#######################################################
Mateus Mateus Mateus Mateus Mateus Mateus Mateus Mateus
#######################################################


1 1 Ainore Jesus Cristo uwobe ekiere . Mariguduwyge uwobe etumana iere Davi . Mariguduwyge uwobe etuo iere Abraão . 2 Abraão onaregedy imedy iere Isaque . Isaque onaregedy imedy iere Jacó . Jacó ore ime emagare . Ia iere Judá . 3 Judá onaregedy imedy iere Peres . Ia onaregedy imedy iere Zera . nowy Peres , nowy Zera etuje iere Tamar . Peres onaregedy imedy iere Esrom . Esrom onaregedy imedy iere Arão . 4 Arão onaregedy imedy iere Aminadabe . Aminadabe onaregedy imedy iere Nasom . Nasom onaregedy imedy iere Salmom . 5 Salmom onaregedy imedy iere Boaz . nowy Boaz uce iere Raabe . Boaz onaregedy imedy iere Obede . nowy Obede uce iere Rute . Obede onaregedy imedy iere Jessé . 6 Jessé onaregedy imedy iere Davi . Boe eimijera kurirewynure ema . nowy Davi ure tugerago Urias oredyjeji toredyjece . Etonaregedy imedyre . Iere Salomão . 7 Salomão onaregedy imedy iere Roboão . Roboão onaregedy imedy iere Abias . Abias onaregedy imedy iere Asa . 8 Asa onaregedy imedy iere Josafá . Josafá onaregedy imedy iere Jorão . Jorão onaregedy imedy iere Uzias . 9 Uzias onaregedy imedy iere Jotão . Jotão onaregedy iere Acaz . Acaz onaregedy imedy iere Ezequias . 10 Ezequias onaregedy imedy iere Manassés . Manassés onaregedy imedy iere Amom . Amom onaregedy imedy iere Josias . 11 Josias onaregedy imedy iere Jeconias . Jeconias uwie magere jamedy . nowy Josias ore ime edy kimore Judá moto keje dykeje Babilônia kejewyge tugobaigarege ere tugerago Judá kejewygei turaga tabo tuduwo ebo toro to moto Babilônia moto ka . 12 Babilônia kejewyge ere Judá kejewyge erego Babilônia moto ka dykeje nowy Jeconias onaregedy imedyre . Ure iedo Salatiel . nowy Salatiel onaregedy imedy iere Zorobabel . 13 Zorobabel onaregedy imedy iere Abiúde . Abiúde onaregedy imedy iere Eliaquim . Eliaquim onaregedy imedy iere Azor . 14 Azor onaregedy imedy iere Sadoque . Sadoque onaregedy imedy iere Aquim . Aquim onaregedy imedy iere Eliúde . 15 Eliúde onaregedy imedy iere Eleazar . Eleazar onaregedy imedy iere Matã . Matã onaregedy imedy iere Jacó . 16 Jacó onaregedy imedy iere José . nowy José oredyje iere Maria . nowy Maria onaregedyre Jesus rema . nowy Jesus iere Pao Kurirewy ure boe ekinorudowunure ema . Ainore Jesus iere . 17 Ainore Jesus uwobe imere . Abraão pijire boe ere quatorze jii Davi boture du ka . Davi pijire boe ere quatorze pugeje jii Babilônia kejewyge ere Judá moto kejewyge etawyje du ka . Judá kejewyge edyre Babilônia moto keje du pijire boe ere quatorze pugeje jii nowy Jesus boture du ka . 18 Ainore Jesus Cristo boture . Uce Maria ure tuwadary maku boe etai tumugumoduie imedy José apo rugadu . Mare emugukare puapo raga . Eribarikare pui raga . Nogoaredy jeribarikareudonure nowy Mariace rugadu . Mare Maria kuiarure . Pao Kurirewy Uwari koiare Maria kuiarure . 19 José jorydywagodyre nowy tumugumode apowu aredy kuiarure duji . Imedy pemegarewynure Joséce rugadu . Jorydywakare kaba kodiba Maria kuiarure Dykodire aidukare tumuguwo apo pugeje . Mare aidukare tuwo Maria pogurudo boe eegai . Dykodire ukare boe ewie . Ure tumeardae tawyje tumagowo tu Mariaji tumugumodukaie apo pugeje . 20 nowy José ure nowy tumeardae tawyje dykeje ia boecoji unuiare . nowy unuia tada ia Pao Kurirewy utugare baru tadawu aregodyre José ae . Makore José ieji . Akore : José . Davi onaregedynure aki . Apagudukaba amuguwo Maria apo rugadu . Reko awai ka amuguwo apo rugadu . Kuiarure mare jeribarikare ia imedyji . Pao Kurirewy Uwari koiare ure kuiarudo . 21 Onaregedy imedymode rugadu . Emare umode boe ekinorudo ewarigudukawo bope doge eda kejewy joruto ero pegarewy morice pugeje . Dykodire tamode iedo Jesus . Ainore nowy Pao Kurirewy utugare baru tadawu akore Joséji . 22 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy makore ia imedyji tuwo boe ewie ainore boemoduie duji . Akore : Nogoaredy jeribarikareudo kuiarumode . Onaregedy imedy mode . Emode iedo Emanuel . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore marigudu . Aino ca nowy Pao Kurirewy batary jeture pudui rugadu . (Nou boe egore Emanuel aino tuwadary tabo . Pawadary tabo pamagore Pao Kurirewy Mugure Pagabo.) 24 Nono care José jetadure . Meartorure nowy Pao Kurirewy makore pudui dyji rugadu . Ure Maria reko tuwai ka tumuguwo apo rugadu . 25 Mare jeribarikare nowy Mariaji jii toro nowy Maria kuri buture du ka . ca Maria kuri buture rugadu . Imedyre rugadu . José ure iedo Jesus rugadu.

2 1 Jesus boture Belém ba kurirewy keje Judéia moto keje . nowy Judéia moto kejewy boe eimijera kurirewy iere Herodes . Jesus boture dykeje ia boe tuginaiwyge jorydywareuge etaregodyre to moto piji Jerusalém ba kurirewy ka . Leste pijire etaregodyre . 2 Etaregodyre Jerusalém ba kurirewy ka dykeje enarare nowy boe dogei . Egore : cerdure Judeu doge eimijera kurirewy maiwu o kuieje tuginaiwuji baru tada . nowy kuieje tuginaiwu ruture dykeje cerdure ji . Dykodire cerduware Judeu doge eimijera kurirewy maiwu boture rugadu duji . Dykodire cedaregodyre aino cewo cebu jodo moto keje jokorai cemago pemegawo ji rugadu . Ema pa ? Kaiba rakojere ? 3 nowy Jerusalém kejewy boe eimijera kurirewy Herodes mearydyre nowy egoino dyji dykeje morora magadure rugadu . Jerusalém ba kurirewy kejewyge emearydyre ewadary ji jamedy Dykodire eiamedy boe emorora magadure jamedy . 4 Dykodire Herodes makore nowy ure Judeu doge enomea maku Pao Kurirewy aiwyge eimijerage ewagai . Makore nowy jorydyware Judeu doge eno bakaru jiwyge eiamedy boe ewagai jamedy . Etaregodyre dykeje Herodes unarare ei kaiba nowy umode boe ekinorudowu botumoduie . 5 Erduware rugadu Dykodire emagore Herodes batary jipagi . Egore : nowy umode boe ekinorudowu botumode Belém ba kurirewy keje . Ainore nowy mariguduwu makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwu bataryre marigudu . nowy batary padure bapera keje . Akore : 6 Belém ba kurirewy mugure Judá uwobe eno moto keje . Boe eda kurikarewynure nowy Belémce . Boe eimijera kurikarewy mugure Belém keje . Mare nowy Belém boe eda kejere ia Judeu doge eimijera kurirewy botumode nono . nowy boe eimijera kurirewy jetu pemegamode iwobe Israel doge eiamedy boei rugadu . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore marigudu . 7 Nono Herodes makore nowy boe tuginaiwyge jorydywareuge ewagai etaregodywo pudae . Makore ei tuginaigody . Unarare ei Dykodire ere Herodes biedy pemegado nuba merire pudui tuiorydyie nowy kuieje tuginaiwu ruture duji . 8 Nono Herodes makore ei etuwo Belém ba kurirewy ka rugadu . Akore : Tadudo toro rugadu . Tagaiwodo rugadu nowy imedy rogu bagai . Tardumode ji dykeje tagirimi kuri mato tawo iwie rugadu kaiba rakojere ituwo toro jamedy iwo ipu jodo moto keje imago pemegawo ji jamedy . 9 nowy boe tuginaiwyge jorydywareuge emearydyre nowy Herodes makore puduiwu boeji dykeje eture pugeje . ca nowy erdure jiwu kuieje rakoje kimore baru tada . Erdure ji . nowy kuieje uture etododai rugadu jii je rugadu . dykeje nowy kuieje ure tuwuredy nono nowy imedy rogu rakojere tadawu bai aogeje . 10 nowy boe tuginaiwyge jorydywareuge erdure nowy kuieje roinoduji dykeje egarere pudui rugadu . 11 Ere tuburedy nowy baiji . Nono ere turemo nowy baito rugadu . Dykejere care erdure nowy imedy roguji . Rakojere tuje Maria apo rugadu . nowy jorydywareuge ere tubu jodo moto keje nowy imedy rogu jokorai tumago pemegawo ji . Emago pemegare ji rugadu . Nono ere toe tadaboe jado tuwo toe maku nowy imedy rogu ai . Ere toe mori kurirewy maku rugadu . Ere tori kuieje maku imedy rogu ai . Ere roreboe mori kurirewy maku ai . Ere jorubo pemegarewy mori kurirewy maku ai . nowy jorubo pemegarewy iere mirra . 12 nowy boecoji enuiare Pao Kurirewy aregodyre pudae duji . Pao Kurirewy makore ei pagaie Herodes akoino ei . Pao Kurirewy makore ei ekaiago tugirimi Herodes ae . Dykodire nowy barogwato ekare tugirimi Herodes ae rugadu . Eture ia awaraji Belém piji tuduwo to moto ka rugadu . 13 nowy boe tuginaiwyge jorydywareuge eture dykeje José unuiare Pao Kurirewy utugare baru tadawu aregodyre pudae duji . nowy Pao Kurirewy utugare baru tadawu makore Joseji . Akore : Aragojedo . Akerago imedy roguji tuje apo jamedy taregodydo toro Egito moto ka tawo tawiado toro Herodes piji . Herodes aiwomode nowy imedy rogu bagai tuwo nowy imedy rogu bito . Tarego piji toro Egito moto ka . Tagaba tagirimi tago moto ka jii toro ire tawie kejewy meri ka . Imire imode tawie kaba meri kejeba tamode tagirimi tago moto ka pugeje . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore Joseji unuia tada . 14 Dykodire José ure turagojedo kuri je nowy boecoji rugadu . Ure tugerago nowy imedy roguji , nowy uceji . Eture nowy boecoji rugadu nowy tuieda piji tuduwo toro Egito moto ka . Eture jii toro etaregodyre Egito moto ka rugadu . 15 Emugu raire nono Egito moto keje jii nowy Herodes bire kejewy meri ka . Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure boe ewie ainore eromoduie . Makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwu ure nowy batary bu bapera keje . Akore : Imagore itonaregedy bagai utuwo Egito moto piji . Aino nowy batary jeture pudui rugadu . 16 ca nowy boe tuginaiwyge jorydywareuge ere cinorudo Herodes piji . Ekare tugirimi ae rugadu . nowy Herodes jorydywagodyre nowy inoduji Dykodire korigodyre rugadu . Aidure tuwo nowy imedy rogu bito marigudu . Mare nowy jorydywareuge ekare tuiorydywado dubobanure ema duji . Dykodire korigodyre . Makore to tugobaigaregei etuwo Belém ba kurirewy ka ewo boe etore ime eiamedy ewido rugadu . nowy boture maibariwyge , nowy jorure mitotu , pobetu kejewyge eiamedy boe ewido . Emode nowy Belém ba kurirewy tadawyge boe etore kugure ime ewido , nowy mugure puredywyge boe etore ime ewido jamedy . nowy boe tuginaiwyge jorydywareuge ere Herodes bie kaba meri kejeba eture to moto piji . Dykodire Herodes meardaere jorumoduie pobe ei etaiwore bagaiwu imedy roguji . Dykodire makore to tugobaigaregei ewo nowy boe etore ime ewido , ewo nowy boture maibariwyge ewido , nowy o jorure mitotu , pobetu kejewyge boe etore ime ewido jamedy . Dykodire nowy tugobaigarege eture toro . Ere nowy boe etore ime eiamedy boe ewido rugadu Belém ba kurirewy keje , nowy rakojere nowy Belém ba kurirewy puredywyge ewido jamedy . 17 Pao Kurirewy ure boe ewie nowy inoduji marigudu . Ure tuwadary maku makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwu Jeremias ai . Akore : 18 Boe eda Ramá rakoje jaekare Belém piji . Ramá kejewyge etragudu rakamode rugadu . Ekiarigodymode rugadu . Boe emearydymode etraguduji rugadu . nowy moto kejewyge etuje Raquel uwobe areme etragudumode tore ewagai . Boe erduwamodukare tuwo ewudugugo nowy tigiarigodyre dupiji . Etore kugure eiamedy boe ewire dukodi . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore marigudu . Aino care nowy Pao Kurirewy batary jeture pudui rugadu . 19 Toro ia meri keje Herodes bire rugadu . Nono ia Pao Kurirewy utugare baru tadawu aregodyre José ae toro Egito moto ka . Makore Joséji unuia tada . 20 Akore : nowy aidure tuwo imedy rogu bitowu bokware . Aino ca taragojedo taduwo taibagi tago moto ka pugeje , aki , nowy imedy rogu , nowy uce jamedy tawo tagirimi Israel moto ka . 21 Dykodire José ure turagojedo . Ure tugerago toredyjeji , nowy imedy roguji dykeje eture rugadu toro to moto Israel moto ka rugadu . 22 Kodure awaraji dykeje José mearydyre nowy imedy Arquelau muguie tuo Herodes mugato boe eimijera kurireuwo ema nono Judéia moto keje . Dykodire José pagudure tuduwo Judéia moto ka . Unuia tadare Pao Kurirewy ure bie jamedy utukawo toro Judéia moto ka . Dykodire José uture toredyje apo nowy imedy rogu apo jamedy toro Galiléia moto ka . 23 Etaregodyre Galiléia moto ka dykeje eture toro Nazaré ba kurirewy ka tumuguwo nono . Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure boe ewie eromoduie aino . nowy makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge ere nowy Pao Kurirewy batary bu bapera keje . Akore : nowy umode boe ekinorudowu iemode Nazaré ba kurirewy pijiwunure ema . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore marigudu . Aino ca nowy Pao Kurirewy batary jeture pudui rugadu.

3 1 Ia meri keje João Batista rakojere boe maerewy keje Judéia moto keje . Nonore rakojere tumago tabo Pao Kurirewy batary ji . 2 Akore : Tagera ra taro pegarewy piji . Boe puredygody Pao Kurirewy uwo boe eimijera kurireudo pudumi rugadu . 3 Ainore João Batista akore . Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure boe ewie ia makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwu aregodymoduie nono João mogadure rugadu . Mariguduwu makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwu Isaías ure nowy Pao Kurirewy batary bu bapera keje . Akore : Ia imedy uwadodynure boe maerewy keje boe ewo awara jetorodo boe eimijera aregody pemegawo boe etae . Mare awara ji karega akoino . Boe ewo turo jetorodo . Dujire akoino . Boe ewo turo pemegado , umode boe ekinorudowu imedy aregodymode Pao Kurirewy piji kodi . Dujire akoino . João Batista jirabodu Pao Kurirewy akoino . 4 João Batista ukudaure camelo buce . Pegajejewure tapira biri rema . Okwagere tu bakakua dogei , ropa doge eweguruji tu rugadu . 5 Boe emagare tudu tabo João ae . Etaregodyre Judéia moto piji . Etaregodyre Jerusalém ba kurirewy piji . Etaregodyre Jordão Po okwaiwu moto jamedy boe piji tumearydywo João Batista makore jiboeji . 6 Emearydyre João Batista batary ji dykeje emagore turo pegarewy jiboeji , taiduie tuwo tugera ra nowy turo pegarewy jiboe piji . Nono João Batista ure etao pegodo Jordão Po tada . 7 Mare ia fariseu doge etaregodyre João Batista ae . Ia saduceu doge etaregodyre João Batista ae jamedy . Judeu doge eimijeragenure emage . Etaregodyre João Batista ae etao pegododywo jamedy . Mare etaidukare tuwo tugera ra turo pegarewy piji . Dykodire João Batista makore ei . Akore : Tare nono awague pegareuge emogadure . Mare awagu ji karega inagoino . Tare tadugarege Judeu doge ekiripagado . Tagagore taro pemegaie mare ro pegareugenure tagi rugadu . Kocare tagaregodyre mato iwagai . Tarokwacerewy bokwa . Pao Kurirewy umode boe pegado tai taro pegarewy morice rugadu . 8 Mare taro jetorodo tarore jiboeji boe erduwo taroji boe erduwawo tare tagera ra taro pegarewy piji duji . 9 Mare tamodukare tagera ra taro pegarewy piji dykeje Pao Kurirewy uwobe emodukare tagi . Tagagore boe etuo Abraão ore enuie tagi Dykodire Pao Kurirewy uwobe enuie tagi . Ainore tagagore . Boe jokodu jire tagagoino . Abraão uwobenure tagi rugadu . Mare du inodu kodi karega Pao Kurirewy ro pegamodukare tai taro pegarewy morice . Ro pegareugenure tagi rugadu . Dykodire tagare nono Abraão uwobe remawyge emogadure pugeje . Pao Kurirewy roiware tuwo tori udo nono boe emogadure tuwo Abraão uwobedo emage tamugato . 10 Boe emode tudureboe i butudo jerigice tudu bokware dukodi . Tagi tagagomode tamoduie tagera ra taro pegarewy piji mare taro pemegamodukare , tameardae pemegamodukare dykeje Pao Kurirewy ro pegamode tai jamedy nono boe erore nowy jerigi jitu mogadure . Mare jerigi ji karega inagoino . Boe pegamode tai rugadu . Dujire inagoino . Pao Kurirewy umode boe pegado tai taro pegarewy morice kuri je rugadu . Dujire inagoino . 11 Boe ere tugera ra turo pegarewy piji Dykodire ire etao pegodo pobo tabo . Mare ia imedy ro kodumode ikoriwu aregodymode kuri iregodaji . Boe pemegarewynure ema , boe kurirewy mode ema rugadu . Dykodire ipogurumode ipuredywo ji , kurikarewynure imi kodi . Emare umode Tuwari tugu boe emeardaeto boe ero pemegawo . Umode ro pegareuge ewarigu joruto jamedy . 12 Romode nono ia imedy rore trigo jitu mogadure . Imedy umode trigo jukodo baku tabo tuwo iwo tawyje nowy trigo piji . nowy trigo remawure umode tugu baito . nowy iwore umode barigu joruto . nowy umode boe ekinorudowu romode aino boei jamedy . Meartorure Pao Kurirewy jiwyge ere nono trigo mogadure . Mare trigo ji karega inagoino . Umode boe ekinorudowu umode meartorure Pao Kurirewy jiwyge etawyje ro pegareuge epiji tuwo edydo pudabo . Dujire inagoino . Umode ro pegareuge ewarigu bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto . Dujire inagoino . nowy joru akedymodukare rugadu . Ainore João Batista akore . 13 Ia meri keje Jesus uture Galiléia moto piji toro Jordão Po ka , João Batista bagai , João Batista uwo Jesus ao pegodo . 14 Jesus aregodyre João Batista ae mare João Batista aidukare tuwo Jesus ao pegodo . Akore : Ro pegarewynure imi Dykodire ipemegakare iwo akao pegodo . Aki apemegare awo itao pegodo rugadu . 15 Mare Jesus akore : Boro . Amode itao pegodo rugadu . Ainore Pao Kurirewy meardaere . Amode itao pegodo dykeje pamode Pao Kurirewy makore jiboe jamedy boe jetudo pudui . Aino Pao Kurirewy meardae pemegarewy jire paroino rugadu . Dykodire João ure tumeardaedo nono Jesus makore jiboe mogadure . 16 Ure Jesus ao pegodo rugadu . dykeje Jesus ure tudawyje Jordão Po piji . Nono barure tuiado . Jesus jorydyre Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure turawyje baru piji rugadu . Ure nono metugore . Ure tumugudo Jesus keje . 17 Nono Pao Kurirewy makore baru piji . Akore : Itonaregedy reo . Imearydy kurire ji rugadu . Ure iagaredo i rugadu.

4 1 Nono Pao Kurirewy Uwari makore Jesusji utuwo toro boe maerewy ka . Nonore maroboe doge eimijera umoduie turo kagado Jesusji tuwo Jesus meardae pegado tumeardaeji . 2 Torore merire quarenta Jesusji . nowy meri jamedyji Jesus okwagekare iaboeji iaboeji . Dykodire uke boire ji . 3 Nono nowy maroboe aregodyre Jesus ae rugadu . Akore : Pao Kurirewy onaregedy remawu mode aki dykeje amagodo awu toriji uwo tudo nono amirewy mogadure awo kowuje . 4 Jesus akore : Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary koiare iromodukare nono ameardae mogadure . nowy bakaru akore : Boe eke mitodu tabo karega imedy rakojemode moto keje mare Pao Kurirewy o batary jamedy boe tabo. 5 Maroboe eimijera uture Jesus apo toro Jerusalém ba kurirewy ka . Uture apo toro Pao Kurirewy uwai ricorewy ao ka . 6 Nono makore Jesusji pugeje . Akore : Pao Kurirewy onaregedy remawu mode aki dykeje amode akaredo awu bai ricorewy ao piji toro moto ka . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore tumoduie tudugarege baru tadawyge ekera braredo ai . Eetu pemegamoduie ai akawo akogorido . Awure jamedy jetumodukaie toriji . 7 Mare Jesus akore : Boro iromodukare aino . nowy padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary remawu akore : Boe ekawo turo kagado Pao Kurireuji. 8 Dykejere nowy maroboe eimijera uture Jesus apo toro ia tori kurirewy ao ka . Ure Jesus jorydydo moto jamedy boeji taci je . Akore : Awu moto jamedy boe makudure inai inoce . Awu moto kejewyge eimijeranure imi . Itaidumode dykeje imode awu moto maku itaidure jiwyge etai . ca amode apu jodo iogorai akagomode akaiduie i amoduie akimijerado imi ameartoruwo i dykeje imode awu moto jamedy boe maku akai , imode awu moto kejewyge eimijerado aki . 10 Jesus akore : Boro . Iromodukare aino . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Boe etaiduwo tu Pao Kurireuji ewo tubu jodo moto keje tu Pao Kurirewy jokorai emago pemegawo tu Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Boe emeartoruwo tu Pao Kurireuji rugadu. Mare akiere satanáz . Maroboenure aki rugadu . ca atudo ipiji . 11 Dykodire maroboe eimijera uture Jesus piji rugadu . Nono Pao Kurirewy utugarege baru tadawyge etaregodyre Jesus ae . Eetu pemegare Jesusji rugadu . 12 Mare boe eimijera ure João Batista tugu baicoreuto . ca Jesus mearydyre nowy inoduji dykeje ure tugirimi Galiléia moto ka Nazaré ba kurirewy ka . 13 Nono Jesus uture Nazaré ba kurirewy piji . Uture toro Cafarnaum ba kurirewy ka . nowy Cafarnaum ba kurirewy mugure nowy pobo maerewy okwai . nowy pobo marewy iere Galiléia . Naftali moto kejere nowy Cafarnaum ba kurirewy mugure . nowy Cafarnaum ba kurirewy mugu puredyre Zebulom motoji jamedy . 14 Dykodire ia Pao Kurirewy batary jeture pudui . nowy makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwu imedy Isaías ure nowy batary bu bapera keje . Akore : 15 nowy iere Galiléia aino jiwu pobo maerewy okwai Zebulom moto mugure , Naftali moto mugure jamedy . Boe ekodumode nowy moto kajeje taregodywo nowy pobo maerewy ka , taregodywo Jordão Po ka jamedy . Boe tuginaiwyge emugure nowy moto keje jamedy . nowy boe emugu pemegakare . Emugure boeco tada . Emugure kejewy moto ure nono bireuge eda mogadure . Mare boeco ji karega inagoino . nowy boe erduware tuwimoduie . Dujire inagoino . Erduwakare tuwo tuginorudo nowy tuwi piji . Dujire inagoino . Mare aino erdure ia jorugu kurireuji . Ure nono meri joku rutu mogadure . Mare jorugu ji karega inagoino . Meri joku rutu ji karega inagoino jamedy . Umode boe ekinorudowu jire inagoino . Boe erduware umode boe ekinorudowuji . Dujire inagoino . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore marigudu . Aino care Jesus aregodyre . Dujire nowy Pao Kurirewy batary akoino . 17 nowy meri kejere Jesus makogodyre boei . Makore tu tyje boe ewiagai tuwo erduwado Pao Kurirewy meardaeji . Akore : Tagera ra taro pegarewy piji . Kuri aino Pao Kurirewy umode boe eimijera kurireudo pudumi rugadu . 18 Ia meri keje Jesus merure nowy Galiléia Po Maerewy okwaji . Nono jorydyre Simãoji nono pobo okwai . nowy Simão iere Pedro jamedy . Jesus jorydyre nowy Simão umanaji jamedy . nowy umana iere André . nowy ime pobedy doge ere tuwyge barigu poboto kare ewagai . Emaragodae reno . 19 Nono Jesus makore etae . Akore : Mato itabo . Imode tawogudo ime ewagai . Mare tawogu ji karega inagoino . Tamode boe emeartorudo Pao Kurireuji . Dujire inagoino . Ainore Jesus akore . 20 ca nowy ime pobedy doge ere tugera ra tuwyge piji taci je . Eture Jesus apo rugadu tumaragodae piji rugadu . 21 Eture ji je dykeje erdure ia boei pugeje . Zebedeu ore imenure emage . Ere pobe . Ia iere Tiago . nowy uwie imedy iere João . Emugure tuo apo to ika kurirewy tada . Emaragodyre tuwugeji tuwo tuwyge epemegado . Nono Jesus makore etae . 22 ca eture to ika kurirewy piji kuri je . Nono eture tuo piji tuduwo Jesus apo rugadu . 23 Nono Jesus kodure nowy Galiléia moto jamedy boe parugajeje tuwo boe eiamedy boe erduwado Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Ure turemo tu tu nowy Judeu doge ere bato puiwu to baito tuwo erduwado nono . Ure ewie tu tyje Pao Kurirewy umoduie boe eimijera kurireudo pudumi kuri aino rugadu . Ure kogodyrewy boe epemegago jamedy . 24 nowy Jesus akaru ure tumaedo Síria moto jamedy boe ka . Dykodire boe etaregodyre Jesus bagai kogodyreuge eiamedy boebo . Iage etaora , emorora , ekana , epogora korire ei rugadu . Bope doge emedyre iage etada . Iage epogora pegare emeru bokware . Iage ewikigodyre tu tyje tumagadu tabo . Jesus ure awu kogodyreuge eiamedy boe epemegago . 25 Boe emagare taregody tabo Jesus ae tuduwo Jesus apo rugadu . Boe etaregodyre Galiléia moto piji , Decápolis moto piji , Jerusalém ba kurirewy piji , Judéia moto piji . nowy torowu Jordão Po bakowu kejewyge boe ekurugodyre nowy pobo kajeje mato Jesus ae tuduwo apo jamedy.

5 1 Jesus jorydyre nowy boei dykeje ruture ia tori kurirewy ao ka . Nono ure tumugudo . nowy ure jorydywadowyge etaregodyre Jesus ae jamedy . 2 Nono Jesus makore ei tuwo erduwado . Akore : 3 Ia boe enojarokare pudui . Dykodire eragojemode Pao Kurirewy apo . Ere tugimijerado ema Dykodire eragojemode apo rugadu boe pemegarewy keje . Dykodire egaremode pudui . Boe pemegamode ei rugadu . 4 Ia boe etragudure tugiarigodyre dukodi . Mare du inodu tabo Pao Kurirewy umode ewudugugo . Dykodire egaremode pudui rugadu . Boe pemegamode ei rugadu . 5 Ia boe emaragody pemegamode tugimijera ai mare ekorigodymodukare ji rugadu . Mare Pao Kurirewy umode tumagore jiboe maku nowy maragody pemegareuge etai rugadu . Dykodire egaremode pudui . Boe pemegamode ei rugadu . 6 Ia boe ere turagado pudui tumeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji tuwo turo jetorodo . Ewiagorore tu turo pemegawo tu rugadu . Ewiapagakare iaboeji iaboeji . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy umode turaga maku etai rugadu ewo turo jetorodo . Dykodire egaremode pudui . Boe pemegamode ei rugadu . 7 Ia boe enogudugodyre boebo rugadu . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy okudugodymode ebo nowy ero jipagi . Dykodire boe pemegamode ei rugadu . Eegaremode pudui rugadu . 8 Ia boe emeardae pegarewy bokware . Emeardae pemegare . Boe pemegamode ei rugadu . Erdumode Pao Kurireuji tuioku tabo rugadu . Dykodire egaremode pudui rugadu . 9 Ia boe erugodykare boei . Emago kigodyre boei erugodykawo pui pugeje epemegawo pui rugadu . Boe pemegamode nowy boei . Pao Kurirewy umode toredo emage . Dykodire egaremode pudui rugadu . 10 Ia boe emeartorure Pao Kurireuji Dykodire ro pegareuge emago pegare ei , ero pega kigodyre ei . Mare du inodu tabo boe pemegamode nowy meartorure Pao Kurirewy jiwugei . Ere tugimijerado Pao Kurireuce Dykodire eragojemode Pao Kurirewy apo rugadu boe pemegarewy keje . Dykodire egaremode pudui rugadu . 11 Tameartorumode imagore tai jiboeji Dykodire boe emago pegamode tarore jiboeji boe emeartorukawo tai pugeje . Tagodymode iwadary kodaji dykeje boe emago pegamode tai , ero pegamode tai , egomode taro pegaie tuwadrarodu tabo . Ainore ewobe emago pegare jamedy jauboei . Mariguduwyge ewobe ero pegare nowy mariguduwyge makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwugei jamedy . Mare tare tameartorudo i Dykodire emago pegare aino tai jamedy . Mare kocare tameartorukaba egoino jiboeji . Taegaredo tai . Mare paga karega . Pao Kurirewy umode mori kurido tagai toro baru tada . Dykodire care taegaregodymode tai rugadu . 13 Jesus mako kimore . Akore : Tameartorure i Dykodire tare nono sal mogadure . Sal pemegare . Mare nowy sal pegomode dykeje nowy sal akedymode . Nono umodukare nono sal mogadure pugeje . Dykodire boe eromodukare iaboeji nowy sal tabo pugeje . Emode barigu . Ewure jomode keje . Mare sal ji karega inagoino . Tameartorure i . Dujire inagoino . Tagaba tagera ra tameartorure i dupiji . Nono meartorukarewyge erdumode taro pemegareuji . Nono etaidumode tumeartoruwo i jamedy . Dujire inagoino . 14 Tameartorure i Dykodire tare nono jorugu mogadure . Boe emode jorugudo ia tori kurirewy ao keje dykeje boe eiamedy boe erdumode joruguji . 15 Boe emode pori bu jorugu aogeje dykeje urugumodukare . Mare boe emode jorugu braredo , uruguwo pudui . 16 Mare jorugu ji karega inagoino . Tameartorure i . Dujire inagoino . Tamodukare tagera ra tameartorure i dupiji dykeje boe erdumode taro pemegareuji . Dujire inagoino . Boe erdumode taro pemegareuji dykeje emago pemegamode tameartorure jiwu Pao Kurireuji . Emagomode Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto . Dujire inagoino . 17 Ia boe egore itaregodyie iwo Moisés ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaru akedydo . Mare itaregodykare iwo nowy bakaru akedydo . Ia boe egore itaregodyie iwo makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge emagore jiboe akedydo . Mare itaregodykare iwo nowy emagore jiboe akedydo . Itaregodyre iwo Moisés ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaru makore jiboe jetudo pudui . Itaregodyre iwo nowy makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge emagore jiboe jetudo pudui . 18 Moisés makore jiwu Pao Kurirewy o bakaru jetumode pudui rugadu . nowy ia makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge emagore jiwu Pao Kurirewy o bakaru jetumode pudui rugadu . nowy Pao Kurirewy o bakaru tadawu ia batary rogu akedymodukare piji rugadu jii toro moto akedymode du ka , jii toro baru akedymode du ka . nowy makore jiboe jamedy boe jetumode pudui rugadu . Boe jokodu jire inagoino rugadu . 19 Ia boe emeartorumodukare awu Pao Kurirewy bakaru tadawu batary roguji . Emode ia boe emeartoru bokwado nowy batary roguji jamedy dykeje Pao Kurirewy umode boe eimijerado pudumi dykeje mako pegamode ei . Akomode nowy roinowugei : Itugarege jorydywakareugenure tagi pemegakareugenure tagi . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akomode ei . Umode boe eimijera kurireudo pudumi dykeje ainore akomode ei rugadu . Mare ia boe emeartorumode awu Pao Kurirewy batary ji , emode boe erduwado awu Pao Kurirewy batary ji dykeje Pao Kurirewy mako pemegamode ei . Akomode ei erduwaie epemegaie ekurie nowy tudugarege eiamedy boe ekori . Pao Kurirewy umode boe eimijera kurireudo pudumi dykeje ainore akomode ei . 20 Iwo tawie . Pao Kurirewy umode boe eimijera kurireudo pudumi rugadu . Mare tamodukare taro jetorodo fariseu doge ero kori dykeje tagimijera umodukare Pao Kurireuce . Tamodukare taro jetorodo nowy jorydyware Judeu doge eno bakaru jiwyge ero kori dykeje tagimijera umodukare Pao Kurireuce . 21 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy makore boei ekawo boe ewido . Tarduware nowy batary ji marigudu . Pao Kurirewy akore boe emoduie boe ewido dykeje boe eimijerage emoduie boe pegado ei ero pegarewy morice . 22 Mare imode tawie Pao Kurirewy meardae remawuji . Boe ekorigodymode tumediaji dykeje Pao Kurirewy umode boe pegado ei nono turo moga nowy ure boe ewidowu jitu mogadure . Ia pugeje . Iaboe akomode tumediaji boe kaieguie ema dykeje nowy metia umode nowy akoino puduiwu reko Judeu doge ekimijerage etae ewo boe pegado ji nowy batary pegarewy morice . Ainore tarore . Mare imode tawie Pao Kurirewy meardae remawuji . Ia boe akomode tumediaji jorydywa bokwaie rugadu dykeje boe pegamode ji rugadu . Umodukare togwa ra nowy tuwadary pegarewy piji dykeje barigudumode bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto rugadu . 23 Dykodire imode tawie . Tagaregodymode Pao Kurirewy uwai ka ia tagoe tabo tawo maku Pao Kurirewy ai . Mare tagaregody keje tawiabuture ia taro pegare tamedia jitu ka . nowy tamedia jorydy pemegakaie nowy taroino pudui duji . 24 Dykodire tamode nowy tagoe bu moto keje nono Pao Kurirewy uwai tada taduwo kuri nowy tamedia bagai . Tardumode nowy tamediaji dykeje tamago pemegado ji tagiarigodyie nowy taro pegareuji , tamodukaie nowy taro towuje pugeje . Dutabore tamode tabemegado ji pugeje . Tabemegamode pui pugeje dykeje tamode tagirimi Pao Kurirewy uwai ka tawo nowy tagoe maku Pao Kurirewy ai rugadu . 25 Ia boe ekorigodymode tai . Egomode tumoduie tarego boe eimijera kurirewy ae tumago pegawo ia tarore jiboeji nowy boe eimijera biagai . nowy boe eimijera makomoduie tai tawo iaboe maku nowy boe etai taro pegarewy morice . nowy boe eimijera umoduie tamagu tugobaigarege etai . Umoduie tadugu baicoreuto . Ainore nowy korigodyre taiwyge egomode . Parduwakare boemode aino tai rugadu duji . Dykodire imode tawie . Ia boe ekorigodymode tai . Emagomode tai tumoduie tarego boe eimijera bagai aiwowo ia taro pegarewy bagai dykeje tamago pemegado ei tawo nowy boe ekorigodyredy barigu epiji . Taro pemegado ei ekorigodykawo tai pugeje kuri je . 26 Boe jokodu jire inagoino . Tamodukare tabemegado nowy korigodyre taiwugei dykeje emode tarego boe eimijera bagai rugadu . nowy boe eimijera umode tadugu baicoreuto rugadu . Taedymode nono jii tamode taro pegarewy morido du ka . 27 Marigudu tarduware bakaruji rugadu . Akore boe eribarikaiago toredyje piji toredy piji . 28 Mare aino care imode tawie Pao Kurirewy meardae remawuji . Boe etaiwomode aredyji tumeardae pegarewy tabo tuwo tugerago nowy aredyji . Dutabore emeardae ure nono boe ero moga tuieribari tabo jitu mogadure Pao Kurirewy jakai . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy jorydy pegare nowy emeardaeji . 29 Boe etaidukare tuioku bokwawo . Mare epagudure tuwariguduwo bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto rugadu . Dykodire imode tawie . Taeku umode tameardae pegado dykeje nowy taeku tawuje . Mare taeku remawu ji karega inagoino . Tagaidure jiwu tameardae pegarewy jire inagoino . nowy tameardae pegarewy barigu tagaora piji rugadu tameardaekawo nowy tameardae pegareuji pugeje . Dujire inagoino . 30 Boe etaidukare tugera kadodywo tugana piji . Mare epagudure tuwariguduwo bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto rugadu . Dykodire imode tawie . Tagera umode taro pegado dykeje nowy tagera kado tagana piji rugadu . Mare tagera remawu ji karega inagoino . Tagaidure jiwu taro pegarewy jire inagoino . nowy taro pegarewy barigu tabiji rugadu tarokawo nowy taro pegareuji pugeje . Dujire inagoino . 31 Marigudu Moisés ure taro maku tagai . Akore ia imedy umoduie tugera ra toredyje piji dykeje umoduie bapera atugodo tuwo maku toredyje ai tuwo toredyje bie tuie tugera ra piji duji . Umoduie tugie bu nowy bapera atugododyrewy keje rugadu . 32 Mare imode tawie Pao Kurirewy meardae remawuji . Imedy umode tugera ra toredyje piji mare mugumode ia aredy apo pugeje . Du pegare Pao Kurirewy jakai rugadu . nowy imedy ro peganure nowy toredyje boetojiwudo piji rugadu . Ure tudo nono jeribarire toredyje pijiwu mogadure Pao Kurirewy jakai . Mare imedy oredyje jeribarimode nowy toredy piji dykeje nowy imedy aidumode tuwo tugera ra toredyje piji du pegakare . Mare imedy oredyje jeribarikare toredy piji mare nowy imedy umode tugera ra toredyje piji dykeje ro peganure nowy toredyjeji rugadu . Turoino dutabo umode toredyje udo nono jeribarire toredy pijiwu aredy mogadure Pao Kurirewy jakai . Imedy jamedy mugukawo ia aredy ure tugera ra toredy pijiwudo apo . Mugumode apo dykeje umode tudo nono jeribarire toredyje pijiwu mogadure Pao Kurirewy jakai . 33 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy makore boei emagomoduie Pao Kurirewy ie tabo turomode jiboeji dykeje ekawo tuwadary pogurudo . Mare boe emagomoduie Pao Kurirewy ie tabo dykeje nowy emagore jiboe ewo towuje rugadu . Tarduware nowy batary ji marigudu . 34 Mare imode tawie Pao Kurirewy meardae remawuji . Tamagokaba iaboe iaboe ie tabo . Mare tamagodo tameardae pemegareuji . Tawadrarodukaba rugadu . Tamagomode jiboe jetudo pudui rugadu . Tagaba tawadary pogurudo . Tamagomode uu taromoduie ia taroji dykeje tarodo ji rugadu . Tamagomode boro taromodukaie ia boe eroji dykeje tarokaba ji rugadu . Ia boe emagore baru ie tabo tuwo boe emeartorudo tuwadary ji . Mare tamagokaba baru ie tabo . Nonore Pao Kurirewy mugure . Ia boe emagore moto ie tabo tuwo boe emeartorudo tuwadary ji . Mare tamagokaba moto ie tabo . Nonore Pao Kurirewy umode tuwure udo tamudo . Ia boe emagomode Jerusalém ba kurirewy ie tabo tuwo boe emeartorudo tuwadary ji . Tamagokaba Jerusalém ba kurirewy ie tabo . Jerusalém tadare Pagimijera Kurirewy mugumode rugadu . Ia boe emagomode taora ie tabo tuwo boe emeartorudo tuwadary ji . Mare tamagokaba tagaora ie tabo . Taroiwakare tawo tagao corewy kigadudo . Taroiwakare tawo tagao kigadurewy codo pugeje . Tu Pao Kurirewy emare roiware tuwo boe etao udo nono tumeardae mogadure . Dykodire inagoino . Tawadrarodukaba . Tamagore jiboe jamedy boe jetudo pudui rugadu tawo boe emeartorudo tawadary ji . Mareboe aidure boe ewadraroduwo boe emeartorukawo pui . Dykodire nowy maroboe meardae jire boe eroino tumagowo iaboe ie tabo ia tumagore jiboeji . 38 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure boe ewie nuba eromoduie tuwo ia boe ero pegare jiboe morido etai . Akore boe erowo ji nono ro pegare jitu mogadure . Ia boe umoduie ia tumedia joku pegado dykeje boe ewo nowy ro pegare tumedia jiwu joku pegado jamedy ro pegare tumedia jitu morice . Ia boe umoduie ia tumedia o kado dykeje boe ewo nowy ro pegare tumedia jiwu o kado jamedy ro pegare tumedia jitu morice . Tarduware nowy Pao Kurirewy batary ji marigudu . 39 Mare imode tawie Pao Kurirewy meardae remawuji rugadu . Tagaba ro pegarewy rore taiboe morido ai . Ia ro pegarewy umode tugera to taeji tae aobowu metia maku ai jamedy uwo tugera to ji jamedy . 40 Ia boe etumode boe eimijera bagai tuwo tugerago tagudau meture taiwuji tabiji dykeje maku etai rugadu . Mare ia tagudau okwatorurewy biaku epa maku etai jamedy . 41 Ia boe tuginaiwyge tugobaigarege ero rakamode tai tagoredywo toe tabo pudai jii kilometro oto paka tagerago ji tagoredywo tabo rugadu . Mare kilometro udo pobe taroino enoe tabo duji . 42 Ia boe enogomagudumode tai iaboe bagai dykeje maku etai rugadu . Ia boe enogomagudumode tai ia tago diero bagai mare ia meri kejeie tumoduie morido tagai dykeje diero maku etai rugadu . 43 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy akore boe emearydy kuriwo tumedagei tuwobei . Marigudu tagimijerage egore boe erdu pegawo jorydy pegare puduiwugei . Tamearydyre nowy batary ji marigudu . 44 Mare imode tawie Pao Kurirewy meardae remawuji . Tamearydy kurido jorydy pegare taiwugei , onare taiwugei . Tamagodo baruto Pao Kurirewy bagai nowy ro pegare taiwyge eparu tabo . 45 Dykodire care boe erduwamode Pao Kurirewy orenure tagi duji . Pao Kurirewy emare ure meri joku jorugudo ro pemegareugei ro pegareugei jamedy . Emare ure bubutudo ro pemegareuge eno moto keje ro pegareuge eno moto keje jamedy . 46 Tamearydy kurimode tu ro pemegare taiwugei dykeje taro pemegamodukare ro pegareuge ero kori . nowy ure tugerago boe enoe mori jiwu imedy ro pemegare puduiwugei jamedy . Mare tamearydy kuriwo boe eiamedy boei nono Pao Kurirewy umode boe pemegado tai jamedy . 47 Tagimadumode tu tawobebo tu tamedagebo dykeje taro pemegamodukare ro pegareuge ero kori . Ro pegareuge meartorukare Pao Kurirewy jiwyge ekimadure tuwobebo tumedagebo jamedy . Mare tagimaduwo boe eiamedy boebo . Nono Pao Kurirewy jorydy pemegamode tarore jiboeji . 48 Dykodire inure tawie . Taro jamedy boe pemegado nono Pao Kurirewy ro pemegarewy mogadure rugadu.

6 1 Taro pemegamode boei tu boe egai mare boe etaiwokare dykeje tamodukare taro pemegado boei dykeje Pao Kurirewy umodukare nowy taro pemegarewy morido baru tada . 2 Dykodire tamode ia tagoe maku marenaru doge etai dykeje tagaba boe ewie tapira ukiga tabo . Ia meartorukare tuwadary jiwyge emode boe edo tapira ukiga akodo Judeu doge ere bato puiwu bai tada , awara okwai jamedy tuwo boe eiamedy boe ewie tuie ia toe maku marenaru doge etai . Etaidure tuwo boe emeardae pemegado pudui . Dykodire boe emago pemegamode ei eroino nowy marenaru dogei duji . Mare ere turo pegarewy biado boe epiji . Dykodire boe emago pemegare ei du morimode tu nowuce rugadu . Mare Pao Kurirewy umodukare nowy ero pemegarewy morido etai . 3 Iwo tawie . Tamode iaboe maku marenaru doge etai dykeje tagaba boe ewie taroino duji . Tagaba tamedage ewie . Tagaba tawobe ewie taroino duji . 4 Aino taro pemegarewy biadodymode boe epiji . Mare Pao Kurirewy jorydymode tarore jiboe jamedy boeji . Emare umode nowy taro pemegarewy morido tagai rugadu . 5 Ia boe emeartorukare tuwadary ji . Emagere etaidure tuwo turagojedo nono Judeu doge ere bato puiwu bai tada tumagowo baruto Pao Kurirewy bagai boe erduwo turoinoduji . Etaidure turagojewo nono awara kajeje nono boe eda oiadada tumagowo Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto boe eiamedy boe erduwo turoinoduji . Iwo tawie . Tarokaba nono ero mogadure tamagowo Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto . Boe erdure egoino duji . Dykodire boe emago pemegamode ei . Du erore ainodu morirewy tu rugadu . Mare Pao Kurirewy jorydyware boe remawuji . Dykodire meardae pemegamodukare ei nowy eroino duji . 6 Mare tagi taremo tawaito tamagowo baruto Pao Kurirewy bagai . Tawai bai poro mi tawo taro biado boe epiji . Boe erdukare Pao Kurireuji mare Pao Kurirewy jorydyre boe erore jiboe jamedy boeji . Dykodire umode nowy tare biadowu taro pemegarewy morido rugadu . 7 Tarokaba nono meartorukare Pao Kurirewy jiwyge ero mogadure tamagowo Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto . Meartorukare Pao Kurirewy jiwyge emago raimode tumeartorure jiwu bagai . Emode tuwadary udo nono tuwadaryre tu tyje tumago raiwo tumeartorure jiwu bagai . Egore boe emodukaie tuwadary udo nono tuwadaryre tu tyje dykeje tumeartorure jiwu mearydymodukaie tumagore jiboeji . 8 Tarokaba nono ero mogadure . Tamagokare tagaidure jiboe bagai raga mare Pao Kurirewy jorydyware marigudu tagaidure jiboeji . 9 Dykodire imode tawie . Tamagore Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto dykeje ainore tagagomode : Iogwa Kurireu . Mugure baru tadawunure aki . Boe emago pemegawo akieji tuwo boe emeartorudo tu ai rugadu . 10 Boe emeartoruwo awadary jamedy boeji tuwo tugimijera kurireudo aki rugadu . Akaregody pemegado aro pemegarewy tabo mato moto ka ameardae rugadu boe jetuwo pudui rugadu , nono aro mogadure toro baru tada dumogadure . 11 cege maku cenai meri jamedyji . 12 Awiagodydo cero pegarewy piji nono cewiagodyre ro pegare ceiwyge ero piji dumogadure . 13 Iage etaidumode tuwo tumeardae pegarewy maku cenai tuwo cero pegado . ceginorudo epiji cewiapagakawo nowy emeardae pegareuji . ceginorudo maroboe piji rugadu . Mare paga karega . Boe eimijera kurirewynure aki . Aragare boe jamedy boe kori . Apemegare rugadu . Are aino jii toro rugadu . Ainore uwo rugadu. Ainore tagagomode Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto . 14 Tawiagodymode ro pegare taiwyge ero piji dykeje Pao Kurirewy biagodymode taro pegare jiboe piji jamedy . 15 Mare tawiagodymodukare ro pegare taiwyge ero piji dykeje Pao Kurirewy biagodymodukare taro pegare jiboe piji jamedy . 16 Ia tagimijerage emeartorukare tuwadary ji . Etaidure tuwo turo pegarewy biado boe epiji . Mare emode tugera ra togwage piji ia meri keje tumagowo Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto nowy meriji dykeje emode tie makodudo . Mare pagare eroino . Emode tie makodudo boe erduwo pudui boe emeardae pemegawo pudui . Dykodire etaidure boe erduwo turoino duji . Boe erdure eroino duji . Dykodire boe emago pemegamode ei eroino duji . Dykodire nowy boe emago pemegare pudui nowy morimode tu nowuce rugadu . Mare Pao Kurirewy jorydyware boe remawuji . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy meardae pemegamodukare ei eroino dyji rugadu . ca . Iwo tawie boe remawuji . Tarokaba nono ero mogadure . 17 Tamode tagera ra tagwage piji tu tu ia meri keje tamagowo Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto dykeje nowy taro biado boe epiji . Tae kabi . Puduga tugu tagaoji . Roreboe reko tawiriji . Tae makodukawo . 18 Nono boe erduwamodukare tare tagera ra tagwage piji . Tu Pao Kurirewy jorydywamode taroino duji . Boe erdumodukare Pao Kurireuji . Mare Pao Kurirewy jorydyre boe ere biadowu turore jiboe jamedy boeji . Dykodire emare umode taro morido rugadu . 19 Tawiagorokaba tu tawo tagoe kurido woe moto keje . Tamode tagoe kurido woe moto keje mare borewy umode tagoe pegado . Tagoe akedymode . Iwogureuge ekiwogumode tagoeji tabiji . 20 Mare tawiagorodo tawo tagoe kurido baru tada . Mare moto kejewy tagoe ji karega inagoino . Tawiagorodo tameartoruwo Pao Kurirewy batary ji , tamearydy kuriwo Pao Kurireuji . Dujire inagoino . Tawiagorodo tawo taro pemegado . Dujire inagoino . Tameartorumode Pao Kurireuji dykeje umode boe pemegado tai baru tada . Dujire inagoino . Baru tadare borewy umodukare boe pegado . Iwogureuge ekiwogumodukare nowy Pao Kurirewy ro pemegareuji tabiji . nowy boe pemegare taiboe akedymodukare rugadu . 21 Boe etaidure tuwo toe kurido woe moto keje Dykodire ewiagoromode tu nowy toeji rugadu . nowy boe ewiapagamodukare Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Mare boe enoe jetumode baru tada Dykodire ewiagoromodukare ia moto kejewy toeji pugeje , ewiapagamode tu Pao Kurirewy batary ji rugadu . 22 Tuioku tabore boe erdumode boeji . Mare boe eku pegare dykeje erdumodukare boeji . Imagore jiboe ure nono boe eku mogadure . Mare boe eku ji karega inagoino . Boe emeartorumode imagore jiboeji dykeje erduwamode rugadu . Dujire inagoino . Mare boe emeartorumodukare imagore jiboeji dykeje erduwa bokwamode rugadu . Dujire inagoino . Dykodire tagi tagaidumodukare tarduwawo iwadary ji dykeje boecomode tai rugadu . Mare boeco ji karega inagoino . Tarduwamodukare boe pemegareuji rugadu . 24 Ia imedy ukimijerage emode pobe dykeje mearydy kurimode nouia tugimijeraji . Mare jorydy pegamode nouia tugimijeraji . Meartorumode nouia tugimijera batary ji . Mare meartoru bokwamode nouia tugimijera batary ji . Dykodire boe emode tugimijerado dieroce dykeje ewiapagamodukare tumeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji pugeje . 25 Tamorora magadukaba tage bagai , tagudumode ceboe bagai , tagudau aroia bagai . Pao Kurirewy ure tadowuje . Ure tawodudo . Emare jetu pemegamode tai . 26 Tagaiwodo awu kiebaregei . Ekare boe tugu . Ekare tugerago boeji . Eke ja bokware . Eke muga bokware . Mare du inodu tabo Pao Kurirewy koiare ure enogwagedo . Boenure tagi . Pao Kurirewy mearydy kurire boei nowy kiebarege ekori . Dykodire inagoino tai jetu pemegamoduie tai rugadu . 27 Tamorora magadumode mare du inodu tabo tamodukare tawimode kejewy meri barigu tabiji . 28 Tamorora magadukaba tagudau aroia bagai . Tagaiwodo awu okureboeji . Emodure rugadu mare emage eigoia karega ere tumodudo aino . Pao Kurirewy koiare ure awu okureboe emodudo aino . Mariguduwu Israel doge eimijera kurirewy Salomão oe kuricigore Dykodire meture jiwu ukudau aroia moture rugadu . Mare motukare nono awu okureboe emodu mogadure . ca okureboe emodure mare joru umode ekowu kuri je . Mare boenure tagi . Pao Kurirewy mearydy kurire boei nowy okureboe kori . Dykodire umode tugera maku tagai rugadu . Dykodire inagoino tai tamorora magadukaiago tagudau aroia bagai , tameartoruwo tu Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Tameartorumode ji dykeje tamode nono awu okureboe emogadure jamedy . Pao Kurirewy jetu pemegamode tai rugadu . Kocare tameartorukare ji . 31 Dykodire inagoino tai tamorora magadukaiago tagwagemode jiboe bagai tagudumode ceboe bagai . Tamorora magadukaba tagudau aroia bagai jamedy . 32 Mare meartorukare Pao Kurirewy jiwyge ewiagorore tu nowy tuge roguji toe roguji rugadu . Mare tameartorumode Pao Kurireuji dykeje tawiagoromodukare nowy inoduji pugeje . Pao Kurirewy jorydyware kaba jiba tagaidure . Dykodire tawiagorodo tawo tagimijera kurireudo Pao Kurireuce rugadu . Tawiagorodo tawo taro jetorodo nono Pao Kurirewy meardae mogadure . Tamode tagimijerado ema dykeje umode tage jamedy boe maku tagai rugadu . Umode tagudau aroia maku tagai . Jetu pemegamode tai rugadu . Tamorora magadukaba barogwato boe pegamode tai du bagai , boe rakamode tai dubagai . Boe rakare boei meri jamedyji . Mare tamode tagimijerado Pao Kurireuce dykeje umode tugera maku tagai awu meriji rugadu . Umode tugera maku tagai barogwato jamedy.

7 1 Tawiapagakaba boei boe pegarewy tabo . Tawiapagamode boei boe pegarewy tabo dykeje Pao Kurirewy biapagamode tai boe pegarewy tabo jamedy . Tameardae pegamode boe erore jiboeji tamago pegawo nowy boei dykeje Pao Kurirewy meardae pegamode tarore jiboeji jamedy tumago pegawo tai jamedy nono tamago mogadure . Tamode tameardae tawyje taro pegawo ia tamediaji nowy tamedia ro pegarewy morice . Aino jamedy Pao Kurirewy romode aino tai taro pegarewy morice nono taro moga tamediaji dumogadure . 3 Meartorukare tuwadary jiwugenure tagi . Tardure tamedia joku tadawu boebutu roguji . Mare tardukare taeku tadawu iraji . Mare boebutu rogu ji karega inagoino . Boe ero pegarewy rogu jire inagoino . Biagare tyje mare tardure ji . Dujire inagoino . Dykodire tamago pegare nowy tamediaji . Tagagore : Aro pegare , aino ji . Tagagore tarduwaie tamedia ro pegareuji mare tardukare ia taro pegareuji . Dykodire tameartorukare tawadary ji . Tardukare taeku tadawu ira kurireuji . Mare ira ji karega inagoino . Taro pegarewy kurirewy jire inagoino . Taro pega kurire rugadu mare tagare tardudo ji . Dujire inagoino . Kocare . Tagera ra taro pegarewy piji . Tamode tagera ra taro pegarewy piji dykeje tarduwamode rugadu tamago pemegawo nowy tamediaji nowy tamedia uwo tugera ra turo pegarewy biagarewy piji jamedy . 6 Tagaba Pao Kurirewy maragodae pemegarewy maku ariga doge etai . Mare ariga ji karega inagoino . Meartorukare Pao Kurirewy jiwyge ro pegareuge eire inagoino . Tamode taragado tawo Pao Kurirewy maragodae pemegarewy maku nowy meartoru bokware Pao Kurirewy jiwyge etai dykeje nowy meartorukare Pao Kurirewy jiwyge ro pegareuge ekada kagirimode tai tuwo boe emeartoru akedydo tawadary ji . Emeardaere Pao Kurirewy maragodae uie pagatuje . Dujire inagoino . Tagaba Pao Kurirewy maragodae pemegarewy maku jugureuge etai . Mare jugurewy ji karega inagoino . Meartoru bokware Pao Kurirewy jiwyge ro pegareuge eire inagoino . Tamode taragado tawo Pao Kurirewy maragodae pemegarewy maku nowy meartorukare Pao Kurirewy jiwyge etai dykeje emode tumeardae pegarewy tawyje nowy Pao Kurirewy maragodae pemegarewy piji tuwo nowy Pao Kurirewy maragodae pemegarewy akedydo boe epiji . Emeardaere Pao Kurirewy maragodae uie pagatuje . Dujire inagoino . 7 Tagogwa magudumode Pao Kurireuji iaboe bagai dykeje Pao Kurirewy umode tamagore bagaiboe maku tagai rugadu . Pao Kurirewy aidure tuwo boe erduwado pudui . Dykodire taemarumode Pao Kurirewy bagai dykeje umode tarduwado pudui rugadu . Pao Kurirewy aidure tuwo tuwai poro jado baru tada tuwo boe edo turemo baruto . Dykodire tamode tagera to Pao Kurirewy uwai poroji dykeje umode tuwai poro jado tagai rugadu . Mare bai poro ji karega inagoino . Boe emeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Dujire inagoino . 9 Ro pegareuge ero pemegamode torei . Dykodire tagore emagomode tai amirewy bagai tuge boi koia . Nono tamodukare tori maku etai . Tamode amirewy maku etai rugadu eke boire ei kodi . 10 Tagore emagomode tai karo bagai tuge boi koia . Nono tamodukare awagu maku etai . Tawogumode karo bagai ekece rugadu . 11 Ro pegareugenure tagi mare du inodu tabo tarduware taro pemegawo tagorei tawo eke maku etai rugadu . Tarduware tawo boe pemegarewy maku tagore etai . Mare Pao Kurirewy pemegare rugadu . Dykodire umode boe pemegarewy maku boe etai rugadu du kodumode nowy tare maku tagore etaiboe kori . 12 Dykodire ire tawie . Taro pemegado boei boetoji nono tagaidu moga boe ero pemegawo tai dumogadure . Du nono tameartorunure makudure Judeu doge etaiwu bakaruji . Tameartorunure nowy mariguduwyge makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge emagore jiboeji jamedy . 13 Pao Kurirewy meardae ure nono baiporo biagarewy ja mogadure . Ure nono awara barikarewu mogadure . Boe emode baiporo biagarewy jado tugodywo nowy awara barikareuji taregodywo Pao Kurirewy ae . Mare baiporo ji karega inagoino . Awara ji karega inagoino . Pao Kurirewy meardae jire inagoino . Taragado tai tawo tameardae pemegado nono Pao Kurirewy meardae mogadure tawo taremo baruto Pao Kurirewy mugurewy ka . Dujire inagoino . Bope doge eimijera meardae pegarewy ure nono baiporo kurirewy ja mogadure . Bope doge eimijera meardae pegarewy ure nono awara barirewy mogadure . Boe emode nowy baiporo kurirewy jado tugodywo nowy awara barireuji dykeje ewarigudumode bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto rugadu . Mare baiporo ji karega inagoino . Awara ji karega inagoino . Bope doge eimijera meardae pegarewy jire inagoino . Boe emeartorumode kuri je nowy bope doge eimijera meardae pegareuji . Dujire inagoino . Meartorure jiwyge emagare rugadu . Dujire inagoino . Etaidure tuwo turemo baru tadawu Pao Kurirewy uwaito rugadu mare ekare tugimijerado Pao Kurireuce . Dykodire umodukare edo tiremo rugadu . Meartorure Pao Kurirewy meardae remawu jiwyge emagakare . 15 Taeku jado . nowy ia boe emagomode tai tumagoie Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Mare pagare egoino . Ewadrarodunure . Ere tudo nono ovelha doge emogadure . Mare ovelha ji karega inagoino . Ere tuwadary motudo boe etaiduwo tumagore jiboeji . Mare pagare egoino . Etada ere nono rie pegareuge emogadure . Mare rie ji karega inagoino . Etadare emerdae pegareure . Ewadrarodure tuwo boe ekiripagado Pao Kurirewy batary remawu piji . Dujire inagoino . 16 Mare tagaiwodo erore jiboeji . Erore jiboe umode tarduwado ei . Erore jiboe ure nono kurodurewy tudu mogadure . Boe emodukare tugerago uva tuduji ia boto iku piji . Boe emodukare tugerago figo tuduji ia boto iku piji jamedy . Emode tugerago uva tuduji ia uva iku piji . Emode tugerago figo tuduji ia figo i piji . Mare kurodurewy tudu ji karega inagoino . Makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge batrarodureuge eire inagoino . Ewadary moture mare emeardae pegare Dykodire erore jiboe pegamode jamedy . Dujire inagoino . 17 I pemegarewy tudu pemegamode . Tudu kurodumode dykeje betumode rugadu . Mare i pegarewy tudu pemegamodukare . nowy i tudu pegamode rugadu . Pagodymode rugadu . 18 I pemegamode dykeje tudu pegarewy bokwamode . I pegamode dykeje tudu pemegarewy bokwamode . 19 Ia i tudu pegareumode dykeje boe emode nowy i kado rugadu . Emode barigu joruto . 20 Mare i tudu ji karega inagoino . Makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge eire inagoino . Tumeardae jire erore aino . Dujire inagoino . Tagaiwo pemegado nowy boe erore jiboeji tarduwawo ei rugadu . Nono tarduwamode makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge remawugei , batrarodureugei jamedy . Tarduwa pemegamode ei rugadu . 21 Ia boe egomode i : Ikimijera . Ikimijera. Ainore nowy boe egomode i . Mare pagare egoino Dykodire imodukare eremo baruto . Egomode : Ikimijera . Ikimijeranure aki . Akie tabore imagore awadary ji boe ewiagai . Akie tabore ire bope doge ewarigu boe epiji . Akie tabore iro rakare rugadu tu tyje . Ainore nowy boe egomode i . Mare imagomode ewadary jipagi . Inagomode : Pagare tagagoino . Iorydyware tarore jiboeji . Tameartorukare Iogwa Kurirewy meardaeji . Dykodire ikare iwobedo tagi . ca . Tadudo ipiji rugadu . Ro pegareugenure tagi. Ainore inagomode nowy boei rugadu . Dykodire inure tawie . Tu nowy boe emeartorumode baru tadawu Iogwa Kurirewy meardae jiwyge emode turemo baruto . nowy boe ere tugimijera remawudo Pao Kurireuce rugadu Dykodire emode turemo baruto . 24 Dykodire imode tawie aino . Boe ewiapagamode iwadary ji dykeje emeartorumode nowy imagore jiboeji rugadu dykeje jorydywareuge emode emage . Jorydywareuge emode emage nono ia jorydyware tuwo tuwai pemegadowu imedy mogadure . nowy imedy ure tuwai towuje . Ure iguru pemegarewy tugu mototo rugadu tuwo tuwai pemegado bakuru ukawo tuwai butudo . 25 Nono bubuture rugadu . Pobo aregodyre rugadu . Bakurure rugadu . nowy pobo rerewy jeture nowy imedy uwaiji . Mare nowy uwai butukare rakare dukodi . ca meartorure iwadary jiwu jorydywamode tuwo boe pemegado pudui nono nowy jorydywarewy ure bai pemegado dumogadure . Mare bai ji karega inagoino . Boe ewiapaga pemegamode iwadary ji dykeje emeartorumode rugadu imagore jiboe jamedy boeji . Dykodire nowy boe erduwamode rugadu Dykodire boe pemegamode ei rugadu . Dujire inagoino . 26 Mare boe ewiapagamode iwadary ji mare emeartorumodukare nowy imagore jiboeji rugadu dykeje jorydywa bokwareuge umode emage . Jorydywa bokwareuge umode emage nono ia jorydywa bokwarewy imedy ro moga tuwai jitu mogadure . nowy imedy ure tuwai pemegado jamedy mare ure tugerago iguru pegareuji . Ure tugu mototo mare ukare tugudu pemegado . 27 Nono bubuture . nowy pobo aregodyre . Dykodire pobo jeture nowy imedy ure towu baiji . Bakuru pegarewy jetu rakare ji jamedy . Dykodire nowy uwai buture tuiaruru tabo rugadu . ca nowy meartorukare iwadary jiwu jorydywa bokwamode Dykodire boe pegamode ji nono boe pegare nowy bai jitu mogadure . Mare bai ji karega inagoino . Boe emeartorumodukare tumearydyre jiwu iwadary ji dykeje boe pegamode ei rugadu . Dujire inagoino . 28 ca Jesus ure tumago akedydo . Mare nowy biapagare nowy Jesus batary jiwyge eku kidure nowy Jesus makore jiboeji . 29 Jesus makore jiboe ukare nono nowy boe ekimijerage jorydyware Judeu doge eno bakaru jiwyge ewadary mogadure . Jesus mako pemegare mako jetorore rugadu Dykodire boe erduware Pao Kurirewy batary remawu jire Jesus akoino rugadu.

8 1 Jesus ure turawyje tori ri ao piji . Mare boe eture rekodaji rugadu . Emagare rugadu . 2 Nono ia imedy kogodyrewy aregodyre Jesus togi . nowy imedy kogodae pegare ji rugadu . Ure biri pegado rugadu . nowy imedy aregodyre Jesus togi dykeje ure tubu jodo moto keje Jesus jokorai . Nono makore Jesusji . Akore : Ikimijera . Aragare rugadu awo ipemegago . Akaidumode dykeje amode ipemegago rugadu . 3 Nono Jesus ure tugera raido nowy imedy ae . Ure tugera bu imedy keje . Nono Jesus makore ji . Akore : Uu . Itaidure . ca . Apemegare rugadu . ca nowy imedy pemegagodyre taci je . nowy imedy biri pegakare pugeje . 4 Nono Jesus makore imedyji pugeje . Akore : Amagokaba awu irore ai boeji . Atudo kuri nowy Pao Kurirewy uwai ka . Nonore amode nowy ure Judeu doge enomea maku Pao Kurirewy aiwu imedy jorydydo awiriji . Jorydymode apemegagodyre dyji rugadu . Nono amode nowy Moisés makore jiwu mori maku ai rugadu nono paro mogadure . Nono nowy ure boe enomea maku Pao Kurirewy aiwu imedy umode nowy are maku pudaiwu mori maku Pao Kurirewy ai rugadu . Dykodire boe eiamedy boe erduwamode apemegagodyre rugadu duji . Ainore Jesus makore nowy imedyji . 5 Nono Jesus aregodyre Cafarnaum ba kurirewy ka . Nonore ia tugobaigarege eimijera aregodyre Jesus ae rugadu . Okwa magudure Jesusji rugadu . 6 Akore : Boe eimijeranure aki . Itugare imedy padure toro iwai tada tugogodyre dutabo . Kogodyre rugadu Dykodire meru bokware . Korire ji rugadu . 7 Jesus makore ji . Akore : Itumode toro awai ka iwo atugare pemegago . 8 Mare nowy tugobaigarege eimijera makore Jesusji pugeje . Akore : Boe eimijera kurirewynure aki rugadu . Atukaba iwai ka . Mare tu nowy awadary tabore amode itugare pemegago . Amagomode dykeje itugare pemegagodymode rugadu . 9 Ikimijerare . Tugobaigarege eimijeranure imi jamedy . Imagomode tugobaigare imedyji utuwo toro dykeje utumode toro rugadu . Imagomode iaji aregodywo mato itae dykeje aregodymode itae rugadu . Imagomode itugareji maragodyiago ia imaragodaeji dykeje nowy itugare maragodymode ji rugadu . Dykodire iorydyware nowy itugare kogodae meartorumode awadary ji nono nowy itugare meartorure i dumogadure . 10 Jesus mearydyre nowy tugobaigarege eimijera akoino dyji dykeje Jesus jebogodyre . Makore nowy rakojere pudabowugei . Akore : Iwo tawie . Judeu karugure ema mare awu imedy meartorure i rugadu Israel moto kejewy Judeu doge eiamedy boe emeartoru kori . 11 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy makore Judeu doge ewagai emeartoruwo pudui . Makore ei tumoduie nowy umode boe ekinorudowu arego etae . Abraão meartorure nowy batary ji . Onaregedy Isaque meartorure . Isaque onaregedy Jacó meartorure jamedy . Dykodire toro ia meri keje Pao Kurirewy umode boe ekimijerado pudumi dykeje umode ia tuwadae tawyje etai toro baru tada . ca nowy umode boe ekinorudowu aregodyre . Mare Judeu doge emeartorure nowy umode boe ekinorudowu jiwyge emagakare . Meartorukare nowy umode boe ekinorudowu jiwyge ewarigudumode toro boeco tadawu joru pegareuto . Nonore boe etragudu rakamode rugadu , emode to reko pui tuwiri boe kori koia . Mare boe tuginaiwyge emeartorumode nowy umode boe ekinorudowuji rugadu . Meartorure jiwyge emagamode rugadu moto jamedy boe parugajeje . Emugumode Abraão apo , Isaque apo , Jacó apo nono Pao Kurirewy uwadae keje toro baru tada . 13 Nono Jesus makore nowy tugobaigarege eimijeraji pugeje . Akore : ca . Ameartorure i rugadu . Ire nowy atugare pemegago tu iwadary tabo nono ameartorure i dumogadure . Atudo aibagi toro awai ka arduwo ji . ca Jesus ure tuwadary iado dykeje nowy tugobaigarege eimijera utugare pemegagodyre rugadu taci je . 14 Nono Jesus aregodyre Pedro uwai ka . nowy Pedro uwai tadare Jesus jorydyre Pedro ucarugoji . nowy Pedro ucarugo kogodyre rugadu . Biri urure Dykodire padure nono tuba keje . 15 Nono Jesus ure tugera bu Pedro ucarugo iera keje . ca nowy biri uru akedyre piji taci je . Dykodire nowy Pedro ucarugo ure tumugudo . Ure turagojedo . Dykejere ure ia tuge rogu towuje . Ure ia maku Jesus ai ukece rugadu . 16 nowy boecoji ia boe etaregodyre Jesus ae . Emagare pugeje . Etaregodyre bope doge emedyre tadawugebo rugadu . Nono Jesus ure nowy bope doge etawyje nowy boe epiji tuwadary tabo . Makore ei Dykodire eture nowy boe epiji . Jesus ure kogodyreuge epemegago jamedy . 17 Dykodire care Pao Kurirewy batary jeture pudui rugadu . Marigudu makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwu Isaías ure nowy Pao Kurirewy batary bu bapera keje . Akore : Rakare boe ekogodaeji . Ure boe epemegago rugadu . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore marigudu nowy umode boe ekinorudowu romoduie rugadu . 18 Boe emagare nono Jesus apo rugadu . Ere taiado Jesus apo rugadu . Jesus jorydyre nowy boe eiamedy boei emagare rugadu Dykodire makore nowy ture jorydywadowugei etuwo pudabo toro nowy pobo maerewy okwa bowu ka . 19 Ere tudo turugadu tuduwo dykeje ia jorydyware Judeu doge eno bakaru jiwu imedy aregodyre Jesus ae . Makore Jesusji . Akore : Boe eimijeranure aki . Itaidure ikoduwo akabo akodure jiboe ka . 20 Mare Jesus makore ji . Akore : Okwa doge emugure tiari poro ja tada . Kiebarege emode tamudo tuwaradu ja tada jamedy . Imire Imedy Onaregedynure imi . Mare iwai bokware iedyrewy bokware iwo itamudo tada , inuduwo tada . Boe rakamode kodure itabowugei jamedy . 21 Ia Jesus ure jorydywadowu imedy makore Jesusji jamedy . Akore : Ikodumode akabo rugadu mare kajao . Aino kuri aino itumode kuri iogwa uwai ka . Iogwa bire Dykodire itaidure iwo iogwa tugu mototo jao . Dykejere ikodumode akabo akodure jiboe ka . 22 Mare Jesus makore ji . Akore : Bireuge etugudumode bireugebo mare awiapagakaba ei . Atudo epiji . Ako itabo rugadu . 23 Nono Jesus ure turemo ika kurireuto . nowy ure jorydywadowyge ere turemo apo jamedy . 24 Ekodure nowy ika kurirewy tabo nowy pobo maerewy kajeje dykeje Jesus unudure nowy ika kurirewy ja tada . ca ia bakuru pegarewy aregodyre etae taci je . nowy bakuru ure nowy pobo redo . nowy inodu kodire pobo jeture nowy ika kurireuji . Dykodire pobo ure turemo nowy ika kurireuto rugadu . 25 nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowyge epagudugodyre Dykodire ere Jesus jetadudo . Egore : cegimijera . Pawimode poboto ! Arodo iaboeji awo paginorudo . 26 Jesus akore : Kocare tabagudure ? Kocare tameartorukare i ? Nono Jesus ure turagojedo ika ja tada . Nono makore nowy bakuruji nowy poboji Dykodire nowy bakuru akedyre , nowy pobo butugugodyre jamedy . 27 nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowyge ebogodyre rugadu . Egore pui : Dubobanure awu imedyce ? Kocare bakuru , pobo emeartorure awu imedy batary ji rugadu ! 28 Dykejere Jesus aregodyre toro nowy pobo maerewy okwa bakowu ka ture jorydywadowugebo nowy ika kurirewy tabo . nowy etaregodyre kawu moto iere Gadara . Etaregodyre dykeje ere tudawyje ika kurirewy piji . Mare bope doge emedy tadawu ime eture Jesus togi . Marigudu nowy bope doge emedyre nowy ime etada Dykodire erore pudabo turo pegatabo boe eiamedy boei . Dykodire boe epagudure ece . Dykodire boe etukare toro etae pugeje . nowy ime pobedy doge edy pagare nono aroe eda keje jamedy . 29 Nono ekudugodyre Jesus ae . Egore : Pao Kurirewy onaregedynure aki . Kodiba akaregodyre mato cedae ? Kaba kodiba aroino cewagai ? Toro ia meri keje Pao Kurirewy umode boe pegado cei rugadu . Aki kana amode boe pegado cei kuri aino ? 30 Jugureuge edy puredyre nono togwage tabo . Emagare rugadu . 31 nowy meture nowy ime tadawu bope doge emagore nowy ime eiabiji Jesusji . Egore : Amode cedawyje awu ime epiji dykeje cedydo toro nowy jugureuge etae . cedo ceremo nowy jugureugeto . 32 Dykodire Jesus akore : Toro . Dykodire ere tudawyje nowy ime epiji . Eture toro nowy jugureuge etae . Ere turemo nowy jugureugeto . Dykodire nowy jugureuge eregodyre kuri ia moto ri ao piji taci poboto . Dykodire eiamedy boe ewire poboto rugadu . 33 nowy jeture nowy jugureuge eiwyge eregodyre Jesus piji toro nowy tuwai mugure tadawu ba kurirewy ka tureadodywo boe ewiagai nono . Ereadodyre nowy Jesus rore jiboeji boe eiamedy boe ewiagai . 34 nowy ba kurirewy kejewyge eiamedy boe eture toro Jesus ae . Erdure Jesusji dykeje emagore ji utuwo nowy boe piji . Enogwa magudure Jesusji rugadu utuwo nowy moto piji rugadu.

9 1 Nono Jesus ure turemo ika kurireuto pugeje . Ure tugirimi nowy pobo maerewy kajeje pugeje nowy ture jorydywadowugebo . Dykejere etaregodyre nowy Jesus mugure kejewy ba kurirewy ka . 2 Nono ia boe etaregodyre ia imedy pogora pegarewy apo . nowy imedy pogora pegarewy padure tugudau kodo keje . Jesus jorydyre emeartorure pudui dyji kodire etaregodyre aino nowy imedy pogora pegarewy apo pudae rugadu duji . Dykodire makore nowy imedy pogora pegareuji . Akore : Me . Ire aro pegarewy jamedy boe barigu apiji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy biagodymode aro pegare jiboe piji rugadu . 3 Ia boe eimijerage jorydyware Judeu doge eno bakaru jiwyge etaidukare nowy Jesus akoino duji . Egore tudada : Awu makore jiboe ukare turugadu ! Pagare akoino . Unure tudo nono Pao Kurireure . Tu Pao Kurirewy umode boe ero pegarewy barigu boe epiji . 4 Jesus jorydyware emeardaere jiboeji rugadu . Dykodire makore ei . Akore : Kocare kodiba tameardae pegare aino i . 5 Boe jokodu . Boe emodukare boe ero pegarewy barigu boe epiji rugadu . Tu Pao Kurirewy umode boe ero pegarewy barigu boe epiji rugadu . Mare boe emodukare awu imedy pogora pegarewy pemegago jamedy . Emodukare pemegago rugadu . Tu Pao Kurirewy koiare umode nowy imedy pogora pemegago . 6 Dykodire imode awu imedy pemegago dykeje tarduwamode Imedy Onaregedynure imi duji . Dykodire imode tarduwado iragare iwo boe ero pegarewy barigu epiji ewarigudukawo bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto rugadu . Ainore Jesus akore nowy boe eimijeragei . Nono ure tuie mekido nowy imedy pogora pegarewy ae . Nono makore ji . Akore : Me . Aragojedo . Akerago akudau kodoji atuwo tabo aibagi awai ka . 7 ca nowy imedy ure turagojedo rugadu . Meru pegakare Dykodire uture tuwai ka rugadu . 8 nowy boe eiamedy boe erdure nowy rore aino duji . Erore ta je . Mare emago pemegare Pao Kurireuji . Egore emaie roino Jesusji uwo nowy imedy pogora pegarewy pemegago . 9 Jesus uture nowy boe epiji . Kodure awaraji dykeje jorydyre ure tugerago boe enoe mori jiwu imedyji . Dure iere Mateus . nowy Mateus mugure nono ira keje . Nonore ure tugerago dieroji boe epiji tuwo maku boe eimijera kurirewy ai . Nono Jesus makore ji . Akore : Ako itabo . Nono Mateus ure turagojedo . Ure tugera ra tumaragodae piji tuduwo Jesus apo rugadu . 10 Mateus makore Jesusji okwagewo tuwai keje pudabo . Dykodire Jesus uture Mateus apo toro uwai ka . Jesus ure jorydywadowyge eture Jesus apo jamedy . Boe emagare nono togwage tabo ebo . Imposto diero makudure aiwyge imenure emage . Boe egore ro pegareuge enuie emage . Ia boe etaidukare jiwyge eragojere nono Jesus apo jamedy . 11 Fariseu doge etaregodyre toro etae jamedy . Erdure Jesus rore jiboeji dykeje emagore nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowugei . Egore : Kocare tagimijera okwagere awu ro pegareugebo ? Ukare turugadu ! 12 Jesus mearydyre egoino dyji dykeje makore nowy fariseu doge ewadary jipagi . Akore : Jorubo kuru epa jemarumodukare kogodykareuge ewagai . Mare kogodyreuge ewagaire jemarumode tuwo epemegago . 13 Irore nono nowy jorubo kuru epa ro mogadure . Mare jorubo kuru epa ji karega inagoino . Itaregodyre woe mare ro pemegareuge ewagai karega iroino . Ro pegareuge ewagaire iroino ewo tugera ra turo pegarewy piji . Dujire inagoino . Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure tawie . Tagaiwodo nowy Pao Kurirewy bagai . Akore : Boe emode boe egu barogo rogu kowu tuwo maku inai turo pegarewy morice . Mare itaidure boe enogudugodywo puapo rugadu . Dujire itaidure rugadu. Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore marigudu . ca tarduwado nowy batary ji tameartoruwo ji tarore jiboe tabo . 14 Ia meri keje João Batista ure jorydywadowyge etaregodyre Jesus ae . Egore : Ia meri keje cenogwagemodukare nowy meriji cemagowo Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto nowy meri keje . Ainore cerore . Fariseu doge eromode aino jamedy cero mogadure . Kodiba nowy are jorydywadowyge erokare aino jamedy ? 15 Jesus makore ewadary jipagi . Akore : Ire nono uwiremodewu imedy mogadure . Boe etuwirere dykeje boe ere tuwadae towuje . nowy ewadae kejere boe enogwagemode rugadu . Ewadae reno . Ekiarigodymodukare nowy meriji . Mare ewadae akedyre dykeje uwirerewu imedy utumode epiji toredyjapo . Dykejere care boe emode ia meri tawyje togwagekawo nowy meriji tumagowo Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto nowy meriji . Ire nono nowy uwiremodewu imedy mogadure . Mare uwiremodewu imedy ji karega inagoino . Ire inagoino . Ire irawyje baru piji mato boe ewagai . Mare ia meri keje itumode nowy boe epiji . Dujire inagoino . Itumode nowy boe epiji dykeje boe emode ia meri tawyje togwagekawo nowy meriji tumagowo Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto nowy meri keje . Dujire inagoino . 16 Boe ekudau aroia pegagodyrewy umode tuwowuje . Mare boe emodukare tugudau aroia maiwu kado tuwo nowy tugudau pegagodyrewy poro miwuje tabo . Boe eromode aino dykeje nowy ekudau aroia maiwu gigirimode . Dykodire umode tuwowuje nowy boe ekudau aroia pegagodyrewy piji kuri je rugadu . Dykodire nowy ekudau aroia pegagodyrewy umode tuwowuje ja je pugeje . 17 Boe ere tapira biri maiwu pemegado nowy tugé vinho kuru maiwu jace . Mare emode vinho kuru maiwu tugu tapira biri codureuto dykeje nowy tapira biri codurewy umode tuwowuje . Nono nowy vinho kuru umode tuwarigu nowy tapira biri codurewy piji rugadu . Dykodire boe ekare tuge vinho kuru maiwu tugu tapira biri codureuto . Ere tuge vinho kuru maiwu tugu tapira biri maiwuto tu tyje . Ainore Jesus akore . Mare aroia ji karega akoino . Vinho kuru ji karega akoino . Tuwadary maiwu jire Jesus akoino . 18 Jesus akoino dykeje ia boe eimijera aregodyre ae . Ure tubu jodo moto keje Jesus jokorai . Makore Jesusji . Akore : Itonaregedy aredy bire aino maigody . Mare atudo itabo iwai ka awo akera bu nowy itonaregedy aredy biri keje dykeje jewodumode pugeje . 19 Jesus ure turagojedo tumuga piji . Uture nowy boe eimijera apo toro uwai ka ture jorydywadowugebo . 20 Ekodure awaraji dykeje ia aredy kodure ebo Jesus rekodaji . Marigudu nowy aredy kogodaere tu tyje . nowy aredy ku rere piji nono areme etorewudae mogadure . Mare nowy aredy o akedykare piji . Re kimonure piji meri jamedyji . Joru otopadu kejeboere doze nowy aredy ku rere piji duji . Aino nowy aredy makore tudada . Akore : Imode ikera otorogu jetudo Jesus ukudau aroiaji dykeje ipemegagodymode . Ainore nowy aredy akore tudada . Dykodire nowy aredy ure tugera raido . Nono iera otorogu jeture Jesus ukudau aroiaji . 22 Nono Jesus ure tuie mekido . Jorydyre nowy aredyji rugadu . Akore : Are . Ameartorure i rugadu . Dykodire apemegagodymode rugadu . Nono nowy aredy pemegagodyre taci je rugadu . 23 Nono Jesus aregodyre nowy boe eimijera uwai ka . Boe emagare nono tragudu tabo . edykiorokare . nowy boe ere tuwabo ako rakado jamedy . Jesus jorydyre nowy inoduji dykeje makore nowy boei . Akore : Tadawyje awu bai piji . Aredy rogu bikare . Unudunure tyje . Mare nowy boe erduware nowy nogoaredy bire rugadu dyji Dykodire enogoarigodyre Jesusji . 25 Mare nowy boe eimijera ure nowy boe etawyje tuwai piji . Dykejere Jesus ure turemo nowy nogoaredy padure tadawu baito . dykeje ure tugerago nowy nogoaredy ieraji . Nono nowy nogoaredy jewodure pugeje rugadu . Ure tumugudo rugadu . 26 nowy boe erduware nowy inoduji Dykodire ereadodyre boe eiamedy boe ewiagai awu Jesus rore jiboeji nowy moto jamedy boe parugajeje . 27 Nono Jesus uture pugeje . Mare ia ime joku bokwareuge ekodure Jesus rekodaji . Ere pobe . Ekudugodyre Jesus bagai . Egore : Mariguduwu Judeu doge eimijera kurirewy Davi uwobenure aki . Akogudugo cedabo . 28 Jesus ure turemo ia baito . Nono nowy ime joku bokwareuge ere turemo Jesus rekodaji . Etaregodyre Jesus ae rugadu . Jesus makore ei . Akore : Tameartorure i imode tabemegago dyji rugadu kana ? Egore : Uu . cegimijeranure aki . 29 Dykejere Jesus ure tugera bu eku keje . Nono makore ei . Akore : Tameartorure jiboe jetuwo pudui tai rugadu . 30 Nono epemegagodyre taci je rugadu . Etaiwore pugeje rugadu . Mare Jesus makogodyre ei . Akore : Tareadodykaba boe ewiagai awu irore jiboeji . 31 Mare eture Jesus piji dykeje ereadodyre Jesus rore jiboeji boe eiamedy boe ewiagai nowy moto rugadu boe parugajeje . 32 Eture dykeje iage etaregodyre ia imedapo Jesus bagai pugeje . nowy imedy mako bokware . Roiwakare tumagowo . Bope meture tada kodi . 33 Mare Jesus ure nowy bope tawyje nowy imedy piji dykeje nowy imedy makore pugeje . Boe emagare nono tuiorydyre Jesus roino jitu tabo . Eiamedy boe ebogodyre rugadu . Egore : Marigudu Israel moto kejewy boe erdukare ia awu inodu boeji ji aino . 34 Mare fariseu doge etaidukare Jesus rore jiboeji . Emago pegare ji . Egore : Bope doge eimijera kurirewy raka tabore awu Jesus roino tuwo bope etawyje boe epiji . 35 Jesus kodure nowy moto jamedy boe parugajeje boe eda jamedy boe ka . Aregodymode ia boe eda ka dykeje ure turemo nowy Judeu doge ere bato pui towu baito . Nonore ure erduwado tuwadary pemegareuji tu tyje . Ure ewie Pao Kurirewy umoduie boe eimijerado pudumi kuri je rugadu . Ure kogodyrewy boe eiamedy boe epemegago jamedy . 36 Boe emagare Jesus apo tu tyje . Jesus jorydyre nowy boei dykeje okudugodyre ebo rugadu . Akore eie nono ovelha doge emogadure . Jetu pemegare eiwu bokwaie . Boe pegaie ei . Erduwakaie nuba turomode . Mare ovelha ji karega akoino . nowy boe eroiwakare tuwo tuginorudo . Dujire akoino . Ure erduwado Pao Kurirewy batary remawu jiwu bokware . Dujire akoino . 37 Nono Jesus makore ture jorydywadowugei . Akore : Boepa kurire rugadu . nowy boepa tadaboe ure turugadu boe ewo kado . Mare umode boepa tadaboe kadowyge emagakare . 38 Dykodire tamagodo baruto Pao Kurirewy bagai . Boepa jiwu boe eimijera kurirewynure ema . Tamagodo ji maragodywo boepa jiwyge emagawo etuwo boepato ewo boepa tadaboe kado rugadu . Mare boepa ji karega Jesus akoino . Meartorumode Pao Kurirewy jiwugeire akoino . Boe emode boe erduwado Pao Kurirewy batary ji dykeje emeartorumode ji , Pao Kurirewy umode ekinorudo . Dujire akoino.

10 1 Jesus makore nowy ture jorydywadowyge ewagai pudae . Ere doze . Nono ure eragado ewo bope doge etawyje boe epiji . Ure eragado ewo boe epemegago ekogodae boe piji . 2 Ainore nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowyge ekiere : Simão . Iere Pedro jamedy . André . Pedro uwienure ema . Tiago . nowy Tiago uo iere Zebedeu . João . Tiago uwienure ema . 3 Filipe , Bartolomeu , Tomé , Mateus . Boe ere to diero maku nowy Mateus ai uwo maku boe eimijerage etai . Tiago . Alfeu onaregedynure ema . Tadeu . 4 Simão . Emare makore tumedagei marigudu emeartorukawo Roma kejewy boe ekimijeragei pugeje . Judas Iscariotes . Emare umode Jesus maku boe eimijera pegareuge etai . nowy ime eture Jesus batary tabowyge umode emage rugadu . 5 Awu doze ime dogere Jesus ure etudo tuwadary tabo . Makore ei . Akore : Tadukaba boe tuginaiwyge etae . Tadukaba ia Samaritano doge eda ka . 6 Tadudo tu Judeu doge etae . Ere nono okware boetowyge ovelha doge emogadure . Mare ovelha ji karega inagoino . nowy Judeu doge emeartorukare Pao Kurireuji pugeje . Dujire inagoino . 7 Tadumode dykeje tamagomode tardure jiwyge ewiagai awu iwadary ji . Tamagodo : Pao Kurirewy umode boe eimijera kurireudo pudumi kuri je. Ainore tagagomode boei . 8 Tadumode dykeje tamode kogodyreuge epemegago . Tamode bireuge eewodudo pugeje . Tamode kogodyreuge biri pegareuge epemegago . Tamode bope doge etawyje boe epiji . Ire taragado tarowo awu inagoino jiwu taroji mare ikare nowy ire maku tagaiboe morido . Dykodire tamodukare boe edo iaboe maku tagai tarore jiboe morice jamedy . 9 Tadukaba tori kuieje tabo . Tadukaba prata tabo . Tadukaba ia diero tabo rugadu . 10 Tadukaba ia tagudau aroia meture tadawu kadarabo tabo . Tadukaba ia tagudau aroia tabo . Tadukaba ia tawure okeakejewy tabo . Tadukaba ia tagedy jiwu tagaibo tabo . Tadudo tu meture taiwu tagudau aroia tabo . Tadumode tawo boe ewie iwadary ji . Dykodire boe etu pemegamode tai . 11 Tagaregodymode ia boe eda ka dykeje tagaiwodo ia ro pemegarewy bagai tamuguwo nono uwai keje ji tadure kejewy meri ka . 12 Tamode taremo nowy baito dykeje tagimadudo nowy boebo . 13 nowy bai tadawyge ero pemegamode tai , etaidumode tai tuietu pemegawo tai dykeje tawadary pemegarewy maku etai Pao Kurirewy uwo boe pemegado ei . Mare ero pemegamodukare tai dykeje tagaba tawadary pemegarewy maku etai . 14 Ia boe eda kejewyge etaidumodukare tamagore jiboeji . Ekimadumodukare tagabo dykeje tadudo epiji . Tadumode nowy boe eda piji dykeje tawure okeakejewy to pui egai tawo moto urugudu tawyje nowy tawure okeakejewy piji nowy boe erduwo Pao Kurirewy aidukare nowy erore jiboe jituji kodire umode tugera ra epiji . 15 Inure tawie . Boe pegamode nowy aidukare taiwugei rugadu . Toro ia meri keje Pao Kurirewy aiwomode boe eiamedy boe erore jiboeji . Mariguduwyge Sodoma kejewyge ero pegare . Gomorra kejewyge ero pegare jamedy . Dykodire nowy meri keje Pao Kurirewy umode boe pegado nowy Sodoma kejewygei ero pegarewy morice . Umode boe pegado nowy Gomorra kejewygei ero pegarewy morice . Mare nowy aidukare taiwyge boe eire Pao Kurirewy ro pega kuricigomode nowy Sodoma kejewyge ekori , nowy Gomorra kejewyge ekori jamedy . 16 nowy ire tadudo etaewyge ere nono rie doge emogadure . Tare nono ovelha doge emogadure . Mare barogo ji karega inagoino . Tameardae pegarewy bokware . Dujire inagoino . Mare tadumode ewagaiwyge emeardae pegamode rugadu . Dujire inagoino . Dykodire inure tawie . Taeku jado nono awagu ro mogadure . Mare awagu ji karega inagoino . Tarduwado boe emeardae jamedy boeji . Dujire inagoino . Mare tameardae pegarewy bokwado nono metugo mogadure . Mare metugo ji karega inagoino . Tameardae pegakaba boei rugadu . Dujire inagoino . 17 Taeku jado ro pegareuge emeardae pegarewy bagai . Mare ro pegareuge emode tugerago tai rugadu . Emode tamagu Judeu doge ekimijerage etai . Emode tarego Judeu doge ere bato puiwu bai ka . Nonore emode boeto tai tapira biri iku tabo . 18 Tameartorumode i Dykodire ro pegareuge emode tamagu boe ekimijera goverrnado doge etai . Emode tamagu boe ekimijerage kurireuge etai rugadu . Nono tamode nowy boe ekimijerage ewie iwadary ji jamedy . Tamode boe tuginaiwyge ewie iwadary ji jamedy . 19 Mare nowy boe ekimijerage emode tadugu baicoreuto dykeje tamorora magadukaba ia tamagomode jiboe bagai . Tamorora magadukaba tamode ewie jiboe bagai . Tamagomode mare tawadary karega . Pao Kurirewy Uwari makomode tai tuwo tamagore jiboe maku tagai Taonure ema kodi . Emare umode tarduwado Pao Kurirewy makomode jiboeji tamagowo nowy Pao Kurirewy batary ji nowy boe ekimijerage ewiagai . 21 Imode tawie iaboeji pugeje . Tameartorure i Dykodire boe erdu pegamode tai , ero pegamode tai . Mare tamodukare tagera ra ipiji dykeje imode taginorudo rugadu . Ia boe emeartorumode i Dykodire etumana mage emode nowy tuwie mage meartorure iwyge emagu boe eimijerage pegareuge etai ewidodywo . Ia boe emeartorumode i Dykodire etuo jorydy pegamode ei . Dykodire nowy etuo umode tore meartorure iwyge emagu boe eimijerage pegareuge etai ewidodywo . Ia boe etore etuje meartorumode i Dykodire boe etore etaidumodukare nowy tujeji pugeje . Ia boe etore etuo meartorumode i Dykodire nowy boe etore etaidumodukare nowy tuoji pugeje . Dykodire nowy boe etore emode tuje mage tuo mage meartorure iwyge emagu boe eimijerage pegareuge etai ewidodywo jamedy . 23 Mare ia boe ero pegamode tai dykeje tarego nowy boe epiji tamuguwo ia boe eda keje pugeje . Iwo tawie . Imedy Onaregedynure imi . Tadumode Judeu doge eno moto kejewy boe eda jamedy boe ka jii toro imode ikirimi kejewy meri ka . Mare tagaregodymodukare nowy Judeu doge emugure kejewy eda jamedy boe ka jii Jesus aregodymode du ka . 24 Boe emeartorumodukare ia mugure bapera kejewyji jorydywamodukare nono tugimijera mogadure . Boe emeartorumode tu nowy mugure bapera kejewy ukimijeraji . Boe emeartorumodukare ia boe eimijera utugareji . Boe emeartorumode tu nowy boe eimijeraji . 25 Mare nowy mugure bapera kejewy jorydyware jiboe umode nono nowy ukimijera jorydyware jiboe mogadure . Du ure turugadu . nowy boe eimijera utugare romode nono tugimijera ro mogadure . Du ure turugadu . Boe emode ia boe etuo iedo Maroboe aino dykeje emode nowy imedy uwobe ekiedo aino jamedy . Mare ire inagoino . Taire inagoino jamedy . Boe eto kire i nowy bope ie tabo . Etokimode tai jamedy . Dujire inagoino . Etoki kuricigomode tai rugadu tokire i dupiji rugadu . 26 Mare tabagudukaba ece . Boe ero pegamode dykeje etaidumode tuwo nowy turo pegarewy biado boe epiji tumagowo ro pemegareuge nuie pudumi . Mare Pao Kurirewy jorydyware marigudu ero pegareuji Dykodire boe erduwamode nowy ero pegareuji jamedy . 27 Tu tagi tarduware ia ire tarduwado jiboeji mare tamagodo nowy ire tarduwado jiboeji boe ewiagai rugadu . Tamago pemegado ji boe eiamedy boe emearydywo tamagore jiboeji . 28 Tabagudukaba boece . Boe emode tawido mare eragakare tuwo tawarigu bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto . Dykodire inagoino tai . Tabagudukaba ece . Tu Pao Kurirewy meardae koiare umode boe ewarigu bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto boe ewi keje . Tabagududo tu Pao Kurireuce . Mare tabagudu remawu ji karega inagoino . Taragado tai rugadu tameartoruwo tu Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Dujire inagoino . 29 ca kiebarege kugure emode pobe dykeje boe emode to diero tori rogu udo mitotyje tuwo akirodo nowy kiebarege kugurei tugece tuwo kowuje . nowy kiebarege emori bokware mare du inodu tabo Pao Kurirewy biagodymodukare epiji rugadu . Ewudumodukare moto ka Pao Kurirewy meardae piji . 30 Mare Pao Kurirewy aidure tai du kodure nowy kiebarege kugure eiamedy boe ekori . Dykodire jetu pemegamode tai rugadu . Jorydyware tai rugadu . Jorydyware tagao iku jamedy boeji . Jorydyware nowy inodu rogu boeji kodire jorydyware nuba boe mode tai dyji rugadu . Jetu pemegamode tai rugadu . Dykodire inagoino tai tabagudukawo boece rugadu . 32 Iwo tawie iaboeji pugeje . Ia boe emagomode boe eiamedy boe ewiagai tuie tumagu inai tumeartoruwo tu i dykeje imagomode Pao Kurirewy biagai baru tada nowy meartorure iwu nuie ema rugadu . Toro nowy Pao Kurirewy aiwomode boe ero pegarewy bagaiwu meri kejere imagomode aino ji . 33 Mare ia boe makomode boe ewiagai tugaie tumagu inai , tumeartorukaie i dykeje imagomode Pao Kurirewy biagai baru tada nowy meartorukare iwu nuie ema rugadu . 34 Tameardaere itaregodyre iwo boe epemegado pui . ca itaregodyre iwo boe pemegado boei rugadu . Mare ia boe emeartorumodukare i . Dykodire emeardaemodukare nono pumeardae mogadure imagore jiboeji .
