Tamajarakate Abraham ajisaka . 10 Warao tane nakajakutai naoae rija jakutaisi najabune aobojona ibaju-kakitane . 11 Jesú Jerusalén awere nabakayame aribu anokomo Dio rijana arujuna rujakitane tanabaeyama . Tiame Jesú asita abane tatuma saba rewarae . 12 Ribane : Airamo sabuka ina utirajasiata naruae . Tata airamowitu tane abakore atae ekiajase bajinae oriaina airamo takitane . 13 Tiarone anaru ebika anebu mojoreko yejebune burata awai mina jisaka jisaka tane moaubuae . Isia ribane : Manabakana wakayaja nisane , wabine tane burata eirakotu , taeyama . 14 Tiarone aina arao taisi rarijatane taisi iamo ribamejerei inatabae . Ribu akonarumo ribane : Tamaja kairamowitu tane obononajaoko , tae . 15 Takore tai are airamowitu tane bajene naoae . Anebu burata moajakutai tatuma yejebumejereae taisiata nabakamejerei . Ta-tuma nisane , wabine tane burata katamona kanatae tai tane miki-tane yejebumejereae . 16 Awajiabara jakutai naone ribane : Mairamo , jiburata mina jakutaisi araimo mojoreko tane kanataine , taeyama . 17 Takore airamo taisi isia ribane : Yakera , iji maneburatu ya-keraja . Iji sanuka isia airamo aribu eku abayaja bajinajame jano-koina mojoreko airamo tane jiabatine , taeyama . 18 Takore araisa naone ribane : Mairamo , jiburata mina jaku-taisi araimo mojoabasi tane kanataine , taeyama . 19 Takore taisi isiarakate ribane : Ijirakate janokoina mojo-abasi airamo tane jiabatine , taeyama . 20 Takore araisa naone ribane : Mairamo , jiburata mina jaku-taisi mi . Kwamotu eku motane yaorabaine . 21 Jinojayame yaora-baine . Jiribu taeraja . Iji abánae tiajena jakutaisi nisaya . Iji namúae tiajena jakutaisi aria . 22 Takore airamo ribane : Ijisike neburatu asiraja . Iji ribuna-jakutaisi eku jiribu nome toatine . Iji manaminayaraji . Maribu taerajayama . Ine abánae tiajena jakutaisi nisaya . Ine namúae tiajena jakutaisi aria , taneama . 23 Taisi naminane iji maburata banko eku abakuna . Maburata banko eku abánae tiaja jakore ine ama manabakana eku maburata kwarika sabuka mamoakuna , taeyama . 24 Tane awere jakutaisi isia ribane : Burata mina jakutai taisi ebikamo nisakotu . Mojoreko tane kanatajakutai taisi moate , taeyama . 25 Takore tatuma taisi isia ribane : Kairamo , tai mojoreko ja rijana , taeyama . 26 Airamo ribane : Yatu isia ribiaine : Ja jakutai atae kwarika taisi moate . Ekirakutai taisi jaja sanukarone taisi ebikamo nisate . 27 Ama maisiko asiraja jakutai tamate konakotu . Tatuma maobononaja ine airamo tamejerei . Mamujaba tatuma awaroba nakabatakotu , tae , taeyama . 28 Tamajasi ribaitane Jesú orianebutu ebe yã tane Jerusalén tata yaburuaeyama . 29 Takore janokoina Betfagé , janokoina Betania tane awere nabakanae . Tai jotakwa Oriwa Arauina awere . Takore anebu manamo inatabayaja isia ribunaeyama . 30 Ribane : Janokoina yatu akejenuka jakutaisiata narukotu . Tata nabakane yatu buro auka koyánae tiajasi mite . Warao jisakarakate taisi arai mate rujamoana . Taisi arojutu jajene konakotu . 31 Yatu isia ribiaja : Katukeme ejeroya bajama tane ribakore riboto ribakotu . Kairamo taisi obonoya , takotu , taeyama . 32 Takore inatabajakutai narune Jesú aribu eku miae . 33 Mi-tane buro arojutu jajekore buro arao tatuma isia ribunae : Katu-keme arojutu jajia bajama ? taeyama . 34 Tatuma ribane : Kairamo taisi obonoyame jajiaoko , taeyama . 35 Taitane Jesú tata konaruae . Konaruitane oriajiaka buro arai abane Jesú buro arai rujamejereae . 36 Taitane Jesú nariakore taisi ebisaba anebu oriajiaka jojisi ekia ebujakaubuaeyama . 37 Jojisi ekia nariaja Jotakwa Oriwa Arauina ananaka awere nabakanae . Nabakakore anebu kokotuka oriwakakitane jotananae . Dio yakeraja jae tane ribubuae nona taeraja miajame . 38 Rokojotayaja ribane : Airamo aribia naoyakutai tai airamowitu tane naoya . (Rok . 118:26) Tai yakerajawitu . Najamutuata inareraja tane bajekunarai . Kwai arao ribakunarai : Diosike yakerajawitu , takunarai , taeyama . 39 Takore waraosebeira kawanaya Bariseotuma jajayama . Ta-tuma kawanamo ribunaeyama : Inaminatu , jinebutu sabaji , taeyama . 40 Jesú tatuma riboto ribane : Yatu isia ribiaine : Tamatuma inaretakore joyo rokojotakuna , taeyama . 41 Tane janokoina awere nabakane mitane janokoina araoto yaonaeyama . 42 Ribane : Ama yatu aya eku inareraja yatu aba-kitane obonoyakutaisi naminakunako ! Tiarone rijísae tane bajia yatu minaka jamejerei . 43 Ya asinarija naote . Taisi eku yatu isiko asiraja jakutai raukara abane yatu kamate . Yatu kamakore ejobakomoniwitu jate . 44 Tatuma yatu joika toate . Yatu anobo-tomorakate joika toate . Janoko joyononarone joyo araisama arai bajinatate . Dio yatuata nabakakore yatu taisi anabakana aya naminanatanajame , tametane yatu isia nonate , taeyama . 45 Taitane Jesú kwai ribunoko eku yaruae . Yarune taisi eku awabimo anisamo tane webiarakitane jotananae . 46 Tatuma isia ribane : Jabátae tiaja ja : Majanoko jakutai kwai ribunoko , tia . (Isa . 56:7) Tiarone yatu erijisa araoto ajanoko tane abanae , taeyama . (Jer . 7:11) 47 Taitane ya kokotukanea kwai ribunoko eku inaminaubuae . Tiarone saserote airamotuma kajotabu akarata ainaminamo , jano-koina airamotuma tane obonobuae : Oko katukane Jesú nakuna tai ? taeyama . 48 Tiarone nakomoni ejobonae warao kokotuka Jesú aribu yaorane nokoajame.

20 1 Ya jisaka eku Jesú kwai ribunoko eku waraoto inami-nayaja jaja . Rewara yakerajasi rewarayaja jaja . Takore saserote airamotuma , kajotabu akarata ainaminamo , waraoto airamotuma tane nabakanaeyama . 2 Tane Jesú renokoyaja ribane : Iji sinama aribia tamajasi nonaya ? O sina ribu jimoae tamajasi nonamejerei ? Kasaba ribanu , taeyama . 3 Takore Jesú tatuma riboto ribane : Inerakate renoko jisaka jaine . Mariboto ribakotu . 4 Juan waraoto ekobuajakutai tai sinama aribia ekobuae ? Dio aribia o waraoto aribia ? 5 Tiarone tatuma oriaribu kwarikane ribane : Juan Dio aribia ekobuae tane ribakore tai kariboto ribate . Katukeme taisi aribu yajorabanatanae ? tate . 6 Oko ribane waraoto aribia ekobuae , tane ribakore , warao kokotuka joyo isia katimite . Tatuma Juan Dio kware arewaratu tane yajorabayame katimite , taeyama . 7 Tane riboto ribane : Sinama aribia tai tane naminanajaoko , taeyama . 8 Takore Jesú tatuma isia ribane : Yatu marenoko riboto ribu-natanajame ine nonayakutai sinama aribia nonaya tai tane yatu saba rewaranajine , taeyama . 9 Taitane asita abane waraoto saba rewarakitane jotananae . Ribane : Warao jisaka arajikaba eku uwa arauina namuae . Na-muitane rajikabamo enebane tane utiraja naruae kware majaba-kitane . 10 Taitane uwa akwaja ayakaramata eku arotu jakutai orianeburatu inatabae . Akwaja akari arotuma saba jakutaisi moa-mejerei inatabae . Tiarone rajikabamo neburatu yewerene moa-naka inatabae . 11 Arotu atanejese aneburatu raisama inatabae . Tiarone tatuma taisi ekotubune yewerene tane monukajase moa-naka inatabae . 12 Takore arotu atae aneburatu raisama inatabae . Tatuma taisi eboisine uwa arauina ekumo webotonae . 13 Takore uwa arauina arotu ribane : Ine katukane tate bajama ? Mauka ine obonoyakutaisi inatabatine . Takore tatuma taisi mitane yatomanetete tai , tae . 14 Tiarone rajikabamo jakutai aukama mitane obojona jisaka nakayaja ribunae : Arotu wabakore uwa arauina tamajasi amo-jeku bajete . Tiame taisi naki . Tane uwa arauina arao tane ejoba-teko , taeyama . 15 Tane uwa arauina ekumo webotane nae . Amasike uwa arauina arotu tatuma isia katukane nonate ? 16 Tai naone rajikabamo kubate . Uwa arauina nebu raisama amojeku abate , taeyama . Tane Jesú ribunae . Takore aribu anokomo tamajasi nokoitane ribane : Dio tane obononaka jakunarai ! taeyama . 17 Takore Jesú tatuma kware barene mitane isia ribane : Katukaja isia ribiaja jabátae tiaja ja bajama ? Jabataja taisi isia ribia : Janoko anonamo joyo tainae . Joyo tainajakutai tai janoko ajoyoira tane ejobonae , tia . (Rok . 118:22) 18 Warao joyo jakutaisi arai nakane asatate . Tiarone joyo waraoto arai nakane ejujute , taeyama . 19 Takore saserote airamotuma , kajotabu akarata ainaminamo tane ya taisi eku Jesú emojojutakitane obonoae . Jesú asita abane rewarayaja tatuma isia rewarajakutai tatuma naminae . Tiame emojojutakitane obonoae . Tiarone saba moinaja ejobonae waraoto nojayame . 20 Takore tatuma ribu anokomo inatabae Jesú aribu nokobu-mejerei . Tatuma warao nomeraja tane oritoaubuae . Tatuma Jesú aribu nokoyaja bajinae aribu asiraja ejobakore kobenajoro anebu amojeku abakitane . 21 Tatuma Jesú renokoyaja ribane : Inami-natu , iji yakeraja rewaraya . Iji yakeraja inaminaya tane ribiaoko . Iji waraoto aribu kware barinaka are Dio ajojisi isia nomeraja inaminaya . 22 Airamo César jakutai burata kebia . Abakitane Dio akajotabu ekuanara ? taeyama . 23 Imasibiaja rewarayakore Jesú tatuma aobonobu naminae . Isia ribane : Yatu katukeme mayakara mija bajama ? 24 Burata renario memikotu . Amejokoji jakutai sinama amejokoji ? Awai jabataja jakutai sinama awai ? taeyama . Tatuma riboto ribane : Tai César , taeyama . 25 Takore Jesú ribane : César saba jakutai taisi César moate . Dio saba jakutai taisi Dio moate , taeyama . 26 Takore waraoto amujaba aribu isia Jesú nakamejerekomoni ejobonae . Tiame Jesú tatuma riboto ribakore retane inareraja bajinaeyama . 27 Tatukamo Saduceo sabasabamo naoae . Saduceo jakutai warao wabakore nomininaja tane inaminaya . Tatuma Jesú reno-koaeyama . 28 Ribane : Inaminatu , Moisés kasaba jabatae . Tirabaka jakutai anobotomo ekiraja wabakore araka ayabuaba jakutai arajema atirasi nisate . Arakama anoboto jakutai arajema anoboto monuka bajete , tia . 29 Takore oriwarao mojoabasi kware manamo jaja , araje arakatuma tane . Araje jakutai tirabakane ano-botomo ekiraja wabae . 30 Araka ayabuaba jakutai tai tira taijase nisanae . Tairakate anobotomo ekiraja wabae . 31 Tatukamo araka tira taijase nisanae . Tatuma mojoabasi kware manamo jakutai jisaka jisaka tira jisakajase nisanae . Tane tatuma kokotuka anobotomo ekiraja muanae . 32 Ayaju tane tirarakate wabae . 33 Amasike warao nominikore sinama atira tane bajete bajama ? Tai mojoabasi kware manamo atira jaja , taeyama . 34 Takore Jesú tatuma riboto ribane : Warao ama jakutai tira-bakaya , niborabakaya tane . 35 Tiarone mate jakitane jakutaisiata nabakakitane saba yakeraja jakutai tai tata tirabakanaja . Nomini-kitane saba yakeraja jakutai tai tata tirabakanaja , niborabakanaja tane . Aukatira iboma jakutaisi moanaja niborabakamejerei . 36 Tatuma atae wabanaja . Dio ainatabatuma monuka bajete , tatuma rijana Dio anobotomo nominina araotiji . 37 Moisesjase warao wabane nominikitane jakutaisi isia inaminae . Rau rokiaja jakutaisi isia jabatayaja Airamo isia jabatae . Tai Abraham Ario . Tai Isaac Ario . Tai Jacob Ario , tane jabatae . (Ejo . 3:6) 38 Rijana Dio jakutai waba Arioana . Tai riko jakutaisi Ario . Taisi saba kokotuka riko , taeyama . 39 Takore kajotabu akarata ainaminamo kawanamo taisi riboto ribane : Inaminatu , iji yakeraja ribunae , taeyama . 40 Tatukamo warao retaya Jesú renokokitane . 41 Jesú tatuma isia ribane : Warao katukeme Akirito jakutai tai David Auka tia bajama ? 42 Davidjase Rokotu akarata eku ribia : Airamo Mairamo isia ribunae : Mamojonome tajasaba rujanu . 43 Jisaba asiraja jakutai tai jiomu noika abatine . Mate abanaja jakore are tata rujanu , tia . (Rok . 110:1) 44 Davidjase taisi isia Mairamo tane ribia . Yatu katukeme tai David auka tia bajama ? taeyama . Tane Jesú rewarae . 45 Tatukamo Jesú orianebu saba rewarayakore warao koko-tuka Jesú aribu nokoae . 46 Jesú ribane : Kajotabu akarata ainaminamo amojeku nakaterate . Jiaka kawajerajasi orisabane basiatakitane tatuma saba yakera . Wabinoko ekia nariakore warao tatuma isia yakeraubiara abaubiakore tatuma saba yakera . Orikware nakanokoata naruitane o noara najorokitane naruitane rujunoko airamo saba jakutai taisi eku rujakitane tatuma saba yakera . 47 Tatumasike tatu tewere ebikamo ajanoko nisaya . Tiarone yakeraja tane oritoakitane kwai ribiaja kawajeraja ribia . Dio tatuma sanamatamejerete . Warao eobo kwarika sanamata-mejerete.

21 1 Takore kwai ribunoko eku burata arao burata abanoko eku anobeanaka toayakore Jesú seorane miae . 2 Mi-jakore tira tewere saneraja jakutai kwarutio manamo abanoko eku toanae . Toayakore Jesú miaeyama . 3 Takore Jesú ribane : Nomewitu yatu isia ribiaine : Tamaja tira tewere saneraja jakutai burata Dio saba abanae . Tira abanajakutaisi amoara eobo kokotuka abanajakutaisi amoara kwarika . 4 Tatuma kokotuka aburata erajasi akari jakutai Dio saba abanae . Tiarone tira jakutai sanerarone anajoro amoara tane jakutaisi kokotuka Dio saba nobeanaka tane abanae , taeyama . 5 Kawanamo kwai ribunoko isia rewarae . Janoko ajoyo yakerajasi isiko nónae tiaja ja . Nobeanaka moajakutaisi isiko nónae tiaja ja . 6 Tane rewarakore Jesú ribane : Yatu mijakutai ekorate . Sinarija naoya . Taisi eku joyo jisakarakate raisama arai bajinatate . Kokotuka enojobone joika toate , taeyama . 7 Takore tatuma renokoyaja ribane : Inaminatu , iji rewaraya-kutai katukakore eku nakate ? Asinarija kasikajasi eku nakate ? taeyama . 8 Takore Jesú ribane : Oi ! Eobo yatu imasibumejerenaka jakotu . Eraja imasibiaja maribia monuka naone ribate : Ine Akirito , tate . O asinarija eku rijana , tate . Tane takore tatuma iamo narunaka jakotu . 9 Yatu ina raisa raisa aorikuba isia nokote . Ina jisaka arao oririboto orikubayakutaisi isia nokote . Nokoitane retanaka jakotu . Wajiabara tane kwaeabakitane ja . Tiarone ayaju mate , taeyama . 10 Tatukamo ribane : Ina arao ina raisama araoto isiko oriku-bate . Ina airamo jisaka ina airamo raisama isiko orikubate . 11 Ina-riko uriraja jakate . Nojoira jate . Waba eraja jate . Tamatuma ina raisa raisa ekia jate . Najamutuata jawana uriraja jate . Sinarija uriraja jate tane . 12 Tiarone tamaja sinarija jakutai kokotuka ebe yatu emojoju-tane isanamatate . Orikware nakanoko araoto amojeku yatu toate . Mojojutanoko eku toate . Masabasabamotiji airamowitu amujaba , kobenajoro amujaba tane yatu konarute . 13 Tiarone tamaja yatu kwaeabakore maisia rewarakitane yakera . 14 Mate ribu eku nakanaja jakore , yatu obonobute tai : Oko katukane orikware ribate bajama ? tate tai . Amayatukamo yatu aobojona abakotu tametane obonobunaka jakitane . 15 Ribu yatu moatine . Musa-beraja tane yatu abatine . Takore kokotuka yatu riboto jakutai yatu aribu kanatakomoni jate . Yatu aribu kwarikakomoni jate . 16 Yatu arimarakate yatu wabite . Yatu awaraowitu yatu wabite . Yatu awarao sabuka yatu wabite . Yatu amuaraisatuma yatu wabite . Tatuma yatu kawanamo kubate . 17 Yatu masabasaba-motiji warao kokotuka yatu rarijatate . 18 Tiarone yatu akwajio jisakarakate rijanatate . 19 Yatu taeraja bajene wite oriaobojona wajukautate . 20 Orikubamo Jerusalén kware sibajete . Yatu taisi mitane Jerusalén ekorakitane jakutai taisi eku nakae rijana , tane nami-nate . 21 Takore Judea arao jotakwa tata kurujubukunarai . Janokoina eku jakutai ekumo narukunarai . Janokoina ekuana jakutai janokoina eku yarunaka jakunarai . 22 Tamaja kokotuka ateje jabatajakutaisi aya eku nakae rijana , Jerusalén isia amoara abakitane . 23 Ina eku sanamata taeraja jate . Dio tamaja ina araoto isiko orijisiraja bajete . Tiame tai ya eku kwabu jakutai amájae tane ribate . Tatu ajorosimo jorosimowitu jakutai amájae tane ribate . 24 Buariwari isia muanate . Tatuma kawanamo riko jakutaisi oane ina kokotuka tata mojoju konarute . Judioana jakutai Jerusalén sakate . Inawaja asebe Judioana saba ribu abánae tiaja jakutaisi eku nakamoana jakore are sakaubute . 25 Takore ya eku , waniku eku , kuratuma eku tane sinarija jate . Nojaba tujurubute . Nojaba ai kwana yabaraubute . Takore raina araoto aobonobu eraja ejobane taisi yamonite . 26 Dio airamo sabukatuma najamutuata jakutaisi etororote . Tiame raina arao retane sinakate . Mate raina eku naokitane jakutai taisi aobojona aobonobu eraja ejobate . Aobonobu ebe sinakate . 27 Takore warao tane nakajakutai ajakajoko eku naote . Ajara taeraja naote . Ajokoma urirajasi isia tane naote . Naoyakore raina arao taisi mite . 28 Tamajasi nonakitane jotanakore yatu nokaramane kwai seorakotu . Yatu aejerotu yatu awere rijana , taeyama . 29 Taitane Jesú atae asita abane tatuma saba rewarae : Iko arau mikotu . Rau kokotuka mikotu . 30 Aroko irajiro jakore yatujase ribia : Joira kawere rijana , tia . 31 Monukajase tamaja kwaeabakore rijana : Dio arujuna rujakitane jakutai tai kawere , tane ribakotu . 32 Nomewitu yatu isia ribiaine : Warao ama jakutai muana-moana jakore maribu kokotuka eku ejobate . 33 Najamutu , raina tane ekorate . Ekoroyarone maribusike ekoronatate . 34 Tametane nonanaka jakotu : Uriraja najorokitane , awaba-kitane , raina auba isia obonobukitane tane . Nona tamatuma nonayakore yatu aobojona eku uru monuka bajete . Tane nonayaja mate orinaminanaja jakorejase asinarija eku nakate . Tiame yatujase oriyaorokotu . 35 Asinarija jakutai raina kokotukanea araoto bukate kai isia monuka . 36 Kokotuka naokitiakutaisi ebikamo jakakitane yakeramejerei ubanaka are kwai ribakotu . Warao tane nakajakutaisi amujaba nokaramakitane yakeramejerei ubanaka are kwai ribakotu , taeyama . 37 Taitane yawaya Jesú kwai ribunoko eku inaminae . Imaya janokoina ekumo ejobane jotakwa awai Oriwa Arauina tata ubae . 38 Takore jokona anejeko warao kokotuka kwai ribunoko eku yarune Jesú tata nabakanae aribu nokokitane.

22 1 Takore Oriwaka Arina Akwaruta Ekiraja awere jaja . Taisi awai raisa Oriwaka Kwaeaba . 2 Takore saserote aira-motuma kajotabu akarata ainaminamo tane waraoto nojayame rijisane Jesú nakitane obonobubuaeyama . 3 Takore Satanás Judas aobojona eku yaruae . Judas jakutai Kariot arotu jakutai . Tai Jesú anebu mojoreko kware manamo kawanamo jisaka . 4 Judas jakutai saserote airamotuma , kwai ribunoko ayaoromo airamotuma tane isiko rewarakitane naruae . Ama ine katukane Jesú wabite tai ? tane rewarakitane naruaeyama . 5 Takore tatuma akobe ekeiraja , burata Judas moakitane bajinaeyama . 6 Judas jakutai tatuma aribu eku abanae . Warao ekirakore Jesú saserote airamotuma amojeku wabikitane najabuaeyama . 7 Oriwaka Arina Akwaruta Ekiraja aya eku rijana . Tai ya kwaeaba nakakore obeja aukamo naija kwaeaba sitakitane . 8 Takore Jesú jakutai Pedro Juan tane inatabae . Inatabayaja ribane : Narune kwaeaba anajoro iyakaratakotu oko najorokitane , taeyama . 9 Tatuma ribane : Oko kasaba najoro iyakaratamejerea iji ? taeyama . 10 Takore Jesú tatuma riboto ribane : Yatu janokoina eku yarukore nibora yatu riboto ejobate . Tai jo anamu konariaja ejo-bate . Nibora jakutai janoko eku yarute . Takore yatu taisi iamo yarukotu . 11 Tane janoko arotuma isia ribakotu : Kainaminatu ribia : Janokonamu kasaba ja , ine manebu isiko kwaeaba anajoro najorokitane ? tia , takotu . 12 Tai namuata yatu konarute . Namu jakutai uriraja . Tai kwai bajia . Amena iyakarátae tiaja ja rijana . Tata jisabakotu , taeyama . 13 Takore tatuma narune Jesú aribu eku miaeyama . Tata kwaeaba anajoro jisabaeyama . 14 Takore asinarija eku nakakore Jesú inatabatuma mojoreko kware manamo isiko mesa yanorujuae . 15 Ainatabatuma isia ribane : Ine mate sanamatamoana jakore yatu isiko kwaeaba anajoro najorokitane kwana obonoaine . 16 Yatu isia ribiaine : Dio arujuna rujuyakutaisiata kwaeaba sitayakutaisi eku nakate . Mate eku nakanaja jakore najoronajine . Sitayakutaisi eku nakakore najorotine . 17 Taitane jobinoko nisane yakeraja jae tane ribunae . Ribane : Tamajasi nisane orimoaubukotu . 18 Yatu isia ribiaine : Tamatu-kamo Dio mate arujuna rujunaja jakore uwa ajo jobinajine . Rujakore jobitine , taeyama . 19 Tane bãu nisane yakeraja jae tane ribunae . Bãu nakarine tatuma moaubune ribane : Tamaja matejo . Matejo yatu kware moayaine . Bãu tametane najoroitane maisia obonobukotu , taeyama . 20 Tane najoroitane jobinoko nisanae . Nisaitane ribane : Ta-maja jobinoko eku jakutai tai ajute jiro asinarija majotu isia . Majotu jakutai yatu kware sororoya . 21 Tiarone miki anaka . Mawabitu jakutai tai are kaisiko najoroya . 22 Nomewitu warao tane nakajakutai ebe jabatajakutaisi eku naria . Tiarone awabitu amájae tane ribate , taeyama . 23 Takore inatabatuma orire-nokobuae . Sina Jesú wabikitia bajama ! tane taeyama . 24 Taitane tatuma oriaribu kwarikae . Sina okoatukamo koko-tuka airamo tane bajete bajama ? taubuaeyama . 25 Takore Jesú ribane : Judioana airamo jakutai anebu are kajotabubia . Ribu ja jakutaisi isia eobo ribia : Kasanetamo , tia . 26 Tiarone yatu tametane nonanaka jakotu . Yatu kawanamo airamo uriraja jaku-tai tai nojotonajiro monuka bajekunarai . Yatu kawanamo akwa-tayakutai tai yatu akajotabu monuka bajekunarai . 27 Sina airamo uriraja ? Mesa yarujuyakutai tai airamoanara ? O akajotabu jakutai tai airamo mojoro ? Mesa yarujuyakutai taisike airamo . Ine yatu kawana yatu akajotabu tane jaine . 28 Eobo mayakara mikore yatu are maisiko bajinae . 29 Marima airamo tane merujate . Taisi monuka ine yatu airamo tane erujatine . 30 Tane ine marujuna rujakore yatu mamesa yanoru-june najorote jobite tane . Taitane yatu airamo arujunoko arai norujune Israeltuma awaraosebeira mojoreko kware manamo jakutaisi aribu nome toate , taeyama . 31 Tane Airamo ribane : Simón , Simón , Satanás kwana ebuae tiriko monuka yatu enisabukitane . 32 Tiarone jikware ebuaine iji nome abayakutaisi iabanaka jamejerei . Takore iji bajene jiwa-raoto aobojona taeraja tane abanu , taeyama . 33 Takore Simón ribane : Mairamo , are jiiamo narutine . Memojojutayarone o manaijarone are jiiamo narutine , taeyama . 34 Jesú ribane : Pedro , jiisia ribiaine : Mate karina kuitanaja jakore iji rijanamo tane ribate : Taisi naminanajine , tate , taeyama . 35 Tatukamo Jesú tatuma isia ribane : Kaje yatu inatabaine . Sako omi , wanaba omi , barukata omi tane yatu inatabaine . Yatu narune ekiraja ejobonaera ? tae . Tatuma ribane : Ekirena , taeyama . 36 Tai ribane : Ama burata anamu jakore konarute . Wanaba jakore konarute . Abuariwari ekirakore ajiaka wabine buariwari nisate . 37 Yatu isia ribiaine : Ribu maisia jabatajakutai mate taisi eku nakakitane ja . Ribu ja : Kajotabu atainamo isiko taisi abanae , tia . (Isa . 53:12) Maisia jabatajakutai taisi eku nakakitane ja , taeyama . 38 Takore tatuma ribane : Kairamo , oko buariwari manamo jaoko , taeyama . Tai tatuma isia ribane : Yakera rijana , taeyama . 39 Takore ejobane jotakwa Oriwa Arauina tata naruae . Are tata nariaja jaja . Aneburakate taisi iamo naruaeyama . 40 Takore Jesú tata nabakane anebu isia ribane : Kwai ribakotu raisa yatu ayakara minaka jamejerei , taeyama . 41 Taitane Jesú emosabuka naruae . Joyo toane nakayakutaisi aito monuka naruae . Tane jinamane rujane kwai ribunae . 42 Ri-ma , iji tamaja jobinoko mebikamo nisakore yakerakuna . Tiarone maobojona eku abakitane obononajine . Jiaobojona eku abakitane obonoyaine , taeyama . 43 Takore Dio ainataba najamutu tatamo Jesú tata ejobane taisi taeraja tane abanae . 44 Takore Jesú akobe kwana ekumoniraja jaja atae kwarika kwai ribunae . Aijiobo jotu uriraja monuka joika takatakaeyama . 45 Kwai ribaitane karamunae . Tane anebuata nabakane anebu ubayakore miae . Tatuma ekumoni ebe ubaeyama . 46 Jesú ribane : Yatu katukeme ubaya bajama ? Karamane kwai ribakotu raisa yatu ayakara minaka jamejerei , taeyama . 47 Tane mate ribiakore waraosebeira nabakanae . Jesú anebu kawanamo jisaka tatuma ebe naoae jojisi anaminatu tane . Taisi awai Judas . Tai Jesú yanabakanae amukaba orokitane . 48 Takore Jesú ribane : Judas , iji warao tane nakajakutaisi amukaba orone taisi wabia mojoro ? taeyama . 49 Jesú isiko jakutai kwaeabakitane jakutaisi miae . Tatuma ribane : Kairamo , oko buariwari isia orikubate mojoro ? taeyama . 50 Taitane tatuma kawanamo jisaka saserote airamowitu anebu-ratuma akojoko mojonome tajasabaya jewetenaeyama . 51 Akojoko yaneberakore Jesú ribane : Taneana . Tanaka jakotu , taeyama . Taitane niborama akojoko torene ibajukanaeyama . 52 Takore saserote airamotuma , kwai ribunoko ayaoromo aira-motuma , waraoto airamotuma tane nabakae . Jesú konarukitane naoae . Takore Jesú tatuma isia ribane : Yatu buariwari isiko rau isiko tane naoaeraji bajama ! Ine erijisa arotu monuka mariboto ejoboyaraji bajama ! 53 Ine ya kokotukanea kwai ribunoko eku yatu isiko jajaine . Tiarone yatu amojo mariboto ejinatanae . Amasike yatu aobojona eku , imajana arotuma aobojona eku tane nakae rijana , taeyama . 54 Takore tatuma Jesú emojojutane saserote airamowitu ajanokoata konaruaeyama . Takore Pedro tatuma iamo nariaja utiraja yã tane naruaeyama . 55 Takore tatuma janoko akara eku jekunu erokane awerea norujuaeyama . Pedrorakate tatuma kawana rujunaeyama . 56 Takore nebutu kawanamo tira jakutai Pedro jekunu awere rujúnae takore miae . Yaorane mine ribane : Tamajarakate taisi isiko jaja , taeyama . 57 Tiarone Pedro ribane : Tira , taneana . Taisi naminanajine , taeyama . 58 Kware majabane raisa taisi mitane isia ribane : Iji tatuma ajisaka , taeyama . Takore Pedro ribane : Maraisa , ineanaine , tae-yama . 59 Tatukamo ya asinarija jisaka kaika monuka nakakore atae raisa yaorane ribane : Nomewitu tamaja taisi isiko jaja , Galilea arotutiji , taeyama . 60 Takore Pedro ribane : Maraisa , iji ribiakutai taisi naminana-jine , taeyama . Tane mate ribiakore karina kuitaeyama . 61 Takore Airamo oribarene Pedro miaeyama . Mikore Pedro aobojona Airamo aribu tata nakae . Airamo ribane : Karina mate kuitanaja jakore iji rijanamo tane ribate : Taisi naminanajine , tate , taeyama . 62 Takore Pedro yakareku ejobane kwana onaeyama . 63 Takore Jesú ayaoromo jakutai Jesú yewereaja ekotubuae . 64 Amu sijakane amukaba nabaubuae . Nabaubuitane isia ribane : Sina jinabanae ? Iji Dio kware arewaratutiji jinabatuma awai waranu , taeyama . 65 Atae ribu erajasi isia isanaubiaja Jesú isia asiraja ribubuaeyama . 66 Jokona yakarayakore waraoto airamotuma orikware nakae saserote airamotuma isiko , kajotabu akarata ainaminamo isiko tane . Orikware nakane ribu nome atoamo amujaba Jesú konaruae-yama . 67 Tata renokoyaja ribane : Iji Akiritoanara ? Kariboto ribanu , tae-yama . Tai riboto ribane : Ine yatu isia ribakore maribu yajorabanaja . 68 Ine yatu renokokorerakate mariboto ribunaja , mejeronaja tane . 69 Tiarone tamaja sinarijayatukamo warao tane nakajakutai Dio taeraja jakutaisi amojonome tajasabaya rujate , taeyama . 70 Takore kokotuka ribane : Iji rijana Dio Aukenara ? taeyama . Takore tai ribane : Yatu ribiakutai , tai nome , taeyama . 71 Takore tatuma ribane : Katukane atae oko ribu kwarika naja-bute bajama ? Ama oko kakojoko isia aribu nokoae rijana , taeyama.

23 1 Takore waraosebeira kokotuka nokaramane Pilatoata Jesú konaruaeyama . 2 Konarune kware asiraja abakitane jotananae . Ribane : Tamaja kawaraoto aobojona emo ibajiakore naminaeko . Tai oko burata airamo César moamejerenaja . Ine Aki-rito tane ribia . Ine Airamowitu tane ribia , taeyama . 3 Takore Pilato Jesú renokoae : Iji Judiotuma airamowitu mo-joro ? tae . Jesú taisi riboto ribane : Iji ribiakutai , tai ine , taeyama . 4 Tane takore Pilato saserote airamotuma isia waraoto isia tane ribunae . Ribane : Tamaja anona asirajasi minajine , taeyama . 5 Tiarone tatuma taisi aribu kwarikane ribane : Tai waraoto ewiyawiyaya . Ina Judea kokotukanea inaminaya . Ina Galilea tatamo tamatuka ru tane are inaminaya , taeyama . 6 Takore Pilato Galilea isia nokone renokoyaja ribane : Tamaja Galilea arotuanara ? tae . 7 Tane Pilato jakutai Jesú Herodes aina arotu jajasi naminaitane Herodes tata inatabae . Sinarija taisi eku Herodesrakate Jerusalén tata jajayama . 8 Takore Herodes atejeatamo Jesú mikitane obonoajame , mi-tane oriwakaeyama . Jesú anona isia nokoajame , Jesú sinarija nonayakore mikitane obonoaeyama . 9 Tiame eraja tane reno-koae . Tiarone Jesú taisi riboto ribunatanaewitu . 10 Takore saserote airamotuma , kajotabu akarata ainaminamo tane kwana ribiaja Jesú kware asiraja abaeyama . 11 Takore Herodes ayao-romo isiko Jesú tainane ekotubuae . Jiaka yakeraja jommo tiajasi eorisabanae . Eorisabane Pilatoatajase inatabaeyama . 12 Pilato Herodes tane ateje oriisiko asiraja jajayama . Tiarone ya taisiatukamo orimuaraisataeyama . 13 Takore Pilato saserote airamotuma , janokoina airamotuma , warao tane orikware toaeyama . 14 Tane tatuma isia ribane : Yatu tamajasi konae . Waraoto aobojona emo ibajetu monuka konae . Tiarone yatu amujaba ine taisi renokokore yatu taisi kware abanajakutaisi amoara ekiraja ejobonae . 15 Herodesrakate tai asiraja minatanae . Tiame atanejese okoata inatabae . Mikotu . Tamajasi anona amoara ekira nakitane . 16 Yewerene ejerotine rijana , taeyama . 17 Pilato are Oriwaka Kwaeaba eku mojoju jisaka ejeroyaja jajayama . Amarakate taisi monukajase ejerokitane ja . 18 Tiarone warao kokotuka rokojotane ribane : Tamajasi nau , tiarone Barrabás ejeronu ! 19 Barrabás jakutai janokoina eku orikuba arotu , akobaka tane jajayama . Tiame mojoju jaja . 20 Takore Pilato Jesú ejerokitane obonoajame atanejese ribu-naeyama . 21 Tiarone tatuma kwarika rokojotane ribane : Esijarimejere ! Esijarimejere ! taubuaeyama . 22 Pilato atae atane-jese ribane : Anona asiraja kasikaja bajama ? Anona amoara nakitane jakutai taisi minajine . Tiame yewerene ejerotine rijana , taeyama . 23 Tiarone suatana aribu kwarikae . Rokojotayaja ebuae esija-rimejerei . Tatuma rokojotane , saserote airamotuma rokojotane tane are Pilato aribu kwarikaubuaeyama . 24 Takore tatuma aribu eku nonamejerei kajotabuae . 25 Orikuba arotu akobaka tane jame emojojutajakutai taisi ejeronae . Taitane Pilato Jesú yaoromo amojeku abanae saserote airamotuma oriaobojona eku abame-jerei . 26 Tatukamo Jesú konariaja niborama oanae . Taisi awai Simón , ina Cirene arotu . Tai jarawaja tatamo naoyakore oanaeyama . Tatuma kuru oane Simón erosiabanae Jesú iamo konarumejerei . 27 Takore janokoina arao eraja Jesú iamo naruaeyama . Tatu-rakate oriamejo nabayaja yaonayaja asana warayaja tane narubu-aeyama . 28 Tiarone Jesú tatuata seorane ribane : Tatu Jerusalén arao , mayaonanaka jakotu . Wite oriyaonate . Yatu anobotomo yaonate tane . 29 Asinarija naoya . Taisi eku ribate : Kwabuoni jakutai tai ekeiraja . Mate kwabumoana jakutai tai ekeiraja . Ami eoromoana jakutai tai ekeiraja , tate . 30 Tane jotakwa isia ribate . Karai nakakotu , tate . Jotakwa sanuka isia ribate : Kasijakakotu , tate . (Ose . 10:8) 31 Rau jiro isiko tametane nonaya . Tiarone rau waja isiko tane nonakore katukate ? taeyama . 32 Takore tatuma Jesú isiko atae nibo manamo konaruaeyama . Nibo jakutai asirajasi anonamo . Tatuma kubakitane konaruaeyama . 33 Ina Kwamujuineta nabakane tata Jesú esijariae . Asirajasi anonatu jisaka Jesú amojonome tajasaba , asirajasi anonatu araisa akajamojo tajasaba tane esijariaeyama . 34 Takore Jesú ribane : Rimá , tatuma nonayakutai wite taisi naminanaja . Tiame obojona asiraja tatuma kware abanaka bere , taeyama . Takore yaoromo jakutai Jesú ajiaka kanatakitane kware kotubuae . 35 Takore warao Jesú tata seoroyaja bajinae . Judiotuma aira-motumarakate Jesú ekotubiaja ribane : Tai eobo ejeronaeyama . Ama wite oriejerokunarai . Tai Akirito jakore tane nonakunarai . Dio taisi mibune nisánae tiaja jakore tane wite oriejerokunarai , taeyama . 36 Yaoromorakate taisi ekotubuae . Awere nabakane bino ajíae tiakutaisi moae . 37 Isia ribane : Iji Judiotuma airamowitu jakore wite oriejeronu rijana , taeyama . 38 Takore Jesú akwa kwarika jabata abanae . Grecia araoto aribu isia , Roma araoto aribu isia , Ebereo aribu isia tane jabatae . Ajabata ribane : TAMAJA JUDIOTUMA AIRAMOWITU , taeyama . 39 Takore asirajasi anonatu jisaka Jesú awere esijaríae tiakutai Jesú isia asiraja ribunae . Ribane : Iji Akirito jakore wite orieje-ronu . Kejeronu tane , taeyama . 40 Tiarone araisa taisi sabajine riboto ribane : Taisi monuka jiaisanamataya . Iji Dio yatomanetenajara ? 41 Kanona kaika kai-sanamataya rijana . Oko kanona amoara abayaja sanamataya . Tiarone tamaja asirajasi nonanatanae , taeyama . 42 Tane Jesú isia ribane : Mairamo , iji jirujuna rujane maisia obonobu , taeyama . 43 Takore Jesú taisi isia ribane : Nomewitu jiisia ribiaine : Iji misika maisiko najamutuata jate , taeyama . 44 Tatukamo ya kwai monuka raina kokotukanea ya imananae . Ya anayakore ima ekoronae . 45 Ya imananajakutaisi eku kwai ribunoko akojo ajiaka jakutai najinaeyama . 46 Takore Jesú kwana rokojotane ribane : Rimá , jimojeku maobojona abayaine , taeyama . Ribaitane wabaeyama . 47 Takore yaoromo siento jisaka akabitana taisi mitane Diosike yakeraja jae , tane ribunae . Ribane : Nomewitu tamaja nibora nomeraja , taeyama . 48 Warao kokotuka tata jakutai kwaeabanajakutaisi miae . Mitane oriamejo nabayaja ajanokoata narubuae . 49 Tiarone Jesú amusaba kokotuka , tatu Galilea tatamo Jesú iamo naoajakutai tane tatuma bajinae . Tatuma utirajamo mijaja bajinae . 50 Takore nibora jisaka naoae . Taisi awai José . Tai janokoina Arimatea ina Judea arotu . Tai ribu nome atoamo kawanamo jisaka . Tai nibora yakeraja , nomeraja tane jajayama . 51 Ribu nome atoamo anona José saba asiraja ejobonae . José jakutai Dio arujuna rujamejerei yawakayaja jaja . 52 Tai Pilatoata narune Jesú atejo konarukitane ebuaeyama . 53 Taitane José Jesú atejo kuru isimo nisane jiaka arino ajaunona jakutaisi isia yejimaraeyama . Amena joitanoko jakutai joyoira eku iwamejerei kajotabuaeyama . Joyo joitanoko tane íwae tiaja jaja . Mate taisi eku joitamoana jaja . Taisi eku Jesú atejo abanaeyama . 54 Ya tuwara aya esewirakitane jakutaisi ebika Jesú joitae . Ya tuwara jakutaisi ebisabuka ya tuwara saba iyakarataya . 55 Takore tatu taisi isiko Galilea tatamo naoajakutai joitamo iamo naruaeyama . Joitanoko miae . Jesú atejo joitanoko eku abayakore miae . 56 Tane ekiajase bajitane tatuma jonaberaja , jonaberaja ejonoko tane iyakarataeyama . Iyakarataitane kajotabu kaika ya tuwara eku tuwarae.

24 1 Takore misa jokoyakore tatu joitanokoata naruae . Jona-beraja iyakaratajakutai taisi konaruaeyama . Tatuma iamo tatu raisarakate narubuaeyama . 2 Tata nabakane joitanoko akwa-mukoro joyo emo abánae takore miaeyama . 3 Tane eku yarune Airamo Jesú atejo minatanaeyama . 4 Tane tatuma aobonobu eraja ejobane katukane jaja tai tane naminanatanaeyama . Takore nibo manamo tatuma awere nokaramuae . Niboto ajiaka jommo yii tiajayama . 5 Takore tatu kwana retane jinamane joika nakaeyama . Nibo jakutai ribane : Yatu katukeme riko jakutaisi najabia joitanoko eku ? 6 Tai tamatuka ekira . Amena nomininae . Tai mate Galilea tata jaja ribunajakutaisi isia obonobukotu . 7 Tai yatu isia ribunae : Warao tane nakajakutai asirajasi anonamo amojeku abakitane ja . Taisi esijarekitane ja . Ya rijanamo takore nominakitane ja , tane ribunae , taeyama . 8 Takore tatu aobojona Jesú aribu tata nakae . 9 Tane joitanoko tatamo ekiajase bajene anebu mojoreko kware jisaka saba rewaraeyama . Eobo kokotuka sabarakate rewarae . 10 Tatu inatabatuma saba rewarajakutai tatuma awai Maria Magdala arotu . Araisa Juana . Araisa Maria Jacobo arani . Eobo tatuma isiko jaja . 11 Rewarakore aribu inatabatuma saba bure monuka ejobonae . Yajorabanatanaeyama . 12 Takore Pedro karamane joitanokoata jakanaeyama . Tane wiajene joitanoko eku seorane miae . Jiaka arino ajaunona emo abánae tiaja miae . Tane kwaeabanajakutaisi aobojona retayaja ekiajase bajinaeyama . 13 Tatuma kawanamo manamo ya taisi eku janokoina sanu-keta naruae . Janokoina awai Emaús . Ajojisi akawaja Jerusalén tatamo aito estadio asebe siento ajabasi kware mojoreko monuka . 14 Tatuma nariaja kwaeabanajakutaisi isia orisaba rewaraeyama . 15 Tane tatuma orisaba rewarayaja orirenokoyaja tane naruae . Nariakore Jesú tatuma awere nabakane isiko naruaeyama . 16 Tiarone tatuma amu sijákae tiaja monuka bajinae Jesú sina tai tane naminanaka jamejerei . 17 Jesú tatuma isia ribane : Yatu katukane jojisi ekia orisaba rewaraya ? Yatu katukeme ekumonira ? taeyama . 18 Jisaka awai Cleofas jakutai Jesú riboto ribunae . Ribane : Jerusalén arao kwaeabanajakutai taisi naminaya . Tatukamoana-rakate naminaya . Ijiwitu naminanaja mojoro ? taeyama . 19 Takore Jesú ribane : Katukane kwaeabanae ? taeyama . Tatuma ribane : Jesú Nazaret arotu jakutai taisi isia . Tai Dio kware arewaratu . Taisi anona taeraja , ariburakate taeraja Dio amujaba , warao kokotuka amujaba tane . 20 Tiarone saserote airamotuma , kajanokoina airamotuma tane taisi emojojutane raisama amojeku abanae namejerei . Takore esijariae . 21 Jesú jakutai tai Israeltuma ejerokitane tanabaeko . Ama kwaeabanaja-kutaisiatukamo ya rijanamo ja rijana . 22 Takorejone jokoyakore tatu kasebe ekumo joitanoko tata naruaeyama . 23 Jesú atejo minatanajame naone kwana keretae . Tatuma ribane : Dio ainatabatuma miaeko . Takore Dio ainataba kaisia ribunae : Jesú jakutai tai riko ja , tae , taeyama . Tane tatu kasaba rewarae . 24 Kakawanamo ajoitanokoata narune tatu aribu eku miae . Tiarone Jesú minatanae , taeyama . 25 Takore Jesú tatuma isia ribane : Yatu bureraji ! Yatu aobo-jona taerajaraji ! Dio kware arewaramo aribu kokotuka isia nome abanajaraji bajama ! 26 Mate airamo tane ejobakitane Akirito tametane sanamatakitane ribu janajara ? taeyama . 27 Tane Jesú Jabataja aribu tatuma inaminakitane jotananae . Kokotuka wite oriisia ribiakutaisi inaminaeyama . Moisés ajabatayatukamo Dio kware arewaramo ajabata kokotuka jakutaisi tata ru tane inaminae . 28 Taitane janokoina sanuka tata nariaja , tata nabaka-naeyama . Jesú are suatana narukitane monúkau takore , tatuma Jesú tuwaramejereae . 29 Ribane : Ya anaya . Ya sotoya rijana . Tiame kakaika bajenu , taeyama . Takore Jesú tatuma iamo yaruae kaika bajekitane . 30 Tane tatuma isiko mesa yanorujune bãu nisanae . Yakeraja jae tane ribunae . Nakarine tatuma moaubuaeyama . 31 Takoresike yaorane mitane , Jesú jakutaisi naminae . Takore Jesú nome ekko tae . 32 Takore tatuma oriisia ribane : Nomewitu jojisi ekia kasaba rewarayaja , Jabataja kainaminayakore kakobe okko tane bajinae . Nomeanara ? taeyama . 33 Taitane sinarija taisi eku nokaramane ekiajase Jerusalén tata bajinaeyama . Jesú anebu mojoreko kware jisaka orikware nákae takore miae . Eobo tatuma kaika jaja . 34 Tatuma ribane : Nomewitu Airamo nomininae . Tai Simón oriemusabae , taeyama . 35 Takore Emaús arao jojisi eku kwaeabanajakutaisi rewarae . Jesú bãu nakarikore naminajakutai taisi rewaraeyama . 36 Tane tatuma orisaba rewarayakore Jesú tatuma autu kara-munae . Ribane : Inareraja bajekotu , taeyama . 37 Takore tatuma tai mejokoji tanabajame nojane , retaubu-aeyama . 38 Tiarone Jesú ribane : Yatu katukeme retaya ? Katu-keme yatu aobojona eraja ejoboya ? 39 Mamojo , momu tane mikotu . Ineine rijana . Matorene mikotu . Ine toma , muju tane jaine . Mejokoji jakutai tane ekira . 40 Taitane amojo omu tane tatuma emiaeyama . 41 Tiarone ta-tuma ekeirame , retayame tane mate nome abanatanae . Tiame Jesú ribane : Tamatuka najoro jara ? taeyama . 42 Takore jomakaba jeubu akari , atae simo ajonamu tane moae . 43 Tai nisane tatuma amujaba najoroaeyama . 44 Ribane : Makwaeabanajakutai kwaeabakitane jaja . Ine mate yatu isiko jakore ribu yatu saba rewarajakutai tai rijana . Maisia kajotabu akarata eku jabatajakutai taisi eku nakakitane ja , taine . Kajotabu akarata jakutai tai Moisés ajabata . Atae Dio kware arewaramo akarata eku ribu ja , maisia . Rokotu akarata eku ribu maisia ja . Kokotuka aribu eku nakakitane ja , taine , taeyama . 45 Tane Jesú anebutu aobojona iejobonae Jabataja aribu noko-mejerei . 46 Ribane : Jabátae tiaja ja : Akirito sanamatakitane ja . Ya rijanamo takore wabaerone nominakitane ja , tia . Tane jabatae . Taisi eku nakakitane jame eku nakae . 47 Akirito aribia rewarakitane ja . Obojona ibarekitane ja tane rewarakitane . Obo-jona asirajasi berekitane ja tane rewarakitane . Wajiabara Jeru-salén tata rewarakitane ja . Tatukamo ina kokotukanea rewara-kitane ja . 48 Ama yatu kwaeabanajakutaisi amimo . 49 Mikotu anaka . Rima ribu abanae . Aribu eku yatu inatabatine . Mate jarata kwaimo nojonaja jakore Jerusalén tata bajekotu , taeyama . 50 Taitane Jesú orianebu konaruae Betania tata . Tai amojo kobukane tatuma yakeraja tane abanaeyama . 51 Yakeraja tane abayakore tatuma aweremo kobukane najamutuata konaruae-yama . 52 Takore tatuma taisi yatomanetene ekiajase Jerusalén tata ekeiraja bajibuaeyama . 53 Tane kwai ribunoko eku are Dio isia yakeraja jae tane ribiaja , Dio yakeraja tane abayaja tane bajibuaeyama . Amén.


################################################
João João João João João João João João João
################################################

1 1 Awu motokare raga mare Bakaru Remawu ure . Awu Bakaru Remawu mugure Pao Kurirewy apo rugadu . Awu Bakaru Remawu Pao Kurirewynure ema . 2 Bakaru Remawu mugure Pao Kurirewy apo boetoji . Mare Jesus jire inagoino . 3 Pao Kurirewy koiare ure awu Bakaru Remawu udo boe jamedy boe towuje . Ia ukare towujeboe bokwakare moto jamedy boe parugajeje , baru tadaboe jamedy . Ure boe jamedy boe towuje rugadu . 4 nowy Bakaru Remawu koiare ure boe edydo aino . nowy Bakaru Remawu ure nono ia jorugu pemegarewy mogadure . nowy Bakaru Remawu umode boe erduwado turo pegareuji , turore jiboeji boecoji nowy bakaru remawu ure nono jorugu mogadure . Mare jorugu ji karega inagoino . nowy Bakaru Remawu ure boe erduwado boe pemegareuji rugadu . Dujire inagoino . nowy Bakaru Remawu ure boe erduwado dykeje boe erduwamode turo pegareuji rugadu . Dujire inagoino . Ro pegareuge ere nono boeco mogadure . Mare boeco ji karega inagoino . Ro pegareuge erore jiboe pegare . Dujire inagoino . Mare ro pegareuge emodukare Bakaru Remawu akedydo jamedy . 6 Pao Kurirewy ure tudugare imedy arego mato pagae . nowy imedy iere João Batista . 7 João Batista aregodyre tumagowo boei Jorugu Pemegarewy paru tabo boe erduwawo ji emeartoruwo ji jamedy . 8 Jorugu Pemegarewy karugure ema . Mare aregodyre tuwo boe erduwado Jorugu Pemegareuji . 9 Jorugu remawu jire João Batista akoino . Urugumode boe eiamedy boei . Mare jorugu karega . Jesus jire akoino . 10 Pao Kurirewy koiare ure Bakaru Remawu udo moto towuje . nowy Bakaru Remawu aregodyre moto ka . Jesus jire inagoino . Mare moto kejewyge erduwakare ji . 11 Aregodyre ture towujewu moto ka tuwobe etae , mare uwobe etaidukare ji . 12 Iagere etaidure ji . Emeartorure ji . nowy meartorure jiwugere ure Pao Kurirewy oredo emage . 13 Ewodukare Pao Kurirewy piji nono boe etore ewodu moga tuje mage epiji dumogadure . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure toredo emage . Emeartorure pudui Dykodire ure toredo emage . 14 Bakaru Remawu ure imedydo pudumi . Rakojere pagabo . Emare mearydy kurire boei rugadu . Emare ro pemegare boei jamedy . Boe jokodu jire akoino boe emeartoruwo ji rugadu . Pardure Pao Kurirewy ure maku aiwu ro kurireuji . Pao Kurirewy onaregedy mitodunure ema Dykodire ure turo rakarewy maku nowy tonaregedy ai . 15 João Batista ure boe ewie ji . Akore : Dujire ire tawie marigudu . Inagore aregodymoduie iregodaji . Kurimoduie ikori . Iwodukare raga dykeje emare rakojere baru tada marigudu . 16 Emare mearydy kurire boei rugadu Dykodire ro pemegare paiamedy boeji . Ukare turo pemegarewy akedydo . 17 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure tumeardae maku Moisés ai Judeu doge eno bakaruwo ema . Mare maigody aino care Jesus Cristo ure boe erduwado Pao Kurirewy mearydy kurire boei rugadu duji . Ure boe erduwado Pao Kurirewy ro pemegareuji . Ure boe erduwado batary remawuji . 18 Marigudu boe erdukare Pao Kurireuji . Pao Kurirewy onaregedy ure mitotyje . Ure nono tuo mogadure . Mugure Pao Kurirewy meki . Dykodire ure boe erduwado Pao Kurireuji rugadu . 19 Jerusalém ba kurirewy kejewy boe eimijerage ere ia boe etudo João Batista ae . Iage Levita dogenure emage . Iage ure Judeu doge enomea maku Pao Kurirewy aiwugenure emage . Enarare João Batistaji . Egore : Iogudubanure aki ? 20 João Batista mako pemegare ei . Ukare tumeardae biado epiji . Akore : Pabagare bagaiwu umode boe ekinorudowu karugure imi . 21 Egore : Mare iogudubanure aki ? Eliasnure aki ? João Batista akore : Boro . Elias karugure imi . Egore : Pabagare bagaiwu makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwunure aki ? João Batista akore : Boro . 22 Egore : Dukodi cewie . Iogudubanure aki ? cedaidure cewo cegimijerage ewie kaboba ure aki . Emagere ere cero jino cerduwawo ai . Nuba akagomode cei ? 23 Dykejere João Batista makore Pao Kurirewy batary ji ewiagai . Makore Isaías ure bu bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary ji ewiagai . Akore : Kudugodyre boe maerewy kejewynure imi . Ainore inagore boe ero pemegaiago Pagimijera aregodywo boe etae . 24 Jerusalém ba kurirewy kejewyge boe eimijerage ere fariseu doge etudo nowy João Batista ae jamedy . care nowy fariseu doge emagore João Batistaji jamedy . Egore : Kocare pabagare bagaiwu umode boe ekinorudowu karegure aki . Elias karegure aki . Pabagare bagaiwu makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwu karegure aki . Kodiba are boe etao pegodo ? 26 João Batista akore : Imi ire boe etao pegodo pobo tabo . Mare ia tarduwakare jiwu rakojere tagabo . 27 Emare aregodymode iregodaji . Mare ipogurumode ipuredywo ji boe kurirewy karegure imi dukodi . 28 Jordão po okwa bakowu kejere João Batista akoino nowy boei ia boe eda keje . nowy boe eda iere Betânia . Nonore João Batista ure boe etao pegodo . 29 nowy barogwato João Batista jorydyre Jesus kodure pudae duji . Akore : Makudure boe ero pegarewy mori cewu Pao Kurirewy aku ovelha reo . Emare umode boe ero pegarewy barigu boe epiji . Jesus jire João Batista akoino . 30 João Batista makore kimo . Akore : Dujire ire tawie marigudu . Inagore ia imedy aregodymoduie iregodaji . Kurimoduie ikori . Iwodu kare raga dykeje rakojere baru tada marigudu . 31 Imi iorydywakare iogodyba ure ema . Mare ire boe etao pegodo pobo tabo . Nono Judeu doge erdure irore jiboeji dykeje erduwamode nowy makudure boe ero pegarewy mori cewu aregodymode kuri aino rugadu . 32 João Batista ure boe etao pegodo mare ure boe erduwado jamedy . Akore : Iorydyre Pao Kurirewy Uwariji rugadu . Ure metugodo pudumi . Ure turawyje baru piji . Ure tumugudo Jesus keje . 33 Dukodi care iorydyware ji aino . Pao Kurirewy ure iwie marigudu . Akore : Ardumode Iwariji . Umode turawyje baru piji tuwo tumugudo nowy imedy kanaura keje . nowy imedy koiare umode Iwari metudo boe eiamedy boe etada. 34 João Batista mako kimore . Akore : Iorydyre ji rugadu . Dykodire inagoino tai . Awu Jesus Pao Kurirewy Onaregedynure tu ema rugadu . 35 nowy barogwato João Batista rakojere nono ia ture jorydywadowugebo . Ere pobe tyje . 36 Nono jorydyre Jesusji . Merure awaraji . Nono João Batista akore : Makudure boe ero pegarewy mori cewu Pao Kurirewy aku ovelha reo . 37 nowy ime pobedy doge emearydyre nowy João Batista batary ji dykeje eture Jesus rekodaji . 38 Jesus aiwore tuibagi dykeje jorydyre nowy ime pobedy dogei ekodure turegodaji duji . Unarare ei . Akore : Kaba bagaiba taroino ? Egore : cerduware jorydywarewynure aki duji . Kaiba amugure ? 39 Jesus akore : Mato itabo tarduwo . Merirekodutabore akoino ei . Nono eture Jesus apo . Erdure mugureuji . Eragojere apo nono nowy meriji . 40 nowy ia imedy iere André . Simão Pedro umananure ema . 41 ca uture Jesus piji tuiemaru tabo tuwie Simão Pedro bagai . Jorydyre ji dykeje makore ji . Akore : cerdure umode boe ekinorudowuji . (Grego batary tabo egore Cristo aino ji.) Pawobe epagare bagaiwunure ema rugadu . 42 Nono André uture tuwie Simão Pedro apo Jesus ae . Etaregodyre ae dykeje Jesus aiwore Simão Pedroji . Nono Jesus makore : Akiere Simão . João onaregedynure aki . Mare awu inodu otobiji akiemode Cefas . 43 nowy barogwato Jesus ure tumeardae tawyje tuduwo Galiléia moto ka . Nono jorydyre Filipeji . Makore ji . Akore : Ako itabo . 44 nowy Filipe boture kejewy ba kurirewy iere Betsaida . Nonore André , Pedro emugure jamedy . 45 ca Filipe uture imedy Natanael bagai jamedy . Jorydyre ji dykeje Filipe makore ji . Akore : cerdure boe epagare bagaiwuji . Dujire Moisés ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaru akoino . Dujire jauboe emakore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge ere bu bapera keje jamedy . Iere Jesus . José onaregedynure ema . Mugure kejewy ba kurirewy iere Nazaré . 46 Mare Natanael akore : Boe pemegarewy aregodymodukare Nazaré piji . Mare Filipe akore : Mato itabo arduwo . 47 Jesus jorydyre Natanael kodure pudae duji . Dykodire care makore boei . Akore : Judeu remawunure ema . Marigudu ukare boe ekiripagado . 48 Natanael mearydyre Jesus akoinoduji . Nono akore : Kocare arduware i na ? Jesus akore : Iorydyware aragojere figo i paru akinaigody duji . Dykejere Filipe aregodyre akae . Iragojekare mare iorydyware . 49 Nono Natanael akore : Jorydywarewynure aki rugadu . Pao Kurirewy Onaregedynure aki rugadu . Israel doge eimijera kurirewynure aki rugadu . 50 Jesus makore ji pugeje . Akore : Iorydyware aragojere figo i paru dyji Dykodire ameartorure i . Iro biagarewy reo . Iro kurimode rugadu kimo awu iro biagarewy kori . 51 Nono Jesus makore nowy boe dogei . Akore : Boe jokodu jire inagoino tawiagai . Imedy Onaregedy remawunure imi rugadu . Tardumode barure tuiado duji . Tardumode Pao Kurirewy utugarege baru tadawugei etu pemegamode i rugadu.

2 1 Merire pobe dykeje Jesus uture Caná ba kurirewy ka ia boe emugure puapowyge ewadae ka . Caná ba kurirewy mugure Galiléia moto keje . Jesus uce rakojere nowy ba kurirewy keje jamedy . Boe emagore Jesus bagai nowy ure jorydywadowyge ewagai jamedy etuwo nowy boe ewadae ka . Dukodi care eture . 3 Eragojere nono ji je . Nono nowy boe eké vinho kuru akedyre . dykeje care Jesus uce makore nowy tonaregedyji . Akore : Vinho kuru akedy . 4 Jesus makore tuje batary jipagi . Akore : Pao Kurirewy koiare umode imaragodae maku inai . Mare meri aregodykare kaeraga iwo Pao Kurirewy maragodae towuje . 5 Nono Jesus uce makore boe etugaregei . Akore : Tarodo nono Jesus makore tai dumogadure . 6 Poridoge enodo padu kewugere seis nono pobo tabo nowy boe ewo taimo Judeu doge turoiaji . Pobomode 80 litros rabodu 100 litros rabodu tu tu nowy pori jamedy boe etada . 7 Nono Jesus makore nowy boe etugaregei . Akore : Awu pori doge ekorau pobo tabo . dykeje ere korobadudo rugadu pobo tabo . 8 Nono Jesus makore ei pugeje . Akore : ca nowy ia pobo tawyje tawo reko toro boe ewadae kejewy boe eimijera ae kuduwo ce . dykeje care ere ia pobo tawyje nowy pori piji . Ere reko toro nowy boe ewadae kejewy boe eimijera ae . 9 Mare Jesus ure vinhodo nowy poboce . Nono nowy boe ewadae kejewy boe eimijera kudure ce . Mare jorydywakare kaiba pijiba nowy vinho kuru aregodyre . (Mare nowy boe etugarege erduware.) Dukodi care nowy boe ewadae kejewy boe eimijera makore nowy uwiremodewu imedy bagai . 10 Akore ji : Vinho kuru pemegareure boe emode maku boetoji tuwadae keje . Vinho kuru pemegarewy akedyre dykeje boe emode vinho kuru mori bokwarewy maku pugeje . Ainore boe erore . Aki care are vinho kuru pemegarewy maku aino boigody . 11 Jesus ure vinhodo nowy poboce . Boetojiwu turo rakarewy jire roino nono nowy Caná ba kurirewy keje . Caná ba kurirewy mugure Galiléia moto keje . Nonore ure boe erdudo turagare duji . Ure boe erdudo turo rakamode rugadu duji . Nono nowy ure jorydywadowyge emeartorure ji rugadu . 12 nowy turoino dupiji Jesus uture Cafarnaum ba kurirewy ka tuje apo , tuwie magebo , ture jorydywadowugebo jamedy . Rakojere nono du meri makakare ji rugadu . 13 Boe puredygodyre Judeu doge ewadumode ia tuwadae ji du ka . nowy ewadae iere Páscoa . Dykodire Jesus uture Jerusalém ba kurirewy ka . 14 Aregodyre toro dykeje ure turemo Pao Kurirewy uwaito . Nonore jorydyre boe ere toe maku duji , ere tagu tapira doge , tagu ovelha doge , tagu metugoe emagu diero bagai jorydyre ere diero maku puai puibagi duji . 15 Jesus korigodyre ei erore aino duji . Ure ia barogo birido nono bukigure . dykeje care ure nowy boe doge egu ié rugadu boe etudo nowy Pao Kurirewy uwai piji nowy barogo biri bukigu tabo . Ure tapira doge etudo . Ure ovelha doge etudo . Ure nowy boe enoe padure kejewy ira jamedy boe butudo tuwo nowy eno diero jamedy boe barigu epiji moto ka . 16 Nono mako rakare nowy ure metugoe emaguwugei . Akore : Tadudo awu bai piji nowy tagagu metuguebo . Tare Iogwa Kurirewy uwaido nono boe makudure kejewy bai mogadure diero bagai tagoce . Tarokaba aino pugeje ! 17 nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowyge ewiabuture Pao Kurirewy batary keje . nowy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Imearydy kurire Pao Kurirewy uwaiji rugadu . Ietu pemegamode ji rugadu . 18 Judeu doge etaidukare nowy Jesus rore jiboeji . Enarare ji . Egore : cemeartugure ai . cegimijera karugure aki rabodo . ca ia aro rakarewy towuje cemeartoruwo ai rugadu . Aro rakareumode dykeje cegimijera mode aki arowo aino aro mogadure woe Pao Kurirewy uwai tada . 19 Dukodi care Jesus makore ei . Akore : Awu Pao Kurirewy uwai butudo . Nono merimode pobe metia bokware dykeje imode rakojedo pugeje . 20 nowy boe eimijerage emeartorukare ji . Egore : Joru otapadure quarenta e seis boei ewo awu Pao Kurirewy uwai iado . Merimode pobe metia bokware dykeje amodukare awu Pao Kurirewy uwai towuje pugeje . 21 Mare Pao Kurirewy uwai ji karega Jesus akoino . Tuwiri , tugody jire akoino . Mare tuwimode du jire akoino merimode pobe metia bokware dykeje tuiewodumode pugeje . Du jire Jesus akoino . 22 Jewodure dykeje ure ture jorydywadowyge ewiabutudo awu tuwadary keje . Dykodire emeartorure Pao Kurirewy batary ji rugadu . Emeartorure Jesus batary jamedy boeji . 23 Nono Jesus rakojere Jerusalém ba kurirewy keje jii toro nowy Judeu doge ewadae Páscoa akedy ka . Ro rakare nono . Boe erdure Jesus ro rakareuji dykeje emeartorugodyre ji . 24 Mare Jesus jorydyware nowy boei emeartoru raimodukare pudui duji . Dykodire Jesus meartorukare nowy boei . 25 Boe ekare Jesus jorydywado nowy boei . Jorydyware boe eiamedy boe emeardaeji marigudu.

3 1 Ia Judeu doge eimijera iere Nicodemo . Fariseunure ema . 2 Ia boecoji uture Jesus ae tumagowo ji . Akore : Boe eimijeranure aki . Pao Kurirewy ure akarego mato cedae rugadu . Ema koiare ure ado boe erduwado rugadu . Pao Kurirewy rakojemodukare akabo dykeje aro rakamodukare . Mare aro rakare rugadu . Dykodire cerduware Pao Kurirewy merure akabo rugadu duji . 3 Jesus akore : Boe jokodu jire inagoino ai . Boe ewodumode pugeje kodire eimijeramode Pao Kurireuce pugeje turuduwo baruto . 4 Nono Nicodemo akore : Nuba imedy romode tuwoduwo pugeje ? Umodukare turemo tuje kurito tuwoduwo pugeje . 5 Mare Jesus akore : Boe jokodu jire inagoino ai . Boe ewodure tuje piji Dykodire emugure woe moto keje . Pao Kurirewy Uwari koiare umode boe ewodudo pugeje . Mare ewoduwo pugeje ji karega inagoino . Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode boe edo tuwia ra tuiordae tumeardae pegarewy piji . Du jire inagoino . Ure edo tuwia ra tuiordae pegarewy piji dykeje epemegamode nono ure taimowu biri kabe dumogadure . Mare ewiri ji karega inagoino . Emeardae pegarewy jire inagoino boe ewo barigu tubiji . Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode emeardae pemegado ewo tugimijerado Pao Kurireuce turuduwo baruto . Dujire inagoino . 7 Dykodire inagoino ai awoduwo pugeje . Kodire apagudugodykaba awu iwadaryce . Boe rakakare ai arduwawo awu iwadary ji . 8 Ia iwadary pugeje . Bakuru jomode taidurewy ka . Boe emearydymode bakuru akoji mare erduwamodukare kaibowu pijiba nowy bakuru aregodyre . Boe erduwakare kaiba nowy bakuru kodumode . Pao Kurirewy Uwari rore nono bakuru mogadure . Mare bakuru ji karega inagoino . Pao Kurirewy Uwari koiare umode boe emeardae pemegarewy maku etai mare nowy boe erduwakare kaibowu pijiba nowy tumerdae pemegarewy aregodyre pudae . Dujire inagoino . 9 Nono Nicodemo akore : Nuba akagore jiboe mode boei ? 10 Jesus akore : Israel doge eimijeranure aki . Are erduwado Israel doge eno bakaruji . Kodiba arduwakare inagoino jiboeji ? 11 Boe jokodu jire inagoino . Imagore iorydyware jiboeji tawiagai . Ireadodyre iorydyre jiboeji tawiagai . Mare taiamedy boe tameartorukare iwadary ji . 12 Imagore awu moto kejewy boeji tawiagai mare tameartorukare ji . Imagomode baru tadawu boeji tawiagai jamedy dykeje tameartorumodukare ji rugadu . 13 Imedy Onaregedynure imi . Iragojere baru tada marigudu . Iaboe iaboe erudukare baruto rugadu . Itaregodyre baru piji mato moto ka . 14 Marigudu Israel doge eragojere toro boe maerewy keje dykeje Moisés ure ia merirido nono awagure ipo oto keje . Imedy Onaregedy padumode ipo keje nono nowy awagu umogadure . 15 Nono meartorure iwyge emugumode Pao Kurirewy apo rugadu . Du akedymodukare rugadu . Ewimodukare pugeje . 16 Pao Kurirewy mearydy kurire boei rugadu . Dykodire ure tonaregedy mitodu rawyje baru piji mato boe etae . Meartorure jiwyge eiamedy boe ewimodukare pugeje . Meartorure jiwyge emugumode Pao Kurirewy apo rugadu . Du akedymodukare rugadu . 17 Pao Kurirewy ure tonaregedy rawyje mato moto ka mare tuwo boe ero pegarewy morido ukare rawyje uwo boe pegado boei . Mare ure rawyje tuwo boe ekinorudo etukawo bope doge eda kejewy joru pegarewy ka . 18 Pao Kurirewy umodukare meartorure iwyge boe pegado ei . Mare meartorukare iwugere Pao Kurirewy umode edo turo pegarewy morido rugadu . Pao Kurirewy Onaregedy mitodunure imi . 19 nowy ro pegareuge etaidukare joruguji . Emodukare tuburedy ji . Boecojire etaidure turo pegawo boe erdukawo turoino duji . Mare ro pemegareuge emode tuburedy joruguji urugu pemegawo pudui boe erduwo tumeartorure Pao Kurirewy jituji . care jorugu pemegarewy aregodyre moto ka . Mare jorugu ji karega inagoino . Ire inagoino . Mare kocare boe emearydy kurire boecoji jorugu piji ? Mare boeco ji karega inagoino . nowy boe ero pegarewy jire inagoino emearydy kurire turo pegareuji kodi . Etaidukare tumeartoruwo i rugadu . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy umode edo turo pegarewy morido rugadu . 22 Nono Jesus uture ture jorydywadowugebo toro Judéia moto ka . Nonore rakojere jii je . Ure boe etao pegodo nono . 23 João Batista ure boe etao pegodo jamedy boe eda Enom keje . Padu puredyre boe eda Salimji . Pobo kurirewy mugure nono . 24 (Boe eimijera pegarewy ukare João Batista tugu baicoreuto raga.) 25 João Batista ure jorydywadowyge emago raire ia Judeu imedyji . Emeardaekare nono pumeardae mogadure tuwo taimo turoiaji tuwo turemo Pao Kurirewy uwaito . Dujire emago raire pui . 26 Nono care eture João Batista ae tumagowo ji . Egore : Jorydywarewynure aki . Awiabuture cowu rakojere toro Jordão po okwa bakowu kejewy imedy keje ? Rakojere pagabo toro . Amagore nowy imedy paru tabo cei . ca unure boe etao pegodo jamedy nono paro mogadure . Dukodi care boe eture toro ae cebiji . 27 João Batista makore nowy ture jorydywadowugei . Akore : Boe emodukare boe pemegado pudui tao biji . Tu Pao Kurirewy koiare umode boe pemegado boei rugadu . 28 Tarduware iwadary ji . Ire tawie marigudu . Inagore : Pabagare bagaiwu umode boe ekinorudowu karugure imi . Pao Kurirewy koiare ure itarego umode boe ekinorudowu otodai . 29 Imedy ure tumedia bie tuwiremode duji . Dykodire metia ure boe pemegado tumedia togi tumedia uwiremode dukodi dykeje boe ewadumode . Ure boedo turugadu dykeje upagare nowy uwiremodewu bagai . Mearydyre uwiremodewu kudu jitu dykeje jakaregodymode pudui rugadu . Ire nono nowy uwiremodewu metia mogadure . Ire boedo turugadu Jesus aregodymode kodi . care aregodyre Dykodire iegarere i rugadu nowy uwiremodewu metia mogadure . Jesus ro pemegare boei Dykodire iegarere i . Ure boe etao pegodo Dykodire iegarere i . 30 Boe etaidu kurimode ji rugadu . Ewiagodymode ipiji . Du pegakare i rugadu . Ure turugadu iagai . 31 João Batista mako kimore . Akore : Aregodymode baru pijiwu ro kurimode paiamedy boe kori . Boture moto kejewy jorydyware moto keje boe jamedy boeji . Makomode moto keje boeji . Mare aregodyre baru pijiwu ro kurimode moto kejewy eiamedy boe ekori . 32 Makomode tuiorydyre jiboeji tumearydyre jiboeji boe ewiagai mare emeartorumodukare ji . 33 Mare meartorure batary jiwyge erduware boe jokodu jire Pao Kurirewy akoino duji . 34 Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode tugera maku nowy Pao Kurirewy ure arego matowu tonaregedy ai . Dykodire nowy aregodyre matowu makomode Pao Kurirewy batary ji boe ewiagai rugadu . 35 Pao Kurirewy mearydy kurire nowy tonaregedyji rugadu . Dykodire ure turaga jamedy boe maku tonaregedy ai eragawo nono pu raka mogadure . 36 Nono nowy meartorure Onaregedy jiwyge emugumode Pao Kurirewy apo rugadu jii toro rugadu . Dykodire etagedymodukare . Ewimodukare pugeje . Mare meartorukare nowy Pao Kurirewy Onaregedy jiwyge emugumodukare Pao Kurirewy apo jamedy . Pao Kurirewy ro pegamode ei jamedy . nowy ro pegare jiboe akedymodukare rugadu.

4 1 Fariseu doge emearydyre Jesus ure boe etao pegodo duji . Emearydyre nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowyge emagagodyre nowy João Batista ure jorydywadowyge epiji . 2 (ca Jesus ukare boe etao pegodo . nowy ure jorydywadowyge eigoiare ere boe etao pegodo.) 3 Nono Jesus jorydyware nowy fariseu doge emeardaeji . Dukodi care uture Judéia moto piji tuduwo tuibagi pugeje Galiléia moto ka . 4 Kodure Samaria moto oiagi tuduwo Galiléia moto ka . 5 dykeje aregodyre Sicar ba kurirewy ka . nowy Sicar ba kurirewy mugure nowy Samaria moto keje rugadu . Marigudu jawu Israel doge etuo Jacó ure ia moto maku tonaregedy José ai . nowy Sicar ba kurirewy padu jakare nowy motoji . 6 nowy Jacó ure porodowu kaciba mugure nono jamedy . ca Jesus metugodyre dukodi care ure tuwuredo nono nowy kaciba keje . Ure tumugudo nono tuwo tamudo . Meri aregodyre pagaia ka du kodi . 7 Mare nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowyge eture otodai nowy ba kurirewy ka tuwo akirodo tugeji . Jesus mugure nowy kaciba po okwai ture tamudo dutabo . Nono ia Samaria kejewydo aredy aregodyre pobo bagai nowy kaciba po ka . Jesus makore ji . Akore : Pobo maku inai ikuduwo ce . 9 Nono nowy aredy makore : Judeunure aki . Imire Samaria kejewydonure imi . Judeu doge etaidukare cei rugadu . Ekudumodukare poboce cegopo tabo . Enogoagemodukare ceno meriri keje jamedy . Aki care amagore i pobo bagai akuduwo ce . 10 Jesus makore : Arduwakare Pao Kurirewy ure maku boe etai boeji . Arduwamode i rugadu dykeje akogomagudumode i pobo remawu bagai awikawo . 11 nowy aredy akore : Are pobo tugu toboe bokware . Pobo padu jaere cemoroi nowy kaciba ja tada . Nuba aromode awo akerago nowy akagoino jiwu pobo remawuji ? 12 Jao paobe etuo Jacó koiare ure awu kaciba towuje . Dykodire pagore aino ema . Emare kudure awu poboce boetoji . Ore ekudure awu poboce . Aku ié ekudure awu poboce jamedy . Ji aino awu pobore kimo . Aro kodumokana nowy Jacó ro kori ? Nuba aromode awo ia pobo maku cenai pugeje ? 13 Jesus akore : Boe ekudumode awu poboce mare pobo boeimode ei pugeje . 14 Mare boe ekudumode ire maku etaiwu poboce dykeje pobo boeimodukare ei pugeje jii toro rugadu . Kaciba mugumode etada kodire nowy etadawu pobo akedymodukare epiji rugadu . Mare pobo ji karega Jesus akoino . Boe emeartorumode Jesus ure maku pudaiwu tuwadary ji dykeje ewimodukare pugeje . Jesus umode emugudo Pao Kurirewy apo . Du akedymodukare rugadu . 15 Mare nowy aredy meardaere pobo remawu ji rugaduie Jesus akoino . Akore : nowy akagoino jiwu pobo maku inai ikuduwo ce pobo boekawo i pugeje itaregodykawo woe pugeje pobo bagai . 16 Jesus akore : Toro . Atudo awo akoredy bie . dykeje amode akirimi mato pugeje . 17 Aredy akore : Ikogekare . Itoredy bokwa . Jesus akore : Uu . Iorydyware . Akogere mare are akera ra piji . 18 Akogere ikera aboudure . Aino care amugure ia apo pugeje mare akoredy karugure ema . Awadunure ji . Boe jokodu jire akagoino iwiagai . 19 nowy aredy akore : Kocare arduware i rugadu ! Jorydywarewynure aki rugadu . Makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwu rabodure aki rugadu . 20 Jao iwobe Samaria kejewyge ere tubu jodo tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji woe awu tori aogeje . Judeu doge tagire tagagore awu cerore jiboe ukaie turugadu . Tagagore tu Jerusalém ba kurirewy kejeie boe emode tubu jodo tumago pemegawo tu Pao Kurireuji . 21 Jesus akore : Ameartorudo awu iwadary ji . Tu awu tori aogeje karega boe emode tubu jodo tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . Tu Jerusalém ba kurirewy keje karega boe emode tubu jodo tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . Kuri aino boe emode tubu jodo moto keje moto jamedy boe parugajeje tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . 22 Samaria kejewygenure tagi . Tamago pemegare Pao Kurireuji mare tarduwakare ji . Judeu dogenure cegi . cerduware Pao Kurireuji . Ure Judeu doge ewie marigudu tumoduie boe ekinorudo duji . 23 Kuri aino Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode boe eragado emago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Erduwamode Pao Kurirewy meardae remawuji rugadu Dykodire emode tubu jodo tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji rugadu boe remawu tabo rugadu . 24 Pao Kurirewy ure nono tuwari mogadure . Dykodire boe erdukare ji . Kodire boe emodukare tuwadary udo paga paga tumago tabo Pao Kurireuji . Pao Kurirewy Uwari koiare umode boe erduwado Pao Kurirewy meardae pemegareuji ewo tubu jodo tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji boe remawu tabo rugadu . 25 nowy aredy makore Jesusji : Iorydyware umode boe ekinorudowu aregodymoduie duji . Aregodymode dykeje umode parduwado boe jamedy boeji rugadu . 26 Jesus akore : nowy akagoino jiwu umode boe ekinorudowunure imi rugadu . 27 ca nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowyge etaregodyre ba kurirewy piji tuibagi . Erdure Jesus makore nowy aredy jituji dukodi care eku kidure ei . Ere tumagoiago nowy aredyji kaboba bagaiba roino . Mare emagokare . Ere tumagoiago Jesusji jamedy kodiba akoino nowy aredyji . Mare emagokare . 28 ca nowy aredy uture tubori piji toro ba kurirewy ka tuibagi . Aregodyre ba kurirewy ka dykeje makore boei . 29 Akore : Mato itabo tarduwo ia imedy kurireuji . Emare jorydyware mariguduwu irore jamedy boeji rugadu . Ema koia ka na umode boe ekinorudo ? Ema ka na pabagare bagai marigudu ? 30 Dukodi care nowy boe eture nowy aredapo ba kurirewy piji toro Jesus bagai . 31 nowy aredy rakoje kimore toro ba kurirewy tada dykeje nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowyge emagore Jesusji . Egore : Akwagedo . 32 Mare Jesus akore : Ire ia tarduwakare jiwu iké rogu kowuje . 33 dykeje nowy ure jorydywadowyge emagore pui . Egore : Ia boe etaregody kana ia tugé tabo tuwo maku ai ? 34 Mare Jesus akore : Boe eké ji karega inagoino . Pao Kurirewy koiare ure itarego mato . Imeartorure batary ji kodire umode iraga maku inai . Imode ure maku inaiwu imaragodae iado rugadu . Dujire inagoino . 35 Boe egore : Arimode pobe puibiji dykeje boe eno boepa tadaboe kurodumode. Tagaiwodo boe dogei . Ere turugadu tumeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji marigudu rugadu . Ere nono boepa tadawu kurodureboe mogadure . 36 Boe emode tugerago kurodureboe jitu keje emaragodae mori makudumode etai . Mare boepa tadaboe ji karega inagoino . Boe emode Pao Kurirewy batary maku boe etai dykeje Pao Kurirewy umode emaragodae mori maku etai jamedy . Boe emagare tumaragodae tabo tuwo boe emeartorudo Pao Kurireuji rugadu emuguwo Pao Kurirewy apo baru tada jii toro rugadu , ewikawo pugeje . Boe emeartorure Pao Kurirewy batary ji dykeje nowy ure Pao Kurirewy batary maku boe etaiwyge eiamedy boe egaremode pudui rugadu . Egaremode pudui nono nowy ure boepa tuguwu jakarere pudui dumogadure . Egaremode pudui nono nowy ure tugerago kurodureboe jiwu jakarere pudui dumogadure . 37 Boe jokodu jire boe egoino : Ia imedy umode to boepa tugu . Ia umode kurodu rawuje. 38 ca tare nono nowy umode kurodureboe rawujewu mogadure . Mare boepa tadaboe ji karega inagoino . Tadumodukare boepa ka . Boeire inagoino . Inure tadudo iwadary tabo boe etae rugadu . Iage ere nowy boe erduwado Pao Kurirewy batary ji tuwo edo turugadu emeartoruwo i . Aino ca tadumode iwadary tabo etae emeartoruwo i rugadu . 39 ca nowy aredy makore nowy Samaria kejewy boe ewiagai Jesus batary ji dukodi care emeartorure Jesusji rugadu . Akore : Emare jorydyware mariguduwu irore jamedy boeji rugadu . Dykodire nowy ba kurirewy kejewyge emeartorure Jesusji rugadu . Emagare . 40 Nono nowy Samaria kejewyge etaregodyre Jesus ae . Enogomagudure Jesusji muguwo pudabo jao . Dykodire merire pobe Jesusji toro ebo . 41 Jesus ure erduwado dukodi care boe emagare nono apo tumeartorure jitu tabo . 42 Emagore nowy aredyji . Egore : Aino care pameartorure ji rugadu . Are cewie marigudu . Mare aino cewiapagare ji rugadu . cewiapagare batary ji Dykodire cemeartorure ji . cerduware emaie umode boe ekinorudo rugadu . 43 Merire pobe Jesusji nono nowy ba kurirewy keje . dykeje uture pugeje Galiléia moto ka . 44 Marigudu akore : Makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwu makomode Pao Kurirewy batary ji boe eiamedy boei . Mare turijodure kejewy moto kejewyge etaidumodukare makore jiboeji . 45 Jesus aregodyre Galiléia moto ka dykeje nowy boe ekimadure apo . Judeu doge ewadae Páscoa kejere Jesus ro rakare Jerusalém ba kurirewy keje . Awu Galiléia kejewyge edyre nono jamedy Dykodire erdure Jesus rore jiboeji . Dykodire egarere pudui Jesus aregodyre pudae duji . 46 Dykejere Jesus uture pugeje Caná ba kurirewy ka . Marigudu ure pobo udo vinho kuruce nowy Caná ba kurirewy keje . Ia Cafarnaum ba kurirewy kejewy boe eimijera rakojere nono Caná ba kurirewy keje jamedy . Onaregedy kogodyre toro Cafarnaum keje . 47 Jorydyware Jesus aregodyre Judéia moto piji Galiléia moto ka . Dykodire uture ae . Okomagudure Jesusji tonaregedy paru tabo ure tuwiago kodi . Aidure Jesus utuwo Cafarnaum ba kurirewy ka uwo nowy tonaregedy pemegago . 48 Jesus akore ji : Taiamedy boe tagaidure tarduwo ia iro rakareuji tameartoruwo i . 49 nowy boe eimijera akore : Ikimijeranure aki . Itonaregedy bimode . Mato itabo awo itonaregedy pemegago . 50 Jesus akore ji : Toro . Atudo akinai . Akanaregedy pemegagodymode . nowy boe eimijera meartorure Jesus batary ji Dykodire uture . 51 nowy barogwato nowy boe eimijera kodu kimore awaraji dykeje ia utugarege etaregodyre togi . Ere bie . Egore : Akanaregedy pemegagodyre . 52 Unaragodyre kaiba meri jeture dukejeba tonaregedy pemegagodyre . Egore : Jao meriji meri aregodyre pagaia ka dykeje biri uru akedyre piji . 53 Nono nowy boe eimijera biabuture meri aregodyre pagaia ka dykeje Jesus akore tonaregedy pemegagodymoduie . Meri aregodyre pagaia ka dykeje pemegagodyre rugadu . Dykodire nowy boe eimijera meartorure Jesusji tuwobe eiamedy boe ebo . 54 Jesus ro rakarewy boetojiwu koiare ure vinhodo poboce . Aino aregodyre Judéia moto piji Galiléia moto ka pugeje . dykeje ure nowy boe eimijera onaregedy pemegago . Dykodire boe erdure Jesus ro rakarewy ure pobetyje nono Galiléia moto keje duji.

5 1 Nono Jesus uture Jerusalém ba kurirewy ka . Uture tuwaduwo ia Pao Kurirewy bowadaeji Judeu dogebo . 2 Jerusalém kejewy ia baiporo ri iere Ovelha . Ia brae etaimoda kewu pobo puredyre nowy bai poroji . Hebrewy batary tabo nowy brae etaimoda iere Betezata . 3 Boe emagare nono tubadu tabo nowy ia bai koadu rewy tada nowy bai koadureuge enodo padure kejeure ekera aboudure . Ekogodyre kodi . Iage eku bokware . Iage epogora pegare . Emeru bokware . Epadure nono tubaga tabo nowy brae etaimoda tadawu pobo magadugodywo tuwo turemo nowy poboto tubemegagodywo . nowy pobo magadugody paga karugure . Ia Pao Kurirewy utugare baru tadawu koiare ure pobo magadudo toro ia meri keje . Meri jamedy boeji karega nowy pobo magadugodymode . Pobo magadugodyre dykeje nowy ure taredo boetojiwu pobo towu pemegagodyre . 5 Joru otopadure kejeure ure trinta e oito ia imedy kogodyreuji tubadure nono dutabo . Pogora pegare Dykodire meru bokware . 6 Jesus jorydyre padure nono duji . Jorydyware nowy imedy kogodyre marigudu rugadu . Dykodire unarare ji . Akore : Akaidure apemegagodywo ? 7 nowy kogodyrewy imedy akore : Uu . Itaidure . Mare iroiwakare iwo iremo nowy poboto ipemegagodywo . Awu pobo magadugodyre dykeje ia kogodyrewy ure taredo nowy poboto itododai tu tyje tubemegagodywo . nowy pobo magadugodyre dykeje umode boe epemegago . 8 Jesus makore ji . Akore : Aragojedo . Amerudo . Akerago akudau kodoji atuwo pugeje . 9 Dukodi care nowy imedy pemegagodyre taci rugadu . Ure turagojedo . Ure tugerago tugudau kodoji . dykeje uture tumeru tabo rugadu . Sábado meri kejere Jesus rore aino ji . 10 ca Judeu doge eimijerage erdure nowy imedyji dykeje ekorigodyre ji . Egore : Amerure aino akudau kodo tabo Sábado meri keje du pegare rugadu . Arokaba aino pugeje . 11 nowy imedy akore : Ure ipemegadowu imedy makore i iwo ikerago awu ikudau kodoji imeruwo tabo pugeje . 12 nowy boe eimijerage egore : Duba koiaba ure arodo aino ? 13 Mare nowy imedy jorydywakare Jesusji . Jesus ure pemegago dykejere uture piji . Boe emagare nono Dykodire nowy imedy jorydykare uture tubiji duji . Dykodire makokare ji pugeje . 14 Merirekodutabo Jesus jorydyre nowy imedyji pugeje Pao Kurirewy uwai tada . Jesus makore ji . Akore : Awiapaga pemegado iwadary ji . Apemegagodyre . Mare akera ra aro pegarewy piji jamedy . Amodukare akera ra aro pegarewy piji dykeje boe pegamode ai pugeje du kodumode awu boetojiwu akogodae kori rugadu . 15 Nono nowy imedy uture Jesus piji Judeu doge eimijerage etae . Ure ewie Jesus ieji . Makore ema koiaie uie tubemegago . 16 Nono nowy boe eimijerage erdu pegare Jesus rore aino duji . Etaidukare Jesus ure nowy imedy pemegago Sábado meri keje duji . Erokare aino kodi . Egore boe ekaiago boe epemegago Sábado meriji . Dykodire etaidure tuwo boe pegado Jesusji rugadu . 17 Mare Jesus makore ewadary jipagi . Akore : Iogwa maragodyre meri jamedy boeji . Iromode aino jamedy . 18 Ainore Jesus rore rugadu . Judeu doge eromodukare ia turore jiboeji sábado meriji . edy pagamode tu tumuga keje rugadu . Mare Jesus meartorukare nowy erore boeji . Jesus akore tuoie Pao Kurirewy rema . Akore aino dutabo akore Pao Kurirewy nuie pudumi jamedy . Mare nowy Judeu doge eimijerage erdu pegare akoinoduji . Dukodi care ekorigodyre ji . Ere tumeardae tawyje tuwo Jesus bito . 19 Nono Jesus makore nowy Judeu doge eimijeragei . Akore : Boe jokodu jire inagoino tawiagai . Pao Kurirewy Onaregedy romodukare ia boeji tumeardae tabo . Jorydymode Tuo Kurirewy roji dykeje romode nono nowy Tuo ro mogadure . Onaregedy romode nono Tuo ro mogadure rugadu . 20 Awu Pao Kurirewy Onaregedynure imi . Iogwa mearydy kurire i . Dykodire ure iorydywado turo jamedy boeji irowo nono turo mogadure jamedy . ca Iogwa ro kurimode nowy turo kori pugeje . Umode iorydywado nowy turo kurireuji irowo ji jamedy . Tardumode nowy iro kurireuji dykeje taebogodymode i rugadu . 21 Iogwa Kurirewy umode bireuge ewodudo pugeje tuwo emugu pemegado turo pegarewy piji . Onaregedynure imi . Imode itaidure jiwyge emugu pemegado ero pegarewy piji jamedy . 22 Iogwa Kurirewy aiwomodukare boe ero pegarewy bagai . Ure boe eimijerado imi . Dykodire imire itaiwomode boe ero pegarewy bagai . 23 Itaiwomode boe ero pegarewy bagai Dykodire boe emode ikie kurido nono ere Iogwa Kurirewy ie kurido dumogadure . Mare mako pemegakare iwu mako peganure Iogwaji jamedy . Iogwa koiare ure itarego mato boe etae . 24 Boe jokodu jire inagoino . Iogwa Kurirewy ure itarego mato boe etae . Ewiapagamode iwadary ji dykeje emeartorumode Iogwa Kurireuji jamedy . dykeje emugumode Iogwa Kurirewy apo jii toro rugadu . Du akedymodukare . Emeartorumode Iogwaji dykeje umodukare boe pegado boei . Boe ero pegare Dykodire ewimode . Dykodire ere nono bireuge emogadure . Mare emeartorumode Iogwaji dykeje ewimodukare pugeje . Emugu pemegamode Iogwapo rugadu jii toro rugadu . 25 Boe jokodu jire inagoino tawiagai . Pao Kurirewy ure tawie marigudu bireuge emearydymoduie Tonaregedy batary ji . Pao Kurirewy Onaregedynure imi rugadu . Tare nono bireuge emogadure . ca tamearydyre iwadary ji . Tameartorumode iwadary ji dykeje tamodukare nono bireugere pugeje . 26 Iogwa Kurirewy koiare ure boe etowuje erijodudo . Emare jeture boei kodi . Ema koiare ure tonaregedy rakado uwo boe etowuje jamedy . Emare jeture boei jamedy . 27 Pao Kurirewy onaregedynure imi . Imedy Onaregedynure imi . Dykodire Iogwa ure boe eimijerado imi itaiwowo boe ero pegarewy bagai ewo turo pegarewy morido rugadu . 28 Ia meri keje bireuge eiamedy boe ewodumode pugeje bireuge eda piji . Ro pemegareuge ewodumode pugeje . Nono ewimodukare pugeje . Emugu pemegamode Iogwapo . Du akedymodukare . Ro pegareuge ewodumode jamedy mare imago pegamode erore jiboeji dykeje ewarigudumode bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto boe pegawo ei jii toro rugadu . Du akedymodukare rugadu . 30 Jesus mako kimore . Akore : Imi karega ire boe eimijerado imi . Iromodukare itaidure jiboeji itaobiji . Dykodire imeardae karega mare Pao Kurirewy koiare ure imeardae maku inai itaiwowo boe ero pegarewy bagai . Pao Kurirewy koiare ure itarego woe . Dykodire iromode aidure jiboeji tu tyje rugadu . 31 Mare imagomode boei iro pemegaie dykeje emeartorumodukare i . 32 Mare Pao Kurirewy makore boe ewiagai iro pemegaie . Boe jokodu jire akoino . 33 Boe jokodu jire João Batista akoino jamedy . Tare boe etudo ae . Ure tawie iromode jiboeji marigudu . 34 Itaiwokare mako pemegare iwyge ewadary bagai iwo tameartorudo i . Pao Kurirewy uwo tawie irore jiboeji du pegakare . Mare ire tawiabutudo João Batista batary keje . Makore boe ewiagai iro pemegamodue tai dyji tameartoruwo i iwo taginorudo boe pegarewy piji rugadu . 35 João Batista batary ure nono jorugu mogadure . Mare jorugu karega . Ure tarduwado . Tagaidure batary ji ia ari keje . 36 João Batista makore tawiagai i boeji . Mare iro pemegareu , iro rakareu , umode tarduwado i rugadu . Iogwa Kurirewy ure iragado iro rakawo rugadu . Iro rakamode dykeje tarduwamode Iogwa Kurirewy koiare ure itarego mato boe etae duji . 37 Iogwa Kurirewy koiare ure tawie iromode jiboeji . Ure itarego mato mare marigudure tardukare ji . Marigudu tamearydykare makoji . Tameartorukare ji jamedy Dykodire tagare Iogwa Kurirewy batary metudo tagaora tada . Tawiagodyre piji . 39 Tagaiwore Pao Kurirewy batary padure kejewy baperaji . Tamerdare nowy taro koiare umode tamugu pemegado Pao Kurirewy apo tawikawo pugeje . Mare nowy tagaiwore jiwu Pao Kurirewy batary unure tawie irore jiboeji . 40 Mare tagaidukare tarduwawo i tagaidukare tamertoruwo i . Tameartorumode i dykeje tamugu pemegamode Pao Kurirewy apo jii toro rugadu . Dukodi tawimodukare pugeje . 41 Itaiwokare mako pemegare iwyge ewadary bagai . 42 Iorydyware tai rugadu . Tawiapagakare tamearydy kuriwo Pao Kurireuji pugeje . 43 Iogwa Kurirewy koiare ure boe eimijerado imi . Du inodu tabo tameartorukare i . Ia imedy aregodymode tagae . Umode boe eimijerado pudumi dykeje tameartorumode ji rugadu . 44 Tagaidure boe emago pemegare tai dyji boe ebogodywo tai . Mare tagaidukare tawiapagawo Pao Kurirewy batary ji tameartoruwo ji mako pemegawo tai . ca . Tameartorumodukare i jamedy . 45 Mare imago pegamodukare tai Iogwa Kurirewy biagai . Tagaidure jawu Judeu doge eimijera Moisés batary ji . Mare emare mako pegamode tai Pao Kurirewy biagai tameartorukaie i . 46 Tameartorumode Moisés batary ji rugadu dykeje tameartorumode i jamedy . Emare makore irore jiboeji . Ure nowy tuwadary bu bapera keje . 47 Mare tameartorukare nowy padure bapera kejewy Moisés batary ji Dykodire tameartorumodukare iwadary ji jamedy.

6 1 Jesus ro rakare rugadu . Ure kogodyreuge epemegago . Nono Jesus kurugodyre nowy Galiléia pobo maerewy bakowu ka ture jorydywadowugebo . nowy pobo maerewy iere Tiberíades jamedy . Boe eture Jesus rekodaji . Emagare rugadu . Erdure Jesus ro rakarewy boeji Dykodire eture rekodaji . 3 Etaregodyre bakowu ka dykeje Jesus ruture ia tori ao ka . Nonore ure tumugudo ture jorydywadowugebo . 4 Judeu doge ewiapagagodyre tuwadae Páscoaji mare nowy meri kodu mai kimore nowy ewadae ka . 5 Jesus aiwore tubiji dykeje jorydyre boe doge ekodure pudae duji . Emagare rugadu . Nono unarare Filipeji . Akore : Kaiba pagodymode pawo pagerago boe ekeji awu boe doge ekeje ? 6 Jesus jorydyware tumeardaeji marigudu . Du inodu tabo unarare Filipeji tuiorydywo Filipe meartorumode pudui dubagai . 7 Filipe akore : Awu boe emagare rugadu . Pamode pagerago boe ekeji eiamedy boewo kowuje mare mori kurimode rugadu . Imedy maragodymode kejewy ari otopadumode kejeu oito dykeje o diero mode tuwo akirodo boe ekeji . 8 Jesus ure jorydywadowu ia imedy iere André . Simão Pedro uwienure ema . 9 André akore : cege amirewy ure ikera aboudure woe ia imedy rogu apo . cege karo rogu ure pobe apo jamedy . Mare awu boe eké rogu aregodymodukare enodu ka emagare rugadu kodi . 10 Boebutu pemegarewy jeture nono Dykodire Jesus akore : Tamagodo awu boei ewo tumugudo nowy boebutu keje . Nono nowy boe doge eiamedy boe ere tumugudo nowy boebutu keje . Ime doge enodo padu kejeboere cinco mil nono . 11 Jesus ure tugerago nowy imedy rogu uké amirewy roguji . Imadure Pao Kurirewy apo nowy amirewy paru tabo . dykeje care ure kado puiato . Ure maku nowy boe doge etai . Boe eiamedy boe ere tugerago ji . Rorino nowy kare kugurei jamedy . Ure kado puiato dykeje ure maku etai jamedy . Boe eiamedy boe ere tugerago ji . nowy boe eiamedy boe enogoagere rugadu . Ere ko jii toro tuguredy ka . 12 Ekuredyre dykeje Jesus makore ture jorydywadowugei . Akore : Tagerago nowy boe eké koboji . Tagaba barigu . 13 Dykodire nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowyge ere tugerago boe eké koboji boe epiji .
