Ere kadarabo doge korau nowy boe eke kobo tabo . nowy kadarabo enodo padu kejeboere doze nowy boe eké kobo tabo rugadu . 14 nowy boe doge erdure nowy Jesus rore ainoduji dykeje emagore pui . Egore : Makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwunure ema rugadu . Boe epagare bagai marigudu . Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure boe ewie ia makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwu aregodymoduie boe etae . Aino care aregodyre boe etae rugadu . Ema rugadu . Pao Kurirewy batary jeture pudui rugadu . 15 Ere turagado tuwo tugerago Jesusji tugimijera kurireuwo ema . Mare Jesus jorydyware emeardaeji . Dykodire uture epiji turagojewo tuginaigody toro ia tori aogeje . 16 nowy boecoji Jesus ure jorydywadowyge eture pobo maerewy okwa ka . 17 Ere turemo ika kurireuto tugurugodywo pobo maereuji toro Cafarnaum ba kurirewy ka . ca boecodure ei rugadu . Jesus aregodykare etae raga . 18 Ekurugody kimore nowy pobo maerewy kajeje dykeje bakuru rakarewy aregodyre etogi . Dykodire nowy pobo jetu rakare nowy ika kurireuji . 19 Traiga tabore nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowyge emaragodyre traiga tabo ika kurireuji . Ekodu ja kimore nowy pobo maerewy okwaji dykeje erdure Jesus merure pobo ao jituji . Kodu mato etae ika kurirewy ka . nowy ure jorydywadowyge epagudugodyre ce rugadu . 20 Mare Jesus makore ei . Akore : Tabagudukaba . Imire iroino ! 21 Dukodi care epagudu akedyre . Ere udo turemo ika kurireuto pudabo . dykeje care erore puku etaregodyre toro nowy turoino kaboe ka duji . 22 nowy barogwato nowy boe doge edy kimore toro nowy pobo maerewy bakowu keje . Erduware ika kurirewy ure mitotyje duji . Erduware Jesus kodukare ture jorydywadowugebo duji . nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowyge eture ika kurirewy tabo Jesus piji . 23 dykeje care ia boe etaregodyre nowy boe etae ika kurirewy tabo jamedy . Etaregodyre Tiberíades ba kurirewy piji . Ika kurireuge ebore etaregodyre . Etaregodyre dykeje erudure Jesus ure boe eké maku boe etaiwu tori ao ka . 24 Mare Jesus rakojekare nono . Ure jorydywadowyge eragojekare nono jamedy . Dukodi care nowy boe eture tuibagi pobo maerewy okwa ka . Ere taredo ika kurireugeto dykeje eture Cafarnaum ba kurirewy ka taiwo tabo Jesus bagai . 25 nowy boe erdure Jesusji nowy pobo maerewy okwa bakowu keje dykeje eture ae . Egore : Nuba arore akaregodywo woe ? 26 Jesus akore : Boe jokodu jire inagoino . Tare ire maku tagaiwu amirewy kowuje dukodi taguredyre . Dykodire taemarure iwagai pugeje . Mare tarduwakare imeardaeji . Tarduwakare kodiba iro rakare aino duji . 27 Tawiapagakaba tu tagé bagai . Pegamode . Mare tawiapagado tu baru tadawu boe eké remawu bagai . Tamode kowuje dykeje tamugumode Pao Kurirewy apo rugadu jii toro rugadu . Du akedymodukare . Imedy Onaregedynure imi . Pao Kurirewy ure iro rakado tuwo boe erduwado taidure i duji . Imire imode nowy boe eké remawu maku tagai . 28 Nono enarare Jesusji . Egore : Nuba ceromode Pao Kurirewy ai aiduwo cei ? 29 Jesus akore : Pao Kurirewy koiare ure itarego mato . Emare aidure tameartoruwo i . 30 Egore : Aro rakamode cegai dykeje cemeartorumode ai rugadu . Nuba aromode ? 31 Jao paobe ere baru pijiwu boe eké kowuje toro boe maerewy keje . Moisés ure turo rakarewy to tuwo nowy boe eké maku etai . Pao Kurirewy batary padure kejewy bapera Akore : Pao Kurirewy ure baru pijiwu boe eké maku etai ewo kowuje. 32 Jesus akore : Boe jokodu jire inagoino tai . nowy Moisés ure maku etaiwu boe eke baru pijiwu boe eké remawu karega . Pao Kurirewy koiare emare umode boe eké remawu maku tagai baru piji . 33 Aregodyre baru piji rugadu . Pao Kurirewy ure nowy boe eké remawu rawyje mato moto ka tuwo boe emugu pemegado pudabo . Du akedymodukare . 34 Erduwakare kaba jiba Jesus akoino . Egore : nowy akagoino jiwu boe eké remawu maku cenai tu tyje . 35 Jesus akore : nowy boe eké remawunure imi . Aidure tuiorydywawo iwyge emeartorumode i dykeje eké boemodukare ei pugeje . Mare boe eké ji karega inagoino . Emugu pemegamode Pao Kurirewy apo . Meartorure iwyge pobo boemodukare ei jamedy . Mare pobo ji karega inagoino . Emugu pemegamode Pao Kurirewy apo rugadu . 36 Aino care ire tawie . Tardure i mare tameartorumodukare i . 37 Iogwa Kurirewy ure maku inaiwu boe etaregodymode itae rugadu . Imodukare etudo ipiji . 38 Itaregodykare iwo itaidure jiboe towuje . Itaregodyre baru piji imeartoruwo ure itarego matowu Iogwa batary ji . 39 Emare aidukare iwo ia aregodyre itaewu barigu ipiji . Dykodire imodukare ewarigu rugadu . Mare awu moto akedymode dykeje imode ewodudo pugeje ewikawo pugeje . 40 Pao Kurirewy aidure meartorure iwugei . Erdumode i mare emeartorumode i dykeje emugu pemegamode Pao Kurirewy apo rugadu . Du akedymodukare . Imire imode ewodudo pugeje awu moto akedy keje . 41 Jesus makore nowy baru pijiwu boe eké remawu nuie pudumi mare nowy boe etaidukare nowy akoinoduji . 42 Egore pui : José onaregedynure ema . Parduware uoji uceji . Pagare akoino tuie turawyje baru piji duji . 43 Mare Jesus akore : Tagagokaba aino . 44 Iogwa Kurirewy umodukare boe etudo itae dykeje etaregodymodukare itae rugadu . Iogwa Kurirewy koiare ure itarego mato . Umode boe etudo itae dykeje emeartorumode i rugadu . Nono imode ewodudo pugeje awu moto akedy keje . 45 Makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge ere Pao Kurirewy batary bu bapera keje . Egore : Pao Kurirewy umode boe eiamedy boe erduwado. Dykodire imagore aino . Biapagare Iogwa Kurirewy batary jiwu aregodymode itae . Iogwa umode jorydywado dykeje aregodymode itae . 46 Mare inagokare boe erduie Iogwa Kurireuji . Tu nowy aregodyre Pao Kurirewy pijiwu jorydyre Iogwa Kurireuji . 47 Boe jokodu jire inagoino . Meartorure iwu mugu pemegamode Pao Kurirewy apo . Du akedymodukare rugadu . 48 Boe eké remawunure imi . 49 Jao taobe ere ia boe eké kowuje boe maerewy keje . Mare ewire tuiamedy boe tabo . 50 Mare baru pijire boe eké remawu aregodyre . Umode kowujewyge ewimodukare pugeje . 51 nowy boe eké remawunure imi . nowy aregodyre baru pijiwunure imi . Tamode nowy boe eké remawu kowuje dykeje tamugu pemegamode Pao Kurirewy apo . Du akedymodukare . Boe eké remawunure ikoduce . Imode ikodu maku tagai tawo kowuje . Imode ikodu maku boe etai ewikawo pugeje . 52 nowy boe erdu pegare nowy Jesus bataryre aino duji . Etokire pui nowy batary keje . Egore : Boe emodukare awu imedy kodu kowuje rugadu . 53 Jesus akore : Boe jokodu jire inagoino . Imedy Onaregedynure imi . Boe emodukare ikodu kowuje mare emugu pemegamodukare jamedy . Boe ekudumodukare ikuce dykeje emugu pemegamodukare . 54 Mare boe emode ikodu kowuje , ekudumode ikuce dykeje emugu pemegamode Pao Kurirewy apo rugadu . Du akedymodukare . Moto akedymode dykeje imode ewodudo pugeje ewikawo pugeje . 55 Boe eké remawunure ikoduce . Boe eké remawunure ikuce . 56 Boe emode ikodu kowuje dykeje emugumode itabo . Imugumode ebo jamedy . Boe ekudumode ikuce dykeje emugumode itabo . Imugumode ebo jamedy . 57 Iogwa Kurirewynure rugadu . Ema koiare ure itarego mato . Ema koiare ure imugu pemegado jamedy . Aino care boe emode ikowuje dykeje imode emugu pemegado jamedy . 58 Ainore baru pijiwu boe ekére . Ukare nono nowy jawu taobe enogoagere jiboere . Jao taobe eiamedy boe ewire . Mare boe emode awu inagoino jiwu boe eké remawu kowuje dykeje ewimodukare pugeje . Emugumode Pao Kurirewy apo jii toro rugadu . Du akedymodukare rugadu . 59 Cafarnaum ba kurirewy kejere Jesus rakojere . nowy Judeu doge ere bato puiwu bai kejere akoino nowy boe dogei . 60 nowy uture Jesus rekodajiwugere emearydyre nowy Jesus akoinoduji Dykodire etaidukare ji . Egore : Awu makore jiboe rakare pai . Boe erduwamodukare ji . Boe emeartorumodukare ji jamedy . 61 Jesus mearydykare ewadary ji mare jorydyware emago pegare pudui duji . Dukodi care makore ei pugeje . Akore : Kocare tagaidukare imagore jiboeji . 62 Tardumode irudure baruto ibagi dyji dykeje nuba tameardaemode i pugeje ? 63 Inagore taiago ikodu kowuje . Mare ikodu remawu ji karega inagoino . Pao Kurirewy Uwari jire inagoino . Inagore taguduiago ikuce jamedy mare ikú remawu ji karega inagoino . Pao Kurirewy Uwari jire inagoino . Ema koiare umode meartorure iwyge emugu pemegado Pao Kurirewy apo . Taraga tabo karega tamugu pemegamode . Mare Pao Kurirewy Uwari koiare umode boe emugu pemegado . 64 Mare ia tagi tameartorukare i rugadu . Marigudu Jesus jorydyware meartorumodukare puduiwugei . Jorydyware ia imedy umoduie tumagu boe eimijerage pegareuge etai dyji jamedy . Jorydyware nowy imedy romode pudui dyji marigudu . 65 Nono Jesus makore pugeje . Akore : Tameartorukare Dykodire inagoino . Boe etaregodymodukare itae tao biji . Pao Kurirewy koiare umode boe pemegado boei etaregodywo itae . 66 ca Jesus akore aino nowy boe dogei dukodi care emagare tudu tabo piji . Etukare Jesus rekodaji pugeje . 67 Dykodire Jesus unarare ture jorydywadowugei . Enodo padure kejeboere doze . Akore : Tagaidure taduwo ipiji jamedy ? 68 Mare Simão Pedro akore : Boro . Awadary koiare umode cemugu pemegado Pao Kurirewy apo jii toro rugadu . cerduwakare ia boe ewagai pugeje . 69 Aino care cemeartorure ai rugadu . cerduware Boe Pemegarewy Remawu ure aki dyji rugadu . Akire akaregodyre Pao Kurirewy piji rugadu . 70 Jesus akore : Tanodo padu kejeboere doze . Ire ikerago taiamedy boeji inai . Mare ia tamedia bopenure ema nono tagabo . 71 Judas Iscariotes jire Jesus akoino . Simão Iscariotes onaregedynure ema . Jesus ure nowy Judas Iscariotes jorydywado . Du inodu tabo umode Jesus maku boe eimijerage pegareuge etai rugadu.

7 1 nowy inodu otobiji Jesus kodure Galiléia motoji . Judéia moto kejewy Judeu doge eimijerage etaidure tuwo Jesus bito . Dykodire Jesus aidukare tugodywo Judéia motoji . 2 Kuri aino Judeu doge ewadumode ia tuwadaeji . nowy ewadure jiwu ewadae iere Mace Bradu . 3 Nono Jesus uwiemage emagore ji . Egore : Boe etaidumode boe erduwawo pudui boe emodukare turo rakarewy biado boe epiji . ca atudo toro Judéia moto ka . nowy Judéia moto kejewyge emearydyre boe egore aro rakaie . Etaidure tuduwo akabo . Atudo toro awo erdudo aro rakareuji . Dykodire boe eiamedy boe erduwamode ai rugadu . 5 Mare nowy Jesus uwiemage emeartorukare ji Dykodire egoino . 6 Mare Jesus makore ei . Akore : Tameardae pagare . Iorydyware itumode toro kejewy meriji . Kajao . 7 Boe erdu pegakare tai . Mare imi ire boe ewie ero pegarewy jamedy boeji Dykodire erdu pegare i rugadu . 8 Tadudo nowy Judeu doge ewadae ka . Itumodukare raga . nowy itumode kejewy meri aregodykare raga . 9 Jesus utukare nowy Galiléia moto piji nowy meriji rugadu . 10 Jesus uwiemage eture toro nowy Judeu doge ewadae ka . Dykejere Jesus uture toro jamedy . Mare ure tuwiado boe epiji . 11 nowy ewadae kejere nowy Judeu doge eimijerage emarure Jesus bagai . Egore : Ema pa ? 12 nowy ewadae kejewy boe doge enogwa podure pui Jesus jiboeji . Iage egore : Imedy pemegarewynure ema . Mare iage egore : Boro . Unure boe ekiripagado . 13 Mare emagokare nowy inodu boeji boe ewiagai . Epagudure tugimijeragece kodi . 14 nowy Judeu doge ewadure rugadu nowy tuwadaeji . Mare ewadu kimore dykeje Jesus uture Pao Kurirewy uwai ka . Nonore ure boe erduwado . 15 Judeu doge eimijerage erore ta je . Egore : Boe ekare awu imedy jorydywado . Kodiba care jorydyware aino ? 16 Jesus akore : Pao Kurirewy koiare ure itarego woe . Du batary jire inagore aino iwo boe erduwado . 17 Aidure tumeartoruwo Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge erduwamode iwadary ji . Erduwamode jamedy iwadary ji karega inagoino . Erduwamode Pao Kurirewy batary remawu jire inagoino duji . 18 Ia boe emagomode tu pudumie tuiorydyware . Nouge etaidure boe etaiwowo tu pudui , boe enojarowo nowy tuwadary ji . Mare ia aidumode boe emago pemegawo nowy ure tarego matowuji dykeje batrarodumodukare . Boe jokodu jire akoino boe etaiduwo nowy ure tarego matowuji . 19 Mariguduwyge pawobe eimijera Moisés ure Pao Kurirewy meardae maku etai eno bakaruce . Dykodire tago bakarure aino jii aino . Mare taiamedy boe tameartorukare nowy tago bakaruji rugadu . Kodiba tagaidure tawo iwido ? 20 nowy boe egore : cedaidukare cewo awido . Ia bope uwari meture atada rugadu kodire akagoino . 21 Jesus akore : Iro rakare sábado meri keje dykejere taerore ta je . 22 Marigudu Moisés ure taro maku tagai tawo tagore ime ewaga oto biri kado . Mare ia jawu taobe eigoiare ere nowy taro maku tagai boetoji . Nono Moisés rore aino tai jamedy aino boigody . Dykodire tare tagore ime eiamedy boe ewaga oto biri kado rugadu . Taromode aino sábado meri keje jamedy . 23 Moisés ure tago bakaru maku tagai . Akore tamaragodykaiago sábado meriji mare boe pegakaie tai tawo tagore ime ewaga oto biri kado sábado meriji . Ire nowy imedy pemegado sábado meriji Dykodire tagorigodyre aino i . Tagagore boe erokaie aino sábado meriji . 24 Tagaiwokaba boei tameardae pegarewy tabo . Tagaiwodo boei eromode jiboeji emeardaemode jiboeji jamedy . Dykodire tarduwamode ei rugadu . 25 nowy ia jeture Jerusalém ba kurirewy kejewyge egore : cowu pagimijerage etaidure tuwo bitowu imedy karegau ? 26 Dukocare makore boe eiamedy boe ewiagai boe eiamedy boe egai . Mare boe emago pegarewy bokware ia tuwadary ji ji . Pagimijerage erduwa kana umode boe ekinorudowunure ema duji ? Erduwa kana pabagare bagaiwunure ema duji ? 27 Boe erduwamodukare kaibowu pijiba umode boe ekinorudowu aregodymode . Mare paiamedy boe parduware kaibowu pijiba awu imedy aregodyre . 28 Jesus ure boe erduwado Pao Kurirewy uwai tada dykeje ure tumago pemegado toro boe etae boe eiamedy boe emearydywo tuwadary ji . Akore : Tameardaere tarduwaie itaregodyre pijiwu motoji . Mare nowy ure itarego mato taewu emare ure itudo jetu . Imi itaobiji karega itaregodyre . nowy ure itarego matowu batrarodumodukare . Boe remawunure ema rugadu . Mare tarduwakare ji . 29 Iragojere apo Dykodire iorydyware ji . Ema koiare ure itarego mato . 30 Nono iage etaidure tuwo tugerago ji tuwo tugu baicoreuto . Mare Pao Kurirewy aidukare Dykodire erokare aino ji rugadu . 31 Mare iage emeartorure Jesusji . Awu meartorure jiwyge emagare . Egore : Awu imedy ro rakare nono pabagare bagaiwu umode boe ekinorudowu mogadure rugadu . 32 Fariseu doge emearydyre nowy boe enogwa podure pui Jesus jiboe jituji . Dykejere ere tugobaigarege etudo toro tuwo tugerago Jesusji . nowy ure Judeu doge enomea maku Pao Kurirewy aiwyge eimijerage emeardaere nono nowy fariseu doge emeardae mogadure jamedy . 33 Jesus makore boei . Akore : Iragoje biagamode tu tagabo . Kuri aino itumode tabiji toro ure itarego matowu bagai ibagi . 34 Tagaiwomode iwagai mare tardumodukare i . Taroiwamodukare taduwo toro iragojemodewu ka . 35 nowy Judeu doge egore pui : Kaiba kodumode ? Utumode kana toro paobe etae toro ia Grécia moto kejewy ba kurirewy ka tuwo nowy Grécia kejewyge erduwado ? Nuba romode pardukawo pudui pugeje ? 36 Akore pagaiwomoduie tuwagai mare pardumodukaie pudui . Akore paroiwamodukaie paduwo toro turagojemodewu ka . Kaba jiba akoino ? 37 Awu meriji nowy Judeu doge ewadae remawu akedy kejewy meri reo . Jesus ure turagojedo . Ure tumago pemegado boe eiamedy boe emearydywo . Akore : Pobo boere ia tai dykeje tadudo itae . 38 Pao Kurirewy batary padure bapera keje . Akore : Meartorure iwyge ekudumode nowy poboce dykeje umode turedo epiji . nowy pobo umode emugu pemegado rugadu . Du akedymodukare rugadu. 39 Mare pobo ji karega Jesus akoino . Pao Kurirewy Uwari jire Jesus akoino . Boe emeartorumode Jesusji dykeje Pao Kurirewy umode Tuwari maku nowy boe etai . Dujire Jesus akoino . Mare Jesus akore aino nowy boei kimo mare Pao Kurirewy ukare Tuwari maku boe etai raga . Jesus jewodukare tuwi piji raga turuduwo baruto Dykodire ukare maku tai raga . 40 nowy boe emearydyre nowy Jesus batary ji dykeje iage egore : Pao Kurirewy ure pawie jiwu makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwunure awu imedyce rugadu . 41 Iage egore : Pabagare bagaiwu umode boe ekinorudowunure ema . Mare iage emeartorukare . Erduwakare Jesus boture Belém ba kurirewy keje duji . Dykodire egore : Ema karega . Awu imedyre boture Galiléia moto keje . 42 Pao Kurirewy akore Belém ba kurirewy kejeie nowy pabagare bagaiwu umode boe ekinorudowu botumode . Jao pagimijera kurirewy Davi uwobe moduie ema . Belém ba kurirewy kejere nowy Davi mugure . Mare awu Jesus botukare Belém ba kurirewy keje . Ainore nowy boe egore . Mare erduwakare Jesus boture Belém ba kurirewy keje duji . Dykodire egoino . 43 Dykodire emeartorukare ji . Dykodire nowy boe emeardaekare pumeardae mogadure Jesus jituji . 44 Iage etaidure tuwo tugerago ji tuwo tugu baicoreuto . Mare boe eragakare tuduwo ae . 45 Dykodire tugobaigarege eture tuibagi tugimijerage fariseu doge etae , tugimijerage ure Judeu doge enomea maku Pao Kurirewy aiwyge eimijerage etae . nowy tugobaigarege eimijerage enarare ei . Egore : Kodiba tagaregodykare apo ? 46 nowy tugobaigarege egore : Marigudu boe emagokare nono nowy imedy makore jiboe mogadure ji aino . Mako pemegare rugadu . 47 nowy fariseu doge ekorigodyre . Egore : Ure taekiripagado rugadu . 48 Judeu doge eimijerage eiamedy boe emeartorukare ji rugadu . Fariseu dogenure cegi . ceiamedy boe cemeartorukare ji rugadu . 49 Awu boe erduwakare Moisés ure maku pagaiwu pago bakaruji paroji . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ro pegare ei . Dukodi care boe pegamode ei rugadu . Ainore nowy fariseu doge egore . 50 Ia fariseu iere Nicodemo . Emare uture Jesus ae marigudu tuiorydywawo Jesus batary ji . Aino care makore tumedage fariseu dogei . 51 Akore : Pawiapagamode boe ewadary ji parduwawo eroji dykeje pagaiwomode ero pegarewy bagai . Ainore pago bakaru ure . Ainore parore . Paromodukare aino dykeje paro peganure . 52 Mare nowy fariseu doge egore : Awodu kana Galiléia moto keje jamedy nono awu imedy Jesus mogadure ? Akaidure ji ? Akaiwodo Pao Kurirewy batary padure kejewy baperaji . Akaiwomode ji dykeje arduwamode nowy makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge eiamedy boe ewodukare nowy Galiléia moto keje rugadu.

8 1 Boe eiamedy boe eture tuibagi tuwai ka pugeje . Mare Jesus ruture ia tori iere Oliveira cewu ao ka . 2 Barogwakodody kejere ure turawuje . Uture tuibagi Pao Kurirewy uwai ka pugeje . Boe ere bato pui ae . Emagare . Dykodire ure tumugudo boebo dykeje ure erduwado . 3 Jorydyware Judeu doge eno bakaru jiwyge etaregodyre ae aredy apo . Fariseu doge etaregodyre ebo jamedy . Erdure nowy aredy jeribarire tumugukare apowu imedy jituji . Dykodire etaregodyre nowy aredy apo aino . Nono ere nowy aredy rakojedo boe toiadada . 4 Emagore Jesusji . Egore : Jorydywarewynure aki . cerdure awu aredy jeribarire tumugukare apowu imedy jituji . 5 Marigudu Moisés ure Pao Kurirewy meardae maku jawu paobe etai pago bakaruce kodire parore aino rugadu . Emare akore aredy jeribarie tumugukare apowu imedyji dykeje boe eiago nowy aredy bito tori tabo . ca nuba ameardaere parowo awu aredyji ? 6 nowy boe eimijerage etaidure tuwo turo kogado Jesusji tumearydywo ia Jesus batary pegarewy bagai . Dykodire egoino ji . Mare Jesus makokare boeji . Ure tubu jodo moto keje tuwo tuwadary bu moto keje tugerako tabo . 7 nowy boe eimijerage enara kimore ji dykeje Jesus ure turagojedo pugeje . dykeje makore ei . Akore : Ia tagi taro pegarewy bokware dykeje tagidomode tori tabo nowy aredyji boetoji . 8 Nono Jesus ure tubu jodo moto keje pugeje dykeje ure ia tuwadary bu moto keje tugerako tabo pugeje . 9 nowy boe eimijerage emearydyre nowy Jesus akoino dyji dykeje eture Jesus piji etododai . Pegagodyreuge eture boetoji . dykeje iage eture eregodaji . Nono iage eture pugeje . ca nowy boe eimijerage eiamedy boe eture rugadu . Aino Jesus rakojere nono tuginaigody nowy eroino jiwu aredy apo . 10 Nono Jesus ure turagodo dykeje makore nowy aredyji . Akore : Kaiba ekodure ? Boe edykare woe pugeje tumago pegawo ai ? 11 nowy aredy akore : Boro . Eiamedy boe eture marigudu . Jesus akore : ca imago pegamodukare ai jamedy . Atudo awai ka aibagi . Mare paga karega . Aro pegakaba pugeje . 12 Jesus makore nowy fariseu dogei pugeje . Akore : Jorugu pemegarewy koiare umode boe edo cinorudo boe pegarewy piji boecoji . Ire nono jorugu pemegarewy mogadure . Mare jorugu ji karega inagoino . Imode boe edo cinorudo turo pegarewy piji . Boe ekodumode itabo dykeje imode boe erdudo turo pegareuji erokawo aino pugeje . Imode eroiwado tuwo tugera ra turo pegarewy piji . 13 nowy fariseu doge egore : Amagore cei mare aragojere woe akinaigody . Tu akire akagoino . Dukodi care awadary ukare turugadu cegai . 14 Jesus akore : Boro . Iorydyware boe jokodu jire inagoino tai duji . Tarduwakare kaibowu pijiba itaregodyre . Imire iorydyware . Tarduwakare kaiba ikodumode . Imire iorydyware . Dykodire inagoino irore jiboeji tawiagai . 15 Tagaiwomode boe eroji dykeje tamagomode ero pegareuji boe ewiagai nono boe ero mogadure . Mare imi imagokare boe ero pegarewy boeji tawiagai . 16 Imagomode boe ero pegarewy boeji boe ewiagai dykeje iwadrarodumodukare . Boe jokodu jire imagomode . Iragojekare woe ikinaigody . Iogwa Kurirewy rakojere itabo . 17 Tamode pobe dykeje tamagomode jiboe kodumode puregodaji dykeje boe emeartorumode tagagoino jiboeji . Egomode boe remawu jie tagagoino . Ainore tago bakaru akore . Tagi taro reo . Boere pobe tumago pegare dutabo ia ro pegarewy jitu dutabo dykeje boe emeartorumode emagore jiboeji . Umode mitu tumagore dytabo dykeje boe emeartorumodukare ji . Ainore tarore . nowy taro padure bapera keje . 18 ca imagore irore jiboeji tawiagai . Mare Iogwa Kurirewy koiare ure itarego mato . Emare makore irore jiboeji boe ewiagai jamedy . Aino cere pobe jamedy tameartoruwo cemagore jiboeji . 19 Enarare Jesusji . Egore : Ao pa ? Jesus akore : Tarduwakare i . Tarduwakare iogwaji jamedy . Tarduwamode i dykeje tarduwamode iogwaji jamedy . 20 Ainore Jesus akore Pao Kurirewy uwai tada . Ure boe erduwado nono . Ia ira mugure nono jamedy boe ewo toe tugu jagi tuwo maku Pao Kurirewy ai . 21 Nono Jesus makore boei pugeje . Akore : Iturumode tabiji pugeje . Tagaiwomode iwagai . Mare taro pegare kodi tawimode . Itumode tabiji dykeje taroiwakare taduwo iregodaji . 22 nowy Judeu doge eimijerage emagore pui . Egore : Emare akoino paroiwamodukaie paduwo turegodaji . Tuwimodedy ji kana akoino ? Umokana tuwido ? 23 Jesus makore ewadary jipagi . Akore : Awu moto kejewygenure tagi . Imi rema itaregodyre baru piji . Tawodure woe awu moto keje . Mare imi moto kejewy karugure imi . 24 Dykodire inagoino tai tawimode nowy taro pegarewy kode . ca itagedymodukare rugadu . Tameartorumodukare i dykeje tawimode rugadu taro pegarewy jamedy boe tabo . 25 Egore : Iogudubanure aki ? Jesus akore : Ire tawie marigudu . 26 Itaidure imago raiwo taro boeji . Itaidure iwo boe ewie taro pegarewy jamedy boeji . Mare ure itarego matowu ure tuwadary maku inai iwo boe ewie . Emare batrarodumodukare . Imagomodukare ia iwadary ji tawiagai . 27 Pao Kurirewy jire Jesus akoino . Mare nowy boe erduwakare akoino jiboeji . 28 dykeje Jesus makore ei pugeje . Akore : Imedy Onaregedynure imi . Tamode ipo padure pugajejeu rakojedo itabo dykeje tarduwamode akedymodukarewynure imi duji . Nono tarduwamode Iogwa Kurirewy batary jire inagoino rugadu . Imeardae ji karega inagoino . Iogwa Kurirewy meardae koiare ure inago jino rugadu aino tai . 29 Ema koiare ure itarego mato . Rakojere itabo jamedy . Imeartorure ji rugadu Dykodire utukare ipiji . 30 Boe emearydyre Jesus akoino dyji Dykodire emagare tumeartorure jitu tabo . 31 Nono Jesus makore nowy meartorure puduiwugei . Akore : Tameartorumode iwadary ji rugadu dykeje ire jorydywadowyge remawyge emode tagi rugadu . 32 Tarduwamode iwadary remawuji Dykodire nowy iwadary remawu umode tadawyje boe pegarewy piji . Tawiapagamodukare tameardae pegareuji taibagi pugeje . Tamode tagamudo piji rugadu . 33 Egore : Amode cedawyje boe pegarewy piji ? Kaba jiba akagoino cei ? cemugu pegakare . Abraão uwobenure cegi . Marigudu cemaragodykare ia boe tuginaiwyge etai ji aino . cewiapagakare ei . ceragojekare boe pegarewy keje . 34 Mare Jesus akore : Boe jokodu jire inagoino tawiagai . Boe ero pegare Dykodire emearydy kurire nowy turo pegare jiboeji . Ewiapagamode tu tu nowy turo pegarewy boeji . 35 Boe emaragodymode ia boe etai dykeje utugaregenure emage . Emugumode ebo mare etuwobe karugure emage . Mare boe etore boe etuwobenure emage rugadu jii toro . 36 Pao Kurirewy Onaregedynure imi . Imode tadawyje boe pegarewy piji tagawo tagirimi nowy taro pegarewy ka pugeje dykeje tawiapagamodukare taro pega boeji taibagi pugeje . 37 Iorydyware Abraão uwobenure tagi duji . Mare tameartorukare iwadary ji Dykodire tagaidure tawo iwido . 38 Imagore Iogwa Kurirewy ure iorydywado jiwu tuwadary ji . Mare tagi tameartorure tao batary pegarewy jamedy boeji . 39 Egore : Iogware Abraão rema . Jesus akore : Abraão ore mode tagi dykeje taromode nono Abraão ro mogadure . 40 Itaidure iwo tarduwado Pao Kurirewy makore iwu tuwadary remawuji tawiagai . Boe jokodu jire Pao Kurirewy akoino . Mare tagaidure tawo iwido . Abraão rokare aino . Kodire tao karugure ema . 41 Mare tagaidure tarowo nono tao remawu ro mogadure . Egore : Pao Kurirewy ure mitotyje kodire ure toredo ceji rugadu . Pao Kurirewy ore remawugenure cegi rugadu . 42 Jesus akore : Pao Kurirewy oremode tagi dykeje tamearydy kurimode i . Itaregodyre Pao Kurirewy piji . ca imi reo . Pao Kurirewy koiare ure itarego mato tuwadary tabo . Imi igoia karega . 43 Mare tagaidukare iwadary ji Dykodire tagaidukare tawiapagawo imagore jiboeji . Dykodire tarduwakare iwadary ji . 44 Bope doge eimijera orenure tagi . Tameartorure tao bope doge eimijera meardaeji . Marigudu ure boe ewido ji aino kimo . Aidukare boe ewadary pemegareuji rugadu . Tuwadrarodae jire jorydyware tu rugadu . Marigudu batrarodure tu tyje ji aino . Batrarodureuge etuonure ema . 45 Boe jokodu jire inagoino tai . Tao batrarodurewy koiare ure tawarigu ipiji tameartorukawo i . 46 Iro pegakare Dykodire tarduwakare ia iro pegarewy bagai . Imagore boe remawuji tawiagai tameartoruwo i mare tameartorukare i . 47 Pao Kurirewy ore ewiapagamode Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Mare Pao Kurirewy ore karugure tagi . Dykodire tagaidukare tawiapagawo ji . 48 Nono emagore Jesusji . Egore : Boro . cegi cerduware boe remawuji rugadu . Samaria moto kejewynure aki . Bope uwari meture atada . nowy boe erdu pegare Samaria moto kejewygei Dykodire erdu pegare Jesusji jamedy . 49 Jesus makore ewadary jipagi . Akore : Bope uwari metukare itada . Imeartorure Iogwa Kurirewy batary ji kodi . Mare tamago pegare ikieji . 50 Itaidukare boe emago pemegawo ikieji . Mare Iogware aidure boe emago pemegawo ikieji . Emare aiwore irore jiboeji Dykodire mako pemegare irore jiboeji . 51 Boe jokodu jire inagoino . Boe emeartorumode iwadary ji dykeje ewimodukare jii toro . 52 Egore : ca ainore cerduware bope uwari meture atada rugadu duji . Abraão bire marigudu . nowy makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge eiamedy boe ewire marigudu jamedy . Mare aki akagore meartorumode aiwyge ewimodukaie jii toro . 53 Iogwa Abraão bire marigudu . Akurikare Abraão kori . nowy makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge eiamedy boe ewire marigudu . Iogudubanure aki ? 54 Jesus akore : Imode ikie kurido ikinaigody dykeje boe kurirewy modukare imi . Mare Iogwa Kurirewy koiare ure ikie kurido . Tagagore tameartoruie Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Mare marigudu tarduwakare ji . Mare imire iorydyware ji rugadu . Imagomode iorydywakaie jituji dykeje iwadrarodumode nono tawadrarodu mogadure . Mare iorydyware ji rugadu . Imeartorure makore jiboeji . 56 Tao Abraão jorydyware tuiorydymoduie itaregodyre dyji dukodi jakarere pudui rugadu . Nono jorydyre i dykeje jakarere pudui rugadu . 57 Egore : Ako joru otopadukare 50 . Dukodi ardukare Abraãoji rugadu . 58 Jesus akore : Boe jokodu jire inagoino tai . Abraão botukare raga mare imire imugure baru tada marigudu . 59 Nono nowy boe ere tugerago toriji tugidowo tabo ji mare Jesus ure tuwiado epiji . dykeje uture Pao Kurirewy uwai piji.

9 1 Jesus merure awaraji . Nono jorydyre joku bokwarewy imedyji . nowy imedy boture tuioku bokwa tabo ji aino imedyre pudumi duka . 2 Nono nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowyge enarare ji . Egore : Jorydywarewynure aki . Ioguduba ro pegare kodiba awu imedy boture tuioku bokwa tabo ? Ema kana ro pegare kodi kana joku bokware ? Uo kana ro pegare ? Uce kana ro pegare kodi kana boture tuioku bokwa tabo ? 3 Jesus akore : Boe ero pegarewy koia karega joku bokware . Boture tuioku bokwa tabo Pao Kurirewy uwo pemegago tuwo boe erdudo ture joku pemegagody dyji tuwo boe erdudo turo rakareuji . 4 Pao Kurirewy ure itarego mato . Pamaragodywo meri kimoto iwo ure itarego matowu meardae towuje ji je . Mare kuri aino boe pegamode boei . Boe mode boei nono boeco mogadure . Boe emaragodymodukare pugeje . 5 Iragojere woe moto keje dykeje imode nono jorugu pemegarewy mogadure . Mare jorugu karega . Imode boe erduwado boe remawuji rugadu . 6 Jesus makore aino dykeje ure todoguru barigu mototo . Ure moto bekurudo nowy todoguru tabo . Ure tugerago nowy moto bekuruji . Ure bu nowy imedy joku bokwarewy joku keje . Nono makore ji . 7 Akore : Atudo toro nowy Siloé po ka awo ae kabi . nowy Judeu doge ewadary tabore egore Utudowu . Ainore egore nowy Siloé poji tuwadary tabo . Nono nowy imedy joku bokwarewy uture nowy Siloé po ka . Ure tuie kabi dykeje joku pemegagodyre . Ure tugirimi tuibagi tuwai ka pugeje . 8 Nono nowy jorydyware jiwyge erore ta je . Egore : cowu imedy joku bokwarewy karega kana ? Kocare mugure woe maigody togwamaguduwo boei diero rogu bagai toce . 9 Iage egore : Ema rugadu . Mare iage egore : Ema karega . Jere nono nowy joku bokwarewy je mogadure mare ema karega . Mare nowy imedy akore : Imi rugadu reo . 10 nowy boe egore : Kocare akaiwo pemegare rugadu ? Nuba boere ai ? 11 dykeje akore : Ia imedy iere Jesus . Ema koiare ure moto bekurudo todoguru tabo . Ure nowy moto bekuru bu ioku keje . dykeje makore i ituwo toro Siloé po ka iwo ie kabi poce . Dukodi care iture toro . Ire ie kabi rugadu . Dukodi care itaiwo pemegare aino rugadu . 12 nowy boe egore : nowy Jesus pa ? Imedy akore : Iorydywakare bagai . 13 nowy boe ere nowy imedy reko toro fariseu doge etae . 14 Jesus ure nowy imedy joku pemegago Sábado meriji . 15 nowy fariseu doge enarare nowy imedyji . Egore : Nuba boere ai aeku pemegagodywo aino ? nowy imedy akore : Ia imedy ure moto bekuru bu ioku keje . dykeje makore i iwo ie kabi . dykeje care itaiwo pemegare aino rugadu . 16 Ia fariseu doge egore : nowy roinowu imedy meartorukare paroji kodire rore aino Sábado meri keje . Pagi parokare aino . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy piji karega aregodyre . Mare iage egore : Ia ro pegarewy imedy ro rakamodukare nono awu imedy ro raka mogadure . Awu imedy pemegare rugadu . dykeje care emeardaekare nono pumeardaere . 17 Dukodi care nowy fariseu doge enarare nowy joku bokwarewy imedyji pugeje . Egore : nowy imedy ure aeku pemegagowu nuba ameardaere ji ? nowy imedy pemegare rugadu ? nowy joku bokwarewy imedy makore ewadary jipagi . Akore : Ia makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwunure ema rugadu . 18 Mare nowy Judeu doge eimijerage etaidukare tumeartoruwo nowy joku bokwarewy akoino duji . Emeardaere joku bokwarewy karugure ema . Dykodire emagore nowy imedy uce bagai uo bagai jamedy . 19 Enarare nowy uceji , nowy uoji jamedy . Egore : Taganaregedynure awu imedyce ? Joku bokware tuwodu tabo ? Nuba boere ji joku pemegagodywo aino ? 20 nowy uce uo egore : cedonaregedynure ema rugadu . Boture tuioku bokwa tabo rugadu . 21 Mare cerduwakare nuba boere ji kodiba joku pemegagodyre aino . cerduwakare iduba koiaba ure joku pemegago . ca . Imedynure ema . Tanarado ji . Ema koiare umode tawiedy pemegado nuba nowy imedy rore pudui duji . 22 Mare marigudu nowy Judeu doge eimijerage emagore boei emeartorukawo Jesusji . Egore ia meartorumoduie Jesusji umode boe ekinorudowunure ema dyji dykeje tumode utudo nowy ture bato puiwu bai piji rugadu aregodykawo nowy bai ka pugeje . Dykodire nowy joku bokwarewy uce uo epagudure nowy tugimijeragece . 23 Dykodire emagokare Jesus ieji tugimijerage ewiagai . Egore tonaregedy koiaie umoduie ewie iduba roino pudui duji . 24 Dukodi nowy Judeu doge eimijerage emagore nowy joku bokwarewy imedy bagai pugeje . Emagore ji . Egore : Pao Kurirewy aiwonure ai rugadu . Awadarydo turugadu . nowy ure apemegadowu imedy ro pegarewy imedynure ema rugadu . 25 Nono nowy imedy joku bokwarewy akore : Imedy ro pegarewy mode ema dykeje mare iorydywakare ji . Mare imire ioku bokware rugadu . Aino care itaiwo pemegare rugadu . 26 Egore : Nuba rore ai tuwo aku pemegado akaiwo pemegawo pugeje ? 27 nowy imedy akore : Ire tawie marigudu . Tawiapagakare iwadary ji . Kodiba tanarare i pugeje ? Tagaidure tameartoruwo ji uwo tarduwado jamedy ? 28 Nono nowy fariseu doge ekorigodyre . Emago pegare nowy joku bokwarewy imedyji . Egore : Akire ure jorydywadowunure aki . Mare cegi Moisés ure jorydywadowugenure cegi . 29 Pao Kurirewy makore Moisesji rugadu . Mare awu imedy karega . cerduwakare kaibowu pijiba awu imedy aregodyre . 30 nowy joku bokwarewy imedy akore : nowy imedy ure ipemegago itaiwowo pugeje . Ioku bokwakare pugeje . Boe eimijeragenure tagi . Kocare tarduwakare nowy imedyji . Kocare arduwakare kaibowu pijiba awu imedy aregodyre . 31 Iwodure ioku bokwa tabo . Aino ca nowy imedy ure itaiwodo pugeje . Marigudu rugadu ia boe erokare nono romagadure . ca Pao Kurirewy biapagamodukare ro pegareuge emagore pudui jiboe bagai . Boe jokodu . Mare Pao Kurirewy biapagamode meartorure puduiwyge ewagai rugadu . Boe emeartorumode Pao Kurirewy batary ji dykeje Pao Kurirewy biapagamode ewadary ji . 33 nowy imedy aregodykare Pao Kurirewy piji dykeje ro rakamodukare . Umodukare ipemegago . Kodiba ure ipemegago ? ca aregodyre Pao Kurirewy piji rugadu . 34 nowy boe eimijerage egore : Awodure dykeje ro pegarewynure aki rugadu ji aino . Aki na akaidure awo cerduwado ? Arduwa bokwa . Dukodi care ere nowy imedy utudo nowy ture bato puiwu bai piji aregodykawo nowy bai ka pugeje . 35 Jesus mearydyre nowy boe eimijerage erore aino dyji dykeje jemarure nowy ture pemegagowu imedy bagai . Jorydyre ji dykeje makore ji . Akore : Aki na ameartorure Imedy Onaregedyji rugadu ? 36 nowy imedy akore : Iogudubanure ema ? Iwie imeartoruwo ji rugadu . 37 Jesus akore : Ardure ji marigudu . Imi reo rugadu . Imi rugadu inagoino ai . 38 nowy imedy ure tubu jodo moto keje Jesus jokorai . Akore : Imeartorumode ai rugadu . Ikimijera mode aki rugadu . 39 Jesus akore : Itaregodyre woe moto ka itaiwowo boe ero pegarewy bagai . Aino joku bokwareuge etaiwomode pugeje . Mare joku bokwareuge ji karega inagoino . Jorydywakare iwugeire inagoino emeartoruwo i rugadu . Mare ocarore tuwadary jiwyge emode nono joku bokwareuge emogadure . Mare joku bokwareuge ji karega inagoino . Egore tuiorydywaie Pao Kurirewy meardaeji . Mare pagatu jere egoino . Dykodire erduwamodukare i rugadu . 40 Ia fariseu doge eragojere nono jamedy . Emearydyre nowy Jesus akoino duji . Dykodire emagore Jesusji . Egore : Ameardaere joku bokwareugenure cegi rugadu ? cedaiwo pemegare . 41 Jesus akore : Inagore joku bokwareugeie . Mare joku bokwareuge ji karega inagoino . Boe egomode turo pegaie mare turo pegamodukaie aino pugeje . dykeje Pao Kurirewy biagodymode nowy ero pegare jiboe piji rugadu . Mare tagagore tarduwaie Pao Kurirewy meardaeji rugadu . Tagagore taro pega bokwaie . Aino tagojarore tawadary ji rugadu . Dukodi ro pegareugenure tagi aino rugadu.

10 1 Jesus akore : Boe jokodu jire inagoino . Boe emode tagu carneiro doge edy tadawu ibora pemegado edywo tada boecoji . Jeture carneiro doge eiwu umode turemo etae nowy eda ibora baiporoji . Mare iwogurewy umodukare turemo nowy edy tadawu ibora baiporoji . Umode turemo edy tadawu ibora kujiado . 3 nowy jeture nowy ibora baiporo jiwu umode nowy carneiro doge eda baiporo jado nowy jeture carneiro doge eiwu uwo turemo carneiro doge etae . nowy jeture carneiro doge eiwu jorydyware tagu carneiro doge ekieji . Dykodire makomode tagu carneiro doge ewagai dykeje erduware makoji . Kodire etumode rekodaji tuieda piji . 4 Umode etawyje eda piji dykeje etumode rekodaji rugadu erduware jetu pemegare puduiwu makoji rugadu . Jeture eiwu utumode etododai . 5 Carneiro doge etumodukare ia boe eregodaji rugadu . Ia makomode ewagai mare eregodymode piji rugadu . Erduwakare makoji dukodi eregodymode piji . 6 Jesus makore nowy inoduji boe ewiagai mare nowy boe erduwakare kaba jiba akoino . 7 Nono Jesus makore ei pugeje . Akore : Boe jokodu jire inagoino tawiagai . Ire nono nowy carneiro doge eda kejewy bai poro mogadure . Mare bai poro ji karega inagoino . 8 Meartorure iwyge ere nono carneiro doge emogadure . Mare carneiro dogei karega inagoino . Marigudu iage etaregodyre tuwo boe erego ikoda piji mare meartorure iwyge ewiapagakare ei . 9 Iwogurewy aidure tu tuwo tugerago boeji boe epiji . Aidure tu tuwo boe ewido . Aidure tu tuwo boe etagedydo . Mare imire ire nono bai poro remawu mogadure . Mare bai poro ji karega inagoino . Boe etumode itae dykeje imode ekodiwado tugodyre jiboeji . ca itaregodyre woe iwo boe emugu pemegado . Emugu pemegamode rugadu . 11 Jetu pemegare carneiro dogeiwu umode iaboedo tuwido tuwo tagu carneiro doge ekinorudo barege pegareuge epiji . ca iromode nono nowy jetu pemegare carneiro dogeiwu ro mogadure . Mare carneiro doge ewugeje karega imode imagu boe etai . Imode imagu ro pegareuge etai iwo boedo cinorudo boe pegarewy piji . 12 nowy akure carneiro doge ecewu utugare biagoromodukare tuietu pemegawo carneiro dogei . Aku ié karega . Dykodire rekodumode nowy barogo pegarewy piji . Umode tugera ra carneiro doge epiji . dykeje nowy barogo pegarewy umode tugerago ia carneiroji . Umode nowy ia carneiro doge edo taodo pubiji toro boe maerewy ka . 14 ca irore nono nowy jetu pemegare carneiro dogeiwu ro mogadure . Mare carneiro dogei karega inagoino . Ietu pemegamode boe dogei rugadu . Iogwa Kurirewy jorydyware i . Iorydyware Iogwa Kurireuji jamedy . Nono iorydyware meartorure iwugei rugadu . Meartorure iwyge erduware i rugadu . Ire irugadu iwiwo emugato . 16 Ia boe emeartorumode i jamedy . Mare eragojekare woe . Imode ikerago ei jamedy emugu pemegawo itabo rugadu . Ewiapagamode iwadary ji rugadu . Meartorumode iwyge eiamedy boe emugumode puapo . Jetu pemegare eiwu umode mitotyje . 17 Ire irugadu iwiwo Dykodire Iogwa Kurirewy mearydy kurire i rugadu . Dykodire umode iewodudo pugeje . 18 Imi imode imagu boe pegareuge etai itaidu tabo ewo iwido . Itaidumode imode imagu . Itaidumode iewoduwo dykeje iewodumode . Ainore Pao kurirewy akore iroiago . 19 Jesus makore aino dykeje nowy boe emeardaekare nono pumeardae mogadure pugeje nowy Jesus batary keje . 20 Iage egore : Ia bope uwari meture awu Jesus tada . Aora bai baire rugadu . Pawiapagamodukare ji rugadu . 21 Mare iage egore : Ia bope uwari metumode tada dykeje makomodukare aino . Romodukare aino . Ure joku bokwarewy aiwodo pugeje . ca bope uwari meture tadawu romode aino ? Romodukare aino ! 22 Biaku buture dykeje nowy Judeu doge ewadure ia tuwadaeji Jerusalém ba kurirewy keje . nowy tuwadae tabore ewiabuture ture Pao Kurirewy uwai rakojedo duka . 23 Jesus merure Pao Kurirewy uwai ja tada . Salomão Jokora jire merure . 24 Nono boe ere bato pui ae dykeje enarare ji . Egore : Akare cewie marigudu Dykodire boe raire cerduwawo ai rugadu . ca cewiedy pemegado . Aki na amode boe ekinorudo ? cebagare bagaiwunure aki ? 25 Jesus akore : Ire tawie marigudu . Mare tameartorukare i . Iogwa Kurirewy ure iro rakado tameartoruwo iro rakare rugadu duji . 26 Mare tameartorukare i . Iwobe karugure tagi . 27 Meartorure iwyge eromode nono carneiro doge ero mogadure . Ire nono jeture carneiro dogeiwu mogadure . Mare carneiro dogei karega inagoino . Meartorure iwyge ewiapagamode iwadary ji . Iorydyware ei . Ekodumode iregodaji . 28 Imode emugu pemegado . Du akedymodukare rugadu . Ewimodukare pugeje . Iaboe emodukare tugerago ei ipiji . 29 Imearydy kurire awu Iogwa ure maku inaiwugei . Iogwa Kurirewy jetu pemegamode ei rugadu Dykodire iaboe emodukare tugerago ei Iogwa piji . 30 Iogwa imi cere aino pure tyje . 31 Nono boe ere tugerago toriji tuwo barigu jesus joki . 32 Mare Jesus makore ei . Akore : Iogwa Kurirewy koiare ure iro rakado . Tardure nowy iro pemegareuji . Kodiba tagaidure tawo iwido ? 33 Egore : Aro pemegakare kodi . Imedynure aki . Mare akaidure awo Pao Kurireudo aki . Mare akagoino dutabo amago peganure Pao Kurireuji rugadu . 34 Nono Jesus akore : Pao Kurirewy ure taro maku tagai dukodi nowy taro padure bapera keje nowy tago bakaru tada . nowy bakaru akore : Pao Kurirewy orenure tagi. 35 Boe jokodu jire bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akoino . Ainore ure jii aino . Akedymodukare rugadu . ca Pao Kurirewy ure tuwadary maku boe etai . Emare makore ei tore nuie emage . 36 Mare imi . Iogwa Kurirewy ure tugerago i . Ure itarego mato moto ka . Imire inagoino Pao Kurirewy Onaregedy nuie imi . Itaidukare tamago pegawo i . Imi imago pegakare Iogwa Kurireuji rugadu . 37 Iromodukare Iogwa Kurirewy aidure jiboeji dykeje tameartorumodukare i . 38 Tameartorumodukare i mare iromode Iogwa Kurirewy aidure jiwu iro rakareuji dykeje tameartorudo iro rakare jiboeji . Tameartorumode irore jiboeji dykeje tarduwamode Iogwa merure itabo rugadu duji . Tarduwamode iragojere Iogwa Kurirewy apo rugadu duji . cere aino pure tyje . 39 ca ere tuiago tugerago Jesusji rugadu mare Jesus ure tumegido pace toro epiji . 40 Nono uture pugeje . Kurugodyre Jordão po kajeje toro João Batista ure boe etao pegodo kejewy ka . Nonore Jesus rakojere tu jao . 41 Nonore boe etaregodyre Jesus ae pugeje . Emagare . Egore : João Batista ro rakarewy bokware . Mare ure boe erduwado Jesus jiboe jamedy boe jeture pudui rugadu . 42 Dykodire boe emagare nono tumeartorure Jesus jitu tabo rugadu.

11 1 Ia imedy kogodyre . Mugure Betânia ba kurirewy keje . nowy imedy iere Lázaro . Uwie aredy iere Maria . nowy Maria utuie iere Marta . Eiamedy boe emugure nowy Betânia ba kurirewy keje . 2 Marigudu nowy Maria ure roreboe pemegarewy reko Jesus bure joki . Ure reko dykejere ure kidudo tao tabo pugeje . Mare aino care uwuri kogodyre . 3 Dykodire nowy Maria , nowy Marta ere boe erego tuwadary tabo toro Jesus bagai . Egore nowy boe egoiago nowy Jesusji tuwuri kogodyie . Mearydy kurire jiwu tuwuri kogodyie . 4 nowy boe etaregodyre Jesus ae dykeje ere Jesus bie nowy areme ewadary ji . Jesus mearydyre nowy ewadary ji dykeje akore : Iorydyware nuba boe mode nowy imedy Lazaroji . Kogodyre mare bimodukare . Kogodyre Pao Kurirewy ie kuriwo . Lázaro bimodukare dukodi Pao Kurirewy ie kurimode boe emago pemegawo ji . Lázaro bimodukare dukodi Pao Kurirewy Onaregedy ie kurimode boe emago pemegawo ji jamedy . 5 Jesus mearydy kurire Martaji , Mariaji , Lazaroji jamedy . 6 Mare utukare toro ewai ka kuri je . Merire pobe ji nono dykejere makore nowy ture jorydywadowugei . Akore : Pugeje . Pawo pagirimi toro Judéia moto ka Lázaro uwai ka . 8 Mare etaidukare utuwo . Egore : cegimijera . Maibare nowy jeture Judéia moto kejewyge etaidure tuwo awido tori tabo . Atukaba toro pugeje . 9 Mare Jesus akore : Meri kare doze hora . Boe emerumode meriji dykeje ewure jetumodukare iaboeji erdure boeji kodi . Meri jire boe etaiwo pemegare . 10 Mare boe emerumode boecoji dykeje ewure jetumode iaboeji rugadu jorugu bokware kodi . 11 Nono Jesus makore ei : Pamedia Lázaro unudunure mare itumode toro bagai iwo jetadudo . 12 nowy ure jorydywadowyge egore : ca unudure . care pemegagodymode . 13 Erduwakare Jesus ure tuwadary inodudo pudui duji . Jesus akore Lázaro nudunuie mare jorydyware Lázaro bire duji . Dujire akoino . Mare nowy ure jorydywadowyge emeardaere Lázaro nudunuie rugadu duji . Emeardaere bikaie raga . 14 Dukodi care Jesus mako pemegare ei . Akore : Lázaro bire rugadu . 15 Iragojekare toro apo iwo pemegago . Mare aino tardumode iraga rakare duji . Dukodi tameartorumode i rugadu . ca paduwo toro bagai . 16 Nono Tomé makore tumedagei . Akore : Pagimijera bimode toro Judéia moto keje . Paduwo toro pagimijerapo pawiwo apo jamedy . Boe egore Tome aino ji . Judeu doge ewadary tabo egore emegure puapowu . 17 ca Jesus uture toro Betânia ba kurirewy ka ture jorydywadowugebo . Etaregodyre dykeje boe ere Jesus bie Lázaro bie marigudu . Egore tuie merido pobe puibiji ji meture moto tada dukeje . Aino ca Jesus aregodyre . 18 ca Judéia moto kejewyge etaregodyre nowy Lázaro uwie mage ewai ka tuwo uwie Marta , uwie Maria ewudugugo . nowy boe emagare rugadu . Etaregodyre Maria ae Marta ae tuwo etaora butugugo ewiagodywo nowy tuwuri piji . nowy Betânia ba kurirewy padu puredyre Jerusalém ba kurireuji . Du ure três quilômetros . 20 ca Marta jorydyware Jesus aregodyre dyji dykeje ure tudawyje tuwai piji Jesus togi . Mare Maria ukare tudawuje . 21 Marta aregodyre Jesus ae dykeje makore ji . Akore : Aragojemode woe cedabo cewuri bimodukare . 22 Mare iorydyware Pao Kurirewy umode amagore bagaiboe maku akai rugadu duji . 23 Jesus makore Martaji . Akore : Awuri jewodumode pugeje . 24 Marta akore : Iorydyware . Ia meri keje awu moto akedymode dykeje iwuri jewodumode pugeje turuduwo baruto . 25 Nono Jesus makore ji . Akore : Imire ire boe etowuje . Imire imode boe ewodudo rugadu . Meartorure iwyge ewimode mare ewodumode pugeje . 26 Meartorure iwyge ewimodukare pugeje jamedy . Meartorure iwadary jiwyge ewimodukare pugeje rugadu . Ameartorure nowy inoduji ? 27 Marta akore : Uu ! Imeartorure rugadu . cebagare bagaiwu umode boe ekinorudowunure aki . Pao Kurirewy Onaregedynure aki . Pao Kurirewy ure jawu pawobe ewie marigudu akaregodymoduie mato moto ka duji . 28 Marta ure tuwadary akedydo Jesusji dykeje ure tugirimi tuwai ka . Makore tuwie Maria bagai . Makore tu ji . Akore : Pagimijera aregody . Makore awagai . 29 Maria mearydyre nowy tuduie batary ji dykeje ure tuie bu taci je . Uture tumara tabo toro Jesus togi . 30 Jesus aregodykare nowy Betânia ba kurirewy ka raga mare rakoje kimore toro tuiorydyre Marta jiwu awara keje . 31 nowy rakojere Maria uwai tadawyge erdure Maria uture toro duji . dykeje eture rekodaji . Emeardaere Maria utumoduie toro birewy bagai traguduwo joki . 32 Mare Maria uture Jesus togi . Jorydyre Jesus jitu keje ure tuwududo moto keje Jesus bure paru . Makore Jesusji . Akore : cegimijera . Aragojemode woe dykeje iwuri bimodukare . 33 Jesus aiwore ji akoe tragudu tabo duji . Nono jorydyre nowy ia boe etragudure jamedy duji . Okudugodyre ebo rugadu . 34 Nono makore ei . Akore : Kaiba tare tugu ? Egore : Mato ka . 35 Eture apo toro ture Lázaro tugu towu tori poro ka . Nono Jesus ragudure . 36 nowy boe erdure Jesus ragudure dyji dykeje emagore pui . Egore : ca Jesus mearydy kurire Lazaroji rugadu . 37 Mare iage egore : Kocare . Ure joku bokwareuge etaiwodo pugeje . Kodiba aregodykare kuri je tuwo Lázaro pemegago bikawo ? 38 Jesus okudugodyre nowy Lázaro uwobebo rugadu . Dykejere ure tuburedy nowy birewy padure tadawu tori poroji . Ia tori kurirewy padure nowy tori poro je keje . 39 dykeje Jesus makore nowy boei . Akore : nowy tori kurirewy rawyje tori poro piji . Mare Marta akore : Merire pobe puibiji ji meture nowy tori poro tada dukeje . Kigogodyre rugadu . 40 Mare Jesus makore ji . Akore : Ire awie . Ameartorumode i dykeje ardumode Pao Kurirewy ro rakare duji . 41 Nono nowy boe ere nowy tori kurirewy rawyje nowy tori poro piji . Nono Jesus aiwore baruto dykeje akore : Iogwa Kurireu . Awiapagare iwadary ji . Dykodire itaidure imago pemegawo ai rugadu . 42 Iorydyware awiapagare iwadary jituji rugadu mare itaidure iwo awu boe erduwado nowy inoduji jamedy emeartoruwo i , emeartoruwo aki aigoiare are itarego mato rugadu duji . 43 Jesus ure tuwadary akedydo tuo bagai dykeje makore toro nowy Lázaro bagai . Akore : Lázaro ! Ae bu mato nowy tori poro piji ! 44 ca Lázaro ure tudawyje nowy tori poro piji rugadu ! Bikare pugeje . Jewodure pugeje rugadu . nowy boe ere upodo tabowu aroia upo kimore apo . Upo kimore je tabo jamedy . Nono Jesus makore nowy boei . Akore : nowy aroia tawyje piji utuwo tuwai ka . 45 nowy rakojere nonowu boe eiamedy boe erdure Jesus rore aino duji . Dykodire emeartorure Jesusji . 46 Mare iagere tugirimi tuibagi Jerusalém ba kurirewy ka . Eture tugimijerage fariseu doge etae tuwo ewie Jesus rore jiboeji . 47 Dykodire nowy fariseu doge ere bato pui nowy Judeu doge eimijeragebo . nowy ure Judeu doge enomea maku Pao Kurirewy aiwyge eimijerage edyre nono jamedy . Emorora magadure rugadu boe emeartorumodukare pudui pugeje duji . Emagore pui . Egore : Nuba paromode ? nowy imedy Jesus ro rakare rugadu . 48 Boe eiamedy boe emeartorumodukare pai pugeje tumeartoruwo awu imedy Jesusji . Nono Roma kejewy boe eimijerage erdu pegamode boe eroino dyji jamedy . Dykodire Roma kejewy boe eimijerage etaidumode turo pegawo pai . Emode awu Pao Kurirewy uwai pegado . Emode paobe etagedydo . 49 Awu joruji nowy ure Judeu doge enomea maku Pao Kurirewy aiwyge boe eimijera kurirewy iere Caifás . Rakojere nono nowy boe eimijeragebo jamedy . Makore nowy tumedagei . Akore : Tarduwa bokware . 50 Boe pegakawo pai pawo nowy imedy bito paobe ewo cinorudo Roma kejewy boe eimijerage pegareuge epiji . Pamodukare bito paiamedy boe bimode . 51 nowy Caifás nowy ure Judeu doge enomea maku Pao Kurirewy aiwyge eimijera kurirewynure ema nowy joruji . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure tumeardae maku ai makowo nowy tuwadary ji nowy boe eimijerage ewiagai . Mare nowy Caifás jorydywakare Pao Kurirewy batary taboie tagoino duji . Akomode pudumie tagoino . Mare ema karega akoino . Pao Kurireure akoino . Ainore Pao Kurirewy rore tuwo boe ewie Jesus bimoduie dyji Judeu doge ero pegarewy boe morice . 52 Jesus bimode boe eiamedy boe ero pegarewy morice jamedy . Dykodire meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe Pao Kurirewy oremode emage . Etuwobe mode pugi . 53 nowy meri oto biji nowy Judeu doge eimijerage ere tumeardae pegarewy tawyje tuwo Jesus bito . 54 Jesus jorydyware emeardaeji . Dykodire merukare Judéia motoji pugeje mare utu jaere ia moto akurugudu maerewy ka . Uture ture jorydywadowugebo toro ia boe eda ka . nowy boe eda iere Efraim . Nonore rakojere ture jorydywadowugebo pugeje . 55 Boe puredygodyre Judeu dogei ewaduwo ia tuwadaeji . nowy ewadae iere Páscoa . Dykodire boe emagare tudu tabo Jerusalém ka Judéia moto piji tuwo tubemegado turowo nowy to bakaru tadawu turo boeji tuwaduwo nowy tuwadae Pascoaji . 56 nowy fariseu doge , nowy ure Judeu doge enomea maku Pao Kurirewy aiwyge eimijerage emagore boe eiamedy boei ewo Jesus maku pudai . Boe erdumode Jesusji dykeje ewo nowy boe eimijerage ewie nowy boe eimijerage ewo tugerago Jesusji . Dykodire nowy boe etaiwore Jesus bagai nono Pao Kurirewy uwai tada . Emagore pui . Egore : Nuba tameardaere ? Jesus aregodymokana ? Iage egore : Aregodymodukare . Jorydyware pagimijerage etaidure turo pegawo pudui duji.

12 1 ca Jesus uture Betânia ba kurirewy ka pugeje . Uture ture jewodudowu Lázaro uwai ka . Okwarewy merire seis Judeu doge ewaduwo tuwadae Pascoaji . 2 ca Jesus rakojere nowy Lázaro uwai keje . nowy uwai kejewyge ere boe eké pemegado Jesus uwo kowuje . Aredy Marta ure ia boe eké maku Jesus ai . Lázaro mugure nowy ira keje togoagewo jamedy . 3 Nono Maria aregodyre roreboe mori kurirewy tabo . nowy roreboe iere nardo . Nono Maria ure nowy roreboe reko Jesus bure joki nowy boe erduwawo boe eimijera kurirewynure ema duji . Dykejere ure Jesus bure kidudo tao tabo . nowy roreboe ro joro nowy bai oto jamedy boeto . 4 Nono Jesus ure jorydywadowu imedy makore ji . nowy imedy iere Judas Iscariotes . Ema koiare umode Jesus maku boe eimijerage pegareuge etai . 5 Akore : Kodiba awu aredy ukare nowy roreboe maku diero bagai tuwo diero kurido tuwo nowy diero maku marenarue doge etai ? Awu roreboe mori kurire rugadu . Boe emaragodymode jii joru akedy ka tuwo tugerago nowy diero kurireuji tuwo akirodo awu roreboeji . 6 Mare pagare Judas akoino . Aidukare uwo diero maku marenarue doge etai . Aidure tugiwoguwo ji . Jesus ure nowy Judas jetudo to dieroji . Mare nowy Judas iwogure tu tu Jesus o dieroji . 7 Mare Jesus akore : Akaba awu aredy pogurudo rore i duji . Ure reko iwure joki tuwo iwiri udo turugadu ituguduwo mototo iwi keje nono Pao Kurirewy meardae mogadure . 8 Marenaru doge edymode tagabo jii toro rugadu . Mare imire itumode tabiji rugadu . 9 Boe erduware Jesus rakojere Lázaro uwai keje Betânia keje duji . Dykodire eture toro ae . Emagare . Etaidure tuiorydywo nowy Jesus ure jewodudowu Lazaroji jamedy . 10 Mare nowy ure Judeu doge enomea maku Pao Kurirewy aiwyge eimijerage etaidukare nowy Lazaroji jamedy . Jesus ure Lázaro jewodudo Dykodire Judeu doge emeartorukare nowy ure Judeu doge enomea maku Pao Kurirewy aiwugei pugeje tumeartoruwo Jesusji . Dykodire nowy ure Judeu doge enomea maku Pao Kurirewy aiwyge eimijerage ere tumeardae pegarewy tawyje tuwo Lázaro bito jamedy . 12 nowy barogwato boe emagare nono Jerusalém ba kurirewy keje tuwaduwo nowy tuwadae pascoaji . Erduware Jesus aregodymode pudae duji . 13 Dykodire ere tugerago apidoguru aiji . Eture tabo toro Jesus togi . Ekudugodyre bagai . Egore : Israel kejewy boe eimijera kurirewy reo ! Pao Kurirewy ure arego mato pagae . Ure turaga maku ai rugadu . Boe eiamedy boe emago pemegawo ji rugadu ! Pao Kurirewy uwo boe pemegado ji rugadu ! 14 Nono Jesus jorydyre ia jumenta onaregedyji . Mugure keje tuduwo Jerusalém ba kurireuto . Marigudu Pao Kurirewy makore ainoie Jesus romode rugadu . Akore : 15 Awu jeture Jerusalém kejewyge tagi . Tabagudukaba . Tagimijera kurirewy mugumode jumenta onaregedy keje taregodywo tagae . 16 nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowyge erduwakare nowy Pao Kurirewy akoino jiboeji . Mare ia meri keje Jesus jewodumode pugeje . Jesus jewodumode pugeje dykeje nowy ure jorydywadowyge ewiabutumode nowy Pao Kurirewy batary keje . Dukodi care erduwamode ji . Erduware Pao Kurirewy makore Jesus jiboe jeture pudui rugadu duji . 17 Jesus ure Lázaro jewodudo pugeje dykeje ia boe ere boe eiamedy boe ewie nowy Jesus rore aino duji . Erdure Jesus rore aino dyji dukodi care ere boe ewie . Dykodire boe eiamedy boe erduware Jesus ro rakare duji . 18 Dykodire boe emagare tugodyi Jesus togi . 19 Mare fariseu doge etaidukare . Egore pui : Tagaiwodo . Boe erore taci pabiji . Boe eiamedy boe emeartorure awu Jesusji . Dykodire erore taci pabiji toro togi . 20 Ia Grécia kejewyge eragojere Jerusalém ba kurirewy keje tuwaduwo nowy Judeu doge ewadaeji ebo tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . 21 Eture Filipe ae . nowy Filipe boture Betsaida ba kurirewy keje . nowy Betsaida ba kurirewy mugure Galiléia moto keje . nowy Grécia kejewyge emagore nowy Filipeji . Egore : cedaidure cerduwo Jesusji . 22 Filipe uture André ae . Ure André bie nowy Grécia kejewyge etaidure jiboeji . Dykejere eture puapo Jesus ae tuwo Jesus bie . 23 dykeje Jesus makore ewadary jipagi . Akore : Imedy Onaregedynure imi . Kuri aino boe erduwamode boe kurireure imi duji , boe pemegareure imi duji . 24 Boe jokodu jire inagoino . Boe emodukare ia trigo a tugu mototo botuwo dykeje botu modukare rugadu . Mare umode mitotyje tu rugadu . Mare boe emode trigo a tugu mototo dykeje nowy trigo enogo botumode . Mare botumode dykeje nowy trigo a pegagodymode moto tada . Botumode dykeje ricodumode enarimode . A makamode rugadu . 25 Ia boe etaidu kurimode turowo taidure jiboeji turaga tabo tu rugadu . nowy boe eraga akedymode epiji rugadu . Egare remawu modukare . nowy boe ewarigudumode toro bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto jamedy . Mare ia boe etaidumodukare tumeardaere jiboeji tuwo tugera ra taidure jiboeji tumeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji dykeje boe pemegamode ei rugadu . Egare remawumode rugadu . Ewarigudumodukare bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto jamedy . Mare emugumode baru tada jii toro rugadu . Du akedymodukare . 26 Ia boe aidumode tumeartoruwo iwadary ji dykeje umode tugera ra taidure jiwu turo tago pegarewy boe piji tuduwo itabo . dykeje meartorure iwu rakojemode itabo . Iogwa Kurirewy umode boe pemegado meartorure iwadary jiwugei . Mako pemegamode ei rugadu . 27 Boe ero pegamode i Dykodire ikiarigodyre rugadu . Mare imago pegamodukare Iogwa Kurireuji uwo ero pegamode idu utudo ipiji . Boro . Iogwa ure maku inaiwu imaragodae koiare boe ero pegamode i . Dykodire itaregodyre woe moto ka . 28 dykeje Jesus makore baruto tuo bagai . Akore : Iogwa . Boe erdudo aro kurireuji boe erduwawo akurire rugadu duji . Nono Pao Kurirewy makore baru piji . Akore : Ire boe erdudo iro rakareuji marigudu . Imode erdudo iro rakareuji pugeje , iro pemegareuji jamedy . 29 Boe emearydyre nowy baru pijiwu makoji . Iage emeardaere boeiaruruie akoino . Mare iage egore : Ia Pao Kurirewy utugare baru tadawu iare akoino baru piji Jesusji . 30 Mare Jesus makore ei . Akore : I karega akoino mare taire akoino tarduwawo Pao Kurirewy batary ji . 31 Kuri aino Pao Kurirewy aiwomode awu moto kejewyge eiamedy boe eroji ero pemegarewy bagai , ero pegarewy bagai jamedy . Kuri aino Pao Kurirewy umode awu moto kejewy bope doge eimijera raka ta piji . 32 Boe emode i padure pugajejewu rakojedo itabo dykeje imode boe emertorudo i rugadu . 33 Jesus akoino nowy boei tuwo erduwado nuba boe eromode pudui tuwo tuwido i padure pugajejewu keje . 34 nowy boe egore : Pago bakaru ure parduwado . Akore umode boe ekinorudowu bimodukaie . Akedymodukaie . Mare akagore Imedy Onaregedy bimoduie i padure pugajejewu keje . Iogudubanure aki ? 35 Jesus akore : Jorugu pemegarewy rakojemode tagabo tyje . Tamerudo nowy jorugu tabo . Tamerumode jorugu tabo dykeje boecomodukare tumaedo taiogi . Merumode boeco kaowu jorydywamodukare kaiba tuiomode . Mare boeco ji karega inagoino . Boe ero pegarewy jire inagoino . Jorugu ji karega inagoino jamedy . Ire inagoino . 36 Iragoje kimore tagabo dykeje tameartorudo i rugadu . Tameartorumode i dykeje tarduwamode taro pemegawo nono boe erdure boeji jorugu tada dumogadure . Mare jorugu karega . Boe ero pemegarewy jire inagoino . Jesus ure nowy tuwadary akedydo dykeje uture boe epiji tuwo tuwiado epiji . 37 Ure turo rakarewy towuje nowy boe egai . Ure epemegado . Ure boe pemegado ei . Mare emeartorukare Jesusji . 38 Erore aino Dykodire Isaías makore mariguduboe jeture pudui rugadu . Emare makore Pao Kurirewy batary ji marigudu . Marigudu ure Pao Kurirewy batary bu bapera keje . Akore : Pao Kurirewynure aki . Boe emeartorumodukare are maku inaiwu awadary ji . Ire boe ewie ji mare emeartorukare Pao Kurirewynure aki duji . Are boe erdudo aragaji . Mare emeartorukare ai rugadu . 39 Nono nowy boe eroiwakare tumeartoruwo rugadu . Ainore Isaías akore marigudu : 40 Pao Kurirewy ure erduwa bokwado emeartorukawo pudui . Pao Kurirewy akore : Ire eku bokwado . Ire etaora pegado . Mare emeardae remawu jire inagoino . Dykodire ekure mare emeardaemodukare taiwowo irore jiboeji . Etaorare mare erduwamodukare irore jiboeji . Dykodire emodukare tugera ra turo pegare jiboe piji tumeartoruwo i rugadu . Dykodire imodukare ekinorudo ero pegarewy piji. Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore . 41 Marigudu rugadure Isaías makore . Emare jorydyre Jesus ro pemegamode jiboeji , ro rakamode jiboeji . Dykodire ure awu batary bu bapera keje . 42 Ma care ia Judeu doge eimijerage emeartorure Jesusji . Mare fariseu doge etaidukare Jesusji Dykodire nowy meartorure Jesus jiwyge emagokare boeji . Emagokare tumeartorure Jesus jituji . Emagomode dykeje fariseu doge emode etudo nowy Judeu doge ere bato puiwu bai piji . 43 Etaidu kurire boe emago pemegawo pudui duji . Kodire etaidu kurikare Pao Kurirewy mako pemegawo pudui epagudure nowy boe eimijeragece dukodi . 44 Jesus mako pemegare tuwadody tabo nowy boe eiamedy boe emearydywo tagoino jiboeji . Akore : Meartorure iwyge emeartorumode ure itarego matowuji jamedy . 45 Jorydyre iwyge erdure ure itarego matowuji jamedy . 46 Itaregodyre mato moto ka iwo nono jorugu mogadure . Mare jorugu ji karega inagoino . Iwo boe ewie turo pegareuji . Dujire inagoino . Boe emeartorumode i dykeje emerumodukare boeco kao pugeje . Mare boeco ji karega inagoino . Boe emeartorumode i dykeje emode tugera ra turo pegarewy piji . Dujire inagoino . 47 Mare boe emeartorumodukare iwadary ji du inodu tabo imodukare boe pegado ei kuri aino . Iwo boe pegado boei dubagai karega iroino mato . Itaregodyre iwo boe ekinorudo bope doge eda kejewy joru pegarewy piji . 48 Mare ia meri keje boe pegamode meartorukare iwugei , aidukare iwugei . Awu moto akedymode dykeje imode ewiabutudo awu iwadary keje dykeje boe pegamode ei rugadu emeartorukare i kodi . 49 Boe rugadu jire inagoino . Mare iwadary karega . Iogwa Kurirewy koiare ure itarego mato . Emare ure awu iwadary maku inai iwo boe ewie ji . Dykodire imagore jiboe ure turugadu . 50 Iogwa Kurirewy batary umode meartorure puduiwyge ekinorudo edywo pudabo jii toro . Du akedymodukare . Awu tuwadaryre Iogwa Kurirewy ure maku inai iwo boe ewie ji rugadu.

13 1 ca okwarewy merire mitotyje Judeu doge ewaduwo tuwadae Pascoaji . Dykodire Jesus jorydyware tudumode baruto kuri aino dyji awu moto piji Tuo bagai . Jesus mearydy kurire meartorure puduiwugei rugadu . Mearydy kurire ei jii toro tuwimodedy ka . 2 nowy boecoji Jesus ure tumugudo ia bai tada togoagewo nowy ture jorydywadowugebo . Bope doge eimijera ure tumeardae pegarewy tugu Judas aorato tuwo Jesus maku boe eimijera pegareuge etai . nowy Judas uo iere Simão Iscariotes . 3 Jesus jorydyware Pao Kurirewy ure turaga jamedy boe maku pudai duji . Jorydyware taregodyre Pao Kurirewy piji rugadu . Jorydyware tudumode tuibagi Pao Kurirewy ae pugeje duji . 4 Dykodire Jesus ure turagojedo nowy bai tada . Ure tugudau aroia biaku epa tawyje tubiji . Ure ia aroia upodo tubeagajeje . 5 Dykejere ure pobo redo pori piji ia meririto . Nono ure nowy ture jorydywadowyge ewure kabi nowy pobo tabo . Ure ewure kabi dykeje ure ekidudo nowy aroia tabo . 6 Uiago Simão Pedro bure kabi dykeje Simão Pedro makore ji . Akore : Ukare turugadu awo iwure kabi . Ikimijeranure aki kodi . 7 Jesus makore Simão Pedroji . Akore : Arduwakare irore jiboeji . Mare ia meri keje arduwamode . 8 Simão Pedro akore : Amodukare iwure kabi rugadu ! Mare Jesus makore ji pugeje . Akore : Imodukare awure kabi dykeje ire jorydywadowu modukare aki pugeje . 9 Nono Simão Pedro akore : ca iwure kabi . Itaora kabi . Ikera kabi . Iamedy boe kabi . 10 Jesus akore : Boe emode taimo dykeje ekabidure rugadu . dykeje etumode tuibagi tuwai ka dykeje emodukare taimo pugeje kuri aino . Tu tuwurere emode kabi . Mare boe ewiri ji karega inagoino . Boe ero pegarewy jire inagoino . ca Pao Kurirewy ure taro pegarewy jamedy boe barigu tabiji . Mare ia imedy ro pegarewy ure mitotu tagabo . Pao Kurirewy ukare nowy imedy ro pegarewy barigu piji . 11 Jesus jorydyware nowy imedyji Dykodire akoino . nowy imedy umode Jesus maku boe eimijera pegareuge etai . Jesus jorydyware nowy imedy romode pudui duji . Dujire akoino nowy ture jorydywadowugei . Akore : Pao Kurirewy ukare ia imedy mitotu jedy ro pegarewy barigu piji . 12 Jesus ure nowy ture jorydywadowyge ewure kabi dykeje ure tugudau aroia jamedy tugu pudui pugeje . Dykejere ure tumugudo tumuga ira keje . Nono akore : Kodiba ire tawure kabi ? Imode tarduwado . 13 Tagagore Jorydywareu aino i . Tagagore Boe Eimijera aino i . Boe jokodu jire tagagoino . Ure Tarduwadowunure imi rugadu . Tagimijeranure imi rugadu . 14 Mare ire ido nono tadugaregere iwo tawure kabi . Tarowo nono iro mogadure . Dykodire tamode pu bure boe kabi . Tamode tagera maku puai . 15 Ire tardudo iroji tarowo nono iro mogadure tarduwawo nuba taromode . 16 Boe jokodu jire inagoino tai . Boe emeartorumodukare ia boe eimijera utugareji ukimijera kori . Boe emertorumodukare ia boe eimijera utugare uture tuwadary tabowu kori jamedy . 17 Dukodi care tarodo nono irore jamedy . Taromode nono iro mogadure dykeje taegaregodymode tai . Boe pemegamode tai rugadu . Tawiagodykaba awu ire tarduwado jiwu iwadary piji . 18 Iorydyware ire ikerago jiwugei . Taire inagoino tarowo nono iro mogadure . Mare ia romodukare aino . Pao Kurirewy ure boe ewie marigudu . Akore : Okoagere itabowu jorydy pegamode i. 19 ca itaidure iwo tawie tarduwawo nuba boe mode i duji . nowy iwadary jetumode pudui dykeje tarduwamode i rugadu . Pao Kurirewynure imi rugadu . Itagedymodukare rugadu . 20 Boe jokodu jire inagoino . Boe emode tugera upodo nowy uture iwadary tabowugebo enure tugera upodo itabo jamedy iragojere nowy uture iwadary tabowugebo kodi . Pao Kurirewy koiare ure itarego boe etae rugadu . Dykodire boe emode tugera upodo itabo enure tugera upodo Pao Kurirewy apo jamedy . 21 Jesus ure nowy tuwadary akedydo dykeje kiarigodyre rugadu . Dykodire makore pugeje . Akore : Iwo tawie boe remawuji . Ia tagi tamode imagu boe eimijerage pegareuge etai . 22 nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowyge etaiwore pui . Erduwakare kaba jiba Jesus akoino . 23 Ia mugure Jesus meki . Jesus mearydy kurire nowy ture jorydywadowuji . 24 Nono Simão Pedro ure tugera nado ae utuwo pudae . Nono makore ji . Akore : Anarado ji uwo pawie ioguduba jiba akoino . 25 Dykodire nowy Jesus ure jorydywadowu ure tuburedy Jesusji tunarawo ji . Akore : Ioguduba jiba akagoino ? 26 Jesus akore : Imode awu amirewy pegodo nowy iaboe kuru to dykeje imode maku ia imedy ai . nowy imedy koiare umode imagu boe eimijerage pegareuge etai . Nono Jesus ure tugerago amireuji . Ure pegodo tagoino jiboe kuruto . Dykejere ure maku Judas ai . nowy Judas uo iere Simão Iscariotes . 27 Judas ure tugerago nowy amireuji dykeje bope doge eimijera pegarewy Satanás ure turemo nowy Judato . Jesus makore Judaji . Akore : Ameardae pegarewy towuje . Amara tabo ! 28 nowy ia rakojere Jesus apowyge erduwakare kodiba Jesus akoino Judaji . 29 Marigudu Judas jeture nowy eno dieroji . Dykodire iage emeardaere Judas umoduie akirodo ia boe ekeji pugeje . Iage emeardaere Judas umoduie ia diero maku marenaru doge etai . 30 Judas ure tugerago nowy amireuji dykeje uture epiji kuri je . Boecodure marigudu . 31 Judas uture epiji dykeje Jesus makore nowy ia ture jorydywadowugei . Akore : Boe erdunure aino Imedy Onaregedy pemegareuji . Awu imedy onaregedynure imi . Inure Pao Kurirewy ro pemegarewy towuje Dykodire boe erdumode Pao Kurirewy ro pemegareuji rugadu . 32 Iromode Pao Kurirewy ro pemegareuji dykeje Pao Kurirewy romode iro pemegareuji jamedy boe eiamedy boe erduwawo cero pemegareuji kuri aino rugadu ewo Pao Kurirewy ie kurido rugadu kuri je rugadu . 33 Tare nono itore emogadure . Iragojemodukare tagabo kuri aino pugeje . Tagaiwomode iwagai mare taroiwakare taduwo iregodaji . Ire Judeu doge eimijerage ewie nowy inoduji marigudu . 34 Mare imode ia taro maiwu maku tagai . Tamearydy kurido pui . Tamearydy kurido pui aino imearydy kurimoga tai dure . 35 Tamearydy kurimode pui dykeje boe erduwamode ire jorydywadowyge nuie tagi duji . 36 Pedro makore Jesusji . Akore : Kaiba akodumode ? Jesus akore : Akare arugadu atuwo itabo . Mare ia meri keje atumode toro itae . 37 Pedro akore : Ikimijeranure aki . Itaidure ituwo akabo . Ire irugadu iwiwo amugato . 38 Jesus akore : Iwo awie . Akare arugadu awiwo imugato . Awu boecoji akagomode arduwakaie i dumode pobe metia bokware rugadu . dykeje care kagariga kudugodymode.

14 1 Jesus makore ture jorydywadowugei . Akore : Tamorora magadukaba . Tameartorudo Pao Kurireuji . Tameartorudo i jamedy . 2 Iogwa uwai kurirewy tadare boe eda kurirewy mugure . Itumode toro iwo tawai pemegado nono . Ainore ure rugadu . Dykodire ire tawie aino . 3 Imode tawai pemegado toro baru tada dykeje imode ikirimi mato pugeje tawagai iwo tarego baruto taragojewo itabo toro . 4 Tarduware ikodumode jiwu awaraji . Tarduware baru towu awaraji . 5 Mare Tomé makore Jesusji . Akore : cegimijera . cerduwakare kaiba akodumode . Nuba ceromode cerduwawo awaraji cedaregodywo toro ? 6 Jesus akore : Umode boe erego baru towunure imi . Boe remawunure imi . Imire imode boe eraga maku boe etai . Imire imode boe ewodudo pugeje . Boe etumodukare tuginaigody Pao Kurirewy ae . Tu imire imode boe erego Pao Kurirewy ae . 7 Tarduware i . Dukodi tarduwamode Iogwa Kurireuji jamedy . Awu meriji care tarduware ji . Tardure ji rugadu . 8 Felipe akore : cegimijera . cedaidure cerduwo Pao Kurireuji . cerdudo ji . Dykodire cemode cerugadu . 9 Jesus makore Felipeji . Akore : Iragojere tagabo marigudu . Aki na arduwakare i ? Jorydyre iwu jorydyre Iogwa Kurireuji . Kodiba akagoino iwo tardudo Iogwa Kurireuji ? 10 Felipenure aki . Iragojere Iogwa Kurirewy apo . Iogwa Kurirewy rakojere itabo . Ameartorure nowy inoduji ? Imagore tai mare iwadary ji karega inagoino . Iogwa Kurirewy rakojere itabo kodire inagoino Iogwa batary ji tawiagai . Iogwa maragodae jire iroino . 11 Tameartorudo awu iwadary ji . Iragojere Iogwa Kurirewy apo . Iogwa Kurirewy rakojere itabo jamedy . Tameartorumodukare inagoino jiboeji dykeje mare tameartorudo tardure jiwu iro rakareuji tameartoruwo i . 12 Boe jokodu jire inagoino . Boe emeartorumode i dykeje eromode nono iro mogadure . Uu . Ero kurimode iro kori rugadu . Itumode Iogwa Kurirewy ae . Dykodire meartorure iwyge ero kurimode rugadu . 13 Itumode Iogwa Kurirewy ae Dykodire iromode tagaidure jiboeji . Tamagomode itaidure jiboe bagai dykeje iromode awu tamagore bagai boeji . Irore aino dutabo imode boe erdudo Iogwa Kurirewy ro pemegarewy rugadu boeji , ro rakarewy rugadu boeji jamedy . 14 Tamagomode itaidure jiboe bagai dykeje iromode awu tamagore bagai boeji jamedy . 15 Tamearydy kurire i dykeje tameartorumode iwadary ji rugadu . 16 Inogomagudumode Iogwa Kurireuji dykeje umode Tuwari maku tagai rugadu . nowy Uwari umode tugera braredo tai . Rakojemode tagabo jii toro . Utumodukare tabiji . 17 Pao Kurirewy Uwarinure ema . Emare ure boe erduwado Pao Kurireuji . Boe jokodu jire ure boe erduwado . Meartorukare Pao Kurirewy jiwyge erdumodukare Pao Kurirewy Uwariji . Erduwamodukare ji jamedy . Dukodi nowy meartorukare Pao Kurirewy jiwyge emodukare tugerago Uwariji . Mare tarduware ji . nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojere tagabo . Rakojemode tagabo jii toro rugadu . 18 Iturumode . Mare ietu pemegamode tai . Nono imode ikirimi tagae . 19 Kuri aino boe erdumodukare i pugeje . Mare tardumode i rugadu . Iewodumode Dykodire taewodumode pugeje jamedy . 20 Iewodumode pugeje dykeje tarduwamode iragojere Iogwa Kurirewy apo duji . Tarduwamode taragojere itabo dyji jamedy . Tarduwamode iragojere tagabo dyji rugadu . 21 Mearydy kurire iwyge etaidumode iwadary ji . Mearydy kurire iwyge emeartorumode iwadary ji . Iogwa Kurirewy mearydy kurimode mearydy kurire iwugei . Imearydy kurimode ei jamedy . Imode erduwado i rugadu . 22 Judas makore Jesusji mare Judas Iscariotes karega . Akore : cegimijera . Amode cerduwado ai mare amodukare meartorukare aiwyge erduwado ai . Kodiba meartorukare aiwyge erduwamodukare ai ? 23 Jesus makore ji . Akore : Mearydy kurire iwyge emeartorumode iwadary ji . Iogwa Kurirewy mearydy kurimode ei jamedy . Itaregodymode etae iogwapo cemuguwo ebo . 24 Mare mearydy kurikare iwyge emeartorumodukare iwadary ji . Ikare tarduwado iwadary ji . Ire tarduwado Iogwa Kurirewy batary ji . Ema koiare ure itarego mato tagae . 25 Iragoje biagamode tu tagabo Dykodire ire tawie aino . 26 Mare Pao Kurirewy umode Tuwari maku tagai imugato . Umode tugera braredo tai . Umode tarduwado nowy imagore jiwu Iogwa batary rugadu boeji . Umode tawiabutudo awu imagore jiwu Iogwa batary jamedy boe keje . 27 Inure tado tagamudo tameardae kuriwo Pao Kurireuji . Meartorukare iwyge emodukare tameardae kurido Pao Kurireuji nono iro mogadure . Tamorora magadukaba . Tagiarigodykaba . Tabagudugodykaba jamedy . 28 Tamearydyre iwadary ji marigudu . Ire tawie itumoduie tabiji duji . Mare imoduie ikirimi pugeje tagae . Tamearydy kurimode i dykeje taegaremode tai iture Iogwa Kurirewy ae duji . Iogwa Kurirewy ro kurire iro kori . 29 Ire tawie nuba boemode tai , nuba boemode i jamedy . Tardumode awu inagoino jiboeji dykeje tameartorumode i rugadu . 30 Awu moto kejewy bope doge eimijera aregodymode iwagai awu boecoji rugadu Dykodire imago raimodukare tai . nowy bope doge eimijera rakakare i mare Iogwa Kurirewy meardae koiare imode imagu ai . Imearydy kurire Iogwaji dukodi . Itaidure boe eiamedy boe erduwawo imearydy kurire Iogwa Kurirewy jituji . Dykodire imeartorure Iogwa Kurirewy batary ji rugadu . ca paduwo awu bai piji.

15 1 Jesus makore kimo ture jorydywadowugei . Akore : Ire nono uva iku paru pemegarewy mogadure . Iogwa Kurirewy ure nono jetu pemegare boepa jiwu mogadure . 2 Ire nono uva iku paru pemegarewy mogadure . Tare nono uva iku mogadure . Iku kadodymode dykeje nowy iku bimode , tudumodukare pugeje . Mare iku jetu kimomode ciguto dykeje bimodukare , tudumode rugadu . Iku tudumodukare dykeje Iogwa Kurirewy umode nowy iku kado uva iku paru piji . Mare iku tudumode dykeje Iogwa Kurirewy umode nowy iku pemegado nowy iku tudu pemegawo rugadu . Mare uva iku paru ji karega inagoino . I rugadure inagoino . Iku ji karega inagoino . Meartorure iwugeire inagoino . Boepa ji karega inagoino jamedy . Pao Kurirewy jire inagoino . Ire tarduwado Dykodire ire tabemegado , taro pemegawo . Tameartoru raimode i dykeje iragojemode tagabo . Nono taedy pemegamode itabo rugadu . Tameartoru raimode i dykeje imode taragado taro pemegawo , tawo taro pegarewy barigu tabiji . Mare iragojemodukare tagabo dykeje taro pemegamodukare rugadu . 6 Meartorukare iwyge ewarigudumode joruto nono jerigi mogadure . Mare jerigi ji karega inagoino . Ewarigudumode Pao Kurirewy piji emeartorukare ji kodi . 7 Mare tameartoru raimode i tarduwamode iwadary ji rugadu dykeje tamagomode i tagaidure jiboe bagai . Imode tardudo tagaidure jiboeji tameartorure i kodi . 8 Taro pemegamode nono Iogwa Kurirewy ro mogadure dykeje tamode boe erduwado Iogwa Kurirewy ro pemegareuji . Taromode aino dykeje ire jorydywadowyge enure tagi . 9 Imearydy kurire tai nono Iogwa Kurirewy mearydy kurimoga i dumogadure . Tagaba iwarigu tabiji imearydy kuriwo tai jii toro . 10 Tameartorumode iwadary ji dykeje tamodukare iwarigu tabiji . Dukodi imearydy kurimode tai jii toro rugadu . Imeartorure Iogwa Kurirewy batary ji . Ikare barigu ipiji . Emare mearydy kurire i rugadu . 11 Ire tawie aino tameartoruwo awu inagoino jiboeji , iegarewo tai rugadu . Taegarewo pui jamedy . 12 ca iwadary reo . Tamearydy kurido pui nono imearydy kurimoga tai dumogadure . 13 Ia boe mearydy kurimode rugadu ia tumediaji dykeje aidumode tuwiwo nowy tumedia mugato nowy tumedia bikawo . 14 ca tameartorumode iwadary ji dykeje imedage mode tagi . 15 Itugarege modukare tagi pugeje . Boe eimijera utugarege erduwakare tugimijera meardaeji . Mare imedagenure tagi . Dykodire ire tawie imeardae jamedy boeji . Ire tawie Iogwa Kurirewy makore iwu tuwadary jamedy boeji . 16 Tagare tagerago i . Imire ire ikerago tai . Imagore tai taro pemegawo , tawo boe pemegado boei . Taro akedymodukare . Dykodire Iogwa Kurirewy umode tamagore bagaiboe maku tagai rugadu . Tamagomode itaidure jiboe bagai dykeje Iogwa umode maku tagai rugadu . 17 ca itaidure jiwu taro reo . Tamearydy kurido pui rugadu . 18 Tawiagodykaba . Meartorukare iwyge erdu pegamode tai mare erdu pegare i boetoji . 19 Taromode nono meartorukare iwyge ero mogadure dykeje etaidumode tai . Etaidumode tai nono etaidumoga pui dumogadure . Mare ire ikerago tai nowy meartorukare iwyge ero piji tarokawo nono erore pugeje . Dykodire meartorukare iwyge erdu pegare tai . 20 Tawiagodykaba imagore tai dupiji . Boe etugarege ekurikare tugimijera kori Dykodire boe emeartorumodukare nowy boe etugaregei ekimijera piji . Tagimijeranure imi . Boe emeartorumode iwadary ji dykeje emeartorumode ire maku tagaiwu tawadary ji jamedy . Mare boe ero pegare i Dykodire ero pegamode tai jamedy . 21 Ero pegamode tai tameartorure i kodi . Erduwakare ure itarego matowu Iogwa Kurireuji dukodi . 22 Imodukare ewie ero pegarewy boeji dykeje egomode turo pegakaie . Mare ire ewie . Ire ewie ero pegarewy boeji . Dykodire egomodukare tuiorydywakaie turo pegareuji . 23 Jorydy pegare iwyge erdu pegare Iogwa Kurireuji jamedy . 24 Itaregodyre etae iro rakarewy tabo . Ire erdudo iro rakareuji . Ia boe erokare nono iro rakareure marigudu . Erdumodukare iro rakareuji dykeje erduwamodukare i . Nono egomode tuiorydywakaie turo pegareuji . Mare erdure iro rakareuji Dykodire erduware i . Erduware ipemegare duji . Mare erdu pegare i . Erdu pegare Iogwa Kurireuji . 25 Pao Kurirewy makore marigudu nuba eromoduie . nowy batary padure bapera keje eno bakaruce . Akore : Iro pegakare ei mare erdu pegare i. Aino care awu batary jeture pudui rugadu . 26 Jesus mako kimore . Akore : Pao Kurirewy Uwari aregodymode tagae . Umode tarduwado Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Boe jokodu jire makomode . Imi igoiare imode Pao Kurirewy Uwari arego tagae . Umode tarduwado i rugadu . 27 Nono tamode nowy mugu jaereuge paobe ewie i jamedy . Taragojere itabo marigudu dukodi tamode nowy boe erduwado i jamedy.

16 1 Jesus mako kimore . Akore : Ire tawie marigudu . Dukodi tagaba tagera ra tameartorure i dupiji . 2 Judeu doge emode tadudo nowy ture bato puiwu bai piji . Emode ia tawido jamedy . Emeardare ainore Pao Kurirewy aidure boe erowo meartorure iwugei . 3 Mare erduwakare i . Erduwakare Iogwa Kurireuji . Dykodire ero pegamode tai . 4 Marigudu iragojere tagabo Dykodire ikare tawie . Mare aino care ire tawie . Dukodi boe ero pegamode tai dykeje tawiabutumode awu iwadary keje rugadu . 5 Jesus mako kimore . Akore : Kuri aino imode ikirimi ure itarego matowu Iogwa bagai . Marigudu tanarakare i kaiba ikodumode . 6 ca ire tawie Dykodire tagiarigodyre rugadu . 7 Boe jokodu jire inagoino tawiagai . Itumode tabiji dykeje boe pegamode tai rugadu . Ire tawie . Mare itumode tabiji boe pemegawo tai dubagai jamedy . Itumode tabiji Pao Kurirewy Uwari aregodywo tagae dubagai jamedy . Itumodukare tabiji dykeje Pao Kurirewy Uwari aregodymodukare tagae . Mare itumode tabiji dykeje imode Pao Kurirewy Uwari arego tagae rugadu . Dykodire inagoino boe pemegamoduie tai rugadu . 8 Boe erduwakare turo pegarewy boeji . Mare Pao Kurirewy Uwari aregodymode boe etae dykeje umode boe erduwado Pao Kurirewy aidukare jiwu boe ero pegarewy boeji boe ewo tugera ra turo pegarewy boe piji rugadu . Boe emeardaere ro jetororeuge nuie pudumi . Erduwakare tuwo turo jetorodo . Pao Kurirewy Uwari aregodymode dykeje umode erduwado ero jetorokare duji . Umode boe erduwado iro jetorore duji . Boe emeardaere tuiorydywaie Pao Kurireuji . Mare Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode erduwado erduwakare Pao Kurirewy jituji . Pao Kurirewy umode boe pegado meartorukare iwugei ero pegarewy morice . 9 Emeartorukare i Dykodire erduwakare ro pegareuge nuie pudumi duji . 10 Iro jetorore . Nono itumode Iogwa Kurirewy bagai dykeje Iogwa Kurirewy umode tona bu ikajeje toro . Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode boe erduwado nowy inoduji rugadu tuwo erduwado iro jetorore duji . dykeje care boe erduwamode iro jetorore dyji rugadu . Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode boe erduwado ro jetorokareugenure emage dyji jamedy . 11 Emeardaere Pao Kurirewy ro pegamodukaie pudui . Mare erduwakare . Marigudu ure bope doge eimijera bie tumoduie boe pegado ji nowy bope doge eimijera ro pegarewy morice . Ro pegareuge emeartorure nowy bope doge eimijeraji jamedy . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ro pegamode ei jamedy ero pegarewy morice rugadu . 12 Iwadary kurire iwo tawie ji . Mare taragakare tarduwawo jamedy boeji . 13 Mare Pao Kurirewy Uwari aregodymode tagae dykeje umode tarduwado Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Umode tarduwado boe jokodu remawuji . Makomodukare tuwadary ji . Makomode tumearydyre jiwu Pao Kurirewy batary ji tu rugadu . Umode tawie nuba boe mode boei awu moto jituji . 14 Umode tawie i jamedy . Umode tawie iwadary ji . Dykodire umode boe erduwado i . Ipemegare rugadu . Dujire umode boe erduwado . 15 Iogwa Kurirewy batary jire inagoino . Dykodire ire tawie aino . Pao Kurirewy Uwari makomode iwadary ji tawiagai rugadu . 16 Kuri aino tardumodukare i pugeje . Mare ia meri keje tardumode i rugadu . 17 Jesus ure jorydywadowyge emagore pui . Egore : Kaba jiba akoino pai ? Akore pardumodukaie pudui kuri aino . Akore ia meri kejeie pardumoduie pudui pugeje . Akore tudumoduie Pao Kurirewy ae . 18 Kuri aino . Kaboba jiba akoino ? Parduwakare kaba jiba akoino pai . 19 Jesus jorydyware nowy ture jorydywadowyge emeardaeji . Dykodire makore ei pugeje . Akore : Inagore tai tardumodukaie i kuri aino mare ia meri keje tardumoduie i pugeje . Mare tarduwakare awu iwadary ji Dykodire tagagoino aino pui . 20 Boe jokodu jire inagoino tawiagai . Tagiarigodymode rugadu . Tagragudumode rugadu . Mare meartorukare iwugere egaremode pudui . Tagiarigodymode mare taegaregodymode tai pugeje . 21 Aredy kuri jirigodyre dykeje kiarigodyre tuguri jiri kori koia . Mare kuri buture dykeje biagodyre nowy tuguri jiriredy piji . Jakarere tonaregedyji rugadu tonaregedy boture kodi . 22 Tagiarigodyre mare iorydymode tai pugeje . Dykejere taegaregodymode tai pugeje .
