Eragojemode Pao Kurirewy apo du akedymodukare rugadu . 8 Mare ia boe ewiapagare tu pudui . Etaidukare boe pemegareuji . Etaidukare Pao Kurirewy batary remawuji . Etaidure tu boe emeardae pegareuji turo pegawo tu tyje . Dukodi care Pao Kurirewy korigodymode ei rugadu . Ro pegamode ei rugadu ero pegarewy morice . 9 Dykodire boe pegamode ro pegareugei rugadu . Boe rakamode ei . Erduwamodukare nuba turomode pugeje . Boe pegareure ei rugadu . Boe pegamode Judeu doge ero pegareugei . Boe pegamode boe tuginaiwyge ero pegareugei jamedy . 10 Mare Pao Kurirewy umode boe pemegado ro pemegareugei . Umode epemegado boe eiamedy boe etaiduwo ei eiamedy boe epemegawo pui . Mako pemegamode ei . Umode boe pemegado Judeu doge ro pemegareugei . Umode boe pemegado boe tuginaiwyge ro pemegareugei jamedy . 11 Pao Kurirewy jorydyware boe eiamedy boei . Boe remawu tabore meardaere boe eiamedy boei . Umodukare tuiordae tumeardae tawujedy pagado boei . 12 Pao Kurirewy umode ro pegareuge eiamedy boe ewarigu tubiji bope doge edyre kejewy joru pegareuto ero pegarewy morice . Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure Judeu doge eno bakaru maku Judeu doge etai . Dykodire nowy bakaru ure Judeu doge erduwado turo pemegawo Pao Kurirewy meardaeji . Mare du inodu tabo nowy ia Judeu doge ekodukare nowy Pao Kurirewy meardaeji rugadu . Ero pegare Pao Kurirewy jakai . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy umode ewarigu bope doge edyre kejewy joru pegareuto ero pegarewy morice . Pao Kurirewy ukare to bakaru maku boe tuginaiwyge etai . Mare nowy boe tuginaiwyge erduware turo pemegawo jamedy . Mare du inodu tabo nowy boe tuginaiwyge ere tuwarigu boeto nowy tuiordae pemegarewy piji rugadu . Ero pegare Pao Kurirewy jakai jamedy . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy umode ewarigu bope doge edyre kejewy joru pegareuto ero pegarewy morice . 13 Pao Kurirewy ure Judeu doge eno bakaru maku etai dykeje ewiapagare nowy bakaruji . Mare emeartorumodukare ji dykeje Pao Kurirewy jorydy pemegamodukare ei . Mare emeartorumode Pao Kurirewy ure maku pudaiwu bakaruji dykeje edy pemegamode Pao Kurirewy apo rugadu . 14 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ukare to bakaru maku boe tuginaiwyge etai . Dykodire erduwakare Pao Kurirewy o bakaruji . Mare du inodu tabo boe eiamedy boe erduware boe pegareuji boe pemegareuji jamedy . Boe ero pemegare dutabore boe erduware turo pemegare duji . Egore nowy ro pemegarewy nuie ema . 15 Tu pudumi tumeardae tabo boe tuginaiwyge ere tumeardae udo nono Pao Kurirewy meardae mogadure . Dykodire ero pemegamode . Erduware turo pemegawo . Mare ero pegamode dykeje erduwamode turo pegare dyji jamedy . Ainore boe eiamedy boe erore . Ainore boe tuginaiwyge eiamedy boe erore jamedy . 16 Inure tawie Jesus batary pemegareuji . Boe eiamedy boe erduware turo pemegawo . Mare boe etaidure tuwo tumeardae pegarewy biado Pao Kurirewy piji . Mare Pao Kurirewy jorydyware boe eiamedy boe emeardaeji . Dykodire ia meri keje Pao Kurirewy umode Jesus Cristo rawyje mato moto ka tuwo boe ewie kodiba boe ero pegare emeardae pegare jamedy . Pao Kurirewy koiare umode Jesus rawyje tuwo ro pegareuge eiamedy boe edydo boe pegarewy keje rugadu . 17 Ia tagi Judeu dogenure tagi . Tagaidure Pao Kurirewy ure maku tagaiwu bakaruji . Tagagore tameartoruie ji . Tagagore Pao Kurirewy aiduie tai . 18 Tarduware Pao Kurirewy aidure jiboeji tameartoruwo ji . nowy ure maku tagaiwu bakaru ure tarduwado tawo tameardae pemegarewy tawuje . Ure tarduwado tawo jorydywa bokwareuge erduwado . Ure tarduwado tawo boe etore erduwado . Boe remawu jire ure tarduwado . ca tagagore tarduwaie tawo jorydywa bokwareuge erduwado nono boe emode joku bokwareuge erduwado dumogadure . Tagagore tarduwaie tawo jorydywa bokwareuge erduwado nono boecojiwu joru urugu pemegarewy mogadure boe etododai dumogadure . 21 Kocare tare boe erduwado mare tagare tarduwado . Tamagore boei boe ekiwogukawo . Mare tagire tagaidure tagiwoguwo . 22 Tamagore boei eribarikawo toredyje piji toredy piji jamedy . Mare tagire taeribarire tagoredyje piji tagoredy piji rugadu . Boe ere tuwai tadawu santo dogedo tuwo tubu jodo jokorai tuwo pao kurireugedo emage pudai . Tagagore ei erokawo aino . Mare tagire tagiwogure nowy eno santo doge ewai tadawu ia boeji tagoce . 23 Tawadary ocarore Pao Kurirewy ure tuwadary maku tagai duji . Mare tameartorukare ji Dykodire tare Pao Kurirewy pogurudo . 24 Marigudu padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Judeu doge ero pegarewy koiare ure boe tuginaiwyge emago pegado Pao Kurireuji . 25 Judeu doge ere tonaregedy imedyrogu baka oto birirogu kado tuwo Pao Kurirewy uwobedo pudumi . Tameartorumode nowy Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaruji dykeje ure turugadu tawo tagonaregedy imedyrogu baka oto birirogu kado nowy taroiaji . Mare tameartorumodukare Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaruji dykeje pagatujere taromede inono . 26 Boe tuginaiwyge ekare tonaregedy imedyrogu baka oto birirogu kado . Mare emeartorumode Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaruji dykeje Pao Kurirewy meardae mode ei nono tumeardae moga nowy ure tonaregedy imedyrogu baka oto birirogu kadowyge dumogadure . 27 Ia tagi Judeu dogenure tagi . Mare tameartorukare Pao Kurirewy ure maku tagaiwu bakaruji . Padure bapera keje . Tare tagonaregedy imedyrogu baka oto birirogu kado . Mare tameartorukare tago bakaruji . Boe tuginaiwyge ekare tonaregedy imedyrogu baka oto birirogu kado . Mare emeartorure Pao Kurirewy ure maku tagaiwu bakaruji . Boe erdure nowy boe tuginaiwyge ero pemegarewy kodure taro kori duji . Dykodire boe erduware ro pegareugenure tagi duji . Emago pegamode taro pegareuji Pao Kurirewy biagai . 28 Pao Kurirewy ure bakaru maku mariguduwyge Judeu doge etai eno bakaruce . Dykodire Judeu doge eiamedy boe emeardaere Pao Kurirewy uwobe remawyge nuie pudumi duji . nowy eno bakaru koiare ure Judeu doge edo tonaregedy imedyrogu baka oto birirogu kado rugadu . Mare Judeu doge emodukare tumeardae pemegado tumeartoruwo tu Pao Kurireuji taidu tabo dukeje , Pao Kurirewy uwobe modukare emage . Pao Kurirewy umodukare tuwobedo emage . Pao Kurirewy ure bakaru maku Judeu doge etai eno bakaruwo ema . nowy inodu kodi karega Pao Kurirewy umode tuwobedo emage . Mare Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode Judeu doge emeardae pemegado dykeje etaidumode tumeartoruwo tu Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Judeu doge erore aino dykeje Pao Kurirewy uwobere emage rugadu . Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode ia boe emeardae pemegado jamedy emeartoruwo tu Pao Kurireuji . nowy boe erore aino dykeje Pao Kurirewy uwobere emage rugadu . nowy meartoru kuricigore Pao Kurirewy jiwyge eire Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago tuwobewo emage . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy mako pemegare ei erore jiboeji rugadu . Boe emago pemegamode iagei mare Pao Kurirewy mako pemegamode nowy meartorure puduiwugei , kodumode toro nowy boe emagore jiwyge ekori.

3 1 Ia boe enarare . Egore : Boe pemegamode nowy Judeu dogei rugadu ka na boe tuginaiwyge epiji ? Judeu doge emeartorumode Pao Kurirewy ure maku pudaiwu bakaruji dykeje ekodiwamodu kana rugadu ? Nono boe pemegamode ei rugadu kana ? 2 Mere iwo tawie boe remawuji . Boe pemegamode Judeu dogei rugadu . Etaire Pao Kurirewy ure tuwadary maku etu pemegawo nowy Pao Kurirewy batary ji rugadu . 3 Ia boe enarare pugeje . Egore : Ia Judeu doge emeartorukare Pao Kurirewy ure maku pudaiwu bakaruji . Nono Pao Kurirewy umode tugera ra epiji kana ? 4 Boro ! Pao Kurirewy umodukare tugera ra epiji . Umode tumagore jiboe jetudo pudui rugadu . Boe eiamedy boe egore tumeartoruie Pao Kurirewy batary ji mare pagare egoino . Mare Pao Kurirewy umodukare tugera ra epiji . Mariguduwu Judeu doge eimijera kurirewy Davi ure Pao Kurirewy batary bu bapera keje marigudu . Davi ro pegare . Mare Pao Kurirewy mako pegare nowy Davi ro pegareuji nono Davi jorydyware Pao Kurirewy akoino puduiboe ure turugadu duji . Kodire Davi akore : Pao Kurirewy mako pegare boe ero pegareuji kodire boe jokodu jire akoino; Boe erdu pegare Pao Kurirewy akoino pudui dyji mare boe jokodu jire Pao Kurirewy akoino pudui dyji Dykodire eroiwakare tumagowo iaboeji Pao Kurirewy batary jipagi . 5 Mare ia boe doge egore : cero pegare . Boe jokodu . cero pegare boe egai Dykodire nowy boe etaidu kurire Pao Kurirewy ro pemegareuji . Dykodire cero pegarewy koiare ure nowy boe etaidudo Pao Kurirewy ro pemegareuji . Dukodi care Pao Kurirewy ro pegamodukare cei nowy cero pegarewy morice . cero pegarewy ure boe etaidudo Pao Kurirewy ro pemegareuji . Etaidukare cero pegareuji Dykodire etaidu kurire Pao Kurirewy ro pemegareuji . cere boe etaidudo Pao Kurireuji . ca Pao Kurirewy ro pegamodukare cei . Ia boe egore aino mare pagare egoino . 6 nowy emagore jiboe ukare turugadu . Pao Kurirewy rore jiboe umode turugadu . Ro pegamode boei ero pegarewy morice rugadu . Mare du pegakare . 7 Iage egore : cewadrarodure . Boe jokodu . Mare cewadrarodae pegare ia boe doge egai Dykodire nowy boe doge etaidure Pao Kurirewy batary remawuji . Boe jokodu jie Pao Kurirewy akoino rugadu . nowy boe erduware boe jokodu jie Pao Kurirewy akoino rugadu duji . Etaidure Pao Kurirewy batary remawuji cewadary piji . Dukodi care cere boe etaidudo Pao Kurirewy batary remawuji . cewadrarodae koiare ure boe etaidudo Pao Kurirewy batary remawuji . Pao Kurirewy batary pemegare nowy boei . Etaidukare cewadrarodaeji Dykodire etaidu kurire Pao Kurirewy batary remawuji . cere etaidudo Pao Kurirewy batary ji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ro pegamodukare cei cewadrarodae morice . Ainore ia boe doge egore . Mare pagare egoino . Erduwa bokware tumagore jiboeji . 8 nowy boe doge egore : ca pawo paro pegado boei etaiduwo Pao Kurirewy ro pemegareuji . Paro pegarewy koiare umode boe etaidudo Pao Kurireuji ro pemegarewynure ema kodi . Ainore ia boe doge egore mare pagare egoino . Emeardaere ainoie inagore jamedy . Mare aino karega inagore . Pao Kurirewy ro pegamode nowy akoinowugei rugadu ero pegareu , ewadary pegarewy morice . 9 Iage enarare . Egore : nowy Judeu doge ero pemegare rugadu nowy boe tuginaiwyge epiji ? Aino rugadu kana ? Boro ! Ire tarduwado marigudu . Judeu doge eroiwakare tuwo tugera ra nowy turo pegarewy piji nono nowy boe tuginaiwyge emogadure . nowy boe tuginaiwyge eroiwakare tuwo tugera ra turo pegarewy piji jamedy . 10 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy batary padure bapera keje . Akore : Boe eiamedy boe ero pegare . Ro jetororewy bokware . 11 Boe erduwakare tuwo tumeardae pemegarewy tawyje rugadu . Erduwakare tuwo tumeardae jetorodo . nowy inodu boe bokware rugadu . Mako pemegare Pao Kurirewy jiwyge bokwa . 12 Boe eiamedy boe ere tugera ra Pao Kurirewy ro piji . Eiamedy boe ere tuwarigu boeto . Boe eiamedy boe ero pemegakare . Ro pemegareuge bokware rugadu . 13 Boe eiamedy boe emode pu jekiripagado . Ewadrarodumode rugadu tu tyje ji aino . Emago pegamode boei . Ewadaryre nono awagu o kurirewy umogadure . Tuwadary pegarewy kodi umode tumedia korigo rugadu . 14 Ewadary pijire boe pegareboe ure tudawuje . 15 Ere akedo pudui tuwo boe ewido . 16 Ere boe jamedy boe pegado tuiedyrewy jamedy boe keje . 17 Erduwakare tuwo tuiordae pegarewy barigu tubiji . 18 Ekare tuioku kidugo Pao Kurireuji Dykodire emeartoru bokware Pao Kurireuji . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore . 19 Boe etaidumode tumeartoruwo Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaruji dykeje emeartorudo nowy bakaru jamedy boeji . Mare boe eroiwakare tumeartoruwo nowy bakaruji rugadu . Boe etaidure tumago pemegawo pudui Pao Kurirewy biagai mare parokacerewy bokware pugeje emeartoru bokware kodi . Nono Pao Kurirewy ro pegamode boe eiamedy boei ero pegarewy morice . 20 Pameartorumode Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaruji dukodi karega Pao Kurirewy umode pamugu pemegado pudabo . Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaru koiare ure parduwado ro pegareugenure pagi duji . 21 Mare aino Pao Kurirewy ure boe erduwado nuba turomode tuwo boe emugu pemegado pudabo . Umodukare udo nono ture maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaru mogadure rugadu . Ure Moisés jorydywado nowy bakaruji uwo maku Judeu doge etai . nowy bakaru ure boe ewie Pao Kurirewy umoduie boe emugu pemegado pudabo duji . nowy makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge ere boe ewie jamedy . 22 Mare aino boe emeartorumode Jesus Cristoji dykeje Pao Kurirewy umode emugu pemegado pudabo . Umode tugerago ei pudae tuwo edo nono ro pemegareuge emogadure . Boe eiamedy boe ero pegare rugadu Dykodire nowy ero pegarewy koiare ure edy jaedo Pao Kurirewy piji . Mare meartorure Jesus jiwyge emagere Pao Kurirewy umode ekinorudo . Umode tugerago meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boei tuwo edo nono ro pemegareuge emogadure , tuwo emugu pemegado pudabo . Aidure turowo aino boe eiamedy boei rugadu . 24 Pao Kurirewy ro pemegare boei . Ure tonaregedy Jesus Cristo maku boe etai biwo boe emugato ero pegarewy morice . Dykodire Jesus Cristo umode meartorure puduiwyge eiamedy boe ekinorudo . Pao Kurirewy umode tugerago ei pudae tuwo edo nono ro pemegareuge emogadure . Mare Pao Kurirewy umodukare nowy turore jiboe morido boe etai . 25 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy akore tumoduie boe ero pegare jiboe morido etai . Mare okudure boebo jii je Dykodire biapagakare nowy boe ero pegare jiboeji jii je . Mare aino care Pao Kurirewy ure tonaregedy maku boe etai . Ure tugú redo boe eiamedy boe ero pegarewy morice . Boe emeartorumode Jesusji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy biagodymode ero pegarewy piji . Mare paga karega . Pao Kurirewy ure nowy boe ero pegarewy morido tonaregedy ku tabo . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy makore jiboe jeture pudui rugadu boe ero pegarewy morimoduie . Dykodire boe erduware Pao Kurirewy rore jiboe jamedy boe jetorore duji . Mare paga karega . Pao Kurirewy ure meartorure Jesus jiwyge ero pegarewy barigu epiji emugu pemegawo pudabo . Dukodi care Pao Kurirewy rore jiboe jetorore rugadu . 27 Dykodire pawadary ocaromodukare parore jiboeji . Pameartorumode Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaruji mare pawadary ocarokawo parore jiboeji . Pameartorumode Jesus jitu keje Pao Kurirewy umode paro pemegado . 28 Pameartorumode Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaruji du inodu Pao Kurirewy umodukare pamugu pemegado pudabo . Mare pameartorumode Jesus jitu keje nono Pao Kurirewy umode tugerago pai pudae tuwo pamugu pemegado pudabo . 29 Tu Judeu doge karega . Mare boe eiamedy boe emeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji . Boe tuginaiwyge jamedy emeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji . 30 Pao Kurirewy ure mitotyje . Judeu doge emeartorumode Jesus jitu keje Pao Kurirewy umode tugerago ei pudae tuwo emugu pemegado pudabo . Boe tuginaiwyge emeartorumode Jesus jitu keje Pao Kurirewy umode tugerago ei pudae jamedy tuwo emugu pemegado pudabo jamedy . 31 Pameartorure tu Jesusji rugadu mare pamodukare Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaru pijido . Pameartorure Jesusji Dykodire parduware Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaru jeture pudui rugadu duji.

4 1 Tagaiwodo jawu marigudu pawobe etuo Abraão rore jiboeji . Umode tarduwado nowy inagore jiboe ure turugadu . 2 Abraão ro pemegare dukodi karega Pao Kurirewy ure mugu pemegado pudabo . Boe ero pemegamode tumugu pemegawo Pao Kurirewy apo dykeje ewadary ocaromode nowy turo pemegareuji . Mare pagatyje . Pao Kurirewy aidukare nowy inoduji . 3 Pao Kurirewy ure tuwadary bu bapera keje . Akore : Abraão meartorure Pao Kurireuji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago Abraãoji pudae tuwo udo nono ro pemegarewy mogadure . 4 Boe emaragodymode dykeje diero makudumode etai . Makudu paga karugure etai makudure etai emaragodae morice . 5 Mare boe ero pemegare dukodi karega Pao Kurirewy aidure boei . Mare boe emeartorumode Pao Kurireuji dykeje emare umode tugerago ei pudae tuwo edo nono ro pemegarege emogadure . Pao Kurirewy akore turo pegamodukaie nowy meartorure puduiwugei , tumodukaie ero pegarewy morido etai . 6 Jaoboe Judeu doge eimijera Davi jorydyware nowy inoduji . Kodire Davi akore Pao Kurirewy aidure jiwu jakaremoduie pudui rugadu . Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago nowy meartorure puduiwugei tuwo edo nono ro pemegarege emogadure . Dykodire jorydy pemegamode ei Dykodire nowy meartorure Pao Kurirewy jiwyge egaremode pudui rugadu . Boe pemegamode ei . Turo pemegarewy kodi karega mare emeartorure Pao Kurireuji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy jorydy pemegare ei . Davi akore : 7 Pao Kurirewy biagodymode ro pegareuge ero pegarewy piji dukodi egaremode pudui rugadu . Ero pegare mare du inodu tabo Pao Kurirewy umodukare edo turo pegarewy morido . Boe pemegamode ei . 8 Pagimijera Kurirewy umodukare ro pegareuge ero pegarewy bu bapera keje Dykodire egaremode pudui rugadu . Boe pemegamode ei kodi . 9 Judeu dogeire Davi akoino . Boe tuginaiwugeire akoino jamedy . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Abraão meartorure Pao Kurireuji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago ji pudae . Ure udo nono ro pemegarewy mogadure . 10 Judeu doge emeardaere boe ewo tuwaga oto biri kado Pao Kurirewy uwo tugerago pudui pudae . Mare Abraão ukare tuwaga oto biri kado . Mare ture aino dutabo Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago ji pudae tuwo udo nono ro pemegarewy mogadure . 11 Dykejere toro ia meri keje Abraão ure tuwaga oto biri kado tuwo boe erduwado Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago pudui duji . Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago meartorure puduiwyge eiamedy boei pudae tuwo edo nono ro pemegareuge emogadure nono turo moga Abraão jitu mogadure . Dykodire meartorure Pao Kurirewy jiwyge eiamedy boe etuonure Abraãoce . Ekare tuwaga oto biri kado mare emeartorure Pao Kurireuji . Dykodire etuonure Abraãoce . 12 Judeu doge eiamedy boe ere tonaregedy imedy baka biri oto rogu kado rugadu ji aino . Ia nowy ure tawaga oto biri kadowyge Judeu doge emeartorure Pao Kurireuji jamedy kodire etuonure Abraãoce jamedy . Mare paga karega . Emeartorure Pao Kurireuji nono Abraão meartoru mogadure . Abraão meartorure Pao Kurireuji nono toro ia meri keje ure tuwaga oto biri kado rugadu . 13 Abraão mugure boe tuginaiwyge eno moto keje . Bikare raga mare Pao Kurirewy ukare Judeu doge eno bakaru maku etai . Dykodire Abraão jorydywakare Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaruji . Mare Abraão meartorure Pao Kurireuji . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago Abraãoji pudae tuwo udo nono ro pemegarewy mogadure . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy makore Abraãoji tumoduie boe jamedy boe maku ai , uwobe etai jamedy . 14 Tu nowy meartorure Judeu doge eno bakaru jiwyge etaire Pao Kurirewy makore jiboe makudumode dykeje boe emeartoru paganure Jesusji . Tu nowy meartorure Judeu doge eno bakaru jiwyge etaire Pao Kurirewy makore jiboe makudumode dykeje Pao Kurirewy mako paganure . Mare Pao Kurirewy makore jiboe makudure boe eiamedy boe etai Dykodire ure turugadu boe emeartoru kuriwo Jesusji rugadu . 15 Pao Kurirewy makore jiboe makudure meartorure puduiwyge eiamedy boe etai rugadu . nowy Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaru ukare Pao Kurirewy ro pemegado ei . nowy Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaru koiare ure Pao Kurirewy korigo ei . Boe emeartorukare nowy bakaruji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy korigodyre ei rugadu . Ainore boe erore jamedy . Boe ewadaryre boe emeartoruwo ji mare ia boe erdu pegare ji Dykodire boe emeartorukare ji . Nono boe ekorigodymode nowy meartorukare nowy boe ewadary jiwugei . Boe emodukare tuwadary udo turugadu boe emeartoruwo ji dykeje boe kare turugadu tumagowo boe ewadary jipagi . Meartorukare jiwu bokwamode jamedy . Dykodire inagoino Pao Kurirewy umode tumagore jiboe maku meartorure Jesus jiwyge etai . Umode tumagore jiboe maku Judeu doge meartorure Jesus jiwyge etai . Emeartorure Judeu doge eno bakaruji mare emeartorure Jesusji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy umode tumagore jiboe maku etai . Makore tumoduie boe jamedy boe maku etai . Mare Pao Kurirewy umode tumagore jiboe maku nowy ia boe tuginaiwyge meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe etai jamedy . Emeartorumode nono Abraão meartoru mogadure dykeje Pao Kurirewy umode tumagore jiboe maku etai . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy makore tumoduie boe jamedy boe maku rugadu taidu tabo Abraão uwobe eiamedy boe etai . Pameartorure Jesusji Dykodire Abraão uwobenure pagi . Paonure Abraãoce jamedy . 17 Marigudu Abraão mugure moto keje . Bikare raga . Mare ore bokware rugadu . Nono Pao Kurirewy makore Abraãoji . Ure nowy tuwadary bu bapera keje . Akore : Imode boe etuodo aki . Akoremode rugadu . Akore etore eidodymode rugadu kodire akore emagamode rugadu . Emode taodo pubiji toro ia tumuga ka . Judeu doge emode emage . Iage boe tuginaiwyge emode emage jamedy . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore Abraãoji . Nono makore ji pugeje . Ure nowy batary bu bapera keje jamedy . Akore : Akoremode rugadu . Akore etore emagamode rugadu . Ainore Pao Kurirewy makore Abraãoji rugadu . nowy Abraão , Sara ekodu mai dutabo emugure puapo mare etore bokware rugadu jii toro tubegagody ka . Nono ca Pao Kurirewy makore ji dykeje Abraão o jorure cem . Oredyje Sara pegagodyre jamedy . Dykodire meardaere toremodukaie rugadu . Mare du inodu tabo Abraão meartoru kimore Pao Kurirewy makore pudui duji . Upagare Pao Kurirewy makore puduiwu tonaregedy bagai . Ore bokware . Oremodukare . Mare Pao Kurirewy akore tumoduie Abraão oredo Dykodire Abraão upagare tonaregedy bagai rugadu . Nono Pao Kurirewy ure tuwadary udo turugadu . Makore jiboe kodure pudui rugadu . Pao Kurirewy ure Abraão onaregedy imedydo toredyje Sara apo rugadu . Awu Pao Kurirewy emare rakare tuwo bireuge ewodudo pugeje . Emare rakare tuwo boe jamedy boe towuje tuwadary tabo . Boe bokware mare tuwadary tabore ure boe jamedy boe towuje . Abraão meartorure Pao Kurireuji . Onaregedyre Dykodire uwobere . Boe etuore ema . Ore etore eidodyre rugadu Dykodire ore emagare rugadu . Ere taodo pubiji toro ia tumuga ka . 20 Abraão morora magadukare tumeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji . Meartoru rakare Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Aidu pemegare Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Meartorure rugadu Pao Kurirewy akoino jiboeji . Dykodire ure turagado pudui rugadu . Mako pemegare Pao Kurireuji . 22 Abraão meartorure rugadu Pao Kurireuji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago ji pudae tuwo udo nono ro pemegareuge emogadure . 23 nowy Pao Kurirewy batary padure bapera keje . Abraão jire Pao Kurirewy akoino . Mare iage eire akoino jamedy . 24 Pao Kurirewy ure Jesus jewodudo pugeje . Pameartorumode awu Pao Kurireuji dykeje Pao Kurirewy umode tugerago pai pudae tuwo pado nono ro pemegareuge emogadure jamedy . Umode tugerago pai pudae nono turore Abraão jitu mogadure . Pagimijera kurirewynure Jesus rema . 25 Paro pegarewy mori cere Jesus makudure boe eimijerage pegareuge etai ewo bito . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure Jesus jewodudo pugeje . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy biagodymode meartorure puduiwyge ero pegarewy piji tuwo tugerago ei pudae.

5 1 Pameartorure Jesusji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago pai pudae tuwo pado nono ro pemegareuge emogadure . Pagimijera Jesus Cristo ure pagaora butugugodydo pamugu pemegawo Pao Kurirewy apo . 2 Pameartorure Jesusji Dykodire ure parego Pao Kurirewy muga pemegarewy ka . Nono boe pemegare pai . Pameartorure Jesusji nono parduware ia meri keje pamugumode Pao Kurirewy apo duji . Nono pabagare paegare tabo Jesus bagai rugadu . Emare aregodymode pugeje tuwo parududo baruto pamuguwo Pao Kurirewy apo baru tada rugadu . 3 Boe rakare pai mare du inodu tabo pagare pae jodo . Mare paga karega . Boe rakamode pai mare pawo paragado pai pae tobu tabo rugadu . 4 Pamode paragado pai pameartoruwo Pao Kurireuji nono Pao Kurirewy aidumode pai . Pao Kurirewy aidumode pai nono pabagamode Pao Kurirewy bagai rugadu pameartorure batary ji kodi . 5 Pabagamode Pao Kurirewy bagai pagiarigodymodukare . Pao Kurirewy ure Tuwari maku pagai . nowy Uwari ure parduwado Pao Kurirewy mearydy kurire pai duji . Dykodire pabagamode Pao Kurirewy bagai mare pagiarigodymodukare . 6 Ro pegareugenure pagi kodi paroiwakare pawo paginorudo . Mare Jesus Cristo bire pamugato . Bire Pao Kurirewy aidure jiwu meri keje . 7 Boe etaidumodukare tuwiwo ro pegareuge emugato . Boe emeartorukare jamedy tuiorydymoduie ia imedyji biwo tumedia pemegarewy mugato jamedy . 8 Mare ro pegareugenure pagi . Mare du inodu tabo Jesus Cristo bire pamugato paro pegarewy morice . Dykodire parduware Pao Kurirewy mearydy kurire pai duji . Mearydy kurire pai rugadu . 9 Jesus Cristo ure tugu redo paro pegarewy morice . Pameartorure ji Dykodire ure tugerago pai pudae pamugu pemegawo Pao Kurirewy apo . nowy inodu kodi parduware Jesus umode paginorudo duji . Pao Kurirewy korigodymode ro pegareugei . Umode boe pegado ei ero pegarewy morice . Mare Jesus umode paginorudo . 10 Pameartorukare marigudu kodire pardu pegare Pao Kurireuji . Mare aino care pameartorure Jesusji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure tumedagedo pagi . Onaregedy Jesus bire paro pegarewy morice Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure tumedagedo pagi . Dukodi care parduware Jesus Cristo umode paginorudo duji . Jewodure pugeje Dykodire umode paginorudo . 11 Paegarere pai rugadu Pao Kurirewy rore jiboeji pagai . Pagimijera Jesus Cristo ure Pao Kurirewy metagedo pagi pameartorure ji kodi . Dykodire paegarere pai rugadu . 12 Imedy boetojiwunure Adãoce . Emare ro pegare boetoji Dykodire boe eiamedy boe ero pegare jamedy . Turo pegarewy koiare ure boe pegado boe eiamedy boei . Adão ro pegare Dykodire boe eiamedy boe ewire Adão piji ji aino rugadu . Boe eiamedy boe ewimode turo pegare kodi . 13 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ukare Judeu doge eno bakaru maku etai . Mare boe ero pegare marigudu . Mare eno bakaru bokware Dykodire erduwakare turore jiboe pegare Pao Kurirewy jakai duji . 14 Mare boe eiamedy boe ewire rugadu Adão piji jii toro Moisés ae . Iage ero pega kurikare mare ewire jamedy . Ero pegare jiboe ukare nono Adão rore jiboe mogadure . Adão ure tuiorydywa bokwado Pao Kurirewy makore pudui duji . Nonore ro pega remawu ure rugadu . Iage ero pega kurikare mare ewire jamedy . Boe eiamedy boe ewire . Adão ure nono ia imedy mogadure . nowy imedy aregodymode ia meri keje . 15 Mare ekare nono pure mogadure jamedy . Adão ro pegare . nowy ia imedyrema umode boe ekinorudo . Iere Jesus Cristo . Pao Kurirewy onaregedynure ema . Pao Kurirewy ure nowy tonaregedy maku boe etai taidu tabo turo pemegawo boei tuwo boe ekinorudo . nowy Pao Kurirewy rore jiboe ukare nono Adão ro mogadure . Adão ro pegare Dykodire boe eiamedy boe ewire . Mare Pao Kurirewy ro pemegarewy kodure nowy Adão rore jiboe kori . Dykodire umode ekinorudowu boe emagamode . 16 Pao Kurirewy ure maku boe etaiwu turo pemegarewy ukare nono Adão ro pegarewy mogadure . Adão ro pegare Dykodire Pao Kurirewy makore ji . Akore : Ro pegarewynure aki . Nono Adão ro pegarewy jore boe eiamedy boeto . Dykodire ro pegareugenure boe eiamedy boece . Mare Pao Kurirewy ro pemegare meartorure puduiwugei taidu tabo tuwiagodywo ero pegarewy jamedy boe piji tuwo ekinorudo . Dykodire ure tugerago ei pudae . 17 Adão ro pegare Dykodire boe eiamedy boe ewire . Moto kejeboe jamedy boe akedymode jamedy . Boe jamedy boe bimode rugadu . Mare Jesus Cristo ure mitotyje jamedy . Jesus ro pemegarewy kurire nowy Adão ro pegarewy kori . Pameartorumode Jesusji dykeje Pao Kurirewy umode tugerago pai pudae tuwo pado nono ro pemegareuge emogadure . Dykodire pameartorumode Jesusji dykeje pagogomaguduwo Pao Kurireuji uwo nowy turo pemegarewy maku pagai paro pemegawo . Umode turo pemegarewy maku pagai mare pamodukare nowy Pao Kurirewy ro pemegarewy morido ai paro pemegarewy tabo . Emare umode maku pagai taidu tabo rugadu . Nono jorydy pemegamode pai . Dykodire Jesus Cristo umode paewodudo pugeje pamuguwo pudabo rugadu . 18 Adão ure mitotyje . Ro pegare Dykodire boe eiamedy boe ewire . Mare Jesus ure mitotyje jamedy . Ro pemegare tuwo boe eiamedy boe ekinorudo . Bitodure boe ero pegarewy morice . Dykodire umode tugerago meartorure puduiwugei pudae tuwo ewodudo pugeje ewikawo pugeje . 19 Adão ure tuiorydywa bokwado Pao Kurirewy makore pudui duji . Kodire ro pegarewy remawunure ema rugadu . Dykodire boe eiamedy boe ero pegare jamedy . Mare Jesus meartorure tuoji Dykodire bire boe ero pegarewy morice . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago nowy meartorure puduiwugei pudae tumedagewo emage tuwo edo nono ro pemegareuge emogadure . 20 Pao Kurirewy ure Judeu doge eno bakaru maku etai erduwawo turo pegareuji . Dykodire erduware turo pegarewy boeji rugadu . Etaidukare tumeartoruwo nowy Pao Kurirewy ure maku pudaiwu bakaruji . Dykodire ro pegarewy remawugenure emage rugadu . Mare nowy inodu kodi karega Pao Kurirewy roiwamodukare tuwo nowy ro pegarege ekinorudo ero pegarewy piji . Pao Kurirewy ure turo pemegarewy kurido nowy boe ero pegarewy kori rugadu . 21 care boe ero pegarewy koiare umode boe ewido . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure turo pemegarewy maku boe etai taidu tabo . Dykodire umode tugerago nowy meartorure puduiwyge eiamedy boei pudae tuwo edo nono ro pemegareuge emogadure . Dykodire jorydy pemegamode ei . Pameartoruwo ji . Pameartorumode ji dykeje Pagimijera Jesus Cristo umode paewodudo pugeje paragojewo Pao Kurirewy apo jii toro rugadu.

6 1 Ainore parore . Marigudu paro pegare mare maigody aino pameartorure Pao Kurireuji . Dykodire biagodyre paro pegarewy boe piji . Ia boe emeardae pegare . Egore : Paro pega kurimode Pao Kurirewy biagodymode paro pegarewy piji rugadu . Dukodi care paro pegawo rugadu pawo Pao Kurirewy ro pemegado pai rugadu . Ainore egore . Mare iwo tawie boe remawuji . Pamodukare pagaora mekido nowy boe emeardae pegarewy rekodaji . Pawo pagera ra paro pegarewy piji rugadu . Bireuge emeardaekare turo pegawo pugeje . Pare nono bireuge emogadure . Mare bireuge ei karega inagoino . Pawo pawia ra paro pegarewy piji . Du jire inagoino . 3 Pameartorure Jesus Cristoji Dykodire ure Tuwari maku pagai . Ainore rore pai tuwo pado nono bireuge emogadure . Dykodire pawire nono Jesus bi mogadure . Mare pawi ji karega inagoino . Pare pagera ra paro pegarewy piji . Du jire inagoino . Dykodire meartorure Jesus jiwyge pagi paiamedy boe pamode paremo poboto pagao pegododywo pawo boe erduwado Pao Kurirewy Uwari rore aino pai duji . Pameartorure Jesus Cristoji Dykodire ure Tuwari maku pagai . Ainore rore pai tuwo pado nono jewodureuge emogadure jamedy . Dykodire paewodure nono Jesus jewodumogadure rugadu . Mare paewodu ji karega inagoino . Pao Kurirewy ure pardae pameardae udo tuginai paro pemegawo , paro pegakawo pugeje . Du jire inagoino . Dykodire meartorure Jesus jiwyge pagi paiamedy boe pagao pegododyre dykeje pamode padawyje pobo piji jamedy pawo boe erduwado Pao Kurirewy Uwari rore aino pai dyji jamedy . Pao Kurirewy ure Jesus jewodudo turaga pemegarewy tabo . Nono Pao Kurirewy umode turaga maku meartorure puduiwyge eiamedy boe etai tuwo erdae emeardae udo tuginai . Nono ewo tugera ra turo pegarewy piji , ero pemegawo , emugu pemegawo pudabo . 5 Pamediare Jesusce rugadu pamearydy kurire ji rugadu Dykodire paromode nono Jesus ro mogadure rugadu . Emare bire . Pagi pare nono bireuge emogadure jamedy . Mare pawi ji karega inagoino . Pawo pawia ra pameardae pegarewy piji paro pegakawo pugeje . Dujire inagoino . Nono Jesus umode paewodudo pugeje jamedy pamuguwo pudabo dubagai . Emare jewodure pugeje . Nono paewodumode pugeje nono Jesus jewodu mogadure jamedy . 6 Jesus Cristo bire ipo padure pugajejewu keje paro pegarewy morice , pameardae pegarewy morice . nowy inodu kodi pameartorumode Jesusji . Nono pameardae pegarewy akedymode nono birewy mogadure . Aino pameartorure Jesusji dukodi ure tumeardae pemegarewy maku pagai rugadu pameardaece pawiapagakawo nowy pameardae pegareuji pugeje nowy pameardae pegarewy ukawo tuiodo pawugeje pugeje . Pamode pagamudo nowy pameardae pegarewy piji . 7 Pawimode dykeje pamode pagamudo paro pegarewy piji . 8 ca pameartorure Jesus Cristoji Dykodire pare nono bireuge emogadure . Mare pawi ji karega inagoino . Pawiapagamodukare pameardae pegareuji pugeje paro pegakawo pugeje . Dujire inagoino . Dykodire parduware umode paewodudo pugeje dyji pamuguwo pudabo toro baru tada . 9 Pao Kurirewy ure Jesus jewodudo pugeje rugadu . Nono bimodukare pugeje rugadu . Jesus rakare rugadu Dykodire bimodukare pugeje . 10 Bire boe ero pegarewy morice . Dykodire boe ero pegarewy raka kodukare Jesus rore jiboe kori pugeje . Emare raka kodure boe ero pegarewy piji toro rugadu . Aino Jesus mugu pemegare Pao Kurirewy apo . 11 Tarodo nono Jesus ro mogadure . Tawiapagakaba tameardae pegareuji pugeje nono bireuge ewiapaga modukare boe pegarewy jitu mogadure . Mare tameartorudo Jesus Cristoji tawo tamediado ema . Ainore taromode tawo tamugu pemegado Pao Kurirewy apo . Jesus ure taginorudo tamugu pemegawo Pao Kurirewy apo . 12 Boe ewodure tumeardae pegarewy tabo jii toro tuwimode du ka . Boe emearydy kurimode nowy tumeardae pegareuji dykeje nowy ero pegarewy kodumode toro tugori rugadu . Marigudu tawiapagare tameardae pegareuji jamedy . Tarokaba aino pugeje . Tawiapagakaba tameardae pegareuji tameartorukawo ji rugadu . 13 Taro pegakaba tagera tabo , taeku tabo , tawadary tabo jamedy . Taeku kidukaba ro pegareuji meardae pegarewy ukawo turemo tagaorato . Taipagakaba mako pegareuge ewadary ji ewadary pegarewy ukawo turemo tagaorato . Mare tameartorudo Pao Kurireuji utugaregewo tagi . Marigudu taro pegare Dykodire tare nono bireuge emogadure . Mare taro pegamodukare pugeje dykeje tamode nono jewodureuge emogadure . Dykodire tameartorudo Pao Kurireuji rugadu taro pemegawo . Tameardaewo nono Pao Kurirewy meardaere . 14 Judeu doge eno bakaru ukare taro pegarewy barigu tabiji . Marigudu tameartorure nowy Judeu doge eno bakaruji mare du inodu tabo tameardaere tu taro pegawo rugadu tu tyje . Dykodire inagoino tai tameartoruwo Jesusji . Aino care tameartorure Jesusji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ro pemegare tai tuwo taro pegarewy barigu tabiji . Ro pemegare tai tuwo taraga maku tagai taro pegakawo pugeje . 15 ca . Parduware nowy Judeu doge eno bakaru umodukare paro pegarewy barigu pabiji dyji rugadu . Dykodire pagare pagimijerado nowy Judeu doge eno bakaruce . Mare nuba paromode ? Paro pegamokana ? Boro . Paro pegamodukare . Pao Kurirewy ro pemegare boei Dykodire pameartoruwo ji pagaidu tabo rugadu . 16 Tarduware . Boe emode tugerago ia boei tagimijerace dykeje boe emeartorumode tu ji rugadu batary ji jamedy . Dykodire utugarege mode emage rugadu . ca . Tameardae tawyje nuba taromode . Tawiapagamode tameardae pegareuji nono umode tuiodo tawugeje rugadu taro pegawo . Nono taro pegamode rugadu . Dykodire tawarigudumode boe pegareuto rugadu tawi keje . Mare Pao Kurirewy utugarege mode tagi nono tameartorudo tu ji rugadu . Tawiapagamodukare nowy tameardae pegareuji pugeje . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy umode tamugu pemegado pudabo . 17 Pao Kurirewy pemegare rugadu ! Ikimadure apo rugadu ! Mare paga karega . Marigudu taiamedy boe taroiwakare tawo tagera ra nowy taro pegarewy piji . Mare boe ere tarduwado Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Dykodire tameartorure ji tameardae jamedy boe tabo . 18 Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure taginorudo taro pegarewy piji taro pemegawo . Utugaregenure tagi taro pemegawo rugadu . 19 Inure tawie Pao Kurirewy meardaere jiboeji . Mare inure tawie tawadary ure aino dyji tarduwawo imagore jiboeji . Marigudu tameardaere tu taro pegawo . Marigudu tagaidure tu tameardae pegawo tawo taro pegarewy kurido tagori . Mare aino ca tawiapagado tameardae pemegareuji taro pemegawo rugadu . Aino ca tameartorudo tu Pao Kurirewy makore jiboeji tameardae pemegawo , taro pemegawo , tarore jiboe uwo tuginai meartorukare Pao Kurirewy jiwyge ero piji . 20 Marigudu tameardaere tu taro pegawo . Tameardaekare taro pemegawo . 21 Mare iwo tawie nuba nowy taro pegarewy rore tai duji . Ure boe pegado tai rugadu . Umode tawarigu boe pegareuto tawi keje rugadu . Mare aino ca tabogurure nowy taro pegare jiboeji rugadu . 22 Aino care Pao Kurirewy ure taginorudo nowy taro pegare jiboe piji . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy utugaregenure tagi . Mare paga karega . Tare tameartorudo tu Pao Kurireuji tu rugadu . Dykodire tarore jiboe ure tuginai meartorukare Pao Kurirewy jiwyge ero piji . Tarore jiboe ure tuginai ero piji rugadu . Nono ca Pao Kurirewy umode taewodudo pugeje Dykodire tamugumode apo . Du akedymodukare . 23 Boe ero pegarewy morire . Boe ewarigudumode boe pegareuto ewi keje turo pegarewy morice rugadu . Mare Pao Kurirewy umode meartorure Jesus jiwyge ekinorudo taidu tabo . Makomode ei ekawo turo pegarewy morido pudai . Taidu tabore umode ewodudo pugeje emugu pemegawo pudabo jii toro rugadu . Ewimodukare pugeje . Mare paga karega boe emeartorumode Pagimijera Kurirewy Jesus Cristoji kodire romode aino boei rugadu.

7 1 Imedagenure tagi Dykodire iwo tawie . Boe emeartorumode tugimijeragei emagore jiboeji jii toro tuwi ka rugadu . Boe ewi keje boe ere tamudo nowy boe eimijerage eno bakaru piji . Taiamedy boe tarduware awu inagoino jiboeji . 2 Aino inure tarduwado . Aredy okogemode dukeje . Boe eno bakaru koiare aredy meartorumode toredyji . Mare oredy bimode dykeje aredy okoge bokwamode pugeje . Toro ia meri keje aidumode tumuguwo ia imedyapo pugeje . Du pegakare . 3 Mare oredy bikare raga dykeje ukare turugadu aredy jeribariwo ia imedy metuiaji . Jeribarimode toredy piji dykeje boe emago pegamode ji . Egomode aredy pegareudo nuie ema . Mugu kiorokare toredapo . Mare oredy bimode nono aredy okoge bokware pugeje . Toro ia meri keje aredy aidumode tumuguwo ia imedapo pugeje . Du pegakare . Ainore boe erore . 4 Marigudu parore pagaidure jiwu paro pegareuji . Parduware Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaruji . nowy bakaru ure pawie paro pemegawo . Mare pameardae pegarewy ure tuiodo pawugeje pameartorukawo nowy bakaruji . Pagaidure pawiapagawo tu paro pegareuji . Dykodire paro pegare tu tyje . Paro pegarewy koiare umode pardudo boe pegareuji Dykodire pawimode rugadu . Mare aino pameartorure Jesusji Dykodire pare nono bireuge emogadure pugeje . Mare birewy ji karega inagoino . Pameardaemodukare paro pegareuji pugeje . Dujire inagoino . Dykodire pare pawia ra paro pegarewy piji . Pameardaekare paro pegawo pugeje . Paro pegarewy metumodukare padada pugeje . Pameartorure Jesusji . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaru akedyre paegai . Imedagenure tagi . Tare nono bireuge emogadure . Mare tawi ji karega inagoino . Jesus bire tamugato tawo tagera ra taro pegarewy piji . Dujire inagoino . Jesus Cristo ure tumedagedo tagi . Dykodire tare nono Jesus mogadure . Emare bire Dykodire tare nono bireuge emogadure . Mare Jesus jewodure pugeje . Dykodire pameartorure tu Jesusji . Pameartorumodukare mariguduwu parore jiboeji pugeje . Pare pagamudo nowy mariguduwu nowy boe eno bakaru boe piji . Aino pameartorure Pao Kurirewy o bakaru maiwuji . nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure nowy bakaru maiwu maku pagai Dykodire pameartorure ji rugadu . 7 Tameardae pegakaba Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaruji . nowy bakaru koiare ure boe erduwado turo pegareuji . nowy bakaru akore : Taebogodykaba tamedage enoeji . Pao Kurirewy makomodukare aino nowy boei dykeje boe erduwamodukare tueibogodyre tumedage enoeji pudai dyji pegare Pao Kurirewy jakai duji . Erduwamodukare ia turo pegareuji . 8 Mare nowy bakaru ure boe erduwado boe ero pegareuji . Dykodire boe erduware . Mare tu emeardae pegarewy koiare ure nowy boe emeartoru bokwado nowy bakaruji . Erduware nowy bakaruji mare du inodu tabo ere tumeartoru bokwado ji . Boe erduwamodukare nowy bakaruji nono boe erduwamodukare turo pegarewy bagai . 9 Marigudu iorydywakare Pao Kurirewy o bakaruji . Dykodire iwiagorokare boeji . Mare iorydyware Pao Kurirewy o bakaruji dykeje Pao Kurirewy batary ure iorydywado iro pegareuji rugadu . Du inodu tabo imeartorukare ji . Itaidure iro pegawo pugeje . 10 Dykodire iorydyware iwarigudumode bope doge eda pegareuto rugadu iwi keje iro pegarewy morice . Imeartorumode Pao Kurirewy o bakaru jamedy boeji dykeje iwarigudumodukare bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto iwi keje . Mare imeartorukare ji Dykodire iro pegarewy moridodymode . 11 Iro pegarewy ure iekiripagado . Iorydyware Pao Kurirewy o bakaruji . Mare iro pegarewy ure imeartoru bokwado ji . Iro pegarewy ure ido nono birewy mogadure . Mare iwi ji karega inagoino . Iwarigudumode bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto iwi keje . Du jire inagoino . 12 Pao Kurirewy ure nowy tuwadary maku Judeu doge etai eno bakaruce . nowy bakaru pegakare . Pemegare . Umode boe erduwado boe ero pegareuji boe ero pemegareuji jamedy . Boe emeartorumode ji dykeje ero pegamodukare . 13 Imeartorumodukare ji dykeje iwimode . Pao Kurirewy o bakaru koia karega umode iwido . Iro pegarewy koiare umode iwido . Mare Pao Kurirewy o bakaru ure iorydywado iro pegareuji . Ure iorydywado iwarigudumode bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto iwi keje iro pegarewy boe morice rugadu . 14 Pao Kurirewy o bakaru ure turugadu . Marigudu bimodurewunure imi . Iragakare iwo ikera ra iro pegarewy piji . Imeardae pegarewy ure tuiodo iwugeje toro boe pegarewy ka rugadu . Ikimijerare ema rugadu . 15 Iorydywakare irore jiboeji . Itaidure iro pemegawo . Mare nowy iro pegarewy kare iragado iro pemegawo . Itaidukare iro pegawo mare irore itaidukare jiwu iro pegareuji . 16 Boe jokodu jire Pao Kurirewy o bakaru akoino pai . Pagaidukare paro pegawo mare ro pegareugenure pagi . 17 Mare paga karega . Pameardae pegarewy ure paro pegado tu tyje . Pagaidure paro pemegawo mare pameardae pegarewy koiare ure paro pegado . 18 Ro pegarewynure imi rugadu . Itaidure iro pemegawo mare iragakare iro pemegawo ro pegarewynure imi rugadu . 19 Irokare itaidure jiwu iro pemegareuji . Mare irore itaidukare jiwu iro pegareuji . 20 Iromode itaidukare jiwu irore jiboeji dykeje iorydywamode imeardae pegarewy jiboeji . Imi karega . Mare meture itadawu imeardae pegarewy koiare ure irodo aino . 21 Itaidure iro pemegawo . Mare imeardae pegarewy meture itada . Dykodire iragakare iro pemegawo . Dykodire iro pegare rugadu . 22 Itadare imeardaere imeartoruwo Pao Kurirewy o bakaruji itaidure ji kodi . 23 Mare itadare ia imeardae pegarewy meture jamedy iwo imeartoru bokwado nowy Pao Kurirewy bakaruji . Imeardae pemegarewy meture itada jamedy . Mare imeardae pegarewy kodure imeardae pemegarewy kori . Dykodire iroiwakare iwo ikinorudo imeardae pegarewy piji . 24 Ainore ire rugadu . Itaidure Pao Kurirewy o bakaruji . Mare ire mitotyje dutabo iroiwakare imeartoruwo ji . Imeardae pegarewy ure tuiodo iwugeje iro pegawo tu tyje . Dykodire ikiarigodyre rugadu . Iwarigudumode bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto iwi keje nowy imeardae pegarewy morice rugadu . Mare iorydyware umode ikinorudowuji . Jesus Cristo umode ikinorudo rugadu . Pagimijeranure ema . Dykodire ikimadure Pao Kurirewy apo tu tyje . Imodukare ikera ra ikimadure Pao Kurirewy apo dupiji tu tyje rugadu.

8 1 Meartorure Jesus Cristo jiwyge emugu pemegare Jesus apo rugadu . Dykodire Jesus mako pegamodukare ei . Umodukare ewarigu boe pegareuto . 2 Marigudu paro pegarewy koiare ure pamugu jaedo Pao Kurirewy piji . Mare pameartorure Jesusji Dykodire ure Pao Kurirewy Uwari maku pagai tuwo pamugu pemegado Jesus Cristo apo . Pamugu jaemode Pao Kurirewy piji dukodi pawi keje pawarigudumode toro nowy bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure Tuwari maku pagai pameartoruwo pudui tuwo paginorudo padukawo nowy bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto pamugu pemegawo Pao Kurirewy apo rugadu . Pao Kurirewy ure Tuwari maku pagai tuwo paginorudo paro pegarewy piji paro pemegawo . 3 Pao Kurirewy makore boei marigudu ero pemegawo , ewo tugera ra turo pegarewy piji . Ure nowy tuwadary maku Judeu doge etai eno bakaruce emeartoruwo ji . Mare boe eroiwakare tumeartoruwo nowy bakaruji . Eragakare tuwo tugera ra turo pegarewy piji . Aino care Pao Kurirewy umode boe eragado ewo tugera ra turo pegarewy piji . Marigudu akore boe ero pegarewy morie . Dykodire ure tonaregedy imedy rawyje moto ka . Ure nono boe emogadure . Mare ro pega bokware , ro pegamodukare boei jii toro . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy akore ema rugaduie bimode boe ero pegarewy morice emare ro pegarewy bokware kodi . 4 Ainore Pao Kurirewy rore tuwo boe ero pegarewy mori barigu boe epiji . Ure paginorudo nowy paro pegarewy piji paro pemegawo Pao Kurirewy ure maku boe etaiwu bakaruji . Pameartorumode Pao Kurirewy Uwariji dykeje paro pemegamode . Pameartorumodukare pameardae pegareuji pugeje . dykeje paro pemegamode rugadu . 5 Mare boe ewiapagamode tu tumeardae pegareuji dykeje eroiwamodukare tuwo tuwia ra nowy tumeardae pegarewy piji . Mare boe emeartorumode Pao Kurirewy Uwari batary ji dykeje emodukare tuwia ra Pao Kurirewy Uwari piji . 6 Boe ewiapagamode tu tumeardae pegareuji dykeje ewarigudumode joru pegareuto ewi keje rugadu . Mare emeartorumode Pao Kurirewy Uwariji dykeje emugu pemegamode Pao Kurirewy apo . Emorora magadumodukare iaboeji pugeje tumeardae kuriwo Pao Kurireuji rugadu . 7 Mare boe ewiapagamode tu tumeardae pegareuji dykeje erdu pegamode Pao Kurireuji . Emeartorumodukare Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Eroiwamodukare tumeartoruwo ji rugadu . 8 Biapagare tumeardae pegarewy jiwyge emodukare Pao Kurirewy jakaredo pudui rugadu . 9 ca Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojere tagabo Dykodire tawiapagakaba tameardae pegareuji pugeje . Tameartorumode Pao Kurirewy Uwari batary ji rugadu . Mare Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojemodukare boebo dykeje Pao Kurirewy uwobe moka tagi . 10 Mare tameartorumode Jesus Cristoji dykeje mugu pemegamode tagabo . dykeje Uwari koiare umode tamugu pemegado Pao Kurirewy apo . Dykodire umode boe pemegado tai rugadu . Boe ero pegarewy koiare ure boe pegado awu motoji . Dykodire paiamedy boe pawimode . Meartorukare Jesus jiwyge ewimode . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge pagi pawimode jamedy . 11 Mare Pao Kurirewy ure Jesus jewodudo pugeje . Pameartorure Jesusji kodire Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojere pagabo . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy umode Tuwari udo paewodudo pugeje jamedy nono turo moga Jesus jitu mogadure . Dykodire pawarigudumodukare bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto paragojewo Pao Kurirewy apo . 12 Dykodire Pao Kurirewy utugaregenure pagi . Pawo pagera ra pameardae pegarewy piji rugadu pawiapagakawo ji pugeje . 13 Pawiapagamode pameardae pegareuji dykeje pawarigudumode bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto rugadu pawi keje . Mare Pao Kurirewy Uwari raka tabore pamode pagera ra paro pegarewy piji dykeje pamugu pemegamode Pao Kurirewy apo jii toro rugadu . Du akedymodukare rugadu . 14 Meartorure Pao Kurirewy Uwari jiwyge Pao Kurirewy orenure emage . 15 nowy Pao Kurirewy ure maku tagaiwu Uwari umodukare tabagududo . Umodukare boe emeardae pegarewy utugaregedo tagi . Mare umode Pao Kurirewy oredo tagi . Pao Kurirewy Uwari romode aino tai dykeje tamagomode Pao Kurireuji . Tagagomode , Iogwa aino ji . 16 Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojemode pagabo Dykodire ure pawie Pao Kurirewy orenure pagi duji . 17 Pao Kurirewy orenure pagi Dykodire umode boe pemegareboe maku pagai rugadu . Umode boe pemegareboe maku tu tuwobe etai . Umodukare maku ia boe etai . Umode boe pemegareboe maku Jesus Cristo ai . Nono umode nowy tumode maku Jesus aiboe maku pagai jamedy . Boe pegamode pai nono boe pegare Jesus Cristo jitu mogadure . Dykejere Pao Kurirewy umode boe pemegado pai nono turo moga Jesus jitu mogadure jamedy . Ure Jesus ie kurido rugadu . Umode pagie kurido jamedy nono turo moga Jesus jitu mogadure . 18 Boe pegare pai rugadu . Mare jii toro karega . Ia meri keje Pao Kurirewy umode boe pemegado pai rugadu . Nono pameardaemodukare nowy boe pegare paidu ka pugeje . Toro ia meri keje Pao Kurirewy umode boe pemegado pai rugadu . 19 Awu moto kiarigodyre Pao Kurirewy bagai uwo tore remawyge ekinorudo . Nono boe eiamedy boe erduwamode Pao Kurirewy ore remawugei . 20 Jawu boe ero pegare Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure boe pegado motoji nowy boe ero pegarewy morice . Pao Kurirewy ro koiare ure boe pegado motoji . 21 Mare Pao Kurirewy makore motoji upagawo umode boe ekinorudowu bagai . Dykejere tumoduie moto udo cinorudo jamedy nono turo moga torei dumogadure . Dykejere awu moto akedymodukare pugeje . 22 Ji aino awu moto ako padure kajeje nono aredy ako moga tuguri jirigody korikoia dumogadure . 23 Tu moto karega . Pagi jamedy . Pagiarigodyre mare boe pegarewy boe koia . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure Tuwari maku meartorure Jesus jiwyge etai marigudu . Dykodire rakojere pagabo . Mare pabaganure Pao Kurirewy bagai kimo . Umode toredo pagi rugadu . Umode paginorudo rugadu . Pao Kurirewy ure paginorudo kodire pamodukare paro pegare jiboe morido pugeje . Dykodire pabagare Pao Kurirewy bagai paragojewo apo rugadu boe pemegawo pai rugadu . Pardukare ji raga . Pardumode Pao Kurireuji dykeje nono pabagamodukare bagai pugeje . 25 Mare pardukare ji raga . Dykodire pawuduguwo pai pabaga tabo bagai . 26 Rakakareugenure pagi . Mare pameartorure Jesusji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy Uwari aregodyre pagae turagojewo pagabo rugadu . Rakakareugenure pagi . Dykodire parduwakare kaibowu pawadary tabo ba pamagode baruto Pao Kurirewy bagai . Mare Pao Kurirewy Uwari makore Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto pabaru tabo parduwakare pamagowo jitu kodi . Makore jiboe ure tuginai pawadary piji tumago tabo Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto pabaru tabo rugadu . Kodire boe erduwamodukare akoino jiboeji . 27 Pao Kurirewy jorydyware pameardae jamedy boeji . Jorydyware Tuwari meardaeji jamedy . Uwari makore Pao Kurirewy bagai meartorure Pao Kurirewy jiwyge eparu tabo rugadu . nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari makore jiboe kodure Pao Kurirewy jordae meardae boeji rugadu . 28 Boe pegamode mearydy kurire Pao Kurirewy jiwugei mare du inodu tabo Pao Kurirewy umode boe pemegado ei rugadu . Marigudu Pao Kurirewy makore ewagai tumeardae tabo emearydy kuriwo pudui dubagai . 29 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy jorydyware turomode jiboeji . Dykodire ure tumeardae ta ia boei tuwo toredo emage tuwo edo nono tonaregedy Jesus mogadure . Mare Pao Kurirewy Onaregedy boetojiwunure Jesusce . Dykodire meartorure Pao Kurirewy jiwyge etumana remawunure ema . 30 Pao Kurirewy ure tumeardae ta nowy boei tuwo toredo emage . Dykodire makore ewagai . Nono ure tugerago nowy tumagore bagaiwugei pudae tuwo edo nono ro pemegareuge emogadure . Dykodire umode emugudo pudabo ewi keje . Dykodire boe pemegamode ei toro baru tada rugadu . 31 Pao Kurirewy ro pemegare pai aino rugadu . Dykodire pawiapagamodukare ia pameardae pegareuji pugeje . Pao Kurirewy batary remawu jire pawiapagamode tu rugadu . Pao Kurirewy umode turaga maku pagai dykeje iaboe eragamodukare pai rugadu . 32 Pao Kurirewy rugodymodukare pai . Mako pegamodukare pai . Emare ure tonaregedy maku rugadu paro pegarewy morice . Ure tonaregedy maku pagai Dykodire umode boe pemegarewy jamedy boe maku pagai rugadu . 33 Boe emago pegamodukare Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago jiwugei . Emago pegamode ei mare pagare egoino . Pao Kurirewy emare akoino nowy meartorure puduiwyge emodukaie turo pegare jiboe morido . 34 Dykodire boe emagomodukare Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago jiwyge emoduie turo pegare jiboe morido duji . Emagomode mare pagare egoino . Jesus bire mare jewodure pugeje . Dykejere ruture baruto turagojewo nono Pao Kurirewy ukana pemegarewy jagwai rugadu . Emare mako raire Pao Kurireuji pabaru tabo rugadu . 35 Jesus Cristo mearydy kurire pai rugadu . Nono boe emodukare Jesus Cristo mearydy kurire paidu akedydo . Boe rakamode pai mare Jesus Cristo mearydy kurire pai . Boe pegamode pai mare Jesus mearydy kurire pai . Boe emode boe pegado pai mare mearydy kurire pai kimo . Page bokwamode , pago diero akedymode , paedy puredymode boe pegareuji , paburedygodymode pawiwo mare Jesus mearydy kurire pai kimo . 36 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy batary padure bapera keje . Akore : Pameartorure Pao Kurireuji Dykodire boe etaidure tuwo pawido . Eromode pai nono turo moga ovelha dogei dumogadure tuwo pawido . 37 Boe jokodu jire inagoino . Jesus Cristo mearydy kurire pai rugadu . Dykodire ure paragado pameardae pemegawo , paro pemegawo . Boe pegarewy keje , boe pemegarewy keje umode paragado pameardae pemegawo . 38 Boe emodukare Jesus udo tugera ra pabiji rugadu . Mearydy kurimode pai jii toro rugadu . Pawimode mare umodukare tugera ra pabiji . Pawimodukare mare umodukare tugera ra pabiji jamedy . Pao Kurirewy utugarege baru tadawyge emodukare Jesus udo tugera ra pabiji . Bope doge etuwaire emodukare Jesus udo tugera ra pabiji . Toro ia meri keje ia boe emodukare Jesus udo tugera ra pabiji jamedy . 39 Baru tadawyge eragakare tuwo Jesus udo tugera ra pabiji . Bireuge eda kejewyge eragakare tuwo Jesus udo tugera ra pabiji . Moto kejewyge eragakare tuwo Jesus udo tugera ra pabiji jamedy . Pagimijera kurirewynure ema rugadu . Pao Kurirewy mearydy kurimode meartorure Jesus Cristo jiwugei jii toro rugadu.

9 1 Imeartoru rakare Jesus Cristoji rugadu . Dykodire iwadrarodumodukare tawiagai . Pao Kurirewy Uwari koiare ure iordae imeardae udo turugadu . Dykodire iwadrarodu karugure tawiagai . Boe jokodu jire inagoino tawiagai rugadu . 2 Ikiarigody kuricigore iwobe Judeu doge ewagai emeartorukare Jesusji kodi . 3 Iwobenure emage . Mare emeartorukare Jesusji raga . Dykodire ikiarigodyre toro ewagai . Imeardaere etaidure tumeartoruwo Jesusji rugadu . Itaidure rugadu . Itaidure Pao Kurirewy ro pegawo i nowy iwobe emugato nowy iwobe emeartoruwo Jesus jitu bagai . Mare nowy inodu umodukare iwobe emeartorudo Jesusji rugadu . 4 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago Judeu dogei tuwobece emeartoruwo pudui dubagai . Ure toredo emage . Ure erdudo tuiorugu pemegareuji erduwawo turagojere pudabo duji . Ure tumeardae maku etai tu tyje . Makore ei . Akore : Tameartorumode imeardaeji dykeje imode boe pemegado tai rugadu . Ainore Pao Kurirewy makore ei tu tyje . Ure to bakaru maku etai eno bakaruwo ema emeartoruwo ji . Ere Pao Kurirewy uwai pemegado . Ere tubu jodo tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji tu tyje nowy bai ja tada . Pao Kurirewy makore turomode jiboeji ewiagai tu tyje . 5 Mariguduboe Judeu doge etuo mage boetojiwyge emeartorure Pao Kurireuji . Judeu doge epijire Jesus boture . Boe eiamedy boe ekimijera kurirewynure ema rugadu . Pao Kurirewynure ema rugadu . Boe emago pemegawo ji rugadu , jii toro rugadu . Ainore uwo rugadu ! 6 Pao Kurirewy batary jetumode pudui rugadu . Mare Judeu doge eiamedy karega emeartorure Pao Kurireuji . 7 Mariguduboe Judeu doge etuo Abraão ore eiamedy karega Pao Kurirewy orere emage . Pao Kurirewy makore Abraãoji . Akore : Akanaregedy Isaque pijire nowy imagore aiwu boe ewodumode . Emage care awobe remawyge emode emage rugadu . 8 Ainore Pao Kurirewy makore Abraãoji . Akore : Itaidure jiwu meri keje imode ikirimi awagai pugeje . Dykodire akoredyje Sara onaregedy imedy botumode . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore Abraãoji . nowy Abraão Sara etore bokware tugody maidutabo jii toro tubegagody ka rugadu . Epegagodyre dykeje Pao Kurirewy akore aino ei etore moduie rugadu . Nono nowy Pao Kurirewy makore jiboe jeture pudui rugadu . Pao Kurirewy koiare ure nowy Abraão Sara etonaregedy imedy botudo rugadu . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy uwobenure nowy imedy roguce . Abraão ure iedo Isaque . Nono Abraão orere pugeje mare Pao Kurirewy batary koia karega . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy uwobe karugure emage . Ewodure nono boe etore ewodu mogadure . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy uwobe karugure emage . 10 Ia pugeje . nowy Isaque ricodure nono jauboe Judeu doge etuo ure ema . Oredyje iere Rebeca . nowy Rebeca ore ere pobe kuri tada , emegunure . Ewodure puapo . Mare imere emage . 11 Boture boetojiwu iere Esaú . Boture boigodywu iere Jacó . Ewodukare raga dykeje karega Pao Kurirewy makore etujeji . Akore : Imeardae koiare imode Esaú meartorudo tuwie Jacoji . Ewodukare raga dykeje karega Pao Kurirewy akoino etujeji . Erokare boeji raga dykeje karega Pao Kurirewy akore aino etujeji . Dykodire parduware Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago uwieji turo pemegawo jitu bagai . Mare Pao Kurirewy meardae koiare ure udo aino rugadu . Makore nowy uwie bagai Dykodire ure tugerago ji turo pemegawo jitu bagai . Aiwokare ia ero pemegarewy bagai . Aiwokare ia ero pegarewy bagai jamedy . Pao Kurirewy tumeardae pemegarewy tabore ure tugerago ji aino . 13 Pao Kurirewy ure tuwadary bu bapera keje marigudu . Akore : Imearydy kurire Jacoji . Iorydy pegare Esauji . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore rugadu . 14 Mare du inodu tabo pamago pegamodukare Pao Kurireuji . Pao Kurirewy rore jiboe jamedy boe ure turugadu . Meardaere jiboe jamedy boe ure turugadu . 15 Marigudu makore Moiseji . Akore : Inogudumode itaidure jiwu apo . Imodukare udo turo pegare jiboe morido . 16 Dykodire paro pemegare mare dukodi karega Pao Kurirewy umode tugerago pai . Emare jorydywamode tumode tugerago jiwu boei . Okudugodymode ia boe dogebo dykeje umode tugerago ei . 17 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure tuwadary bu bapera keje . Makore Egito moto kejewy boe eimijera kurireuji . Akore : Ire boe eimijera kurireudo aki iwo boe erdudo iro rakareuji , iwo boe erduwado i moto jamedy boe parugajeje . 18 Ainore Pao Kurirewy meardaere rugadu . Umode tugerago boei dykeje okudugodymode ebo . Mare umode ia tugare tugerago jiwyge emeartoru bokwado pudui . 19 Ia boe enaramode i . Egomode : Pao Kurirewy koiare ure iage emeartoru bokwado pudui . Mare Pao Kurirewy akore emage eigoiaie emeartorukaie pudui . Kodiba Pao Kurirewy akore emage eigoiaie ? Ukare turugadu cegai . Pao Kurirewy koiare ure emeartoru bokwado pudui rugadu . Boe eragakare Pao Kurireuji . Ema ro rakare boe jamedy boeji rugadu . 20 Ainore iage egore . Mare imode tawie boe remawuji . Tamagokaba Pao Kurirewy batary jipagi . Boe emode ia pori towuje dykeje nowy pori makomodukare nowy ure nowy pori towujewuji : Kodiba are itowuje ? nowy pori akomodukare aino . 21 nowy maragodyre rotu jiwu imedy emare jorydyware kaboba tumode towuje nowy rotu tabo . Pori rabodu aria rabodu ruwobo rabodu . 22 Ainore Pao Kurirewy ure jamedy . Jorydyware nuba turomode boei . Korigodymode ia boei du pegakare . Umode erdudo tugera rakare pudui dyji du pegakare . Mare korigodykare ei kuri je . Mako raire ewagai ewo tugera ra turo pegarewy piji mare ekare tugera ra . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy korigodyre ei . Umode ewarigu toro boe pegareuto nowy ero pegarewy morice rugadu . 23 Ia boeire Pao Kurirewy aidure tuwo erdudo turo pemegareuji . Okudugodyre ebo rugadu . Okudugodyre pagabo jamedy . Ure pabemegado tuwo pardudo turo pemegareuji . 24 Makore bagaiwugenure pagi . Ia pagi Judeu dogenure pagi . Ia pagi boe tuginaiwugenure pagi . Pao Kurirewy makore pawagai pameartoruwo pudui rugadu . 25 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy makore tuwadary ji Oséias biagai . Oséias ure bu bapera keje . Akore : Iwobe karugure emage mare imagomode ewagai iwo iwobedo emage . Imearydy kurikare ei mare aino care imearydy kurimode ei . 26 Marigudu inagore ei : Iwobe karugure tagi . Mare ia meri keje imagomode nowy boe ewagai rugadu . Imode iwobedo emage rugadu . Pao Kurirewy oremode emage rugadu . 27 Isaías ure Pao Kurirewy batary bu bapera keje jamedy . Akore : Judeu doge emagamode nono pobo maerewy okwa kejewy kugaru mogadure . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure ekinorudougere enowaromode tyje . 28 Pao Kurirewy umode boe pegado jeture moto kejewyge eiamedy boei taci je ero pegarewy morice rugadu . 29 nowy Isaías akore : Pao Kurirewy rakare rugadu . Ure Sodoma ba kurirewy kejewyge eiamedy boe etagedydo . Ure Gomorra ba kurirewy kejewyge eiamedy boe etagedydo jamedy . Umode paiamedy boe pagagedydo jamedy mare ure ia pagi paginorudo . Pagowarore tyje . 30 Dykodire inagoino tai . Boe tuginaiwyge etaiwokare Pao Kurirewy bagai . Etaidukare tuwo turo jetorodo tuwo tumugu pemegado Pao Kurirewy apo . Mare aino emeartorure Jesusji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago ei pudae tuietu pemegawo ei rugadu . 31 Mare Pao Kurirewy uwobenure Judeu dogece . Judeu doge etaiwore ia bakaru bagai tumeartoruwo ji tuwo turo jetorodo tumugu pemegawo Pao Kurirewy apo . Mare erdukare ji . 32 Mare paga karega . Etaidukare tumeartoruwo tu Pao Kurireuji . Etaidure tuwo turo jetorodo tumeardae tabo rugadu . Dykodire erduwakare Pao Kurirewy ure maku pudaiwu toriji . Egore nowy tori pegaie kodire emeartorukare nowy toriji . Mare tori ji karega inagoino . Jesus jire inagoino . 33 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure nowy tuwadary bu bapera keje . Akore : Tagaiwodo . Ire ia tori bu Judeu doge eno moto keje . Boe ewure jetumode nowy toriji . nowy tori umode ewududo . Mare meartorure nowy tori jiwyge ekiarigodymodukare pugeje . Mare tori remawu ji karega Pao Kurirewy akoino . Jesus jire Pao Kurirewy akoino . Judeu doge emeartorukare Jesusji Dykodire boe pegare ei . Dujire akoino . Mare boe emeartorumode Jesusji dykeje ekiarigodymodukare pugeje . Dujire Pao Kurirewy akoino.

10 1 Imedagenure tagi . Mare iwiagoro raire iwobe Judeu doge ewagai . Itaidure Judeu doge eiamedy boe emeartoruwo Jesusji . Jesus uwo ekinorudo nowy ero pegarewy piji ekawo turo pegarewy morido ewarigudukawo nowy joru pegareuto . Dykodire imagore Pao Kurirewy bagai iwobe eparu tabo ji aino . 2 Iorydyware ei rugadu . Emeardaere tumeartoruie Pao Kurireuji mare paga . Emeardaere tumeartoruie Pao Kurireuji turaga tabo rugadu mare paga . Erduwakare Pao Kurirewy batary remawuji Dykodire emeartorukare Pao Kurireuji . 3 Pao Kurirewy umode tugerago meartorure Jesus jiwugei pudae tuietu pemegawo ei . Mare iwobe Judeu doge erduwakare nowy Pao Kurirewy meardaeji . Emagere emeardaere tuwo turo pemegado Pao Kurirewy jorydy pemegawo pudui . Mare awu emeardae ukare turugadu . Emeartorukare Pao Kurirewy meardaeji . Ero pemegamode mare dukodi karega Pao Kurirewy jorydy pemegamode ei . 4 Jesus Cristo ure Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaru akedydo . Mare paga karega boe emeartorumode Jesusji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy umode tugerago ei pudae tuietu pemegawo ei . 5 Marigudu Moisés ure Pao Kurirewy batary bu bapera keje . Emare akore boe emeartorumoduie Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaruji dykeje emugu pemegamoduie Pao Kurirewy apo . Akore : Boe emeartorumode nowy Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaruji dykeje boe emeartoruwo nowy bakaru jamedy boeji rugadu tumugu pemegawo Pao Kurirewy apo . 6 Mare boe eroiwakare tumeartoruwo nowy bakaru jamedy boeji rugadu . Dykodire Moisés ure ia Pao Kurirewy batary bu bapera keje jamedy . Makore boe emeartoruwo umode boe ekinorudowuji . Umode boe ekinorudowu umoduie boe emugu pemegado Pao Kurirewy apo . Moisés makore boei . Akore : Aroiwakare aruduwo baruto nowy umode boe ekinorudowu bagai mare amorora magadukaba . Boe erudure baruto mare dukodi karega erdumode nowy umode boe ekinorudowuji . 7 Aroiwakare awo arawyje bireuge eda ka nowy umode boe ekinorudowu bagai mare amorora magadukakaba . Boe ere turawyje toro bireuge eda ka dukodi karega erdumode nowy umode boe ekinorudowuji . 8 Mare padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Tamearydyre Pao Kurirewy batary ji Dykodire meture tagaora tada . Tawiagorore tawiabuture kuri Pao Kurirewy batary keje tameartoruwo ji rugadu . Tamagomode Pao Kurirewy batary ji nono boe emearydymode tamagore jiboeji rugadu . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore . ca awu batary jire ire boe ewie emeartoruwo Jesus jitu bagai rugadu . 9 Boe emode boe ewie ture tugerago Jesus jituji tuwo tugimijerado ema . Boe emeartorumode Pao Kurirewy ure Jesus jewodudo pugeje dyji rugadu . Dykodire Jesus umode ekinorudo rugadu ero pegarewy piji . Dykodire nowy boe emugu pemegamode Pao Kurirewy apo rugadu . 10 Mare paga karega pameartorumode Jesusji dykeje umode tugerago pai pudae tuietu pemegawo pai . Pagagomode pagimijera nuie ema dykeje Jesus umode paginorudo . Dykodire pamodukare paro pegarewy morido pugeje . 11 Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Meartorure Jesus jiwyge ekiarigodymodukare ia boe ewagai pugeje boe eimijera pemegarewynure ema rugadu . 12 Boe eiamedy boe eire akoino . Judeu doge eire akoino . Boe tuginaiwyge eire akoino jamedy . Ere nono pure . Boe eiamedy boe eimijeranure Pao Kurireuce . Boe emagomode Pao Kurirewy bagai dykeje umode tugera maku boe etai rugadu . 13 Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Boe emagomode Pagimijera bagai uwo tugera maku pudai dykeje umode boe ekinorudo rugadu . Emodukare turo pegarewy morido pugeje . 14 Mare boe etumodukare Jesus batary tabo boe etae nono nowy boe emearydymodukare Jesus jiboeji . Boe emearydymodukare Jesus batary ji nono emeartorumodukare Jesusji . Boe emeartorumodukare ji nono emagomodukare bagai uwo tugera maku pudai . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Boe etaregodymode ia boe etae tuwo erduwado Jesus batary pemegareuji du pegakare . Pemegare boei rugadu . 16 Mare ia boe etaidukare Jesus batary pemegareuji . Marigudu Isaías ure boe ewie Pao Kurirewy batary ji mare emeartorukare . Dykodire Isaías makore Pao Kurireuji . Akore : Boe emeartorukare nowy ire ewie jiwu awadary ji . 17 Dykodire inagoino . Boe ewo boe ewie Jesus Cristo makore jiboeji . Boe emearydymode nowy Pao Kurirewy batary ji dykeje erduwamode tumeartoruwo Jesusji rugadu . 18 Mare nowy meartorukare Jesus jiwyge Judeu doge emearydyre rugadu . Emearydyre Pao Kurirewy batary pemegareuji . Dujire nowy padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Makore iwadary jiwyge ere boe eiamedy boe ewie moto jamedy boe parugajeje . 19 Mare nowy meartorukare Jesus jiwyge Judeu doge erduware Pao Kurirewy batary ji mare emeartorukare ji . Moisés ure nowy Pao Kurirewy batary bu bapera keje . Pao Kurirewy akore : Imode ia boe tuginaiwyge emeartorudo i dykeje korimode iwobe Judeu dogei . Emeardaere tu puduie imearydy kurie . Mare imode ia jorydywa bokwarewy boe tuginaiwyge emeartorudo i rugadu . Dykodire iwobe Judeu doge ekorigodymode . Emeardaere tu pudumie tuiorydywaie i . 20 Isaías ure Pao Kurirewy batary bu bapera keje jamedy . Pao Kurirewy akore : Boe tuginaiwyge etaiwokare iwagai mare ire erdudo i . Emagokare iwagai mare itaregodyre etae . 21 Mare Israel kejewy Judeu doge eire Pao Kurirewy akore : Ire ikera bararedo ei rugadu ji je . Itaidure ikimaduwo ebo . Mare meartoru bokwareugenure emage . Araga bokwareugenure emage.

11 1 Mare Pao Kurirewy aidu kimore tuwobe Judeu dogei . Ukare ewarigu tubiji raga . Judeunure imi jamedy . Mariguduwyge Judeu doge etuonure Abraãoce . Du uwobenure imi jamedy . Mariguduwyge Judeu doge etumana Benjamim uwobenure imi . 2 Pao Kurirewy ukare tugera ra tuwobe Judeu doge epiji . Ure tugerago ei marigudu tuwo tuwobedo emage . Ukare moto to raga dykeje meardaere tuwo tugerago ei tuwo tuwobedo emage . Tarduware padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Marigudu Elias mako pegare tuwobe Judeu dogei Pao Kurirewy biagai . nowy Elias batary padure nowy bapera keje . 3 Elias akore : Ikimijeranure aki . Awu iwobe Judeu doge ere nowy makore awadary jiwyge ime eiamedy boe ewido . Awu iwobe Judeu doge ere kamo doge erugadu boe butudo . Boe ewo tapira naregedy kowu nowy kamo keje turo pegarewy morice . Mare ere kamo rugadu boe butudo . Imire ire mitotu boe eiageje imeartorure ai dutabo . Ia meartorure aiwu bokware . Dykodire awu Judeu doge etaidure tuwo iwido jamedy . 4 Mare Pao Kurirewy makore nowy Elias batary jipagi . Akore : Meartorure iwyge ime ere sete mil kimo . Ire ewiado nowy ro pegareuge epiji . nowy ime ekare tumago pemegado nowy egore Baal aino jiwu bope doge eimijeraji . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore . 5 Aino care boe aregodyre nowy Pao Kurirewy makore jiboe ka pugeje . nowy meartorure Pao Kurirewy jiwu Judeu doge enowarore tyje kimo . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago ei taidu tabo . 6 Okudugodyre ebo Dykodire ure tugerago ei . Pao Kurirewy aiwokare boei ero pemegarewy bagai . Aiwore ei . Okudugody kurire ebo rugadu . Dykodire mardae kare turo pegawo ei . 7 Mare Judeu doge erdukare taiwore bagai boeji . Mare nowy Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago jiwyge erdure ji . Mare enowarore tyje . nowy ia Judeu doge erdukare ji . Dykodire ere tudo nono bija bokwareuge emogadure . Pao Kurirewy makore ewagai mare ekare tumearydydo . 8 Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Pao Kurirewy ure etaora rakado erduwa bokwawo . Ure edo nono bija bokwareuge emogadure . Dykodire erduwakare Pao Kurireuji ji aino . Emearydykare Pao Kurirewy batary ji ji aino . 9 Davi ure Pao Kurirewy batary bu bapera keje jamedy . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore : Boe ere tumeardae tawyje tuwo tumeartorudo Pao Kurireuji mare pagatyje . Etaidunure tuwo boe ekiripagado tyje . Dykodire emode tuwadae tawyje tuiegarewo pudui turore jiboeji . Mare pagatu jere eroino egoino . Ero pegare kimo rugadu . Dukodi care tuiekiripagado nowy tuwadae keje . Dykodire erore puku nowy jorydy pegare eiwyge etaregodymode etae tuwo boe pegado ei nowy ewadae keje rugadu . Boe pegawo ei ero pegarewy morice . 10 Ewo nono joku bokwareuge emogadure . Boe rakamode ei rugadu nowy emeartorukare i du morice . 11 Judeu doge ero pegare mare etagedykare . Ero pegare Dykodire Pao Kurirewy uture boe tuginaiwyge etae tuwo ekinorudo . Ainore rore tuwo Judeu doge erdupegado boe tuginaiwugei . Dykodire Judeu doge emode tugera ra turo pegarewy piji tumeartoruwo Jesusji jamedy . 12 Judeu doge ero pegare mare boe pemegare boe tuginaiwugei moto jamedy boe parugajeje . Judeu doge emeartorukare Jesusji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure turo pemegado boe tuginaiwugei emeartoruwo Jesus jitu bagai . Mare Pao Kurirewy umode tugerago jiwu Judeu doge emeartorumode Jesusji jamedy toro ia meri keje . Dykejere boe pemegamode boe eiamedy boei rugadu . 13 Ia tagi boe tuginaiwugenure tagi . Pao Kurirewy ure itudo Jesus batary tabo boe tuginaiwyge etae . Dykodire imago pemegamode nowy batary ji nowy boe ewiagai tu tyje . 14 Nono iwobe Judeu doge erduwamode Pao Kurirewy batary aregodyre tagae duji . Dykodire ia nowy Judeu doge erdumode tameartorure Jesusji dukeje , eku kidumode taromode jiboeji nono etaidumode tumeartoruwo Jesusji jamedy . 15 Pao Kurirewy ure tugera ra epiji tumagowo boe tuginaiwyge ewagai dykeje Pao Kurirewy jorydy pegakare nowy boe tuginaiwugei pugeje . Jorydy pemegare ei . Mare umode tugera maku Judeu doge etai pugeje dykeje boe pemegamode ei rugadu . Emode nono jewodureuge emogadure . 16 Judeu doge ere boepa tadaboe kado dykeje ere to amirewy boetojiwu to . Dykejere ere nowy amirewy boetojiwu maku Pao Kurirewy ai . Ainore Judeu doge erore tumagowo to amirewy jamedy boe paru tabo Pao Kurirewy bagai . Judeu doge emagore awu tumaragodyre jiwu oliveira i uka paru tabo Pao Kurirewy bagai Pao Kurirewy uwo udo nono to mogadure . Ainore Judeu doge emagore mare emagonure nowy i rugadu paru tabo Pao Kurirewy bagai Pao Kurirewy ro pemegawo nowy oliveira i ukaji nowy oliveira i ricodu pemegawo . nowy meartorure Pao Kurirewy jiwyge Judeu doge boetojiwyge ere nono nowy i uka mogadure . Mare i uka ji karega inagoino . Judeu doge eiamedy boe ewodure nowy tuo mage Judeu doge boetojiwyge epiji . Dujire inagoino . Pao Kurirewy makore Judeu dogei emeartoruwo pudui rugadu nono nowy etuo mage ero mogadure . Dujire inagoino . 17 Boe emaragodymode oliveira i tugudureuji . Ere nowy ia itura pegarewy kado oliveira i tugudurewy piji . Meartorukare Pao Kurirewy jiwyge Judeu doge ere nono nowy boe ere kadowu itura mogadure . Mare oliveira itura ji karega inagoino . Pao Kurirewy ure tugera ra nowy meartorukare puduiwyge Judeu doge epiji . Dujire inagoino . Boe ere ia itura pegarewy kado oliveira i tugudurewy piji dykejere etaregodyre oliveira i itura tadawu itura tabo tuwo tugu nowy oliveira i tugudureuto nowy itura kadodyrewy mugato . Dykodire ere itura mekudo nowy ture kadowu mugato . Boe tuginaiwugenure tagi . Tare nono nowy ere mekudowu itura mogadure . Mare oliveira itura ji karega inagoino . Tameartorure Jesusji Dykodire ure tuwobedo tagi . Dujire inagoino . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ro pemegare tai nono turo moga tuwobe mariguduwyge Judeu doge etuo magei dumogadure . 18 nowy mariguduwyge Judeu doge etuo mage ere nono i uka kurirewy mogadure . Mare i uka ji karega inagoino . nowy mariguduwyge Judeu doge etuo mage emeartorure Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Du jire inagoino . Dykodire tardu pegakaba Judeu dogei . Tagojarokaba tai . Tagare nono i uka kurirewy mogadure . Tare nono nowy boe tadawu itura mogadure . Mare itura ji karega inagoino . Tagire boe tuginaiwugenure tagi . Dujire inagoino . Tameartorudo Pao Kurireuji rugadu nono nowy mariguduwu Judeu doge etuo mage ero mogadure . Dujire inagoino rugadu . 19 Tagagomode Pao Kurirewy uie Judeu doge ewarigu tubiji tuwo tamugudo emugato . 20 Boe jokodu jire tagagoino . Mare tagojarokaba tai . Emeartorukare Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure ewarigu tubiji . Tameartorure Dykodire ukare tawarigu tubiji jamedy . Mare tagojarokaba tai . Tameartorudo Pao Kurireuji rugadu . 21 Judeu doge ere nono oliveira itura kadodyrewy mogadure . Mare nowy itura ji karega inagoino . Pao Kurirewy ure Judeu doge ewarigu tubiji . Dujire inagoino . Tameartorumodukare Pao Kurireuji pugeje dykeje umode tawarigu tubiji jamedy . 22 Aino care parduware Pao Kurirewy ro pemegareuji rugadu . Mare Pao Kurirewy ro pegamode boei ero pegarewy morice jamedy . Ro pegamode meartorukare puduiwugei . Mare tamodukare tagera ra tameartorure Pao Kurirewy jitu piji dykeje ro pemegamode tai . Mare tamode tagera ra tameartorure Pao Kurirewy jitu piji dykeje umode tawarigu tubiji rugadu . 23 Nono Judeu doge emode tugera ra tumeartoru bokwa Pao Kurirewy jitu piji tumeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji rugadu dykeje Pao Kurirewy umode ekirimi pudae pugeje emugu pemegawo pudabo . Pao Kurirewy ro kurire ei rugadu . 24 Boe tuginaiwugenure tagi . Tare nono oliveira i itura tadawu itura mogadure . Mare itura ji karega inagoino . Mariguduwyge tawobe emeartorukare Pao Kurireuji . Dujire inagoino . Boe emodukare itura tadawu oliveira i itura tugu nowy oliveira i tugudurewy itura kadodyrewy mugato . Tare nono nowy itura tadawu itura mogadure . Mare itura ji karega inagoino . Tameartorure Pao Kurireuji . Pao Kurirewy ure tamugudo Judeu doge emugato turo pemegawo tai . Dujire inagoino . Judeu doge ere nono oliveira i tugudurewy mogadure . Mare oliveira i ji karega inagoino . Mariguduwu Judeu doge emeartorure Pao Kurireuji . Dujire inagoino . Aino Judeu doge emeartorukare ji pugeje . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure ewarigu tubiji . Mare Pao Kurirewy jorydyware tuwo Judeu doge emeartorudo pudui pugeje . Dykodire toro ia meri keje boemode turugadu Judeu dogei emeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji pugeje . 25 Imedagenure tagi . Imode tawie ia boe erduwakare jiwu Pao Kurirewy batary remawuji . Itaidure iwo tarduwado tardu pegakawo Judeu dogei . Inure tawie boe remawuji tagojarokawo tai pugeje . Judeu doge emeartoru bokware Jesusji . Mare boe tuginaiwyge tagi tameartorure ji . Ia boe tuginaiwyge emeartorumode ji jii toro . Nono iage emeartorumode ji pugeje . Pao Kurirewy jorydyware nowy meartorumode Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boei . nowy boe tuginaiwyge emeartorure Jesus jiwyge etaregodymode nowy todo pa ka dukeje , toro ia meri keje Pao Kurirewy umode tugerago Judeu dogei pugeje emeartoruwo pudui . 26 Dykodire Pao Kurirewy umode Judeu doge eiamedy boe ekinorudo . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Umode boe ekinorudowu aregodymode Judeu doge eno moto ka . Nonore umode Jacó uwobe Judeu doge ero pegarewy jamedy boe barigu epiji . 27 Pao Kurirewynure imi . Imode iro maiwu maku etai dykejere imode ero pegarewy jamedy boe barigu epiji . 28 Judeu doge emeartorukare Jesus batary pemegareuji Dykodire ere nono Pao Kurirewy jorydy pegare jiwyge emogadure mare jii toro karega . Pao Kurirewy ure turo pemegarewy mekido epiji tu jao turo pemegawo boe tuginaiwugei emeartoruwo pudui jamedy . Mare marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago jauboe Judeu doge etuo magei tuwobewo emge . Dykodire ure nowy mariguduwu Judeu doge edo nono tumearydy kurire jiwu tumedage emogadure . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy okudugodymode Judeu dogebo toro ia meri keje pugeje . 29 Pao Kurirewy umodukare tumeardae mekido tumode tugerago jiwyge epiji , turo pemegamode jiwyge epiji . 30 Mare boe tuginaiwugenure tagi . Marigudu tawobe boe tuginaiwyge emeartorukare Pao Kurireuji . Mariguduwyge Judeu doge emeartorure Pao Kurireuji . Awu maiwuboe Judeu doge emeartorukare ji . Dukodi care Pao Kurirewy ure turo pemegarewy mekido nowy Judeu doge epiji jao . Kodire okudugodyre boe tuginaiwugebo tuwo emeartorudo pudui . Dykodire tameartorure ji . Boe tuginaiwugenure tagi . 31 Nono toro ia meri keje Pao Kurirewy romode Judeu dogei nono turo moga tai dumogadure . Judeu doge emeartorukare Pao Kurireuji nono mariguduwu tawobe ero mogadure . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy okudugodyre tagabo . Mare Pao Kurirewy okudugodymode Judeu dogebo jamedy nono turo moga tai dumogadure . 32 Boe eiamedy boe emeartorukare Pao Kurirewy batary ji marigudu . Pao Kurirewy ukare etawyje nowy tumeardae pegarewy piji kuri je tuwo erduwado turo pegarewy jituji . Umode ekinorudo ero pegarewy piji dykeje erduwamode Pao Kurirewy okudugody kurire pudabo dyji rugadu . 33 care Pao Kurirewy ro kurire . Jorydywa kurire . Roiware rugadu . Boe etaregodymodukare Pao Kurirewy jorydyware jiboe oto pa ka . 34 Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Boe erduwakare Pao Kurirewy meardaeji . Boe enogituwamodukare Pao Kurireuji . 35 Boe emode iaboe maku Pao Kurirewy ai mare ewiapagamodukare mori bagai tuibagi . 36 Pao Kurirewy ure boe jamedy boe towuje . Pudaire ure nowy boe jamedy boe towuje . Kodire boe epagamodukare ture maku Pao Kurirewy aiboe mori bagai tuibagi . Pao Kurirewy koiare ure boe jamedy boe udo turugadu . Dykodire pamago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji jii toro . Uwo aino rugadu.

12 1 Imedagenure tagi . Pao Kurirewy okudugodyre pagabo . Dykodire inogituwamode tai . Tameartorudo Pao Kurireuji rugadu utugaregewo tagi rugadu . Tagera ra tagaidure jiboe piji tameardae piji taro jamedy boe piji . Pao Kurirewy makore jiboe jire taipagado tu rugadu jii toro rugadu . Tagaidudo tu Pao Kurireuji Dykodire jakaremode tai . Taromode awu inagoino jiboeji dykeje Pao Kurirewy ie kurimode rugadu . Ainore boe eromode tuwo tubu jodo tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . Mare ebo jowo ji karega inagoino . Boe emeartoru remawumode Pao Kurireuji dykeje Pao Kurirewy jakaremode pudui ei . Du jire inagoino . 2 Tarokaba nono meartorukare Jesus jiwyge ero mogadure . Tameardaekaba nono meartorukare Jesus jiwyge emeardae mogadure . Mare tamagodo Pao Kurirewy bagai uwo tameardae pemegado , uwo tumeardae maku tagai tameardaece . Dykejere tarduwamode Pao Kurirewy meardaeji . Tameartorumode Pao Kurirewy meardaeji dykeje taro pemegamode , taromode Pao Kurirewy aidure jiboeji , tamode Pao Kurirewy jakaredo pudui rugadu . 3 Pao Kurirewy aidure turo pemegawo i Dykodire ure tuwadary maku inai . Dykodire inogituwanure aino tai . Tagojarokaba tai , tarore jiboeji , tameardareji jamedy . ca tagaiwodo taroji rugadu taro pegarewy bagai taro pemegarewy bagai jamedy . Pao Kurirewy ure tameartorudo pudui . Tameartorumode ji rugadu dykeje tarduwamode taro pegareuji taro pemegareuji jamedy . 4 Paganare pabogorare . Pagana rore jiboe ure tuginai . Pabogora rore jiboe ure tuginai jamedy . Mare pagana pabogora emodukare tudawyje pabiji pamorora piji pagaora piji . Kodire pagana pabogora jeture tu pado rugadu . 5 Meartorure Jesus jiwyge pagi pare nono pagana pabogora mogadure . Mare pagana pabogora ji karega inagoino . Pao Kurirewy ure parduwado parore jiboeji . Du jire inagoino . Mare ure iorydywado jiboe ure tuginai nowy ure tarduwado jiboe piji . Ure ia tagi tarduwado jiboe udo tuginai nowy ia tagi ure tarduwado jiboe piji jamedy . Ure parduwado jiboe udo tuginai cai cai pubiji . Kodire pabadure tu tu parduware jiboe keje . Mare pagare paginai Jesus Cristo piji . Pare nono umogadure . Pagare paginai ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge epiji jamedy kodire pardu pemegamode ei . Kodire padu pemegamode puapo rugadu . 6 Pao Kurirewy emare ure tuiordae pemegarewy maku tu tu pagai tuwo tumaragodae maku pagai pamaragodaece . Ure nowy ture maku pagaiwu pamaragodae udo tuginai tu tu paiamedy boe ai . Dykodire ia tagi ure tarduwado tamagowo Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Dukodi care tameartoru rakawo Pao Kurireuji rugadu tamagowo Pao Kurirewy batary ji boe ewiagai rugadu emeartoruwo Jesusji nono tameartoru mogadure . Ia tagi ure tarduwado tawo tagera maku boe etai . Dykodire care tagera maku boe etai rugadu tagaidu tabo . Ia tagi ure tarduwado tawo ia boe erduwado jamedy dubagai . Dukodi care tado tarugadu tawo boe erduwado rugadu . 8 Pao Kurirewy ure ia tagi tarduwado tawo boe ekiarigody barigu epiji rugadu . Dukodi care tado tarugadu tawo boe ekiarigody barigu epiji egaregodywo pudui rugadu . Boe emode toe pedo tumedagei dykeje ewo maku taidu tabo rugadu . Boe eimijerage emaragody pemegawo boebo taidu tabo rugadu . Boe emode tugera maku boe etai dykeje erowo aino tuiagare tabo . 9 Tamearydy kurido boei rugadu . Tagaba boe ekiripagado . Tardu pegado boe ero pegareuji . Tagaba tagera ra boe ero pemegarewy piji . 10 Tamearydy kurido pui rugadu nono boe etuwobe emearydy kurimode pui dumogadure . Ainore meartorure Jesus jiwyge erore . Tado tarugadu tagawo tagera ra tamearydy kurire pui du piji . 11 Tamaragody pemegado . Tawia ra nowy tagera kiarire dupiji .
