Tameartorudo Pagimijera Jesus batary ji taragaredy tabo rugadu . 12 Tabagado Jesus bagai taegare tabo . Boe pegamode tai mare tagorigodykaba . Taragado tai boere aino tai duji . Tamagodo baruto Pao Kurirewy bagai meri jamedy boeji . 13 Ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge enoe bokwamode dykeje ia akoe kado puiato etai . Tarduwakare jiwyge etaregodymode tawai ka dykeje edo tamudo tawai tada tagabo . 14 Ia boe ero pegamode tai mare tagokikaba ei . Mare tawadary pemegarewy bu ewugeje . Tamagodo baruto Pao Kurirewy bagai eparu tabo . Tamagodo Pao Kurireuji uwo tugera maku etai . 15 Boe egaregodymode pudui dykeje taegaredo tai nowy jakarere puduiwugebo . Boe etragudumode dykeje tagragududo ebo jamedy . 16 Taetu pemegado boe eiamedy boei nono taro moga tawobei dumogadure . Tagojarokaba tawadary ji . Tamaragodydo marenaru dogebo emaragodae rakareuji . Tamedagewo emage jamedy . Tameardaekaba tarduwaie boe jamedy boe jituji . 17 Boe ero pegamode tai mare taro pegakaba boei . Ero pegamode tai mare tagaba ero kirimi . Taragado tai taro pemegawo . Tarodo boe etaidure jiboeji . 18 Taro pemegado boe eiamedy boei taedy pemegawo ebo tagaidu tabo taegare tabo . 19 Imearydy kurire jiwu imedagenure tagi . Boe ero pegamode tai mare tagaba ro pegareuge ero kirimi . Pao Kurireure ro pegamode ei . Emare umode boe pegado ro pegareugei ero pegarewy boe morice . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Pao Kurirewynure imi . Imire imode boe pegado ro pegareugei ero pegarewy morice . 20 Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Jorydy pegare taiwyge eke boimode ei dykeje boe eke maku etai . Jorydy pegare taiwyge pobo boimode ei dykeje pobo maku etai . Taromode aino ei dykeje tamode epogurudo . Nono ewiabutumode turo pegarewy keje . 21 Taro pegakaba nono ro pegareuge emogadure . Tagaba ero kirimi . Mare nowy boe ero pegarewy morido taro pemegarewy tabo . dykeje emode tuwia ra nowy tumeardae pegarewy piji rugadu.

13 1 Boe ekimijerage eiamedy boe Pao Kurirewy koiare ure boe ekimijeragedo emage . Dykodire paiamedy boe pameartoruwo pagimijeragei . 2 Meartorukare tugimijera jiwu meartorukanure Pao Kurireuji jamedy . Boe emeartorumodukare tugimijeraji dukocare nowy ero pegarewy moridodymode etai rugadu . 3 Ro pegareuge epagudumode tugimijeragece rugadu . Mare ro pemegareuge epagudumodukare tugimijeragece . Taro pemegamode dykeje tabagudumodukare tagimijeragece pugeje . Taro pemegamode dykeje tagimijerage emago pemegamode tarore jiboeji . 4 Pao Kurirewy utugaregenure emage Dykodire emago pemegamode taro pemegareuji . Etaidure boe pemegawo tai . Mare taro pegamode dykeje tabagudumode ece rugadu . Eragare rugadu tuwo boe pegado boei ero pegarewy morice . Pao Kurirewy utugaregenure emage . Etaire Pao Kurirewy ure tumeardae maku ewo boe pegado boei ero pegarewy morice . 5 Dykodire tameartorudo boe ekimijeragei . Tameartorumode dykeje taro pegarewy bokwamode . Tamodukare taro pegarewy morido pugeje . Nono tawiagoromodukare taro pegawo pugeje . 6 Boe ekimijerage emaragody pemegamode dykeje emaragodyre Pao Kurirewy jordae meardaeji rugadu . Dykodire tamode tago imposto diero maku boe ekimijerage etai . 7 Boe ekimijerage emagomode boei ewo imposto diero maku pudai dykeje tamode ia maku etai rugadu . Tameartorudo boe ekimijeragei rugadu tawo nowy emagore bagaiwu diero maku etai . Tamago pemegado ei . 8 Tagaba tageragudupagado boe eno dieroji . Tamode tagerago ji dykeje morido etai . Tamearydy kurido boei nowy inodu kori rugadu . Tamearydy kurimode boei dykeje tameartorure Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaruji rugadu . 9 nowy bakaru akore : Aeribarikaba akoredyje piji akoredy piji . Akaba boe ewido . Akiwogukaba . Aeku kidukaba boe enoeji akai jamedy . Nono boe emearydy kurimode boei dykeje emeartorumode rugadu awu bakaru jamedy boeji . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Amearydy kurido boei nono amearydy kuri moga ai dumogadure . 10 Tamearydy kurimode boei dykeje taro pegamodukare ei rugadu . Dykodire boe emearydy kurimode boei dykeje erore nono emeartorure Pao Kurirewy batary jitu mogadure . 11 Tameartorure Jesusji . Mare tare jorydywa bokwareugere . ca taedy pagakaba pugeje . Tamearydy kurido boei rugadu . Meri puredygodyre pai rugadu Pao Kurirewy uwo paginorudo . 12 Parowo nono boe ero moga meri jitu mogadure . Boecoji boe ero pegamode . Ewadu raimode tuioku pega tabo toredyje piji toredy piji . Eke kurumode ei . Eribarimode tumugukare apowugei . Emeardae pegamode aremei imei . Erugodymode pui . Ekimaredymode pui . Mare boe puredygodyre awu boe ero pegarewy akedywo rugadu nono boeco akedymode dumogadure . Dykodire paromodukare nono awu boe ero mogadure . Paro pemegawo nono meri jiwu boe ero mogadure . Pawo pagerago Jesusji nono boe emoga tugerago tuwaigaji dumogadure . Jesus umode paragado paro pemegawo . Pagimijeranure ema . Marigudu pagaidure paro pegawo . Pawo pagera ra nowy pagaidure jiwu paro pegarewy piji . Pawiagodywo nowy paro pegarewy piji rugadu.

14 1 Tardu pegakaba meartoru rakakare Jesus jiwugei . Tago kikaba ei , emeardaere jiboeji . 2 Ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge emeartoru rakare Dykodire enogoagemode boe jamedy boeji . Mare ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge emeartoru rakakare Dykodire enogoagemodukare ia barogo koduji . 3 Mare nowy okoagere boe jamedy jiwu jorydy pegakawo nowy okoagekare barogo kodu jiwugei . Nono nowy okoagekare barogo kodu jiwu mako pegakawo nowy okoagere boe jamedy jiwu roji . Pao Kurirewy aidure eiamedy boei . 4 Tamago pegakaba ia boe utugaregei emaragody pegare duji . Eimijera emare jorydywamode emaragody pegare duji . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge eimijeranure Jesusce rugadu . Emare jorydywamode emeartorure puduiwyge ewagai . Umode eragado emeartoruwo tuwadary jitu bagai rugadu . 5 Ia boe emeardaere meri ukaie nono pure . Ere nouia meri tawuje . Dykodire nowy meri keje eragodymode emago pemegamode Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto . Mare iage emeardaere meri uie nono pure . Kodire eragodymode emago pemegamode Pao Kurirewy bagai meri jamedy boeji . Awu inodu jire taigoiare tamode tameardae pemegarewy tawyje tagaora piji . 6 Ia boe emeartorure nouia meri pemegareuji . Mare paga karega tugimaduwo Pagimijera Jesus apo nowy meri keje kodire eroino . Ia boe enogoagere boe jamedy boeji . Mare paga karega tuwo boe ekimadudo Pagimijera Jesus apo Dykodire eroino . Enogoagemode dykeje ekimadumode Pao Kurirewy apo nowy tuge paru tabo . Mare ia boe enogoagekare barogo koduji mare paga karega tuwo boe ekimadudo Pagimijera Jesus apo jamedy kodire eroino . Enogoagemode dykeje ekimadumode Pao Kurirewy apo nowy tuge paru tabo jamedy . 7 Paipagamodukare tu pai mitogody . Pawimode mare paipagamodukare tu pai mitogody . 8 Pawiagorowo pameartoruwo tu Pagimijera Jesusji rugadu . Mare pawimode mare du inodu tabo pameartorumode Pagimijera Jesusji rugadu . Paromode aino dykeje Pagimijera Jesus utugarege emode pagi rugadu . 9 Jesus Cristo bire mare jewodure pugeje . Dykodire bikareuge eimijeranure ema . Bireuge aroe eimijeranure ema jamedy . 10 Meartorure Jesus jiwugenure tagi . Dykodire tamedagenure pugi . ca tagi tagoagekare barogo koduji . Tamago pegakaba nowy okoagere barogo kodu jiwugei . Ia tagi tagoagere boe jamedy boeji . Tamago pegakaba nowy okoagekare barogo kodu jiwugei . Paiamedy boe paragojemode Pao Kurirewy jokorai rugadu . Pao Kurirewy emare aiwomode pai ia paro pegarewy bagai . 11 Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Pao Kurirewy remawunure imi . Tagimijeranure imi . Boe eiamedy boe emode tubu jodo moto keje iogorai . Boe eiamedy boe egomode Pao Kurirewy nuie imi rugadu . 12 Dykodire paiamedy boe pamagomode parore jiboeji Pao Kurirewy biagai . 13 care tagogwa aidukaba boe pegareuji pui . Mare tameardae tawyje taro pemegawo boei tagawo boe emeartoru akedydo Jesus piji . Tameardae tawyje taro pemegawo boei tagawo boe ero pegado . 14 Imugu pemegare Pagimijera Jesus apo Dykodire iorydyware boe eke jamedy boe uie turugadu dyji boe ewo ko . Mare ia tagi tameardaere ia boe eke ukaie turugadu dyji boe ekawo ko . Tameardaemode ia boe eke ukaie turugadu dyji Dykodire nowy boe eke ukare turugadu tai rugadu . 15 Ia tagi tagoagemode barogo koduji nowy tamedage egai dykeje tamode epogurudo nowy tagoagere jiboeji . Tamearydy kurikadunure ei kodire taroino ei . Tagera ra nowy tamedage etaidukare jiwu tage piji . Tamodukare tagera ra dykeje tamode nowy tamedage emeartoru akedydo . Mare paga karega Jesus Cristo bire boe eiamedy boe ero pegarewy morice rugadu . 16 Dykodire taro pegakaba boei emago pegakawo taro pemegare jiboeji . 17 Tagoagere jiboe tabo karega , tagudure ceboe tabo karega tamode tagimijerado Pao Kurireuce . Tameartorure ji dutabo tamode tagimijerado Pao Kurireuce rugadu . Mare Pao Kurirewy Uwari emare umode taro jetorodo . Emare umode tabemegado pui . Emare umode taegaredo tai pu jamedy boeji . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy utugarege mode tagi . Tagimijera kurirewy mode ema . 18 Tameartorumode aino Jesus Cristo batary ji dykeje tamode tagimijerado Pao Kurireuce rugadu . 19 Dykodire taragado tai tawo tameardae tawyje tawo tamedagedo boe eiamedy boece tabemegawo pui . Tameardae maku puai tawo tameartoru kurido Jesusji . 20 Tagokikaba pui boe eke keje . Tagokimode pui boe eke keje nono tamodukare ia boe emeartorudo Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Emeartorumodukare Jesusji rugadu . ca ure turugadu meartorure Jesus jiwyge ewo boe eke jamedy boe ko . Ia boe emodukare nowy boe eke ko . Mare imode nowy boe eke ko nowy boe egai du nowy boe emeartorumodukare Jesusji pugeje . Iromode aino dykeje imire ire boe pegado ei emeartorukawo Jesusji . 21 Ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge emodukare barogo kodu ko . Taragojere ebo dykeje tagaba ko egai ekawo ko jamedy . Emode barogo kodu ko tagabo nono emeardaemode turo pega nuie . Ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge ekudumodukare vinho kuruce rugadu . Taragojere ebo dykeje tagudukaba vinho kuruce egai ekudukawo ce jamedy . Ekudumode tagabo dykeje emeardaemode turo pega nuie . Ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge eromodukare ia turore jiboeji pugeje . Tarokaba ji aino jamedy egai . Eromode nowy taidukare jiwu turoji pugeje emeardaemode turo pega nuie . 22 Dykodire tamagomode tameardaeji tu Pao Kurirewy biagai . Boe emode tumeardae pemegado dykeje egaregodymode pudui nowy turo pemegareuji . Ekiarigodymodukare turo pemegare dukodi . Boe pemegamode ei rugadu . 23 Mare boe erore gara je tumode ko boeji mare enogoagemode nowy boe ekeji rugadu dykeje nowy erore jiboe pegamode Pao Kurirewy jakai . Enogoagemode dykeje emeardaemode turo peganuie . Pao Kurirewy mako pegamode nowy erore jiboeji jamedy . Etaidure turowo nowy turore jiboeji mare erduwakare umode turugadu Pao Kurirewy jordae meardae jituji . Mare du inodu tabo eromode nowy turore jiboeji . Etaidukare tumeartoruwo Pao Kurirewy jordae meardaeji . Etaidure turowo tu tuiordae tumeardaeji rugadu . Dykodire nowy erdae emeardae pijiwu ero jamedy boe pegare Pao Kurirewy jakai rugadu.

15 1 Ia pagi pameartoru rakare Jesusji rugadu . Mare iage emeartoru rakakare ji . Pawo pagera maku etai pawo emeartoru rakado Jesusji . Pagogudumodukare tu pagabo . Pagoguduwo pamedagebo jamedy . 2 Mare pagaiwo pemegawo pamedagei pawo boe pemegado ei jamedy . Paromode aino dykeje pamode emeartoru rakado Jesusji rugadu . 3 Paromode nono Jesus Cristo ro mogadure . Emare biapagakare boe pemegawo pudui . Biapagare boe pemegawo boe eiamedy boei . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Boe ewadary pegarewy jeture i pugeje . Jesus jire akoino rugadu . 4 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure boe edo tuwadary bu bapera keje . Pao Kurirewy rore aino tuwo boe erduwado tuwadary ji . Parduwamode Pao Kurirewy batary ji dykeje pamode pawudugudo pai . Parduwamode dykeje paegaregodymode pai Pao Kurirewy batary keje . Dykodire pagiarigodymodukare pugeje mare pamode paragado pabagawo umode paginorudowu bagai rugadu . 5 Pao Kurirewy koiare umode taedy butugudo nono . Ema koiare umode turaga maku tagai jamedy . Uwo tameardae pemegado pu jamedy boeji . Uwo tameardae udo nono Jesus Cristo meardae mogadure . Tarowo nono Jesus ro mogadure . Tardu pemegawo pu jamedy boeji . 6 Dykodire tameardae kodumode pu meardae kodaji taiamedy boe tamago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji tawadary pemegarewy tabo tawo Pao Kurirewy ie kurido . Pagimijera Jesus Cristo uonure Pao Kurireuce rugadu . 7 Tagaidudo pui nono Jesus aidumoga tai dumogadure . Tagaidumode pui dykeje boe erdumode Pao Kurirewy koiare ure tameardae pemegado duji . 8 Mare paga karega . Jesus Cristo aregodyre moto ka tuwo tudo nono Judeu doge etugaredo pudumi dumogadure . Ure erduwado Pao Kurirewy rore jiboeji . Ure erduwado Pao Kurirewy batary remawuji . Pao Kurirewy umodukaie tugera ra epiji . Dukodi care Jesus aregodyre tuwo Pao Kurirewy batary jetudo pudui rugadu . Marigudu Pao Kurirewy makore Judeu dogei nowy umode boe ekinorudowu aregodymoduie . care aregodyre rugadu . 9 Mare Jesus aregodyre boe tuginaiwyge etae jamedy emeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji emago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji jamedy . Pao Kurirewy okudugodyre boebo . Dykodire boe tuginaiwyge emeartorumode Pao Kurireuji emago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Iragojere boe tuginaiwugebo dykeje imago pemegamode Pao Kurireuji; iragodymode imago pemegare Pao Kurirewy jitu tabo . 10 Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore pugeje : Boe tuginaiwyge egaregodywo pudui Pao Kurireuji rugadu Judeu dogebo ! 11 Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore pugeje : Boe tuginaiwyge eiamedy boe emago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji; Boe eiamedy boe emago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . 12 Marigudu Isaías ure Pao Kurirewy batary bu bapera keje . Akore : Ia boe eimijera kurirewy Davi onaregedy aregodymode boe eimijera kurireuwo pudumi; Boe tuginaiwyge eimijera mode ema; Boe tuginaiwyge emeartorumode ji uwo cinorudo . Ainore Isaías ure bu bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy bataryre . Jesus jire akoino . Jesus aregodyre tuwo awu Pao Kurirewy batary jetudo pudui rugadu . 13 Pao Kurirewy koiare umode boe ekiarigody barigu boe epiji rugadu . Tameartorudo ji uwo taegaredo tai , uwo tamedagedo boece tamorora magadukawo boe pegareuji pugeje . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode turaga maku tagai tawo tawia ra tagiarigody piji tabagawo Jesus bagai rugadu . 14 Imedagenure tagi . Iorydyware tarore jiboeji marigudu . Taro pemegare boei marigudu . Tarduware boe remawuji . Tagi tarduware tagogituwawo boei boe pemegarewy tabo . 15 Mare awu atugoreboe tabore inogituware tai . Ipogurukare iwo tawiabutudo tarduware jiboe keje . Pao Kurirewy ro pemegare i Dykodire ure Jesus Cristo utugaredo imi . Makore i ituwo Jesus jiwu bakaru pemegarewy tabo iwo boe tuginaiwyge ewie . Dykodire ipogurukare imagowo boei rugadu . Pao Kurirewy utugarenure imi . Imaragodae ure nono nowy maragodyre Pao Kurirewy uwai tadawu boe emaragodae mogadure . Emage ere Judeu doge ewie Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Imire ire boe tuginaiwyge ewie Jesus jiwu bakaru pemegareuji emeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji ewo tugimijerado ema . nowy boe tuginaiwyge emeartorumode Jesusji dykeje Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode ero pegarewy barigu epiji . Pao Kurirewy aidumode ei rugadu . 17 Jesus Cristo rakojere itabo . Ure imeartoru pemegado Pao Kurirewy batary ji Dykodire inojarore Pao Kurirewy ure maku inaiwu imaragodaeji . 18 Nono ipogurumodukare imagowo rugadu boe tuginaiwyge ewiagai Jesus Cristo ro pemegare i duji . Dykodire imode boe tuginaiwyge emeartorudo Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Ure iorydywado imagowo boe ewiagai . Ure iragado iro pemegawo boei . 19 Ure iro rakado . Boe erore ta je irore jiboeji . Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure turaga maku inai rugadu . Dykodire ire boe ewie rugadu Jesus Cristo umoduie boe ekinorudo duji . Ikodure Jerusalém ba kurirewy piji toro Ilírico moto ka . Imerure boe jamedy boe parugajeje dutabo ire boe ewie awu bakaruji . 20 Imeardaere iwo jorydywakarewy boe ewie Jesus batary pemegareuji . Ia boe edyre nowy boebo ture ewie nowy Jesus batary jitu tabo Dykodire itumodukare etae . Mare iage erduwakare Jesus meardaeji umodukaie boe ekinorudo duji . Ia boe ekare ewie . Dykodire itaidure ituwo nowy boe ewagai iwo erduwado boe remawuji . 21 Aino care Pao Kurirewy batary jeture pudui . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Boe ekare ewie marigudu mare aino erduwamode nowy umode boe ekinorudowuji , Marigudu ewiapagakare mare aino erduwamode batary ji rugadu . 22 Itaidure ituwo tawagai marigudu . Mare ji aino iroiwakare ituwo tawagai . 23 Mare kuri aino imode imaragodae iado awu moto keje . Marigudu itaidure ituwo tawagai iorydywo tai . 24 Imeardaere kuri aino itaregodymoduie tagae rugadu . Itumode Espanha moto ka . Tamugure Espanha kawu awara okwai Dykodire iorydymode tai . Dykodire umode turugadu tawo tagera maku inai ituwo Espanha moto ka . Mare iragojemode tagabo jao pamagowo pu biagai . 25 Mare aino itumode Jerusalém ba kurirewy ka jao iwo ikera maku nowy meartorure Pao Kurirewy jiwyge etai nono . 26 Macedônia kejewy meartorure Jesus jiwyge ere ia to diero maku inai iwo reko toro nowy Jerusalém kejewy meartorure Jesus jiwyge ewagai . Eno diero bokware . Acaia moto kejewy meartorure Jesus jiwyge ere ia to diero maku ewagai jamedy . 27 Awu Macedônia moto kejewyge boe tuginaiwugenure emage . Awu Acaia moto kejewyge boe tuginaiwugenure emage jamedy . Eiamedy boe ere nowy tumeardae tawyje taidu tabo tuwo diero maku awu Jerusalém kejewyge Judeu doge ewagai . Erowo aino rugadu . Mare paga karega . Judeu doge ere Pao Kurirewy batary pemegarewy utudo boe tuginaiwyge ewagai emeartoruwo Jesusji Dykodire nowy boe tuginaiwyge meartorure Jesus jiwyge ere nowy to diero maku nowy Judeu doge meartorure Jesus jiwyge ewagai . 28 Imode nowy diero rugadu maku nowy meartorure Jesus jiwyge Judeu doge etai dykeje itumode pugeje epiji ituwo toro Espanha moto ka . Itaregodymode tagae tamugure ikodumode jiwu awara okwaji dukodi . 29 Itaregodymode tagae dykeje iorydyware Jesus Cristo ro pemegamode pai rugadu duji . Paegaremode pai rugadu . 30 Imedagenure tagi . Pagimijera kurirewynure Jesus Cristoce rugadu . Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure pamearydy kurido boei . Dykodire itaidure iwo tawie . Tamago raido iparu tabo Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto . 31 Tamagodo Pao Kurireuji iparu tabo uwo ikinorudo Judéia moto kejewyge meartorukare Jesus jiwyge epiji . Tamagodo Pao Kurireuji iparu tabo imaragody pemegawo Jerusalém ba kurirewy kejewyge meartorure Jesus jiwugebo . 32 Imaragody pemegamode ebo dykeje iagaregodymode i . Pao Kurirewy aidumode dykeje itaregodymode tawagai rugadu iagare tabo . Dykejere pamago raimode pui rugadu . 33 ca Pao Kurirewy rakojewo tagabo rugadu . Emare umode tugera bu pawugeje pamorora magadukawo boe pegareuji pugeje . Uwo aino rugadu.

16 1 Ia pamedago iere Febe . Emare maragody pemegare meartorure Jesus jiwyge etai Cencréia ba kurirewy keje . 2 Awu aredy Febe aregodyre tagae dykeje taro pemegado ji nono Jesus ro mogadure mugu pemegawo tagabo rugadu . Emare ro pemegare boei rugadu . Ro pemegare i jamedy . Dykodire tagera bararedo ji jamedy . 3 Tagimadudo Priscila apo , Áqüila apo inai . Emagere emaragodyre itabo Jesus Cristo ai . 4 Ere tuiago boe edo tuwido tuwo ikinorudo ro pegareuge epiji . Dykodire itaidure ei rugadu . Imago pemegamode erore jiboeji rugadu . Boe tuginaiwyge meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe etaidure ei jamedy . 5 Ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge emode bato pui ewai tada tu tyje . Tagimadudo ebo inai jamedy . Ia imedia iere Epêneto . Imearydy kurire ji . Tagimadudo apo inai . Ásia moto kejewynure ema . Emare meartorure Jesusji boetoji nowy tumedage Ásia moto kejewyge epiji . 6 Tagimadudo Maria apo inai . Emare maragody rakare tagai . 7 Tagimadudo imedy Andrônico apo inai . Tagimadudo aredy Júnia apo inai jamedy . Iwobenure emage . edyre itabo baicorewy tada marigudu toro ia ba kurirewy keje . Boe kurireugenure emage . Uture Jesus batary tabowugenure emage . Emeartorure Jesusji itododai marigudu . 8 Tagimadudo imedy Amplíato apo inai . Meartorure Jesusji Dykodire inagomode imana aino ji . Imearydy kurire ji rugadu . 9 Tagimadudo imedy Urbano apo inai . Emare maragodyre itabo Jesus maragodaeji . Tagimadudo imedy Estáquis apo inai jamedy . Imearydy kurire jiwu imedianure ema . 10 Tagimadudo imedy Apeles apo inai . Jesus Cristo aidure awu imedy maragodaeji . Tagimadudo mugure imedy Aristóbulo uwai tadawugebo inai . 11 Tagimadudo imedy Herodião apo inai . Iwobenure ema . Tagimadudo mugure imedy Narciso uwai tadawugebo inai . Emeartorure Jesusji dukodi . 12 Tagimadudo aredy Trifena apo inai . Tagimadudo aredy Trifosa apo inai . Emagere emaragody rakare Pagimijera Jesus ai . Tagimadudo pamedago Pérside apo inai . Paiamedy boe pamearydy kurire ji rugadu . Emare maragody rakare Pagimijera Jesus ai jamedy . 13 Tagimadudo imedy Rufo apo inai . Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago ji meartoruwo Jesusji . Emare maragody pemegare Jesus ai . Tagimadudo Rufo uce apo inai jamedy . Uce ro pemegare i nono muga ro pemega moga i dumogadure . 14 Tagimadudo imedy Asíncrito apo inai . Tagimadudo imedy Flegonte apo inai . Tagimadudo imedy Hermes apo inai . Tagimadudo imedy Pátrobas apo inai . Tagimadudo imedy Hermas apo inai . Tagimadudo nowy rakojere nowy ime apowyge pamedagebo inai . Eiamedy boe emeartorure Jesusji Dykodire inagoino . 15 Tagimadudo aredy Filólogo apo inai . Tagimadudo aredy Júlia apo inai . Tagimadudo aredy Nerewy apo inai . Tagimadudo Nerewy uwie aredy Olimpas apo inai jamedy . Tagimadudo rakojere ebowyge meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boebo inai jamedy . 16 Tagimadudo pu jamedy boe apo . Meartorure Jesus Cristo jiwyge eiamedy boe eimadure taiamedy boe bagai . 17 Imedagenure tagi . Iage etaidure tuwo meartorure Jesus jiwyge emeardae pegado pui . Taeku jado tameardaekawo nono emeardaere . Etaidure tuwo tagaora pegado tarduware jiboe piji . Taipagakaba ewadary ji . Tadaru toro epiji . 18 Awu boe emaragodykare Pagimijera Jesus ai . Emaragodyre tumeardae pegareuji tuwo boe ewarigu tumeardae pemegarewy piji . Emago pemegare . Emago moture . Mare tuwo boe ekiripagado dubagaire egoino . 19 Mare tameartorure Jesus batary ji rugadu . Boe eiamedy boe erduware nowy tarore jiboeji . Dykodire iagarere i tarore jiboeji rugadu . Mare itaidure iwo tarduwado boe pemegareuji . Jorydywarewugewo tagi tarduwawo boe pemegareuji . Mare tarduwakawo boe pegareuji . 20 Pao Kurirewy umode tugera bu pawugeje pamorora magadukawo boe pegareuji pugeje . Emare umode bope raka tawyje piji rugadu . Bope rakamodukare tai . Umodukare tumorido tai rugadu . Umode nono ia pagatu jewu boere . Pagimijera Jesus ro pemegawo tai rugadu . 21 Pamedia Timóteo aidure cimaduwo tagabo . Lúcio aidure cimaduwo tagabo . Jasom aidure cimaduwo tagabo . Sosípatro aidure cimaduwo tagabo . Judeu dogenure emage . Iwobenure emage . 22 Imire ikiere Tércio . Imire ire awu Paulo batary bu bapera keje Paulo ai . Itaidure ikimaduwo tagabo jamedy . Pagimijera ro pemegawo tai . 23 ceragojere Gaio uwai keje . Ro pemegare cei rugadu . Emare aidure tugimaduwo tagabo . Awu woewu meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe etaidure tugimaduwo tagabo jamedy . Awu ba kurirewy kejewy boe eimijera iere Erasto . Emare aidure tugimaduwo tagabo . Meartorure Jesus jiwu imedia Quarto aidure tugimaduwo tagabo jamedy . ca Pagimijera Jesus Cristo ro pemegawo taiamedy boei rugadu . 25 Pamago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . Pamago pemegawo Pao Kurirewy rore jiboeji . Emare roiware tuwo tameartoru rakado Jesusji . Ire boe ewie Jesus batary pemegareuji emeartoruwo Jesus Cristoji . Jaoboe erduwakare nowy batary ji . Pao Kurirewy ure nowy tuwadary biado nowy jauboe epiji . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure nowy tuwadary maku inai . 26 Maigody aino care boe erduware nowy batary ji . Marigudu makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge ere Pao Kurirewy batary bu bapera keje tuwo boe ewie nuba boe mode boei ia meri keje . Maigody aino boe erdure nowy batary jeture pudui dyji Dykodire erduware boe remawuji . Pao Kurirewy bimodukare rugadu . Emare makore boei ewo boe eiamedy boe ewie nowy tuwadary ji emeartoruwo Jesusji , emeartoruwo Jesus batary ji jamedy . 27 Pamago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . Tu emare jorydyware boe jamedy boeji . Pao Kurirewy ure mitotyje . Iakare toro pugeje . Jesus Cristo bire boe ero pegarewy morice boe emago pemegawo Pao Kurirewy rore jiboeji . Boe emago pemegawo jii toro rugadu . ca uwo aino rugadu.


############################################################
I Coríntios I Coríntios I Coríntios I Coríntios I Coríntios
############################################################


1 1 Paulonure imi . Pao Kurirewy ure tumeardae tawyje marigudu tumagowo iwagai . Makore iwagai ituwo Jesus Cristo batary tabo boe ewagai . Aino care inure awu bapera atugodo iwo awu Pao Kurirewy batary maku meartorure Jesus jiwyge ewagai toro Corinto ba kurirewy ka . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge Corinto ba kurirewy kejewygenure tagi . Pao Kurirewy makore tawagai tuwo tarodo tuginai taro pegarewy piji taro pemegawo tu rugadu . Dykodire tamugu pemegare Jesus Cristo apo tameartoruwo ji rugadu . Tameartorure ji Dykodire ure tumeardae pemegarewy maku tagai tarokawo nono meartorukare Jesus jiwyge ero mogadure pugeje . Imode awu atugoreboe maku nowy mako pemegare Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe ewagai jamedy , moto jamedy boe parugajeje . Eimijera kurirewynure Jesusce rugadu . Pagimijera kurirewynure ema rugadu . Itaidure ikimaduwo tagabo . Pamedia Sóstenes aidure tugimaduwo tagabo jamedy . 3 Pao Kurirewy uwo turo pemegarewy maku tagai . Uwo tabemegado pudui jamedy . Pagimijera Jesus Cristo uwo turo pemegarewy maku tagai . Uwo tabemegado pudui jamedy . 4 Ikimadure Pao Kurireuji tu tyje ro pemegare tai kodi . Tameartorure Jesus Cristoji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ro pemegare tai . 5 Dykodire tamugu pemegare Jesus Cristo apo Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure tagoe kurido . Mare boe enoe ji karega inagoino . Ure tarduwado tamagowo Jesus batary pemegareuji . Dujire inagoino . Ure tarduwa kurido . Dujire inagoino . Dykodire tarduware bope doge ewadrarodaeji , tarduware boe remawuji jamedy . Nono tarduware tameartoruwo boe remawuji tu rugadu . Dujire inagoino . Du tarduware tarowo ji . Dujire inagoino . 6 cere tawie Jesus Cristo o bakaru pemegareuji . Tameartorure ji rugadu . Ji aino tagare tagera ra nowy batary piji rugadu . 7 Dykodire Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure tumaragodae maku tagai tamaragodaece . Ure tawie tuwadary jamedy boeji Dykodire ure tado tarugadu tamaragody pemegawo nowy ture maku tagaiwu tamaragodaeji jii toro rugadu . Tarduware pagimijera Jesus Cristo aregodymode pugeje duji . Dykodire tabagare bagai rugadu . Jesus Cristo aregodymode pugeje dykeje boe erdumode ji rugadu . 8 Jesus emare umode tameartoru rakado pudui jii toro taregodymode du ka . Tameartorumode Pagimijera Jesusji rugadu jii toro rugadu . Dykodire Jesus mako pegamodukare tarore jiboeji . Pagimijera Jesus aregodymode dykeje mako pegamodukare tarore jiboeji . 9 Boe emeartorure Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Emare makore tawagai tamugu pemegawo tonaregedy Jesus Cristo apo . Pagimijera Kurirewynure ema . Pao Kurirewy batary jetumode pudui rugadu . 10 Imedagenure tagi . Inogituwawo tai Pagimijera Jesus batary tabo taromode jiboeji . ca tamago pemegado pui tawo tameardae tawuje . Tameardae udo nono pu jamedy boe meardaere . Tamaragody pemegawo puapo . Nono taragamode tamagore jiboeji . 11 Macare tagare tameardae tawuje . Tagokire pui . Imedy Cloé uwobe ere iwie nowy tarore jiboeji . Ekare taro biado ipiji . 12 Imagowo taroji . Taiamedy tameardaere ia tameardaeji . Ia tagi tagagore tameartoruie Paulo batary ji tu rugadu . Ia tagi tagagore tameartoruie Apolo batary ji tu rugadu . Ia tagi tagagore tameartoruie Pedro batary ji tu rugadu . Mare ia tagi tagagore tameartoruie Cristo batary ji tu rugadu jamedy . 13 Dutabore tare meartorure Jesus Cristo jiwyge emeardae pegado emeardaekawo nono pumeardaere pugeje . Paulonure imi . Imi karega iwire taro pegarewy morice ! Jesus emare bire taro pegarewy morice . Tagao pegododyre mare itugaregewo tagi karega ! Jesus emare makore tagao pegododywo tudugaregewo tagi rugadu . I karega tameartorumode . Tameartorumode tu Jesusji rugadu . 14 Imi igoia karega ire tagao pegodo . Iegarere i ia imedy koiare ure tagao pegodo dyji Dykodire ikimadure Pao Kurirewy apo . Ire ao pegodouge ere pobetyje . Ia iere Crispo . Metuia iere Gaio . 15 Tagao pegododyre . Mare ikie tabo karega tagao pegodorure . Jesus ie tabore tagao pegododyre . 16 (Mare ire imedy Estéfanas uwobe eiamedy boe etao pegodo . Mare imeardaekare iagei pugeje , ikare iage etao pegodo pugeje.) 17 Jesus Cristo ure itarego tawagai iwo tawie tuwadary pemegarewy boeji Jesus uwo taginorudo . Itaregodykare iwo tagao pegodo . Itaregodyre iwo tawie mare imagokare nono jorydywareuge emago mogadure . Imagomode nono jorydywareuge emago mogadure dykeje tardu motumode imagoji mare tawiapagamodukare imagore jiboeji . Nono taragamodukare tawo taro pemegado . Mare imagokare nono jorydywareuge emago mogadure . Tu Jesus Cristo batary jire imagore tawiagai tameartoruwo tu Jesusji uwo taginorudo . Emare bitodure ipo padure pugajejewu keje boe ero pegarewy morice . Boe emeartorumode tu nowy batary ji dykeje Jesus umode boe ekinorudo , umode boe eragado ero pemegawo rugadu . 18 Jesus Cristo bire ipo padure pugajejewu keje boe ero pegarewy morice . Mare meartorukare jiwyge egore pagaie Jesus roino . Dykodire ewarigudumode bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto . Mare pameartorure ji Dykodire nowy batary koiare ure parduwado Pao Kurirewy ro rakareuji . Emare rakare tuwo paginorudo rugadu . 19 Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Imode jorydywareuge erduware jiboe akedydo . Imode aiwore bapera jiwyge erduware jiboe okwado epiji . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore . 20 Moto kejewyge erduware boeji . Mare erduwakare nono Pao Kurirewy jorydywa mogadure . Dykodire erduwa bokware rugadu Pao Kurirewy jakai . Jorydywareuge erduwa bokware Pao Kurirewy jakai . Aiwo raire bapera jiwyge erduwa bokware Pao Kurirewy jakai . Mako raire puiwyge erduwa bokware jamedy Pao Kurirewy jakai . 21 Pao Kurirewy jorydyware rugadu . Boe etaidure tuiorydywawo Pao Kurireuji tuiorydyware jiboe tabo , tumeardae tabo . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure boe eiamedy boe eroiwa bokwado Dykodire erduwamodukare Pao Kurireuji rugadu tuiorydyware jiboe tabo . Mare cere boe ewie Pao Kurirewy batary pemegareuji rugadu . Mare meartorukare Jesus jiwyge egore pagaie cenagoino . Mare boe emeartorumode nowy Pao Kurirewy batary ji dykeje erduwamode Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Mare tuiorydyware jiboe tabo karega . Pao Kurirewy umode nowy boe ekinorudo . 22 Judeu doge etaiwore ia Pao Kurirewy ro rakarewy bagai Dykodire emeartorukare nowy Pao Kurirewy batary pemegareuji . Grego doge etaiwore boe erduware jiboe bagai tuwo tuiorydywa kurido Dykodire emeartorukare nowy Pao Kurirewy batary pemegareuji . 23 Mare cegi cere boe ewie Pao Kurirewy batary pemegareuji , Jesus Cristo bitodure ipo padure pugajejewu keje . Dujire cenagoino . Mare Judeu doge ekorigodyre awu cewadary keje Dykodire emeartorukare ji . Mare eiamedy boe karega ekorigodyre . Pao Kurirewy makore bagaiwyge Judeu doge emeartorure cewadary ji . Etaidure ji . Boe tuginaiwyge egore pagaie cenagoino jamedy Dykodire emeartorukare ji . Mare eiamedy boe karega . Pao Kurirewy makore bagaiwyge boe tuginaiwyge emeartorure cewadary ji . Etaidure ji jamedy . nowy meartorure cewadary jiwyge emeartorure Jesus Cristoji rugadu . Dykodire erduware Pao Kurirewy ro rakare rugadu tuwo ekinorudo . Erduware Pao Kurirewy jorydywa kurire rugadu tuwo ekinorudo duji . Jesus koiare ure nowy meartorure puduiwyge erduwado nowy inodu boeji . 25 Boe emeardae pegamode ia Pao Kurirewy batary roguji . Egomode pagaie Pao Kurirewy akoino . Egomode nowy Pao Kurirewy batary rogu nuie pagatyje , boe emeartorukaiago nowy batary roguji . Mare iwo tarduwado . nowy Pao Kurirewy batary rogu koiare umode boe erduwa pemegado rugadu jorydywareuge eiamedy boe ero boe piji . Ia boe emeardae pegamode Pao Kurirewy rore boeji . Egomode Pao Kurirewy raka akedyie . Mare pagare egoino . Erduwakare kaba jiba Pao Kurirewy roino . Pao Kurirewy rakare rugadu . Rakare boe eiamedy boe eraga kori . 26 Imedagenure tagi . Tawiabutudo nowy mariguduwu taro keje . Marigudu boe egore tarduwa bokwaie rugadu . Egore taragakaie . Egore boe kurireuge kaie gure tagi . Mare Pao Kurirewy makore tawagai . 27 Pao Kurirewy ure tumeardae tawyje tumagowo boe etaidukare jiwyge ewagai tuwo jorydywareuge epogurudo . Egore tuiorydywaie . Egore nowy tumedage erduwa bokwaie . Mare Pao Kurirewy makore nowy jorydywa bokwarewy boe ewagai rugadu tuwo nowy jorydywareuge epogurudo dubagai . Makore nowy rakakareuge ewagai tuwo nowy rakareuge epogurudo . nowy rakareuge egore pudumie turagaie . Egore nowy tumedage eraga bokwaie . Mare Pao Kurirewy makore nowy rakakareuge ewagai tuwo nowy rakareuge epogurudo dubagai . 28 Boe emeardae pegare boei rugadu . Egore ero pegaie . Egore pagaie eromode boeji . Mare Pao Kurirewy makore nowy boe etaidukare jiwyge ewagai tuwo nowy boe emeardae pegarewy akedydo . 29 Dykodire boe enojarokawo turore jiboeji pugeje Pao Kurirewy jakai . Boe enojarokawo tuwadary ji pugeje Pao Kurirewy biagai . 30 Mare Pao Kurirewy ure pamugu pemegado Jesus Cristo apo . Pameartorure Jesusji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago pai pudae . Nono umode parduwado tuiorydyware jiboeji . Emare ure paro jetorodo . Ure paro udo tuginai meartorukare jiwyge ero boe piji . Ure paginorudo paro pegarewy piji pagawo paro pegarewy morido pugeje . 31 Dykodire padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary ure turugadu . Akore : Boe enojarowo tu Pao Kurirewy rore jiboeji tu rugadu.

2 1 Imedagenure tagi . Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure ia tumeardae biado boe epiji . Mare itaregodyre tagae dykeje ire tarduwado nowy Pao Kurirewy ure biadowu tumeardaeji . Imedagenure tagi . Imagokare tai iwadary kurirewy tabo . Imagokare tai jorydywareuge ewadary tabo . 2 Iragojere tagabo dykeje imeardaekare ia imeardaeji . Imeardaere tu iwo tawie Jesus Cristo jiwu bakaruji . Ire tawie Jesus bitodure ipo padure pugajejewu keje dyji rugadu . 3 Iragojere tagabo dykeje iragakare pugeje . Ioku kidugodynure Pao Kurireuji iwo ure maku inaiwu imaragodae pemegado imagowo boe remawuji tawiagai . Mare imorara magadure tarduwamodukare iwadary jituji . Dykodire ire iragado imagowo boe remawuji tawiagai . 4 Mare itaidukare iwo tameartorudo iwadary motureuji . Itaidure tameartoruwo tu Jesusji rugadu . Dykodire ikare imago motudo tawiagai . Ire tarduwado mare imagokare tai iwadary moturewy tabo . Ire tarduwado mare imagokare tai jorydywareuge ewadary tabo . Mare ire tarduwado Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakare duji . Ema koiare ure tameartorudo ire tawie jiwu Jesus jiboeji . Dykodire tameartorure Jesusji rugadu . Boe ewadary moturewy ukare tameartorudo . Pao Kurirewy rakare rugadu Dykodire tameartorure Jesusji . 6 Imode meartoru rakare Jesus jiwyge erduwado rugadu . Mare boe erduware jiboe karega . Boe eimijerage erduware jiboe karega . Bope doge erduware jiboe karega . nowy boe eimijerage eraga akedygodynure . nowy bope doge eraga akedygodynure jamedy . 7 Mare Pao Kurirewy meardaere jiboe jire imode boe erduwado . Pao Kurirewy ure nowy mariguduwu tumeardae biado boe epiji . Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ukare moto to raga dykeje ure tumeardae tawyje tuwo boe pemegado meartorure puduiwugei . Mare ukare boe ewie . Ure nowy tumeardae biado boe epiji jii je rugadu . Mare ukare moto to raga dykeje jorydyware tumode parduwado nowy tumeardaeji duji . Dykodire care ure parduwado nuba turomode meartorure puduiwugei rugadu . Dykodire care parduware nowy Pao Kurirewy meardaeji kodire jorydywareugenure pagi . 8 Moto kejewyge boe eimijerage erduwakare nowy Pao Kurirewy meardaeji . Erduwamode dykeje emodukare Jesus bito ipo padure pugajejewu keje . Mare erduwakare . Mare pagi parduware . Pagimijeranure Jesusce . Ure nono Pao Kurireure rugadu . 9 Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary makore nowy Pao Kurirewy meardaeji rugadu . Akore : Pao Kurirewy ure tumeardae tawyje tuwo boe pemegarewy tawyje mearydy kurire puduiwyge etai . Boe erdukare jiboe , emearydykare jiboe , Boe emeardaekare jiboe jire Pao Kurirewy roino . Ure tumeardae udo turugadu nowy mearydy kurire puduiwugei rugadu . 10 Aino care Pao Kurirewy ure Tuwari udo parduwado nowy ture biadowu tumeardaeji . Pao Kurirewy Uwari aiwore boe jamedyji . Jorydyware Pao Kurirewy meardae jamedy boeji . 11 Boe erduwakare meture pagaora tadawu pameardaeji . Tu pagi parduware pameardaeji . Ainore Pao Kurirewy ure jamedy . Tu Uwari jorydyware Pao Kurirewy meardaeji . 12 Pameartorure Jesusji Dykodire meartorukare jiwyge emeardae metukare pagaorato pugeje . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure Tuwari maku pagai uwo parduwado Pao Kurirewy ure maku pagaiboe jamedy boeji . Ure nowy jamedy boe maku pagai taidu tabo rugadu mare pamodukare morido ai . 13 Mare boe ekare cerduwado nowy ire tarduwado jiboeji . Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure cerduwado nowy ire tarduwado jiboeji . Mare cemagore nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari batary ji tu nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojere apowyge ewiagai . 14 Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojekare apowyge eroiwakare tuwo tugerago nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode maku boe etaiwu boeji . nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojekare apowyge erduwamodukare nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode maku boe etaiwu boeji . Egore pegaie . Tu nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojere apowyge erduwamode nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode maku boe etai boeji . Egomode pemegaie . Erduware pemegare rugadu . 15 Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojere apowyge emagere erduwamode taiwowo boe pemegarewy bagai . Erduwamode tuwo boe pegarewy barigu boe epiji . Mare meartorukare Jesus jiwyge erduwamodukare nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojere apowyge eroji egoji jamedy . Dykodire meartorukare Jesus jiwyge etaidumode taiwowo nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojere apowugei erore jiboeji . Egomode ero pegaie . Erduwa bokwaie turore jiboeji . Mare pagare egoino . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojere apowyge emeartorumodukare meartorukare Jesus jiwugei . 16 Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Boe erduwakare Pao Kurirewy meardaeji rugadu . Boe erduwakare togituwawo Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Mare meartorure Jesus jiwugenure pagi . Dykodire ure parduwado tumeardaere jiboeji rugadu.

3 1 Dykodire imedagenure tagi . Mare care tagare nono Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojere apowyge emogadure . Dykodire care iroiwakare imagowo tai nono imagore Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojere apowugei dumogadure . Mare imagomode tai nono imagore boe etorei dumogadure . Tare nono meartorukare Jesus jiwyge emogadure . Marigudu tameartorure Jesusji mare tare nono tare tu kimo . Tameardaekare ia tameardae pemegarewy bagai . 2 Itaidure iwo tarduwado Pao Kurirewy batary biadodyrewuji . Mare tagare tarugadu tarduwawo nowy Pao Kurirewy batary biadodyrewuji . Tare nono okwagirirewy boe etore emogadure . Mare boe etore ei karega inagoino . Tagare tarugadu raga tarduwawo batary biadodyrewuji . Dujire inagoino . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy batary biagarewy jire imagomode tawiagai . Dujire inagoino . 3 Tarore nono meartorukare Jesus jiwyge emogadure . Tardupegare pui . Tagokire pui . Dykodire inagoino . Tarore nono meartorukare Jesus jiwyge emogadure . Tarore meartorukare Jesus jiwyge emeardaeji . 4 Tare tagado puiato . Tabokare puapo . Dykodire ia tagi tagagore meartorure Paulo jiwyge nuie tagi . Mare ia tagi tagagore meartorure Apolo jiwyge nuie tagi . Mare nowy taro ure tado nono meartorukare Jesus jiwyge emogadure . 5 ca imedianure nowy Apoloce . Pao Kurirewy utugarenure ema . Paulonure imi . Pao Kurirewy utugarenure imi jamedy . cere tawie Pao Kurirewy batary ji Dykodire tameartorure ji . Mare boe kurireuge karugure cegi . cemaragodyre Pagimijera ure maku cenaiwu cemaragodaeji tuje . 6 Tare nono Pao Kurirewy o boepa mogadure . Mare boepa ji karega inagoino . Pao Kurirewy aidure tuwo tarduwado tuwadary pemegareuji muguwo tagaora tada rugadu . Dujire inagoino . Ire tarduwado Pao Kurirewy batary ji boetoji . Dykodire imire irore nono imedy ro mogadure . Imire ire boe tugu ino boepato . Mare boepa ji karega inagoino . Tameartoruwo Pao Kurireuji dujire inagoino . Itaregodyre tagae Pao Kurirewy batary tabo boetoji . Dujire inagoino . Nono tameartorure nowy ire tarduwado jiwu batary ji Dykodire tameartorure Jesusji . Dujire inagoino . Nono Apolo aregodyre tagae iregodaji Pao Kurirewy batary kurirewy tabo jamedy . Emare ure boepa tadaboe rugadu boe pegodo . Mare boepa ji karega inagoino . Ure tarduwa kurido Pao Kurirewy batary kurireuji . Dujire inagoino . Tameartorure Jesusji dykeje nowy Apolo aregodyre iregodaji . Ure tarduwa kurido Pao Kurirewy batary ji jamedy . Dujire inagoino . Mare imi , nowy Apolo , cegare ceginai pubiji . cere nono pure rugadu . cemaragodyre puapo Pao Kurirewy ai cewo boe erduwado Pao Kurirewy batary ji cewo boe emeartorudo Jesusji rugadu . Dykodire cemedagenure puge . Mare boe kurireuge karugure cegi . Pao Kurirewy utugaregenure cegi . Pao Kurirewy emare umode boe eno boepa tadaboe botu pemegado . Emare umode ricodudo . Tare nono nowy boepa tadaboe mogadure Dykodire umode tarijodudo jamedy . Mare boepa tadaboe ji karega inagoino . Taire inagoino . Meartorure Jesus jiwugenure tagi . Dujire inagoino . Tarijo ji karega inagoino . Pao Kurirewy emare umode turaga maku tagai tuwo tameartoru kurido Jesusji tameartorure jitu kori pugeje tu tyje . Dujire inagoino . Pao Kurirewy emare umode boe maku tudugarege etai emaragodae morice rugadu . 10 Tare nono Pao Kurirewy ure towu bai mogadure . Pao Kurirewy ro pemegare i Dykodire ire nono ure bai pemegarewy towu mogadure . Iroiware iwo tado nono nowy bai pemegarewy mogadure . Mare bai ji karega inagoino . Ire tarduwado Pao Kurirewy batary ji boetoji tameartoruwo Jesusji uwo taginorudo tawarigudukawo bope doge eda pegareuto . Tare tameardae tawyje tameartoruwo Jesusji rugadu . Dujire inagoino . Dykejere iage ere tarduwado Pao Kurirewy batary ji tuwo tameartoru rakawo ji rugadu . Mare care boe ewo tuioku jado tumaragodaeji . Tu Jesus Cristo jire boe emeartoruwo . Umode boe ekinorudowunure ema tu rugadu . Ire tawie nowy inoduji marigudu . Mare iage etaidumode tuwo tuwadary udo tuginai nowy Pao Kurirewy batary remawu piji mare pagare egoino . Boe emode boe erduwado Pao Kurirewy batary ji dykeje tawia tugu ewadaryto boe remawu jire egoino dubagai tawo pu jorydywado tawo tameartoru rakado Jesusji rugadu . 12 Boe emaragodymode tuwaiji dykeje emode tuwai pemegado iguru pemegarewy tabo . Mare ia boe emaragody pegamode tuwaiji tuwo tuwai rakojedo tugera kiari tabo , dykeje emode rakojedo iguru pegarewy tabo . Ainore meartorure Jesus jiwyge eromode jamedy . Mare bai ji karega inagoino . Iguru pemegarewy ji karega inagoino . Emeartoru remawumode Pao Kurirewy batary ji rugadu . Dujire inagoino . Emode tugera maku iage etai tuwo erduwado Pao Kurirewy batary remawuji emeartoruwo rugadu Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Dujire inagoino . Mare iage eromode nono nowy maragody pegare tuwai jiwyge emogadure . Mare bai ji karega inagoino . Iguru pegarewy ji karega inagoino . Emeartoru rakamodukare Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Dujire inagoino . Emodukare tugera maku iage etai . Emodukare erduwado Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Emodukare boe emeartorudo Pao Kurireuji . Dujire inagoino . 13 Mare Jesus aregodymode dykeje Jesus aiwomode meartorure puduiwyge eiamedy boe emaragodaeji emaragody pemegare dubagai . Umode boe erduwado nowy emaragodae rugadu boeji nono joru mogadure . Joru cemode torito mare umodukare tori akedydo . Mare joru cemode iji dykeje umode i kowu rugadu . Umode akedydo . Mare joru ji karega inagoino . Tori ji karega inagoino . I ji karega inagoino . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge emaragodae mori jire inagoino . Ainore Pao Kurirewy romode . 14 Boe emeartorumode Jesusji rugadu tumaragody pemegawo Jesus meardaeji dykeje Jesus umode boe pemegarewy maku nowy meartorure puduiwyge etai emaragodae pemegarewy morice . 15 Mare meartorure Jesus jiwyge ewiapaga pemegamodukare Tugimijera Jesus batary ji tumaragody pegawo dykeje Jesus umode nowy emaragodae pegarewy akedydo nono joru mode boe akedydo dumogadure . Mare joru ji karega inagoino . Umodukare boe pemegareboe maku etai . Dujire inagoino . Mare umode ekinorudo nono ia boe ere cinorudo joru piji dumogadure . 16 Tameartorure Jesusji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy Uwari mugure tagabo . Dykodire tare nono Pao Kurirewy uwai mogadure . Dujire tarduware marigudu . Mare bai ji karega inagoino . Pao Kurirewy Uwari mugure tabago . Dujire inagoino . 17 Boe pegarewy jetukare mugukare Pao Kurirewy uwai tada . Mare bai ji karega inagoino . Taire inagoino . Boe emeardae pegarewy jire inagoino . Dykodire taipagakaba ia boe emeardae pegareuji . Boe emode tumeardae pegarewy maku tagai tuwo tameartoru akedydo dykeje Pao Kurirewy umode etagedydo jamedy . 18 Tagaba taekiri pagado . Tameardaekaba tarduwaie iaboeji . Tameardaemode tawo tagerago nowy meartorukare Jesus jiwyge emeardaeji tawo tarduwado dykeje pagare taroino Pao Kurirewy jakai . Tarokaba aino . nowy meartorukare Jesus jiwyge erduware jiboe barigu tabiji tawo tarduwado tu Pao Kurirewy jorydyware jiboeji . Nono meartorukare Jesus jiwyge egomode tarduwa bokwaie . Mare tawia pagakaba egoino tai duji . 19 Meartorukare Jesus jiwyge egore tuiorydywaie rugadu . Mare Pao Kurirewy akore pagaie nowy boe egoino . Erduwa bokware Pao Kurirewy jakai . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Meartorukare Pao Kurirewy jiwyge emeardaere tuiorydywaie rugadu duji . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure ewadary rugadu pogurudo . 20 Ia padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore jamedy : Jorydywareuge ere tumeardae tawyje mare Pagimijera Kurirewy jorydyware pagatu jere eroino duji . 21 Dykodire pagojarokaba boe erore jiboeji . Tamagokaba jorydywareuge enuie tagi . ca Pao Kurirewy utugarenure Jesusce . Dykodire care tameartorure Jesusji . nowy inodu kodire Jesus Cristo utugaregenure tagi jamedy . Dykodire emare ure boe jamedy boe maku tagai . Ure iwadary maku tagai . Ure Apolo makore jiboe maku tagai . Ure Pedro makore jiboe maku tagai . Ure awu moto kejewyge erduware jiboe maku tagai . Umode tamugu pemegado . Emare jorydyware tawimode kejewy meriji . Emare jorydyware nuba boere tai . Jorydyware nuba boemode tai rugadu tuwo boe pemegado tagai rugadu jii toro rugadu.

4 1 Iwo tawie . Jesus Cristo utugaregenure cegi . Jesus Cristo meartorure cei Dykodire ure Pao Kurirewy batary biadowu maku cenai cetu pemegawo ji . Marigudu boe erduwakare nowy Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Aino care cenure boe ewie nowy boe erduwakare jiwu Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Pao Kurirewy batary remawu jire cenagoino . Dykodire care tameartorudo cei tawo taro udo turugadu cei . 2 Boe eimijerage emeartorumode tudugaregei dykeje nowy etugarege erowo tu nowy tugimijerage etaidure jiboeji rugadu . Ainore cerore jamedy nono nowy boe etugarege ero mogadure . 3 Tagaiwomode ceroji ia cero pegarewy bagai mare imorora magadukare . Itaura butugugodyre . Boe etaiwomode ceroji rugadu . Mare Pagimijera Jesus emare mako pegamode ia cero pegareuji . Imi karega . Imago pegamodukare ia ceroji . Itaiwore ia cero pegarewy bagai mare iorydykare ji . Mare ia cero pegarewy mode dykeje Pagimijera Jesus jorydymode ji rugadu . Emare mako pegamode cero pegareuji cewiagai . Dujire cewiapagamode cemeartorumode . 5 Dykodire akekaba tai tamago pegawo boe ero pegareuji . Du tabagado Jesus bagai . Jesus aregodymode pugeje dykeje emare aiwomode boe erore jiboeji rugadu ero pegarewy bagai . Boe emode turore jiboe biado mare Jesus jorydyware ji marigudu . Umode boe erduwado erore jiboeji rugadu . Boe emode tumeardae biado mare Jesus jorydyware ji marigudu . Umode boe erduwado emeardaeji rugadu . Dykejere Pao Kurirewy mako pemegamode boe ero pemegareuji , emeardae pemegareuji . Mako pegamode ero pegareuji emeardae pegareuji jamedy . 6 Imedagenure tagi . Ia tagi tagagore meartorure Apolo jiwyge enuie tagi . Tagagoino aino dutabo tamago pegare imagore jiboeji . Ia tagi tagagore meartorure Paulo jiwyge enuie tagi . Tagagoino aino dutabo tamago pegare Apolo makore jiboeji . Dykodire inagoino tai tamago pegakawo boe erore jiboeji . Ainore boe egore : Ameardae kaba ia ameardaeji boei Pao Kurirewy batary remawu piji . Dykodire tardu kurikaba ia boei tardu pegawo ia boei jamedy . Mare tardu kurido eiamedy boei puapo . 7 Kocare tagagore tarduwaie rugadu . Kocare tagagore tagoe kurie rugadu . Mare taigoia karega tare tagoedo . Taigoia karega tare tarduwado . Pao Kurirewy koiare ure tagoe rugadu maku tagai . Ure tarduware jiboe rugadu maku tagai . Dykodire care tagojarokaba tagoeji . Tagojarokaba tarduware jiboeji . 8 Kocare tagagore tagoeie , tagoe kurie . Kocare tagagore jorydywareuge enuie tagi kodie boe eimijerage enuie tagi . Mare tagagore boe eimijerage kaie gure cegi . Boe eimijerage emode tagi rugadu dykeje boe eimijerage emode cegi jamedy . Mare Pao Kurirewy utugaregenure cegi . Dykodire boe eimijerage karugure tagi jamedy . 9 Iwo tawie rugadu . Uture Jesus batary tabowugenure cegi rugadu . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure boe etugaregedo cegi . Ure cedo nono ia bitodumodewu boe emogadure boe egai . Boe etaiwore boe pegare cei duji . Baru tadawyge etaiwore boe pegare cei duji . Ainore imeardaere . 10 cemeartorure Jesus Cristoji Dykodire boe egore jorydywa bokwareuge enuie cegi . Kocare tagagore tameartoruie Jesus Cristoji Dykodire jorydywareuge enuie tagi . Pagare tagagoino . cemeartorure Jesus Cristoji Dykodire boe egore ceragakaie . Kocare tagagore taragaie . Pagare tagagoino . cemeartorure Jesusji Dykodire boe erdu pegare cei . Kocare tagagore boe eie tugimijeragedo tagi . Pagare tagagoino . 11 cewiapagakare cewo boe pemegado cei . cewiapagare tu cemeartoruwo Jesus Cristoji tu rugadu . Dykodire jii aino cege boire cei . Pobo boire cei . cegudau aroia pega . Boe ere boeto cei . cewai bokware . Dykodire cemeru pagare aino boe parugajeje . 12 cemaragody rakare Dykodire cemedygodyre rugadu . Boe emago pegare cei mare cere cemago pemegado ei nowy ewadary pegarewy jipagi . Boe ero pegare cei mare cegorigodykare erore aino cei duji . 13 Boe emago pegare cerore jiboeji mare cemago pegakare erore jiboeji ewadary pegarewy jipagi . Boe etaidure tuwo cewarigu tubiji nono ture ia aroia pegagodyrewy barigu dumogadure . Jii aino boe emeardae pegare cei rugadu . 14 Inure tawie aino awu padure bapera kejewy imeardaeji . Mare itaidukare iwo tabogurudo tameardaere jiboeji . Itaidure iwo tarduwado nono boe emode tumearydy kurire jiwu tore erduwado dumogadure . 15 Nono boe emagamode tuwo tarduwado Jesus jiwu bakaru pemegareuji tuietu pemegawo tai mare imire ire tarduwado Jesus jiwu bakaru pemegareuji boetoji . Awu iwadary koiare ure tameartorudo Jesusji . Dykodire ire ido nono tao mogadure . 16 Dykodire inogoa maguduwo tai . Tarodo nono iro mogadure . 17 Dykodire ire imedy Timóteo utudo tawagai . Emare meartoru kurire Jesus batary ji . Dykodire ure nono imearydy kurire jiwu itonaregedy mogadure . Emare umode tarduwado pugeje irore jiboeji . Imeartorure Jesus Cristoji Dykodire imeardaere nono Jesus meardae mogadure . nowy Jesus meardae koiare ure irore jiboe udo tuginai nowy mariguduwu irore jiboe piji . Ire meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe erduwado nowy Jesus meardae pemegareuji moto jamedy boe parugajeje . 18 Ia tagi tameardaere itaregodymodukaie tagae pugeje . Dykodire tagojarore tai . Tagagore Pao Kurirewy Uwari uie turaga maku tagai . 19 Mare itaregodymode kuri aino tagae rugadu iorydywo nowy ocarore puduiwyge erore jiboeji rugadu . Pagimijera aidumode dykeje itaregodymode rugadu . Itaregodymode dykeje itaiwomode erore jiboeji Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure turaga maku etai dubagai . Nono imearydymode ewadary ji iwija tabo rugadu . Iorydymode erore jiboeji ioku tabo rugadu . 20 Iwo tawie . Boe egomode tumeartoruie Pao Kurireuji mare tu tumago tabo karega boe emeartorumode tugimijeraji . Turore jiboe jamedy boe tabore boe emeartorumode tugimijeraji . Nono nowy boe emeartoruwo Pao Kurirewy batary ji rugadu turo jamedy boe tabo tuwo tugimijerado Pao Kurireuce . Mare paga karega . Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode turaga maku etai dykeje eragamode tumeartoruwo Pao Kurirewy batary ji rugadu . 21 Nuba tameardaere ? Itaregodymode tagae dykeje kaba ia taro jiba iorydymode ? Pagare tagagoino tameartoruie Pao Kurireuji kana ? Boe rugadu kana tameartorure Pao Kurireuji rugadu tarore jiboe jamedy boe tabo ? Pagamode tagagoino dykeje imago rakamode tarore jiboeji iwo taro jetorodo nono Pao Kurirewy meardae mogadure . Mare boe rugadu mode tagagoino dykeje imago pemegamode tarore jiboeji . Nono itaura butugumode tai . Tarduwamode imearydy kurire tai dyji rugadu.

5 1 Mare aino care boe ere iwie tarore jiboeji . Ia tamedia imedy ro pegare rugadu . Ro pegareuge erokare aino . Mare awu imedy ro pegare ro pegareuge ero kori . Jeribarire tuo oredyjeji mare tuje ji karega . 2 Kocare tardu pagakare nowy tamedia ro pegareuji . Kocare tagojarore tarore aino duji . Ukare turugadu ! Tagiarigodydo nowy imedy ro pegareuji . Tamode bato pui mare nowy imedy apo karega . Ukawo bato pui tagabo . 3 Tamode bato pui tamagowo Jesus batary ji pui dykeje iragoje jaere tabiji . Mare iwia kurure toro imugure tagabo duji . Dykodire tare nono iragojere tagabo dumogadure . Dykodire care imago pegare nowy imedy ro pegare dyji rugadu . Mare paga karega . Pagimijera Jesus jorydy pegare nowy imedy ro pegare dyji Dykodire imago pegare aino ji . Tamode bato pui dykeje iragojemode tagabo mare iwiabutu tabo . Tamode bato pui dykeje Pagimijera Jesus rakojemode tagabo jamedy mare turaga tabo rugadu . 5 Dykodire tamode awu imedy maku bope doge eimijera uwari bope ai uwo boe pegado nowy imedyji . Mare paga karega nowy imedy uwo tudo nono birewy mogadure dubagai kodire taromode aino ji . Mare bi ji karega inagoino . Biapagakawo tuwodure tabowu tumeardae pegareuji pugeje . Dujire inagoino . Nono umode tugera ra nowy turo pegarewy piji rugadu . Dykodire Pagimijera Jesus aregodymode pugeje dykeje umode awu imedy udo cinorudo rugadu . 6 Dykodire inagoino tai . Tagojarokaba tarore jiboeji . Tarduware boe ewadary ji . Egore : Fermento biagarewy tabore boe emode pão barodudo rugadu. Ainore boe egore . 7 Nono boe ero pegarewy ure nono fermento mogadure . Mare fermento ji karega inagoino . Taro pegarewy jire inagoino . Taro pegarewy umode tameardae jamedy boe pegado . Dujire inagoino . ca taro pegarewy barigu tabiji . Tamode tagera ra taro pegarewy piji dykeje tabemegamode , tameardae pemegamode jamedy . Tamode nono amirewy remawu mogadure . Mare amirewy ji karega inagoino . Tabemegamode , tameardae pemegamode tawo taro pemegado . Dujire inagoino . Mare tameartorure Jesusji Dykodire ure tabemegado marigudu . Aino tamode tagera ra taro pegarewy piji pugeje tabemegamode nono tamogadure rugadu . Mare paga karega . Jesus Cristo bire boe ero pegarewy morice Dykodire ure nono boe ere bitowu Páscoa kejewy cordeiro mogadure . Mare cordeiro ji karega inagoino . Emare bire paro pegarewy morice rugadu . Dujire inagoino . 8 Dykodire pawo pawadae tawuje . Pawo udo nono nowy Judeu doge egore Páscoa aino jiwu ewadae mogadure . Mare pawadae ji karega inagoino . Pameartoru pemegawo Jesus batary ji paegare tabo . Dujire inagoino . Pawo paro pegarewy barigu pabiji . Pawo pameardae pegarewy barigu pabiji . Dujire inagoino . Paro pemegawo . Pameartoruwo boe remawuji . Pamagowo boe remawuji boe ewiagai . Dujire inagoino . 9 Ire bapera atugodo tawagai marigudu . Dutabore ire tawie tawo tagera ra jeribarire tumugukare apowyge ime areme epiji . Taburedykaba ei . 10 Mare meartorukare Jesus jiwyge ei karega inagoino . Meartorukare Jesus jiwyge eribarire tumugukare apowugei . Enogwa kidure tu pudai diero keje . Erdupegare boe enoe bagai pudai . Ekiwogu kigodyre rugadu . Emeartorure tuwai tadawu santo dogei jamedy . Tarduware marigudu tarokawo nono awu ro pegareuge meartorukare Jesus jiwyge ero mogadure . Mare eragojere moto jamedy boe parugajeje . Dykodire taroiwakare taduwo epiji . 11 Mare ia boe egore tumeartoruie Jesusji mare ero pegare kimo nono awu ro pegareuge ero mogadure . Eire inagoino tawo tagera ra epiji . Eribarire tumugukare apowugei rugadu . Enogwa kidure tu pudai diero keje . Emeartorure bai tadawu santoji . Emago pegare ro pemegareugei . Ekudu kigodyre pigakuruce . Ekiwogu kigodyre . Egore tumeartoruie Jesusji mare pagatyje . Eire inagoino tawo tagera ra epiji rugadu . Tagaba tamedagedo emage . Tagaba tamugudo ebo . Tagoagekaba ebo jamedy . 12 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure tuwadary bu bapera keje . Akore : Tamode ro pegarewy utudo tabiji ukawo bato pui tagabo . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore . Mare meartorukare puduiwyge ei karega akoino . Pagi karega pagaiwomodukare meartorukare Jesus jiwyge erore jiboeji . Emare aiwomode meartorukare puduiwyge erore jiboeji ero pegarewy bagai . Mare nowy egore tumeartoruie Jesus jiwyge eire pagaiwomode ero pegarewy bagai . Ere bato pui pagabo Dykodire pagaiwomode erore jiboeji rugadu ero pegarewy bagai rugadu . Dujire Pao Kurirewy akoino ekawo bato pui meartorure puduiwugebo pugeje.

6 1 Ia tagi tagorigodyre pui pu roredy boeji . Dykejere tadure meartorukare Jesus jiwu boe eimijera ae uwo tarduwado tarore jiboeji uwo tamugu pemegado tarore jiboe piji . Kodiba taroino ? Ukare turugadu . Kodiba tamagokare meartorure Jesus jiwyge boe eimijerage ewagai ewo tabemegado pui tarore jiboe piji ? 2 Tarduwa bokware . Ia meri keje Pao Kurirewy uwobe emagere etaiwomode boe eiamedy boe erore jiboeji ero pegarewy bagai . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge mode tagi dykeje Pao Kurirewy uwobe mode tagi rugadu . Dykodire tagaiwomode boe eiamedy boe erore jiboeji . Mare kocare taroiwakare tawo ia taro pegarewy biagarewy tawyje tabiji tawo tabemegado pui pugeje . 3 Tarduwa bokware . Ia meri keje pagaiwomode Pao Kurirewy utugarege baru tadawyge erore jiboeji . Kocare taroiwakare tagaiwowo moto kejewy tarore jiboeji . 4 Kocare tadure meartorukare Jesus jiwyge boe eimijerage etae etaiwowo tarore jiboeji emagowo tai nuba taromode . 5 Taro pega ! Iwo tabogurudo tarore jitu bagaire inagoino tai . O kocare ia jorydywarewy mugure nono tagabo ? Ma kocare tagaidukanure ji na ? 6 Meartorure Jesus jiwugenure tagi Dykodire tamedagenure pugi . Ma kocare tagorigodyre pui . Kocare tadure meartorukare Jesus jiwyge boe eimijerage etae etaiwowo tarore jiboeji taro pegarewy bagai taro pemegarewy bagai jamedy . Ukare turugadu ! 7 Tadure boe eimijera bagai aiwowo tarore jiboeji tumagowo tai nuba taromode pui tamugu pemegawo pu apo dykeje nowu inodu pegare rugadu ukare turugadu ! Ia meartorure Jesus jiwu ro pegamode tai mare tagaba rore taidu morido . Ia meartorure Jesus jiwu iwogumode tai mare tagaba rore taidu morido . 8 Mare kocare taro pegare pui puibagi . Tagiwogure pui puibagi jamedy . Meartorure Jesus jiwugenure tagi . Tamedagenure pugi . Kocare tarore aino ! 9 Tarduware Pao Kurirewy meardaeji . Ro pegareuge ekare tugimijerado Pao Kurireuce Dykodire Pao Kurirewy umodukare emugudo baru tada rugadu . Tagaba taekiripagado . Ro pegarewy tuieribare tabowyge , meartorure tuwai tadawu santo jiwyge , jeribarire toredyje pijiwyge , jeribarire toredy pijiwyge , ime ere tugerago dieroji tuieribari tabowyge , jeribarire puiwyge ime , jeribarire puiwyge areme nouge emugumodukare baru tada rugadu . 10 Iwogu kigodyreuge , okwa kidure tu pudaiwyge , korigodyre tumedage enoe bagaiwyge , uké kurure jiwyge , mako pegare boe ero jiwyge , iwogure tumedage enoroe jiwyge , nouge emugumodukare baru tada jamedy . Ekare tugimijerado Pao Kurireuce Dykodire Pao Kurirewy umodukare emugudo baru tada . 11 Marigudu tagi tarore awu taro pegarewy boeji jamedy . Mare aino care Pagimijera Jesus Cristo Pao Kurirewy Uwari apo ere tagaimo . Mare boe etaimodu ji karega inagoino . Ere taro pegarewy barigu tabiji . Dujire inagoino . Ere tado taginai taro pegarewy piji taro pemegawo . Ere tugerago tai pudae tuwo tado nono ro pemegareuge emogadure . Dujire inagoino . 12 Ia tagi tagagore : Meartorure Jesus jiwyge emeartorumodukare Judeu doge eno bakaruji pugeje Dykodire parowo pagaidure jiwu parore jiboe jamedy boeji . Pao Kurirewy jorydy pegamodukare paromode ainoduji . Boe jokodu jire tagagoino . Imi jamedy imeartorumodukare Judeu doge eno bakaruji pugeje . Iromode itaidure jiwu irore jiboeji . Mare pagaidure jiboe jamedy boe karega pemegare pai . Dykodire ire imeardae tawyje irokawo nowy pemegakare iwu iroji pugeje . Iromode itaidure jiwu irore jiboeji . Mare itaidumodukare iwo ikera ra nowy iro piji pugeje dykeje imode ikera ra nowy iro pegarewy piji rugadu . Imodukare irore jiboe udo boe pegado i pugeje . 13 Ia tagi tagagore : Page boire pai kodi pagwagemode . Pao Kurirewy jorydy pegamodukare parore ainoduji . Mare boe eke ji karega tagagoino . Taro pegarewy jire tagagoino . Tagagore : Boe etaidure aredyji nono taidu moga tuge jitu mogadure . Boe emodukare tugerago aredyji dykeje boe pegamode ei nono boe pegare uke bokworewy jitu mogadure . Ainore tagagore . Mare tagaidure taro pegawo taeribari pagawo pui . Dujire tagagoino . nowy tameardae ukare turugadu . Tameardae pegare . Pao Kurirewy ure boe etowuje rugadu mare boe emeartoruwo pudui dubagai Pao Kurirewy roino . Dykodire pameartoruwo Pao Kurirewy batary ji rugadu utugaregewo pagi . Dykodire paeribarikawo pagoredyje piji , pagoredy piji . Toro ia meri keje Pao Kurirewy umode pagody pawiri akedydo . Pameartorure Jesusji Dykodire umode pagody maiwu pawiri maiwu maku pagai . Dykodire boe eke boimodukare pai pugeje . Pagimijera Kurirewynure ema kodi . Turaga tabore Pao Kurirewy ure Jesus jewodudo pugeje . Dykodire umode paewodudo pugeje jamedy turaga tabo rugadu . 15 Tameartorure Jesusji Dykodire tare nono Jesus Cristo biri mogadure . Tagodyre nono Jesus Cristo kodu mogadure jamedy . Mare Jesus biri ji karega inagoino . Jesus kodu ji karega inagoino . Jesus rakojere tagabo . Dujire inagoino . Dykodire tabadumode ia aredy ure tugerago dieroji tuieribari tabowudo apo nowy taro ukare turugadu ! nowy taro pegare . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary mako pemegare . Akore : Imedy mugumode aredapo dykeje ere nono mitotu puapo turoi pui dutabo Pao Kurirewy jakai . Dykodire imedy jeribarimode nowy jeribarire diero bagaiwu aredyji dykeje emode nono mitotu puapo turoi pui dutabo Pao Kurirewy jakai jamedy . Tarduware . 17 Mare tamode tamagu Pagimijera Jesus ai dykeje tameardaere jiboe umode mitotyje tameartoruwo Jesusji jitu tabo . Tameartorumodukare ia boe emeardae pegareuji pugeje . 18 Taeribarikaba tawire epiji tagoge epiji ia tamugukare apowugei . Boe emode boe pegado ia boei turo pegarewy jamedy boe tabo . Mare boe eribarimode toredyje piji toredy piji dykeje tuwiri jire tugody jire boe emode boe pegado rugadu . 19 Pao Kurirewy Uwari mugure meartorure Jesus jiwyge etada . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy Uwari uwainure tagi . Pao Kurirewy ure Tuwari maku tagai rugadu . Tarduware nowy inoduji marigudu . Dykodire tagimijera karugure tagi . Pao Kurirewy emare tagimijeranure ema . Kocare tarduwakare nowy inoduji ? 20 Ure akirodo tai . Tamori kurire rugadu . Mare diero ji karega inagoino . Jesus bire tamugato . Dujire inagoino . Jesus ure tugu redo taro pegarewy morice . Dujire inagoino . Dykodire care tarore jiboe tagody tabo udo turugadu Pao Kurirewy jakai tameartoru tabo ji uwo tamugu pemegado boe emago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji rugadu.

7 1 Tare atugoreboe maku iwagai . Dutabore tanarare i Pao Kurirewy meardae bagai . Tagagore imedy mugumodukaie aredy apo du pegamodukaie . 2 Mare iwo tawie . Boe eribari pagare pui tu tyje . Dykodire imagowo tai . Imedy muguwo tu toredyje remawudo apo . Aredy muguwo tu toredy remawu apo . 3 Imedy umode tugerago tu toredyje remawudoji . Aredy umode tumagu tu toredy remawu ai . Dykodire emugure puapo . Oredyje jetorimodukare toredyji . Oredy jetorimodukare toredyjeji . Aredy umodukare tumeardae tawyje tuginaigody tuieribariwo . nowy oredy umode tumeardae maku toredyje ai ewo tumeardae maku puai . Aino jamedy imedy umodukare tumeardae tawyje tuginaigody tuieribariwo . nowy oredyje umode tumeardae maku toredy ai jamedy ewo tumeardae maku puai emeardaewo nono pumeardae mogadure . 5 Emode tumeardae maku puai tuwo tugera ra tieribarire pui dupiji jao tumagowo Pao Kurirewy bagai baruto du pegakare . Mare nowy emagore baruto jiwu meri akedyre dykeje ure turugadu ewo tugirimi puae pugeje . Nono ero pemeganure pui . Aredy umodukare tumagu toredy ai dykeje mareboe umode oredy aora pegado jemaruwo ia aredy bagai toredyje piji . Rakamodukare tuwo turo pemegado . Imedy aidumodukare tuwo tugerago toredyjeji dykeje mareboe umode nowy oredyje aora pegado jemaruwo toro ia imedy bagai toredy piji . Rakamodukare tuwo turo pemegado jamedy . Mare mugure puapowyge emode tumagu puai dykeje boe pegamodukare ei . Eragamode puapo turo pemegawo rugadu . 6 Tanarare i iwadary bagai . Dykodire inagoino . 7 Mare itaidure tarowo nono iro mogadure . Itoredyje bokware . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure meartorure puduiwyge edo turugadu tumeardae tabo . Umode turaga maku meartorure puduiwyge etai rugadu emeartoru pemegawo pudui rugadu . Dykodire iage etuwire bokware . Mare iage etuwiremode rugadu . Mare nono Pao Kurirewy meardae mogadure . 8 Imagowo iparei , imei , okoge bokwareugei jamedy . Tagaidumode tagogekawo pugeje tawirekawo pugeje tawo nono ire . Du pegakare . 9 Mare taroiwamodukare tawo tagera ra taeribari piji dykeje tamugudo apo rugadu . Imedy akore tumugumodukaie aredapo mare aidu kurire kimo tuwo tugerago aremei dykeje ukare turugadu . nowy imedy muguwo aredy apo rugadu . Dure ure turugadu . Aredy akore togogemodukaie mare aidu kurire kimo tuwo tumagu ime etai dykeje ukare turugadu . nowy aredy muguwo imedy apo rugadu . Dure ure turugadu . 10 care imagowo Pao Kurirewy batary ji okogereuge ewiagai , uwirereuge ewiagai . Iwadary karega . Pao Kurirewy batary reo . Ainore akore aremei : Tagaba tagera ra tagoredy piji . 11 Mare aredy umode tugera ra toredy piji dykeje mugukawo ia imedapo pugeje jii toro rugadu . Mare aidure togogewo pugeje dykeje uwo tugirimi tu nowy toredy ae pugeje tu rugadu . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore aremei . Makore imei jamedy . Akore : Tagaba tagera ra tagoredyje piji rugadu . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore . 12 care imagomode boei jamedy . Mare iwo tawie Pao Kurirewy meardaeji . Imedy mugure toredyje apo marigudu . Aino maigody nowy imedy meartorure Jesusji mare nowy oredyje meartorukare ji raga . nowy aredy aidumode kimo tumuguwo toredapo dykeje awu imedy ukawo tugera ra nowy toredyje piji . Tarowo aino rugadu . 13 Aredy mugure toredy apo marigudu jamedy . Aino maigody nowy aredy meartorure Jesusji mare oredy meartorukare Jesusji raga . nowy meartorukare Jesus jiwu imedy aidumode kimo tumuguwo nowy toredyje apo dykeje nowy aredy ukawo tugera ra nowy toredy piji . Tarowo aino rugadu . 14 Mare paga karega . Aredy meartorure Jesusji dykeje Pao Kurirewy jorydy pegamodukare nowy mugure apowu imedyji . nowy imedy meartorukare Jesusji raga mare Pao Kurirewy jorydy pegamodukare ji . Mare paga karega . Emugure puapo kodi . Ainore boere imedyji jamedy . Imedy meartorure Jesusji dykeje Pao Kurirewy jorydy pegamodukare nowy mugure apowu aredyji . nowy aredy meartorukare Jesusji raga mare Pao Kurirewy jorydy pegamodukare ji . Mare paga karega . Emugure puapo kodi . Aino ia meartorure Jesusji mare emugu kimore puapo . Du pegakare Pao Kurirewy jakai . Du jire inagoino . Pao Kurirewy aidumodukare emugure puapo dyji dykeje romode etorei nono turo moga meartoru bokwareugei dumogadure ro pegamode ei . Mare aidure emugure puapo dyji rugadu . Dykodire ro pemegamode etorei jamedy . 15 Mare meartorukare Jesus jiwu aidukare toredyje meartorure Jesus jituji . Dykodire ure tugera ra toredyje piji rugadu . Du Pao Kurirewy jorydy pegakare nowy aredyji . nowy meartorure Jesus jiwudo jorydy pegakawo nowy toredy ure tugera ra tubiji duji . Pao Kurirewy aidure boe emugu pemegawo puapo . Ainore boere imedyji jamedy . Meartorukare Jesus jiwudo oredyje aidukare toredy meartorure Jesus jituji . Dykodire ure tugera ra toredy piji rugadu . Du Pao Kurirewy jorydy pegakare nowy imedyji . nowy meartorure Jesus jiwu imedy jorydy pegakawo nowy toredyje ure tugera ra tubiji dyji jamedy . Pao Kurirewy aidure boe emugu pemegawo puapo . 16 care meartorure Jesus jiwu aredy aidure toredy meartoruwo Jesusji mare boe erduwakare oredy aidumode dubagai . Meartorure Jesus jiwu imedy aidure toredyje meartoruwo Jesusji mare boe erduwakare oredyje aidumode dubagai . 17 Pao Kurirewy makore tawagai . Dykodire care tarodo nono Pagimijera ure maku tagaiwu taroji . Mare tado nono tare marigudu . Ainore imagore meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boei . Mare boe emeardae pegarewy boe ero pegarewy ji karega inagoino . Ia tagi tare tawaga oto biri kadowyge Judeu dogenure tagi . Pao Kurirewy makore tawagai dukodi karega tamode tagera ra Judeu doge ero pemegarewy boe piji . Du jire inagoino . Tameartorumode Pao Kurireuji rugadu mare tagaba tagera ra Judeu doge ero pemegarewy piji . Tameartorumode Pao Kurireuji mare tagaba tado nono nowy ure tuwaga oto biri kadodykareuge emogadure . Du jire inagoino . ca ia tagi ukare tuwaga oto biri kadowyge boe tuginaiwugenure tagi . Pao Kurirewy makore tawagai Dykodire tameartorure ji . Mare dukodi karega tamode tagera ra tawobe ero pemegarewy boe piji . Tameartorumode Pao Kurireuji mare tagaba tagera ra tawobe ero pemegarewy boe piji rugadu . Tagaba tado nono nowy ure tuwaga oto biri kadowyge Judeu doge emogadure . 19 Ure tuwaga oto biri kadowyge bagai karega Pao Kurirewy aiwore pugeje . Boe ekare tuwaga oto biri kado dubagai karega Pao Kurirewy aiwore . Pao Kurirewy aiwore nowy meartorure tuwadary jiwyge ewagai tu rugadu . 20 Pao Kurirewy makore tawagai . Dykodire tameartorure Pao Kurireuji . Mare tameartorure Pao Kurirewy jitu kodi karega tamode tagera ra tamaragodae piji . 21 Ia tagi boe ere tugerago tai turaga tabo tuwo tudugaregedo tagi . Dykodire tamaragodae rakare tai . Mare tamorora magadukaba . Tamaragody pemegado nowy tagimijera ure maku tagaiwu tamaragodaeji . Tagaba tagera ra tagimijerage epiji . Mare tagimijerage etaidure tuwo taginorudo tamaragodae rakarewy piji taduwo ia tamaragodae pemegarewy ka dykeje tadudo rugadu tawo tagamudo nowy tamaragodae rakarewy piji . 22 Ia tagi boe ere tugerago tai turaga tabo tuwo tudugaregedo tagi . Tameartorure Jesusji mare tamaragodae rakare tai kimo . Mare tameartorure Jesusji Dykodire ure taginorudo taro pegarewy piji . Dykodire tare tagamudo nowy taro pegarewy piji . Tamaragodae rakare tai mare tare tagamudo nowy taro pegarewy boe piji . Ia tagi boe etugarege karugure tagi . Tamaragodyre tu tagai rugadu . Mare aino Jesus makore tawagai Dykodire ure tudugaregedo tagi rugadu . 23 Pao Kurirewy ure akirodo tai . Taro pegarewy mori kurire . Dykodire Jesus bire taro pegarewy morice . Dujire inagoino . Dykodire tagaba tagirimi boe emeardae pegarewy ka pugeje . Tawiapagakaba boe emeardae pegareuji pugeje . Tamode tagirimi boe emeardae pegarewy ka dykeje nowy boe emeardae pegarewy etugarege emode tagi rugadu . Dykodire inagoino tai tagawo tagirimi emeardae pegarewy ka pugeje . 24 Imedagenure tagi . Tameartoru rakamode Jesusji dykeje tamugu pemegamode Pao Kurirewy apo . ca boe etugaregenure tagi . Boe kurireugenure tagi . Mare tamorora magudukaba . Tameartorure Jesusji dukodi karega tamode tagera ra tamaragodae piji . Tamaragody pemegado tamaragodaeji . Ainore taromode tameartoru pemegawo Pao Kurireuji rugadu . 25 Tanarare nogware maiwyge ero bagai . Padukare ia Pao Kurirewy batary keje . Mare Pagimijera okudugodyre itabo Dykodire iorydyware Pagimijera meardaeji . Dykodire inogituwamode tai nono Pao Kurirewy meardae mogadure . 26 Boe rakare meartorure Jesus jiwugei . Dykodire boe rakare tai rugadu . Dykodire care tamode nono tare du pegakare . 27 nowy mugure toredyje apowugenure ia tagi . Dykodire imode tawie . Tagaba tagera ra tagoredyje piji . Mare ia tagi uwire bokwareuge imenure tagi . Iwo tawie jamedy . Taemarukaba ia aredy bagai tawirewo . 28 Mare tawiremode dykeje pegakare jamedy . Taro pegakare . Nogwaredy okogemode dykeje pegakare . Ro pegakare . Mare boe emugumode puapo dykeje boe ewiagoromode toredyjeji , torei jamedy . Mare paga karega boe rakamode ei dykeje morora magadumode ei tuwo boe pemegado ei . Mare uwire bokwareuge ewiagorokare iaboeji iaboeji ure mitotyje dukodi . Dykodire inagoino tai tawiagorokawo aredy bagai , imedy bagai . 29 Boe puredygodyre boe jamedy boe akedywo rugadu . Imedagenure tagi . Dykodire inagoino tai . nowy uwirerewy ime ewiagorokawo tuwaiji pugeje toeji pugeje . Mare ewiagorowo tu tumeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji jii toro . 30 Ragudureuge ewiagorokawo traguduji pugeje , ewiagorowo tu tumeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji jii toro . Jakarere puduiwyge ewiagorokawo tuiegareji pugeje , ewiagorowo tu tumeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji jii toro . Boe emode akirodo boe enoeji . Mare nowy boe ewiagorokawo nowy ture akirodo jiboeji pugeje ewiagorowo tu tumeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji tu rugadu jii toro . 31 Biagorore toe jiwyge ewiagorokawo toeji pugeje . Ire tawie aino . Mare paga karega . Awu tardu kejewy jiwu moto , awu tarduware jiwu baru akedymode rugadu kuri aino rugadu . Dykodire inagoino tai tawiagorowo tu tameartoruwo Pao Kurireuji tu rugadu . 32 Itaidure iwo tameardae mekido tawiagorore jiboe piji tameartoruwo Pao Kurireuji tu rugadu . Uwirekarewy imedy meardaere tu tumaragodywo Pao Kurirewy maragodaeji . Aidure tuwo Pagimijera jakaredo pudui . 33 Mare imedy uwiremode dykeje morora magadumode toe bagai , tuge bagai tuwo toredyje jakaredo pudui . Mare aidure tumaragodywo Pao Kurirewy maragodaeji jamedy . 34 Dykodire aidure jiwu maragodaere pobe . Pudaire Pao Kurirewy ai jamedy . Ainore boere aredy okogereudoji jamedy . Aredy okogere dykeje biagorore tuwo toredy jakaredo jamedy . Mare okoge bokwarewy aredy , okoge bokwarewy nogoaredy ewiagorore tu Pagimijera Jesus maragodaeji . Etaidure tumaragodywo tu Pao Kurirewy ai rugadu turaga tabo tumeardae jamedy boe tabo rugadu . 35 Itaidure iwo boe pemegado tai . Dykodire inagoino . Itaidukare iwo taro akedydo . Mare itaidure tawo taro jetorodo . Itaidure taro pemegawo . Itaidure tamaragodywo rugadu Pagimijera ai utugaregewo tagi rugadu . 36 Imedy aidure nogoaredyji . Mearydy kurire ji rugadu . Jorydyware turo pegakare nowy nogoaredy jituji . Aidure tumuguwo apo rugadu . Mare meardaere turo pegarumode Pao Kurirewy jakai tumugumode apo duji . Mare etaidure pui . Iwo tawie . Emuguwo puapo rugadu . Emugumode puapo du pegakare Pao Kurirewy jakai rugadu . 37 Mare ia imedy meardaere tuwirekawo rugadu . Emare jorydyware tuwo turo jetorodo . Ure tumeardae tawyje rugadu . Nono pegakare uwirekawo rugadu . 38 Imedy uwiremode du pegakare . Mare ia imedy uwiremodukare du pemegare rugadu . 39 Aredy meartorumode toredyji jii toro toredy bire du ka . Mugukawo ia imedy apo pugeje . Mare oredy bire dykeje aredy meardaere tumuguwo ia imedapo pugeje . Du pegakare . Mare nowy aredy muguwo tu meartorure Jesus jiwu imedapo tu rugadu . 40 Mare nowy aredy okogemodukare pugeje dykeje jakaregodymode rugadu . Ainore imeardaere rugadu . Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojere itada Dykodire iorydyware nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode imeardae udo nono tumeardae mogadure rugadu.

8 1 Tanarare i nuba taromoduie makudure santo doge etaiwu bope doge ekeji . ca boe egore : Paiamedy boe parduware boeji . Ainore boe egore . Boe jokodu jire boe egoino . Mare boe meardaemode tuiorydywaie rugadu dykeje boe enojarogodymode tuwadary ji rugadu . Mare boe emearydy kurimode boei dykeje emago pemegamode nowy boe erore jiboeji tuwo nowy tumedage emeartoru rakado Jesusji rugadu . 2 Boe emeardaemode tuiorydywaie boeji rugadu dykeje emodukare turagado tuiorydywawo iaboeji pugeje . Dykodire nowy boe erduwa pemegamodukare iaboeji pugeje . 3 Mare boe emearydy kuriwo Pao Kurireuji . Pao Kurirewy jorydyware mearydy kurire puduwugei rugadu . 4 Mare Pao Kurirewy ure mitotyje . Ia bokware . Mare boe emeardaere tuwai tadawu santo doge eragaie nono Pao Kurirewy mogadure . Mare pagatu jere boe eroino . Pao Kurirewy karugure emage . Boe ere towujeboenure emage tu rugadu . Mare boe emeardaere boe rakareuge emagaie baru tada , moto keje jamedy . Dykodire ere to santo doge emagado . Ere etowuje tuwo pao kurireugedo emage . Emeartorure nowy ture towujewu santo dogei rugadu Dykodire emode ia tugé maku nowy tuwai tadawu santo doge etai mare pagatyje . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure mitotyje rugadu . Boe Etuo Kurirewynure ema . Emare ure boe eiamedy boe etowuje . Emare ure baru tadawuboe eiamedy boe etowuje . Dykodire pameartoruwo tu Pao Kurirewy batary ji tu rugadu . Pagimijera Kurirewy ure mitotyje . Jesus Cristonure ema . Pao Kurirewy ure Jesus udo boe jamedy boe towuje moto keje , baru tada jamedy . Ema koiare ure paragojedo aino . 7 Mare ia boe erduwakare nowy inoduji . Marigudu emeartorure tuwai tadawu santo dogei rugadu . Dykodire ere ia tugé maku nowy santo doge etai bope doge ekece tu tyje . Mare aino emeartorure Jesusji . Mare erduwakare Jesus meardae jamedy boeji Dykodire emeartoru rakakare ji . Dykodire nowy boe emodukare nowy makudure bope doge etaiwu boe eke ko . Etaidukare ji . Emeardaere bope uwari uké nuie ema duji . Enogoagemode ji dykeje emeardaere turo pega uire . 8 Mare pagare egoino . Pagoagere jiwu pagé umodukare pado pagera ra Pao Kurirewy piji . Pagoagere jiwu pagé umodukare pamugu pemegado Pao Kurirewy apo jamedy . Dykodire inagoino tai . Pagoagemode makudure bope doge etaiwu boe ekéji du pegakare . Pao Kurirewy jorydy pegamodukare parore ainoduji . 9 Mare taeku jado tarore jiboeji . Tamearydy kurido tamedagei . Tagaba emeartoru bokwado . Ia tagi tagoagemode bope uwari ukeji du pegakare tawo ko . Mare ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge erdumode tarore inonoduji erdu pegamode tarore ainoduji dykeje tagaba ko . Mare paga karega emeartoru rakakare Jesusji Dykodire erdu pegare tamode ko duji . Dykodire emode tugera ra Jesus piji . 10 Mare paga karega . Tagoagemode bope uwari ukeji nowy bope uwari uwai ja tada . Nono nowy meartoru rakakare Jesus jiwu jorydymode tarore ainoduji . dykeje emare umode kowuje jamedy . Nono meardae pegamode turore jiboeji . 11 Ture ko dykeje meardae pegamode ture tugera Jesus piji duji . Mare boe rugadu ji karega meardaere . Jesus bire boe ero pegarewy morice . Boe enogoagemode nowy bope uwari ukeji mare ero pega karugure . Tarduware nowy inoduji . Mare nowy tamedia jorydywakare . Dykodire meardae pegare ture ko duji . 12 Dykodire inagoino tai . Tagaba nowy bope uke kowuje nowy tamedia ukawo ko taro kao . Tamode ko dykeje taro peganure nowy meartoru rakakare Jesus jiwu jakai . Tamode nowy tamedia ro pagado taidukare jiboeji . Dykodire taro pegamode Jesus Cristoji jamedy taroino dutabo . 13 Inogoagemode bope uwari ukeji . Mare awu iro koiare umode ia meartorure Jesus jiwu ro pegado dykeje inogoagemodukare nowy bope uwari ukeji pugeje . Imearydy kurire ji dukodi . Imodukare ia meartorure Jesus jiwu ro pegado rugadu.

9 1 Iorydyre Pagimijera Jesusji rugadu . Ure ikinorudo iro pegarewy boe piji rugadu . Makore i ituwo tuwadary tabo boe ewagai rugadu . Dykodire ire tawie nowy Jesus makore to bakaru jiwuji Dykodire tameartorure ji jamedy . 2 Iage emeartorukare i . Egore imagokaie Jesus o bakaru remawuji . Mare tarduware . Tameartorure Jesusji Dykodire tamugu pemegare Pagimijera Jesus apo rugadu . Dykodire boe erduware Jesus o bakaru remawu jire inagoino rugadu . Ia uture Jesus batary tabowunure imi jamedy . 3 Boe emago pegamode iroji dykeje imagomode ewadary jipagi . 4 Iwo boe ewie Jesus o bakaruji imaragodaere tu nowy rugadu . Dykodire ure turugadu rugadu boe eke rogu makuduwo inai imaragodae morice , iworo kuru makuduwo inai imaragodae morice . 5 Itaidumode imuguwo meartorure Jesus jiwu aredapo utuwo itabo jamedy du pegakare . Ainore Pedro rore rugadu . Ainore Pagimijera Jesus uwie mage erore jamedy . Ainore ia uture Jesus batary tabowyge erore jamedy . 6 Ure turugadu cedaidure jiboe jamedy boe makuduwo cenai cemaragodae morice . Mare toro ia boebo imi imedia Barnabé cere ewie Pao Kurirewy batary ji mare ekare tuge maku cenai , tugudure ceboe maku cenai jamedy . Mare cenogomagudu karugure ei . Dykodire cemaragodyre ia cemaragodaeji diero bagai cewo akirodo cege roguji , ceguduwu ceboeji . 7 Mare iwo tawie . Boe eké makudumode tugobaigarege etai . Emodukare akirodo ji . Maragodyre boepa jiwu umode ture tuguboe kowuje . Umodukare akirodo ji . Jeture tapira doge eiwyge ekudumode emoguru kuruce rugadu . Umodukare akirodo ji . 8 Dykodire inagoino tai uie turugadu boe eke makuduwo inai jamedy imaragodae morice . Mare iwo tawie . Pao Kurirewy ure maku Judeu doge etaiwu bakaru akore nono nowy imagore jiboe mogadure jamedy . 9 Moisés ure nowy bakaru bu bapera keje .
