Akore : Boe emode tapira merudo trigo aoji uwo nowy trigo a rawyje nowy cenari piji dykeje tagaba nowy tapira okwa miwuje okoagewo tumaragodytabo jamedy . Ure tuwuredo nowy trigo keje tagai dukodi . Tapira jire Pao Kurirewy akoino . 10 Mare ceire akoino jamedy . Maragodyre boepa jiwu maragodymode to boepaji tugé bagai . nowy boepa tadaboe makudumode nowy maragodyre nowy boepa jiwu ai . nowy boepa tadaboe makudumode nowy ure kadowu ai jamedy . Boepa ji karega cemaragodyre . Jesus o bakaru jire cemaragodyre cewo boe ewie ji rugadu . Dykodire cemaragodyre jiboe moridodywo cenai jamedy . Dujire akoino . 11 cere tawie Jesus jiboeji . Dykodire pemegare rugadu tawo ia tagoe maku cenai cemaragodae morice . 12 Tare ia tagoe maku iaboe etai . cemaragodae pemegare nowy iage emaragodae kori Dykodire pemegare rugadu tawo ia tagoe maku cenai jamedy . Mare cegi cenogwa magudukare tai iaboe bagai . cere ceragado cei . cedaidukare cewo boe pegado tai . Tameartoruwo tu nowy Jesus jiwu bakaru remawuji kodire cere ceragado cei rugadu . 13 Maragodyre Pao Kurirewy uwai tadawyge emode tugerago tugeji nono Pao Kurirewy uwai tada rugadu . Tarduware nowy inoduji . nowy ure boe enomea maku Pao Kurirewy aiwyge emode tugerago ia nowy makudure Pao Kurirewy aiwu tapira koduji tugece . Tarduware nowy inoduji . 14 Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure pawie jamedy boe ewo iaboe maku makore Jesus jiwu batary pemegarewy jiwyge etai . Emagomode Jesus jiwu batary pemegareuji . Emaragodae reno . Dykodire iaboe maku etai emaragodae morice . 15 Imire imagokare iaboe bagai . Ire awu atugoreboe pemegado mare tawo iaboe maku inai dubagai karega . Imagomodukare iaboe bagai rugadu . Inojaromodukare iwadary ji . Imagomode Jesus jiboeji tyje boe emeartoruwo tu ji rugadu . Jesus emare makore i ituwo tuwagaru pemegarewy tabo boe ewagai . Dykodire iture tabo rugadu . Imagomodukare Jesus jiwu batary pemegareuji boe ewiagai dykeje boe pegamode i rugadu ! Dykodire imagore Jesus jiwu batary pemegareuji tu rugadu . Iwadary jire inojaromodukare . Dykodire inogoa magudumodukare iaboe bagai imaragodae morice . Iwimode mare inogoa magudumodukare iaboe bagai imaragodae morice rugadu . 17 Mare imeardae koiamode umode imaragodydo dykeje umode turugadu itaiduwo boe ewo imaragodae morido . Mare imeardae ji karega iroino . Pao Kurirewy emare ure imaragodae maku inai iwo boe ewie Jesus o bakaru remawuji . 18 Dykodire iegarere nowy imaragodaeji . Ire imaragodae morido i iegare tabo . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge emode iaboe maku inai ire ewie Jesus jiwu batary pemegarewy jitu morice du pegakare . Mare inogoa magudumodukare iaboe bagai . Imodukare boe edo iaboe maku inai imaragodae morice . Dujire iegarere i rugadu . Dukodi imaragodae mori reno . 19 Boe etugarege karugure imi . Imaragodykare iaboe etai . Mare itaidure boe eiamedy boe emeartoruwo Jesusji rugadu . Dykodire ire boe etugaregedo imi . 20 Imeartorukare Judeu doge eno bakaruji . Mare Judeu doge emeartorure to bakaruji rugadu . Dykodire iragojere Judeu dogebo dykeje irore nono Judeu doge ero mogadure iwo Judeu doge emeartorudo Jesusji . 21 Boe tuginaiwyge emeartorukare Judeu doge eno bakaruji . Emeartorure turo tuginaiwuji rugadu . Dykodire iragojere boe tuginaiwugebo dykeje irore nono nowy boe tuginaiwyge ero mogadure iwo emeartorudo Jesusji jamedy . Mare ikare ikera ra Pao Kurirewy batary piji . Imeartorure Jesus Cristo batary ji rugadu . 22 Meartoru rakakare Jesus jiwyge epagudu pagamode ia iaboeji . Emeartorumode Jesusji rugadu dykeje epagudumodukare . Mare emeartoru rakakare Jesusji Dykodire epagudu pagare ia iaboece . Iragojemode nowy meartoru rakakare Jesus jiwugebo dykeje iromodukare nowy epagudure ceboece jamedy nono ero emogadure . Mare paga karega iroino . Itaidure iwo emeartorudo rugadu Jesusji Dykodire imodukare epagudu pagado . Itaidure boe emeartoruwo Jesusji rugadu . Dykodire ire iragado i iro pemegawo boe eiamedy boe egai erdu pegakawo imagore jiwu Pao Kurirewy batary ji iage emeartoruwo Jesusji uwo ekinorudo ewarigudukawo bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto . 23 Ainore irore iwo iragado i iwo boe ewie Jesus jiwu batary pemegareuji boe emeartoruwo Jesusji rugadu . Emeartorumode ji dykeje boe pemegamode ei . Nono boe pemegamode i jamedy . Iegaremode i rugadu . 24 Boe eregodymode puapo dykeje nowy aregodyre boetojiwu umode mitotyje . Tameartorudo Jesusji rugadu taraga tabo rugadu . Taromode aino dykeje Jesus umode boe pemegareboe maku tagai nono boe emode boe pemegareboe maku nowy aregodyre boetojiwu ai dumogadure . Mare boe eregody ji karega inagoino . Boe emeartoruwo Jesus jire inagoino . Boe emeartoru remawumode Jesusji dykeje umode boe pemegareboe maku etai . 25 Boe etaidumode tuwaduwo dykeje ewadae rakamode ei rugadu . Dykodire emode turagado nowy tuwadaeji . Emugu pagakaregure . Etaidumode taregodywo boetoji rugadu . Mare paga karega ia mori bagaire eroino . Mare nowy makudure etai mori akedymode kuri je . Mare pamaragodyre Jesus ai uwo boe pemegareboe maku pagai . nowy umode maku pagaiboe akedymodukare rugadu . 26 Dykodire ikare itawyje imaragodae piji . Ire iro jetorodo rugadu . Ire nono ure tugera to puiwu brae ero mogadure . nowy ure tugera to puiwu umode turo kagado turagawo rugadu . 27 Ire iragado i jamedy nono nowy ure tugera to puiwyge ero mogadure . Mare ire rakawo ji karega inagoino . Iwo ikera to imedy dyji karega inagoino . Ire boe pegado i iwo iragado iwo iro jetorodo Pao Kurirewy jakai . Dujire inagoino . Ire iragado i iwo ikera ra iro pegarewy boe piji . Pao Kurirewy jorydy pegakawo i . Dujire inagoino . Imagore boe ewagai emeartoruwo Jesusji . Dykodire imire imeartorumode ji rugadu . Nono Pao Kurirewy jorydy pegamodukare i . Nono toro ia meri keje umode boe pemegareboe maku inai toro baru tada imaragodae morice rugadu.

10 1 Imedagenure tagi . Tawiabutudo mariguduwyge pawoboe ewugeje . Ere nono boe etao pegododyreuge emogadure . Mare etao pegodody ji karega inagoino . Marigudu Pao Kurirewy ure boetugu bu egajeje tuwo edo cinorudo ro pegareuge Egito doge epiji . Dujire inagoino . nowy mariguduwyge pawoboe epagudure mare emeartorure Moiseji . Dykodire emerure nowy boetugu kudo Moisés apo nowy ro pegareuge Egito doge epiji . Dujire inagoino . Pao Kurirewy ure boe kirewy bu taci Pobo Maerewy Kujagurewy oia kajeje nowy mariguduwyge pawoboe ekoduwo jii toro bakawu ka boe kirewy ka . Moisés makore ei ekoduwo toro bakawu ka rugadu . Dykodire ekodure Moisés apo toro bakawu ka rugadu boe kirewy ka rugadu . Dujire inagoino jamedy . Pao Kurirewy ure boetugu bu nowy mariguduwyge egajeje . Pao Kurirewy ure edo tie bu nowy pobo maerewy kajeje . nowy mariguduwyge ekodure Moisés apo rugadu nowy boetugu kudo . Ekodure Moisés apo nowy pobo maerewy kujagurewy kajeje taci boe kirewy ka rugadu jamedy . Dykodire boe erduware meartorure Moisés jiwyge enure emage duji . Dujire inagoino . 3 nowy mariguduwyge pawoboe eiamedy boe enogoagere Pao Kurirewy ure maku etaiwu amireuji . 4 Eiamedy boe ekudure Pao Kurirewy ure maku etaiwu poboce jamedy . nowy pobo ure tudawyje Pao Kurirewy o tori piji . Jesus Cristo koiare ure nowy pobo udo tudawyje nowy tori piji tuwo maku nowy mariguduwyge pawoboe etai . 5 Mare du inodu tabo nowy mariguduwyge pawoboe ere tugera ra tumeartorure Pao Kurirewy jitu piji rugadu . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy aidukare nowy boe erore jiboeji . Dykodire ewire toro boe maerewy keje . 6 Dykodire pawo paeku rakado nowy mariguduwyge Israel doge erore jiboeji parokawo nono ero mogadure . Emage ere tumeardae tawyje turo pegawo tu tyje . Mare aino care pawo pameardae pemegado parokawo nono ero mogadure . 7 Emagere emago pemegare tuwai tadawu tuwari santoji . Etaidure tumeartoruwo ji nono tumeartoru moga Pao Kurirewy jitu mogadure . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary makore nowy mariguduwu Israel doge erore jiboeji rugadu . Akore : nowy boe ere tuwadae tawyje tumago pemegawo nowy boe ewai tadawu tuwari santo dogei dykeje ere tumugudo togoagewo tuguduwo jamedy . Nono ekudu raire . Ewadae pega remawu rugadu . Ewadu raire tumeardae pegarewy jamedy boeji . Aino care parokawo nono ero mogadure . Pawo pameardae pemegado pameartorukawo boe ewai tadawu ewari santo dogei parokawo nono ero mogadure . 8 nowy mariguduwyge Israel doge eribarire tuwire epiji Dykodire etagedyre rugadu . Mare eiamedy karega . Mare nowy meri mitoduji bireuge enodo padure vinte e três mil . Aino care parokawo nono ero mogadure . Paeribarikawo pawire epiji , pagoge epiji . 9 Ia emage ere turokagado Pao Kurireuji . nowy inodu kodi awague ere ewido . ca parokawo nono ero mogadure . Pagawo parokagado Pao Kurireuji . 10 Ia emage emago pegare Pao Kurireuji pu biagai . nowy inodu kodi Pao Kurirewy ure tudugare baru tadawu utudo etae . Nowu utugare baru tadawu iere Umode Boe Ewidowunure Ema . Ema koiare ure etagedydo . ca pamago pegakawo Pao Kurireuji pui . 11 Ainore Pao Kurirewy rore nowy mariguduwu Israel dogei tuwo boe eiamedy boe erduwado tumeardaeji . nowy Pao Kurirewy rore jiboe padure bapera keje tuwo pawie paioku jawo . Dykodire care pagaiwowo nowy baperaji parduwawo Pao Kurirewy meardaeji rugadu boe puredygodyre awu moto akedywo dukodi . Dykodire pawo pameardae pemegado nono Pao Kurirewy aidumogadure . 12 Ia tagi tagagore tameartoru rakaie Pao Kurireuji . Mare taeku jado tagawo tagera ra tameartorure Pao Kurirewy jitu piji . 13 Boe etaidumode tuwo tagaora korau nono turomoga ia tumedagei dumogadure . Bope aidumode tuwo tagaora pegado nono turomoga ia tamedagei dumogadure . Mare Pao Kurirewy akore tumoduie turaga maku meartorure puduiwyge etai . Pao Kurirewy kodumode tuwadary ji tu rugadu . Umode turaga maku tagai rugadu tawudukawo nowy etaora pegarewy rekodaji rugadu . Dykodire Pao Kurirewy umode tarduwado nuba taromode tawo tadawyje nowy boe emeardae pegarewy piji . 14 Dykodire inagoino tai . Imearydy kurire jiwu imedagenure tagi . Tameartorukaba boe ewai tadawu tuwari santoji . 15 Tarduware kodi . Tagaiwodo iwadary ji . Iwadary pegarewy bokware . 16 Pamode bato pui dykeje pagudumode uva kuruce pawiabutuwo Pagimijera Jesus rore jiboe keje . Pagimadumode Pao Kurirewy apo nowy uva kuru paru tabo . Pamode pedo pui paguduwo ce nono pawiabutumode Jesus ku keje . Pagatyje karega . Pawiabutuwo ku keje Dykodire parore aino . Pagoagemode amireuji pawiabutuwo boe pegare Pagimijera Jesus jitu keje jamedy . Pamode nowy amirewy pedo pui pagoagewo ji nono pawiabutumode Jesus kodu keje . Pagatyje karega . Pawiabutuwo boe pegare jitu keje Dykodire parore aino . 17 nowy pagoagemode jiwu amirewy ure mitotyje . Pagi jamedy pare mitotyje nono nowy amirewy ure mitotyje dumogadure . Mare amirewy ji karega inagoino . Pare nono pawoboere pugi dumogadure . Dujire inagoino . Pamagare mare paiamedy boe pagoagemode nowy amirewy mitoduji . Mare paiamedy boe pameartorure Jesusji Dykodire paroino . Emare ure pawoboedo puje . 18 Tawiabutudo nowy Israel doge ero keje . Ere boe egu barogo rogu kowu Pao Kurirewy uwai tada turo pegarewy morice . Turore aino dykeje ere nowy barogo rogu kodu kowuje jamedy . nowy okoagere nowy boe egu barogo kodu jiwyge eiamedy boe ere bato pui tuwo nowy boe egu barogo rogu kowu tuwo maku Pao Kurirewy ai turo pegarewy boe morice . 19 Mare ia boe eromode aino tuwai tadawu santo doge etai jamedy . Boe emode boe egu barogo rogu kodu maku nowy tuwai tadawu santo doge etai mare pagare eroino . Boe ere tuwai tadawu santo towuje tuwo udo nono Pao Kurirewy mogadure . Mare pagare eroino . 20 Bope doge eire boe eroino . Dykodire emode boe egu barogo rogu kodu bu ture towu ira rogu keje nowy tuwai tadawu santo doge eiogorai tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . Mare pagare eroino pagare egoino . Pao Kurirewy ji karega eroino . Bope doge eire eroino . ca iwo tawie . Tarokaba aino . Tagaba tagera maku bope doge etai . 21 Tagaba taremo nowy bope doge erore jiboeto . Tamode taremo erore jiboeto dykeje tameartorumodukare Pagimijera Jesusji pugeje . dykeje tagudumodukare nowy uva kuruce , tagoagemodukare nowy amireuce pugeje . 22 Mare meartorure Jesus jiwugenure tagi . Tamode taremo nowy bope doge eroiato dykeje tamode Jesus korigo tai . Taragamodukare nono Pagimijera Jesus raka mogadure . 23 Ia tagi tagagore : Paromode pagaidure jiwu parore jiboe jamedy boeji . Boe jokodu jire tagagoino . Mare ia tarore jiboe umode boe pegado ia tai . Tagagore : Pao Kurirewy akore parowo pagaidure jiwu parore jiboe jamedy boeji . Boe jokodu jire tagagoino . Mare ia tarore jiboe umodukare boe pemegado ia tai . 24 Tagaidukaba boe pemegawo tu tai mare tameardaedo boe pemegawo tamedagei jamedy . 25 Ure turugadu tai tawo tagirodo boe koduji nowy umode boe kodu moridowu bai keje tawo ko . Tanarakaba nowy jeture bai kejewygei kaiba pijiba nowy boe kodu aregodyre . Tabagudukaba nowy jeture nowy bai tadawu boe koduje . Pegakare rugadu . 26 Mare paga karega . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Moto jamedy boe Pao Kurirewy onure ema . Moto kejeboe jamedy boe Pao Kurirewy onure ema . 27 Meartorukare Jesus jiwu makomode tawagai tagoagewo pudabo dykeje tadudo uwai ka . Umode tugé maku tagai tagoagewo . dykeje tagoagedo ji rugadu . Tanarakaba ji kaiba pijiba nowy boe eké aregodyre . 28 Mare iaboe umode tawie nowy boe kodu rogu makuduie tuwai tadawu santo doge etai bope doge ekece dykeje tagaba ko . nowy akoino taiwu meartoru rakakare Jesusji dukodi kana akorino ? Tarduwakare . Dykodire tagaba ko . Pegakare tawo ko jamedy . Mare tamode ko dykeje nowy meartoru rakakare Jesus jiwu meardae pegamode tare ko duji . Dykodire inagoino tagawo ko . Mare paga karega . Tamodukare ko dykeje tamodukare meartoru akedydo Jesusji meardae pegakawo kodi . Mare ia tagi tagagore : Kodiba iromodukare itaidure jiboeji ? Kodiba ia meartoru rakakare Jesus jiwu umode iro jodo ? 30 Ikimadure Pao Kurirewy apo nowy iké paru tabo Dykodire ure turugadu iwo ko rugadu . Dykodire boe emago pegamodukare iroji . Ainore ia tagi tagagore . 31 Mare iwo tawie . Boe etaiwore tai tagudure ceboeji , tagoagere jiboeji . Erdumode rugadu . Dykodire tagaiwodo tarore jiboe jamedy boeji tawo taro udo nono Pao Kurirewy meardae mogadure . Boe erduwo Pao Kurirewy meardaeji pemegare rugadu duji . 32 Taro jetorodo boe erdu pegakawo tarore jiboeji . Judeu doge , boe tuginaiwyge , meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe erdu pegakawo tarore jiboeji . 33 Tarodo nono iro mogadure . Itaidure iro pemegawo boe eiamedy boei . Imeardaekare tu i . Imeardaere boe pemegawo boe eiamedy boei nowy boe emeartoruwo Jesusji uwo ekinorudo rugadu.

11 1 Irore nono Jesus Cristo ro mogadure . Dukodi care tarodo nono iro mogadure . 2 Tawiagodykare ipiji . Tameartorure ire tarduwado jiboeji . Ure turugadu iegai rugadu . 3 Mare itaidure iwo tarduwado iaboeji pugeje . Aredy ukimijerare toredyce . Imedy ukimijerare Jesusce . Jesus ukimijerare Pao Kurireuce . 4 Nono boe emode bato pui tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . Nono imedy makomode baruto Pao Kurirewy bagai nowy boe egai dykeje umode tatadawu tawyje taora piji . Makomode Pao Kurirewy batary ji nowy boe ewiagai dykeje umode tatadawu tawyje taora piji . Umodukare tatadawu tawyje taora piji dykeje umode Jesus Cristo pogurudo . 5 Mare aredy makomode baruto nowy boe egai dykeje umode iaboe upodo taora tabo . Makomode Pao Kurirewy batary ji nowy boe ewiagai dykeje umode iaboe upodo taora tabo . Umodukare iaboe upodo taora tabo dykeje umode toredy pogorudo nono ia aredy ro pegareudo ro mogadure . Marigudu boe ere aredy ro pegareudo udo tao kado boe erduwawo ji ro pegareudonure ema duji . Aredy umodukare iaboe upodo taora tabo tumagowo Pao Kurirewy batary ji boe ewiagai dykeje ure tudo nono aredy ao kadodyreudo mogadure . 6 Dykodire boe emode bato pui tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji dykeje areme ewo iaboe upodo taora tabo . Aredy umodukare iaboe upodo taora tabo dykeje uwo tao rugadu boe kado rugadu . Aredy umode tao rugadu boe kado dykeje care pogurumode . Dykodire uwo iaboe upodo taora tabo tubogurukawo . 7 Mare imedy umodukare iaboe upodo taora tabo . Emare umode boe erdudo Pao Kurirewy ro pemegareuji . Mare aredy umode boe erdudo toredy ro pemegareuji . 8 Pao Kurirewy ukare iaboe tawyje aredy piji tuwo imedy boetojiwu towuje . Ure imedy boetojiwu jura tawyje piji tuwo aredy boetojiwu towuje . 9 Pao Kurirewy ure imedy towuje boetoji . dykeje care ure aredy towuje imedy boetojiwu metiawo ema . 10 Dykodire areme emode iaboe upodo taora tabo boe erduwo tumeartorure toredy jituji . Mare Pao Kurirewy utugarege baru tadawyge erdumode boei Dykodire areme emode iaboe upodo taora tabo nowy baru tadawyge erduwo tumeartorure toredy jituji jamedy . 11 Pameartorure Pagimijera Jesusji . Dykodire aredy umodukare tumeardae udo tuginai toredy meardae piji . Nono imedy umodukare tumeardae udo tuginai toredyje meardae piji jamedy . 12 Pao Kurirewy ure imedy boetojiwu jura tawyje piji tuwo aredy boetojiwu towuje . Mare ime eiamedy ewodure tuje areme epiji jamedy . Dykodire emeardae umodukare tuginai pubiji . Nono Pao Kurirewy koiare ure boe jamedy boe towuje rugadu . 13 Itaidure tawo tameardae tawyje rugadu . Boe emode bato pui tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . Mare ukana turugadu aredy makowo baruto nowy taora kedo tabo ? 14 Boro . Ukare turugadu . Boe etaiwore Pao Kurirewy ure towu boeji tuwo turoia tawuje . Paroia koiare imedy ao raimode dykeje nowy imedy pogurumode nowy tao raire duce . 15 Mare aredy ao raimode dykeje nowy aredy motumode . Pao Kurirewy ure aredy aodo aotadawu uwo ema . Mare aotadawu ji karega inagoino . nowy aredy ao jire inagoino . 16 Ia tagi tagaidumodukare awu iwadary ji . Mare meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe erore aino . Ainore cerore jamedy . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge emode bato pui tumago pemegawo Jesusji dykeje ainore erore rugadu . 17 Mare imago pemegamodukare ia tarore jiboeji . Tare bato pui tamago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . Mare tare boe pegado tai . 18 Boe ere iwie tarore jiboeji . Egore tabokaie puapo . Ia tagi tameardae uie tuginai nowy ia tamedage epiji . Ainore boe egore . Itaidukare imeartoruwo nowy ere iwie jiboeji . Mare imeartorure . 19 Meardae pemegareuge emode tumeardae udo tuginai meardae pegareuge epiji rugadu . Dykodire boe etaiwomode tameardaeji dykeje erduwamode . Ia tagi tameardae pemegare . Boe etaiwomode dykeje erduwamode nowy inoduji . 20 Tare bato pui dykeje tameardaere tawo Pagimijera Jesus uké amirewy ko taguduwo nowu uva kuruce jamedy . Mare tagare Pagimijera Jesus uké amirewy ko tagudukare nowu uva kuruce jamedy . 21 Tare bato pui dykeje taiamedy boe tagaregodyre tagé tabo . Nono tare tagé kowuje nono rugadu . Tabagakare pu bagai tagoagewo puapo . Dykodire iage eké bokware . Kocare iage eké kurure ei jamedy . 22 Kocare tagé boimode tai dykeje tagoagedo tu toro tawai keje rugadu . Mare tadure tagé tabo boe ere bato puiwu bai ka tagoagewo boe egai mare tagare boe ekuna . Tare uké bokwareuge epogurudo . Du taro peganure meartorure Pao Kurirewy jiwyge eiamedy boei . Dykodire care imago peganure awu tarore jiboeji . Tagaidure imago pemegawo tarore jiboeji . Mare itaidukare ji . Ukare turugadu . 23 Pagimijera Jesus ure iorydywado rugadu . Ainore paromode pawo Pagimijera Jesus uké kowuje . Imedy ure Jesus maku boe eimijerage pegareuge etai . nowy boecoji Pagimijera Jesus ure tumugudo ture jorydywadowugebo tugé keje . Ure tugerago amireuji . 24 Imadure Pao Kurirewy bagai nowy tugé amirewy paru tabo . Dykejere ure nowy amirewy kado puiato . Nono akore : Awu amirewy ikodu reo . Ire imagu boe ero pegarewy morice . Dujire inagoino . Tagoagedo ji tawiabutuwo iwugeje . 25 Enogwagere dykeje Jesus ure tugerago vinho kuruji jamedy . Akore : Ikure nowy uva kuru rema . Pao Kurirewy meardae maiwu koiare imode iku redo boe ero pegarewy morice . Tagududo awu uva kuruce tawiabutuwo iwugeje , irore jiboe keje jamedy . 26 Tagoagemode awu Pagimijera uké amireuji . Tagudumode awu Pagimijera uké uva kuruce . Tarore aino dykeje tamode boe erduwado Pagimijera bire boe ero pegarewy morice dyji boe ewiabutuwo nowy bire dukeje . Tarodo aino tu tyje jii toro Pagimijera aregody ka . 27 Mare tagaiwodo tarore jiboeji tameardaere jiboeji ia taro pegarewy bagai , ia tameardae pegarewy bagai . Ia tameardae pegarewy metumode tagabo dykeje tagaba awu Pagimijera uké kowuje . Ia tameardae pegarewy metumode tagabo mare tamode ko dykeje taro peganure Pagimijera koduji , taro peganure Pagimijera kuji . Ia taro pegarewy metumode tagabo kimo mare tamode Pagimijera uké kowuje dykeje tamode nono nowy ure Pagimijera bitowyge emogadure . 29 Tagudumode awu Pagimijera uké uva kuruce , tagoagemode awu Pagimijera uké amireuji . Mare tawiagodymode Pagimijera Jesus bire paro pegarewy morice dupiji dykeje boe pegamode tai rugadu . 30 Kocare ainore tarore rugadu . Dykodire kogodyreuge tamagare . Rakakareuge tamagare jamedy . Ia tamedage ewire jamedy . 31 Mare pagaiwowo parore jiboeji boetoji paro pegarewy bagai , pameardae pegarewy bagai pawo pameardae tawyje parokawo aino pugeje pameardaekawo aino pugeje . Dykejere Pao Kurirewy ro pegamodukare pai . 32 Pao Kurirewy aiwomode paroji . Jorydymode ia paro pegareuji dykeje umode boe pegado pai tuwo paro pemegado meartorukareuge epiji . Dykodire pawarigudumodukare toro joru pegareuto meartorukare Jesus jiwugebo . 33 Dykodire tamode bato pui tagoagewo Pagimijera ukeji dykeje tabagado pu bagai tagoagewo puapo . Imedagenure tagi . 34 Ia tagi tagé boire tai dykeje tagoagedo tawai keje boetoji . Nono tamode bato pui dykeje taro pegarewy bokwamode . Nono Pao Kurirewy umodukare boe pegado tai . Itaregodymode tagae dykeje imode tarduwado pugeje iwo ia taro jetorodo pugeje.

12 1 Tanarare i tarduwawo Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure maku boe etaiwu turo pemegarewy boeji boe emaragodae boeji jamedy . Imedagenure tagi . Nono imode tarduwado boe remawuji . 2 Marigudu tameartorukare Jesusji . Boe ere taekiripagado rugadu tameartoru pagawo boe ewai tadawu tuwari santo dogei . nowy boe ewai tadawu tuwari santo doge boe karugure emage Dykodire emagokare iaboeji boe ewiagai . Pagatujere tameartorure ei . Marigudu awu inodure aino . Mare aino tameartorure Jesusji rugadu . 3 Dykodire iwo tawie . Boe emago pegamode Jesusji mare Pao Kurirewy Uwari koia karega ure egodo aino . Mare Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode boe erduwado dykeje emode tugimijerado Jesusce . Mare Pao Kurirewy Uwari umodukare boe erduwado dykeje emodukare tugimijerado ema rugadu . 4 Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure mitotyje . Emare umode meartorure Jesus jiwyge edo turugadu tumaragodaeji . Mare ure maku boe etaiwu boe emaragodae umode tu tu tuginai pubiji . 5 Meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe emaragodae ure tuginai pubiji . Mare tuwo tugera maku puaire eroino tuwo pu meartoru rakado Jesusji rugadu . Jesus jire eiamedy boe emeartorure tuwo nowy tumaragodae towuje . 6 Boe erduwamodukare tuwo ia tumedage emaragodae towuje . Mare Pao Kurirewy koiare umode boe eiamedy boe eroiwado tu tu ture maku etaiwu emaragodae jamedy boeji . 7 Pao Kurirewy Uwari rakojere meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boebo Dykodire umode eiamedy boe edo turugadu tumaragodaeji . Mare umode maku etaiwu emaragodae umode tuginai tu tu pubiji . Mare ewo boe pemegado puai du bagaire nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari roino . 8 Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode iage edo turugadu tuwo etaora pemegado enogituwawo boei . Ainore nouge emaragodaere tu tyje . Iagere Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode edo turugadu tuwo boe erduwa kurido rugadu . Dykodire care nouge emode tugera maku tumedage meartorure Jesus jiwyge etai nowy tuiorydyware jiboe tabo . 9 Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure mitotyje rugadu . Mare ure ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge edo turugadu emeartoru rakawo rugadu . Dykodire nouge emode meartorure Jesus jiwyge emeartoru rakado Jesusji rugadu tu tyje . Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge edo turugadu ewo kogodyreuge epemegago . Dykodire nouge emode boe epemegago rugadu tu tyje . Ainore emaragodaere . 10 Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge edo turugadu ero rakawo . Umode ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge edo turugadu emagowo Pao Kurirewy batary ji boe ewiagai . Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge edo turugadu erduwawo tumaragodae remawuji . Erduwawo bopere nowy ia boe emaragodae maku etai pagatyje jamedy . Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge edo turugadu emagowo boe tuginaiwyge ewadary ji taci je . Umode ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge edo turugadu emearydywo boe tuginaiwyge ewadary ji ewo boe erduwado nowy ewadary ji . 11 Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure mitotyje . Umode meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe edo turugadu tumaragodaeji . Mare ure maku etaiwu boe emaragodae mode tu tu tuginai pubiji . Emare jorydyware ture maku etaiwu emaragodaeji . 12 Boe ekanare pudogi pogorare pudogi boe etaorare jamedy Dykodire boere turugadu . Okware jiboe bokware boewo ema . Birire kodure okare jiboe bokware . Meartorure Jesus Cristo jiwyge ere nono boe ekana boe epogora mogadure boe etaora mogadure jamedy . Mare boe ekana boe epogora boe etaora ji karega inagoino . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge emaragodae jire inagoino . Emaragodae mode tuginai pubiji . Mare ere nono tuwobenure pugi dumogadure tumeartorure Jesus jitu tabo . Dujire inagoino jamedy . 13 Ia pagi Judeu dogenure pagi . Ia pagi boe tuginaiwugenure pagi . Ia pagi boe etugaregenure pagi . Ia pagi pamaragodyre pagai rugadu . Mare pameartorure Jesusji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure pameardae maiwu maku pagai tuwo pado nono pawobere pugi dumogadure . nowy Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure mitotyje rugadu . Pao Kurirewy ure nowy Tuwari maku paiamedy boe ai . 14 Dykodire pare nono pawobere pugi dumogadure . Mare pamaragodae mode tu tu tuginai . 15 Boe ewure makomodukare . Mare makomode pogoraji taidukaie tumaragodaeji pugeje . Iera maragodae pemegaie mare iera kaie gure pudumi Dykodire tudumoduie boe epogora piji . dykeje pagare akoino . Boe ewure umodukare tudawyje boe epogora piji rugadu . Ia pagi pare nono nowy boe ewure mogadure . Mare boe ewure ji karega inagoino . Nuba boemode boei dujire inagoino . Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode pamaragodae maku pagai dykeje paipagamodukare ia pamaragodae bagai pugeje . Dujire inagoino . nowy ure maku pagaiwu pamaragodae koiare pamode boe pemegado meartorure Jesus jiwugei rugadu . Dujire inagoino . 16 Bija makomodukare . Mare makomode taidukaie tumaragodaeji pugeje . Joku maragodae pemegaie mare joku kaie gure pudumi Dykodire tudumoduie aora piji . dykeje pagare akoino . Bija umodukare tudawyje aora piji . Ia pagi pare nono nowy bija mogadure . Mare bija ji karega inagoino . Nuba boemode boei dujire inagoino . Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode pamaragodae maku pagai dykeje paipagamodukare ia pamaragodae bagai pugeje . Dujire inagoino . nowy ure maku pagaiwu pamaragodae koiare pamode boe pemegado meartorure Jesus jiwugei rugadu . Dujire inagoino . 17 Pawiri mode paeku rema dykeje pamearydymodukare iaboe emagoji . Pawiri mode pawija rema dykeje pageno mearydymodukare iaboe roji . 18 Meartorure Jesus jiwyge ere nono jamedy . Mare boe eku boe ewija ji karega inagoino . Emaragodae jire inagoino . Pao Kurirewy ure meartorure Jesus jiwyge emaragodae maku etai . Du ure tumeardae tawyje ture maku etaiwu emaragodae jamedy boeji . Dujire inagoino . 19 Pao Kurirewy umodukare emaragodae udo tu tu tuginai dykeje eroiwamodukare nowy ia tumaragodaeji . Mare ure meartorure puduiwyge emaragodae udo tu tu tuginai rugadu emaragody pemegawo boe etai rugadu Pao Kurirewy maragodae jamedy boeji . Dykodire awu roiwakare iaboeji mare metia roiware ji . Metuia roiwakare iaboeji mare ia metia roiware ji . Dykodire meartorure Jesus jiwyge ere tugera maku tu tu puai tumaragody pemegawo boe etai Pao Kurirewy maragodae jamedy boeji . 21 Paeku makomodukare tugeraji taidukaie ji . Pagaura makomodukare tuwureji taidukaie ji . 22 Pagana pemegareure , pabogora pemegareure , paeku pemegareure rugadu . Mare pamago pegakawo pagana pegareuji , pabogora pegareuji , paeku pegareuji jamedy . Ere turugadu pado . Emodukare dykeje boe pegamode pai rugadu . 23 Pabogurure pai Dykodire pare pagudawu aroia upodo pabewatabo . Pare nowy pagudawu aroia upodo pabewatabo paetu pemegawo nowy pabogurure ceboeji . 24 Mare pagare pagudawu aroia upodo nowy pabogurukare ceboe tabo . Mare Pao Kurirewy meardae koiare pare aino . Aidure paetu pemegawo nowy pabogurure ceboeji . 25 Mare pabogurure ceboe ji karega inagoino . Pabogora pagana ji karega inagoino . Pawiri pagody ji karega inagoino . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge eire inagoino etu pemegawo pui , emeardae pemegawo puapo . Dujire inagoino . Emeardae pegakawo pui . Dujire inagoino . 26 Pagaora korimode nono kori jore paiamedy boeto , paganato , pabogorato . Pagera korimode nono kori jore pamororato . Mare pagaora kori pagera kori ji karega inagoino . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge eire inagoino . Boe pegamode iaji dykeje paiamedy boe pagorimode apo jamedy . Boe emago pemegamode akaoji boe egomode akao motuie nono akao karega jakaremode pudui . Akire aegaremode ai . Tu akao mitodu ji karega boe egoino . Aire boe egoino . Mare akao ji karega inagoino . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge eire inagoino . Boe pemegamode ia pamediaji dykeje paiamedy boe paegaremode apo . Dujire inagoino . 27 care tameartorure Jesus Cristoji Dykodire tare nono Jesus kana , pogora , bija , joku mogadure . Mare Jesus kana pogora bija joku ji karega inagoino . Jesus ure maku tagaiboe tamaragodae jire inagoino . Ure nowy tamaragodae udo tuginai pubiji . Dujire inagoino . Mare tagi tamugukare taginai . Tare nono Jesus uwobere dumogadure . Dujire inagoino . 28 Pao Kurirewy ure meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe emaragodae maku etai tuwo edo turugadu turore jiboeji . Dykodire uture Jesus batary tabowugenure iage mare eiamedy boe karega . Makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwugenure iage mare eiamedy boe karega . Ure boe erduwadowugenure iage mare eiamedy boe karega . Ro rakareugenure iage mare eiamedy boe karega . Pao Kurirewy ure iage erduwado ewo boe epemegago . Ure iage erduwado ewo tugera maku boe etai . Ure boe eimijerage pemegareugedo iage ewo boe eroiwado egarewo pudui . Ure iage erduwado emagowo boe tuginaiwyge ewadary ji . Ure iage erduwado ewo boe ewie nowy makore boe tuginaiwyge ewadary jiwyge emagore jiboeji . Ainore Pao Kurirewy rore tuwo tuiordae pemegarewy maku eiamedy boe etai tuwo tumaragodae maku eiamedy boe etai emaragodaece . 31 Ainore rore tai jamedy . Dykodire tado turugadu taragawo rugadu tagaiduwo Pao Kurirewy Uwariji uwo tumaragodae pemegarewy maku tagai rugadu . Mare imode tawie meartorure Jesus jiwyge ero pemegarewy remawuji.

13 1 Imagomode boe tuginaiwyge ewadary ji . Imagomode baru tadawyge ewadary ji . Mare imearydy kurimodukare boei dykeje pagamode inagoino nowy boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo , nowy baru tadawyge ewadary tabo jamedy . Iwadary pagamode nono boe emoga boeto meriri jitu mogadure pagatyje . 2 Pao Kurirewy umode iorydywado imago pemegawo Pao Kurirewy batary ji boe ewiagai . Iorydywamode rugadu boe jamedy boeji . Iorydywamode biadodyrewy boeji . Imeartoru rakamode Pao Kurireuji iwo tori kurirewy utudo tumuga piji . Mare imearydy kurire boei dutabo karega . Nono pagare irore nowy iro rakareuji . Pagare inagoino nowy Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Boe kurirewy kurugure imi jamedy . 3 Imode inoe jamedy boe maku marenaru doge etai mare itaidu tabo karega imearydy kurire ei dutabo karega . Nono pagatu jere iroino . Boe pemegamodukare i irore inodu morice . Iwiapagamodukare boei egore tumoduie iwarigu joruto imeartoruie Jesus jitu kodi mare imearydy kurire boei dutabo karega . Nono pagatu jere iroino i . Boe pemegamodukare i irore inodu morice . 4 Pamearydy kurimode boei dykeje pagorigodymodukare ei . Pagogudumode ebo . Pamearydy kurimode boei dykeje paro pemegamode ei . Pamearydy kurimode boei dykeje pagorigodymodukare nowy boe enoe keje . Mare paegaregodymode ei . Pamearydy kurimode boei dykeje pagojaromodukare pai pugeje pawadary ji . Pamearydy kurimode boei dykeje pamagomodukare tu pameardaeji mare pawiapagamode nowy pamearydy kurire jiwyge emeardaeji jamedy . 5 Pamearydy kurimode boei dykeje pawadary pegarewy modukare ei pamodukare epogurudo . Pamearydy kurimode boei dykeje pagaidumodukare boe makuduwo tu pagai . Pagaidumode boe pedodywo boe eiamedy boei . Pamearydy kurimode boei dykeje pagorigodymodukare ei . Pamearydy kurimode boei dykeje pawiabutumodukare ero pegarewy keje . 6 Pamearydy kurimode boei dykeje pagaidumodukare boe ero pegareuji mare paegaregodymode boe ero pemegarewy boe keje . 7 Pamearydy kurimode boei dykeje paetu pemegamode ei rugadu jii toro . Mearydy kurire boeiwu meardae pemegamode boei jii toro rugadu . Mearydy kurire boeiwu upagamode boe ero pemegarewy bagai jii toro rugadu . Mearydy kurire boeiwu umode tubemegado boei tu tyje tugawo tugera ra epiji jii toro rugadu . 8 Pao Kurirewy mearydy kurire boei rugadu . Du akedymodukare . Ainore boere jamedy . Boe emearydy kurire boei dujire boe etaidumode jii toro rugadu . Ia Pao Kurirewy rore jiboe akedymode . Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure boe edo turugadu ewo boe ewie Pao Kurirewy batary ji mare jii toro karega . Emode boe ewie jii toro Pao Kurirewy aidumode du oto pa ka . Nono emagomodukare pugeje . Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure boe erduwado boe tuginaiwyge ewadary ji ewo nowy boe ewie Pao Kurirewy batary ji nowy boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo mare jii toro karega . Emagomode nowy boe tuginaiwyge ewadary ji jii toro Pao Kurirewy aidumode du oto pa ka . Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode boe edo turugadu tuiorydywawo boeji rugadu jamedy mare jii toro karega . Ia meri keje nowy boe erduware jiboe akedymode . 9 Pao Kurirewy ure boe erduwado erduwawo boeji . Mare erduwamodukare boe jamedy boeji . Pao Kurirewy ure ia boe erduwado ewo boe ewie tuwadary ji . Mare erduwamodukare Pao Kurirewy batary rugadu boeji . 10 Mare jorydywarewy boe remawu aregodymode rugadu . Dykodire boe erduware jiboe akedymode . Boe emagore jiboe akedymode . 11 Imedyrogure imi kimo dykeje imagore nono boe etore emago mogadure . Imeardaere nono boe etore emeardae mogadure . Imearydyre nono boe etore emogadure . Macare irijodure . Imedynure imi . Dykodire ire boe etore erore jiboe barigu ipiji . 12 Boe etaiwomode pudui espelhoto dykeje erdumode mare erdu arudugodymode boeji . Pagaiwore Pao Kurirewy rore jiboeji nono boe etaiwore espelhoto dumogadure . Mare espelho ji karega inagoino . Pardu arudugodyre Pao Kurirewy rore jiboeji . Dujire inagoino . Mare ia meri keje paragojemode Pao Kurirewy apo rugadu dykejere pardu kicarumode ji rugadu . Iorydyware Pao Kurireuji mare biagatyje . Mare ia meri keje iorydywamode ji rugadu . Iorydywamode ji nono jorydyware i dumogadure . 13 Mare jii toro ia boe ero pemegare jiboe akedymodukare . nowy boe emeartorumode Jesusji jii toro rugadu . Dujire inagoino . nowy boe epagamode bagai aregodywo pugeje jii toro rugadu . Dujire inagoino jamedy . nowy boe emearydy kurimode Pao Kurireuji jii toro , emearydy kurimode boei jamedy jii toro rugadu . Dujire inagoino jamedy . Mare boe emearydy kurimode du pemegare nowy boe ero jamedy boe kori.

14 1 Tamearydy kurido Pao Kurireuji . Tamearydy kurido boei . Tagaidudo Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure maku tagaiwu tamaragodaeji . Tagerago ji tagaidu tabo rugadu . Tagaidudo rugadu tamagowo Pao Kurirewy batary ji . 2 Ia boe emagomode boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo boe etoiadada dykeje boe erduwamodukare nowy emagore jiboeji . Boe tuginaiwyge karugure emage Dykodire erduwakare nowy boe tuginaiwyge ewadary ji . Tu Pao Kurirewy jorydywamode egoino jiboeji . Pao Kurirewy Uwari koiare ure erduwado turaga tabo emagowo nowy boe tuginaiwyge ewadary ji . Dykodire boe erduwakare nowy biadorewy boe remawuji . 3 Mare boe emagomode Pao Kurirewy batary ji boe ewiagai ewadary tabo dykeje erduwamode emagore jiboeji , tuwadary jire egoino duji . Dykodire nowy Pao Kurirewy batary umode boe pemegado ei emeartoru kuriwo Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Nono ekiarigody utumode epiji . dykeje etaora butugugodymode pugeje . Nono eragamode . 4 Mare boe emagomode boe tuginaiwyge ewadary ji dykeje boe pemegamode tu ei . nowy boe tuginaiwyge eragojekare nono . nowy makore nowy boe tuginaiwyge ewadary jiwyge emodukare boe pemegado nowy ia boei tumagore jiboe tabo erduwakare nowy batary ji kodi . Mare boe emagomode Pao Kurirewy batary ji boe ewiagai ewadary tabo dykeje nowy boe erduwamode tumeartoruwo Jesusji rugadu . 5 Itaidure taiamedy boe tamagawo boe tuginaiwyge ewadary ji . Mare itaidu jokodukare nowy inoduji . Mare itaidure rugadu Pao Kurirewy Uwari uwo tarduwado tamagowo Pao Kurirewy batary ji boe ewiagai ewadary tabo . nowy makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwu pemegare nowy makore boe tuginaiwyge ewadary jiwu kori emagomoka Pao Kurirewy batary ji kodi . Mare ia jorydywarewy nowy boe tuginaiwyge ewadary jiwu rakojemode ebo dykeje umode boe erduwado nowy makore jiboeji . dykeje boe erduwamode nowy makore jiboeji jamedy . 6 care imagomode boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo tawiagai dykeje imodukare tarduwado boeji . Mare itaregodymode tagae dykeje imagomodukare tawiagai boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo rugadu . Itaregodymode tagae dykeje imagomode Pao Kurirewy ure iorydywado jiboeji . Dukodi imagomode iorydyware jiboeji . Imagomode meartorure Jesus jiwyge erduware jiboeji jamedy . 7 Tarduware panaji . Tarduware ikaji . Boe emodukare pana ako pemegado dykeje boe emearydymodukare akoji . Boe emodukare ika ako pemegado dykeje boe emearydymodukare akoji . 8 Boe emodukare tapira ukiga ako pemegado tugobaigarege ewagai dykeje boe emearydymodukare akoji . Nono emearydymodukare ji dykeje emodukare tudo turugadu turugodywo tumearydykare tapira ukiga akoji dukodi . 9 Dykodire tagi jamedy tamagomode boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo dykeje boe erduwamodukare nowy tagagoino jiboeji . Tamagore jiboe boe ewiagai utumode okwamode tu nono rugadu . 10 Paiamedy boe pawadary ukare nono pu bataryre . Pawadary ure tuginai tu tu pubiji . Mare boe eiamedy boe erduware tuwadary ji . 11 Mare iorydywamodukare nowy boe tuginaiwyge emagore jiwu batary ji dykeje ire nono boe tuginaiwugere jamedy . Boe tuginaiwyge erduwakare imagore jiwu iwadary ji Dykodire boe tuginaiwugenure emage rugadu . 12 care tagaidure Pao Kurirewy Uwari uwo turo pemegarewy maku tagai rugadu uwo tumaragodae maku tagai tamaragodaece . Dykodire care tagerago nowy maragodaeji rugadu . Mare tagai karega . Tawiagorodo tawo meartorure Jesus jiwyge emeartoru rakado nowy tamaragodae jiboe tabo . 13 Nono tamagomode boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo dykeje imode tawie . Tamagodo baruto Pao Kurirewy bagai Uwari uwo tarduwado nowy tagagoino jiboeji . 14 Imagomode baruto Pao Kurirewy bagai boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo dykeje itadare iorydyware imagore baruto duji . Mare iorydywakare inagoino jiboeji . 15 Du inodu tabo imagomode baruto boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo . Mare imagomode baruto Pao Kurirewy bagai iwadary tabo rugadu iorydywawo imagore jiboeji . Iragodymode Pao Kurirewy bagai boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo . Mare iragodymode Pao Kurirewy bagai iwadary tabo rugadu iorydywawo irare jiboeji . 16 Tamode bato pui tamagowo baruto Pao Kurirewy bagai . Mare tagimadumode Pao Kurireuji boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo dykeje boe erduwamodukare tamagore jiboeji . Eroiwamodukare tuwo tugerago nowy tamagoji tumeardaece . Erduwamodukare tamagore jiboeji . 17 Tagimadumode Pao Kurirewy apo nono jorydywamode tamagore jiboeji . Mare ia boe erduwamodukare tagagoino jiboeji . Dykodire nowy tawadary umodukare emeartorudo Pao Kurireuji rugadu . 18 Pao Kurirewy ure imagodo boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo taiamedy boe kori Dykodire ikimadure Pao Kurirewy apo . 19 Mare boe emode bato pui dykeje imode erduwado ewadary tabo rugadu . Imago raimode boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo nowy boe ewiagai dykeje erduwamodukare imagore jiboeji . Imode iwadary raido ewiagai boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo mare erduwamodukare ire erduwado jiboeji . Dykodire imagomodukare boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo nowy boe ewiagai rugadu . Imagomode boe ewiagai tu ewadary tabo rugadu . Imode iwadarydo ikera aboudure tyje boe ewiagai ewadary tabo du pegakare . Erduwamode inagoino jiboeji rugadu . Dykodire imagomode boe ewiagai tu ewadary remawu tabo tu tyje . Ainore imeardaere . 20 Imedagenure tagi . Tameardaekaba nono boe etore emogadure . Mare tarodo nono boe etore ero mogadure taro pegakawo . Mare tameardae udo nono ime areme emeardae mogadure . 21 Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Boe emagomode boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo . Dutabore imagomode iwobe Israel doge ewiagai . Imode boe tuginaiwyge emagodo iwobe Israel dogei . Mare du inodu tabo ewiapagamodukare iwadary ji . Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore . 22 Dykodire care parduware . Boe emagore boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo Dykodire meartorukareuge ewiagoromode Pao Kurirewy koiare ure emagodo aino boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo dyji ture tuwadary jetudo pudui duji . Mare Pao Kurirewy Uwari ure boe erduwado emagowo Pao Kurirewy batary ji boe ewadary tabo boe ewiagai Dykodire meartorure Jesus jiwyge erduware Pao Kurirewy batary jire egoino duji . 23 Dykodire care meartorure Jesus jiwyge emode bato pui . Nono eiamedy boe emagomode boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo mare ia meartorukare Jesus jiwyge emugumode nono tuwiapaga tabo emagore jiboeji dykeje emeardae pegamode ei . Egomode nouge etaora bai bai nuie kodire egoino . 24 Mare meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe emagomode Pao Kurirewy batary ji boe ewadary tabo . Nono ia meartorukare Jesus jiwyge emearydymode ewadary ji dykeje erduwamode emagore jiboeji . Ekiarigodymode turo pegareuji . Emearydymode Pao Kurirewy batary ji Dykodire erduwamode boe pegamode pudui dyji turo pegarewy morice . 25 nowy Pao Kurirewy batary koiare umode erduwado emeardae peganure duji . dykeje ekiarigodymode nowy tumeardae pegareuji . Emode tubu jodo mototo tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . Egomode : Pao Kurirewy rakojere woe tagabo rugadu . 26 Dykodire inagoino tai . Tamode bato pui dykeje ia uramode tagabo ia Pao Kurirewy ura pemegareuji . Ia umode tarduwado Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Ia makomode Pao Kurirewy ure tuwie jiwu batary ji tawiagai . Ia makomode Pao Kurirewy bakaruji boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo . Ia umode boe erduwado ewadary tabo nowy boe tuginaiwyge ewadary jipagi . Mare paga karega . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe emeartoruwo Pao Kurireuji rugadu du bagaire tarore aino . 27 Boe etaidumode tumagowo boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabo dykeje nowy boe ewo pobetyje , ewo pobe metia bokware tyje . Mare emagokawo puapo . Metia makomode . Umode tuwadary akedydo dykeje ia makomode pugeje . Nono iaboe uwo boe erduwado emagore jiboeji jamedy . 28 Mare boe edymodukare tagabo tuwo tawie tawadary tabo nowy makore boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabowyge emagore jiboeji dykeje nowy makore boe tuginaiwyge ewadary tabowyge edy pagawo tyje . Emagomode tu tudada Pao Kurireuji . 29 Pao Kurirewy ure tuwadary maku aiwyge emode pobe emode pobe metia bokware tumago tabo boe ewiagai . Mare ia meartorure Jesus jiwyge etaiwomode emagore jiboeji taiwo tabo egoino jiboe kodumode Pao Kurirewy batary remawu jitu bagai . 30 Mare Pao Kurirewy batary aregodymode ia meartorure Jesus jiwu ae nono ebo dykeje makomode rugadu . nowy iage eipagamode akoino jiboeji . nowy ia makokawo pugeje jao piapagawo akoino tumago tabo duji . 31 Tagaidumode dykeje taiamedy boe tamagomode Pao Kurirewy batary ji mare tamagokaba puapo . Taipagado tamediaji uwo tuwadary akedydo dykeje tamagomode . Dykodire boe eiamedy boe emearydy pemegamode nowy tamagore jiboeji . Erduwamode ji rugadu . Dykodire nowy Pao Kurirewy batary umode boe eiamedy boe emeartoru rakado Pao Kurireuji rugadu . 32 Pao Kurirewy Uwari umode Pao Kurirewy batary maku boe etai emagowo ji . Mare nowy makore Pao Kurirewy batary jiwyge ewo tuwudugudo tumago tabo nowy batary ji boe ewiagai . 33 Pao Kurirewy aidukare boe ewo boe pegado puapo . Mare aidure boe emugu pemegawo puapo rugadu epemegawo pui rugadu . Aidure boe eiamedy boe emeardaewo nono pumeardaere . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe ero reo . 34 Meartorure Jesus jiwyge emode bato pui dykeje areme edy kiorowo ekawo boe pegado . Ainore Judeu doge eno bakaru ure jamedy . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge eimijerage karugure emage . 35 Areme etaidumode tuiorydywawo iaboeji dykeje enaramode tugogei toro tuwai keje . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge emode bato pui tumago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . Nono aredy makomode dykeje umode tubogurudo . 36 Ia tagi tagagore tu tagi tarduwaie Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Tu tagi tamoduie boe ewie Pao Kurirewy batary ji . Mare pagare tagagoino . 37 Pao Kurirewy Uwari maragodae makudumode tagai rugadu dykeje tarduwamode Pao Kurirewy batary remawu jire inagoino tai dyji awu atugoreboe tabo . Tarduwamode Pao Kurirewy batary ji rugadu dykeje tarduwamode Pao Kurirewy batary remawu jire inagoino tai dyji awu atugoreboe tabo . Dure padure awu bapera keje tameartoruwo ji rugadu . 38 Mare ia boe ewiapagamodukare awu imagore jiwu Pao Kurirewy batary ji dykeje tawiapagakaba nowy imedyji nowy aredyji . 39 Dykodire care tagaidudo tamagowo Pao Kurirewy batary ji boe ewiagai . Mare tagaba boe emago akedydo boe tuginaiwyge ewadary ji . 40 Tamode bato pui dykeje taro jamedy boe jetorodo . Tarodo aino tu tu puregodaji . Tagaba pu pogurudo rugadu.

15 1 Imedagenure tagi . Ire tawie Jesus jiwu bakaru pemegareuji . Itaidure iwo tawie pugeje . Tameartorure nowy bakaru pemegareuji . Tagare tagera ra tameartorure Jesus jitu piji . 2 Imagore nowy bakaru pemegareuji tawiagai . Tamodukare tagera ra nowy batary piji dykeje Jesus umode taginorudo rugadu . Mare iage egore pagaie tameartoruie ji . Egore Jesus jewodukaie pugeje . 3 Mare ire tawie makudure inaiwu batary ji rugadu . nowy batary pemegare boe jamedy boe kori . Ainore ure . Jesus Cristo bire paro pegarewy morice . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary ure pawie marigudu . Akore umode boe ekinorudowu bimoduie boe ero pegarewy morice . 4 Boe ere Jesus tugu tori poroto mare merire pobe metia bokware dykeje Jesus jewodure pugeje . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary ure pawie marigudu . Akore nowy umode boe ekinorudowu jewodumoduie pugeje rugadu . 5 Nono Jesus jewodure pugeje rugadu . Dykejere ure Pedro jorydydo pudui . Dykejere Jesus ure nowy ture jorydywadowyge eiamedy boe erdudo pudui jamedy . 6 Dykejere Jesus ure boe doge erdudo pudui jamedy . nowy boe doge enodo padure quinhentos . Meartorure Jesus jiwugere emage . nowy boe eragoje kimore mare eiamedy boe karega . Iage ewire . 7 Nono Jesus ure Tiago jorydydo pudui . Nono ure nowy utumode Jesus batary tabowyge eiamedy boe erdudo pudui . 8 Dykejere Jesus ure iorydydo pudui . Imire iorydyre Jesusji boigody . Jesus rakojere moto keje mare imeartorukare ji . Ruture baruto . Toro ia meri keje ure iorydydo pudui . dykeje care imeartorure ji rugadu . 9 Dykodire imire boe karugure imi nowy uture Jesus batary tabowyge ekori . Marigudu imeartorukare Jesusji Dykodire iro pegare meartorure Jesus jiwugei rugadu . Dykodire ipogurure Jesus makore iwagai dyje . 10 Mare Pao Kurirewy ro pemegare i rugadu . Dykodire makore iwagai ituwo Jesus jiwu bakaru tabo boe etae jamedy . Ro pemegare i rugadu Dykodire emare ure iragado imaragodywo pudai rugadu . Imaragody rakare nowy ia uture Jesus jiwu bakaru tabowyge ekori . Mare imi karega . Pao Kurirewy koiare ure iragado imaragody pemegawo . 11 Dykodire nowy uture Jesus jiwu bakaru tabowyge enogwa kodu pegakare imagore jiboe rekodaji . Dykodire cemagore jiboe ukare tuginai pubiji . cemagore jiboe jire tameartorure . 12 cere tawie Jesus Cristo jewoduie pugeje duji . Mare ia tagi tagagore bireuge ewodumodukaie pugeje . 13 Mare bireuge ewodumodukare dykeje Jesus Cristo jewodumodukare pugeje jamedy . 14 Jesus Cristo jewodumodukare pugeje dykeje pagatyje cemagomode Jesus jiboeji boe ewiagai . Jesus Cristo jewodumodukare pugeje dykeje pagatyje boe emeartorumode ji . 15 Jesus jewodumodukare pugeje dykeje cewadrarodunure Pao Kurirewy rore jiboeji . cemagore Pao Kurirewy uie Jesus Cristo jewodudo pugeje . Mare bireuge ewodumodukare pugeje dykeje Pao Kurirewy umodukare Jesus jewodudo pugeje . 16 Bireuge ewodumodukare pugeje dykeje Jesus jewodumodukare pugeje jamedy . 17 Jesus jewodumodukare pugeje dykeje pameartoru pagamode tyje . Jesus jewodumodukare pugeje dykeje padumode bope doge eda kejewy joru pegarewy ka paro pegarewy morice . 18 Bireuge ewodumodukare pugeje dykeje nowy meartorure Jesus jiwyge bireuge ewodumodukare pugeje jamedy . 19 Pabagamode Jesus Cristo bagai uwo boe pemegado pai mare paewodumodukare pugeje dykeje kiarigodyreuge mode pagi rugadu . Pagiarigodymode boe eiamedy boe ekori moto jamedy boe parugajeje . 20 Mare Jesus Cristo jewodure pugeje rugadu . Dykodire ure parduwado . Bireuge ewodumode pugeje jamedy . Eiewodumode rugadu . 21 Boetojiwu imedy Adão ro pegare Dykodire bire . Dykodire boe eiamedy boe ewimode rugadu . Boere nono nowy Adãore kodi . Adão imedy boetojiwunure ema . Dykodire boe eiamedy boe ere nono Adãore rugadu . Dykodire boe eiamedy boe ewimode jamedy nono Adão bire dumogadure . Mare Jesus jewodure pugeje . Jewodurewy boetojiwunure ema . Dykodire umode boe eiamedy boe ewodudo pugeje jamedy . Mare paga karega . Boe emeartorumode Jesusji dykeje mugu pemegare Jesus apowugenure emage jamedy . Dykodire Jesus umode meartorure puduiwyge ewodudo pugeje nono tuiewodu mogadure . 23 Mare ukare ewodudo pugeje raga . Umode boe ewodudo pugeje Pao Kurirewy aidure kejewy meri keje . Jesus Cristo jewodure pugeje boetoji . Toro ia meri keje aregodymode pugeje . care umode meartorure puduiwyge ewodudo pugeje jamedy . 24 Dykejere boe jamedy boe akedymode . Jesus Cristo umode bope doge eraga tawyje epiji . Umode maroboe eimijera raka tawyje piji . Umode boe eimijerage eraga tawyje epiji jamedy . Dykodire emodukare boe pegado boei pugeje . Dykejere Jesus umode tudugarege emagu Pao Kurirewy ai emeartoruwo tu Pao Kurireuji rugadu . Eimijera mode Pao Kurireuce rugadu jii toro . 25 Jesus Cristo boe eimijera kurirewynure ema . Pao Kurirewy umode jorydy pegare puduiwyge eraga tawyje epiji rugadu . Umode nowy jorydy pegare Jesus Cristo jiwyge eraga akedydo rugadu . 26 Dykejere boigody Pao Kurirewy umode boe ewi akedydo . Dykodire boe ewimodukare pugeje . 27 Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Pao Kurirewy ure nowy umode boe ekinorudowu raka kurido boe jamedy boe kori rugadu . Jesus Cristo jire akoino . Mare nowy Jesus Cristo raka kodumoka Pao Kurirewy raka kori . Pao Kurirewy emare umode Jesus Cristo raka kurido . 28 Ure Jesus Cristo raka kurido boe jamedy boe kori dykeje Jesus umode tudo nono Pao Kurirewy utugaredo pudumi dukodiwore . Dykejere boe eiamedy boe eimijera kurirewy mode Pao Kurireuce rugadu . Nono boe eiamedy boe emeartorumode tu ji rugadu . 29 Ia tagi tare tagao pegodo tamagowo nowy bireuge eparu tabo nono meartorukare Jesus jiwyge ero mogadure . Mare tagagore boe ewodumodukaie pugeje . Dykodire tamagore jiboe ure tuginai taroino jiboe piji . Mare bireuge ewodumode pugeje rugadu . 30 Dujire cere boe ewie rugadu . cemagore Jesus jiwu bakaru pemegareuji rugadu . Dykodire ro pegareuge etaidure turo pegawo cei rugadu cewo cegera nowy cemago piji . Mare cewiapagakare ei . cemago kimore Jesus jiboeji . Mare paga karega . Jesus jewodure pugeje rugadu . Dykodire cegare cegera ra nowy cemago piji boe ewiagai rugadu . 31 Ro pegareuge etaidure tuwo iwido meri jamedyji . Dykodire ire nono birewy mogadure meri jamedyji . Imedagenure tagi . Inojarore i tameartorure Jesus jituji . Pamugu pemegare Jesus Cristo apo kodi . Pagimijeranure ema . Dykodire inure tawie . 32 Ire iragado i nono rugodymode barogo jiwu ro mogadure iwo Éfeso ba kurirewy kejewyge emeartorudo Jesusji . Mare irugody ji karega inagoino . Imago raire ei emeartoruwo Jesusji . Dujire inagoino . Mare itaidumode boe pemegawo tu i imagomodukare aino ewiagai . Jesus jewodumodukare pugeje dykeje pagare inagoino ei . Jesus jewodumodukare pugeje dykeje imagomode nono ia boe emago mogadure . Egore : Paguduwo rugadu . Parduwamoka nuba boemode pai barogwato . Pagwagewo rugadu pawiwo paguredy tabo . Ainore egore . Mare Jesus jewodure pugeje rugadu Dykodire ire iragado i iwo boe emeartorudo Jesusji . 33 Dykodire ire tawie . Boe etaidumode tuwo taekiripagado . Mare boe jokodu jire ia boe egore : Boe emode tumedagedo ro pegareugece dykeje ro pemegareuge emodukare emage pugeje . Ero pegamode nono nowy tumedage maiwyge ro pegareuge ero mogadure . Boe jokodu jire nowy boe egoino . 34 ca . Taeku jado . Tameardae pemegado pugeje nono tameardae pemegarewy boetojiwu mogadure . Tagera ra taro pegarewy piji . Iorydyware tai . Ia tagi tarduwakare Pao Kurireuji . Taboguruwo dubagaire inagoino tai . 35 Ia tagi tanarare i . Tagagore : Boe ewodumode mare nuba emode ? Emode nono tumogadure ? Ainore tanarare i . 36 Kodire imode tawie . Tarduwa bokware ! Boe ere iaboe tugu to boepato . Mare nowy boe a bimode jao dykeje botumode . 37 Boe emode trigo a tugu mototo . Boe emode kuieda a tugu mototo . Emode nowy ia boe a tugu jamedy . Mare boe are boe ere tugu . Boe boturedy karega boe ere tugu . 38 Nono nowy trigo a botumode ricodumode . Nono umode nono trigo remawu mogadure rugadu . Kuieda a botumode ricodumode . Nono umode nono kuieda remawu mogadure rugadu . Pao Kurirewy emare ure nowy boe a ricodudo motudo rugadu nono tuiordae tumeardaere . 39 Kare , barege , kiebarege ekodu ukare nono pumogadure . Boe ekodu ure tuginai . Barege ekodu ure tuginai . Kiebarege ekodu ure tuginai . Kare ekodu ure tuginai jamedy . 40 Meri rakojere baru tada . Ari rakojere baru tada . Kuieje doge eragojere baru tada jamedy . Eiamedy boe emodure . Mare emodu ure tuginai moto kejeboe emodu piji . Mare meri ari kuieje doge erugu ure tuginai tu tu pubiji jamedy . Meri urugu rakare meriji . Ari kuieje doge erugu rakare boecoji . nowy kuieje doge erugu ure tuginai tu tu pubiji jamedy . 42 Ainore bireuge emode . Ewimode mare ewodumode pugeje . Nono emode tuginai tubiji . Boe ewire dykeje boe ere birewy tugu mototo nono boe ere boe a tugu to boepato dumogadure . Mare boe a ji karega inagoino . Boe ewimode dykeje etugudure mototo . Dujire inagoino . Mare Pao Kurirewy umode nowy birewy jewodudo pugeje nono nowy boepa tadaboe botumode dumogadure . Mare boepa tadaboe ji karega inagoino . Pao Kurirewy umode birewy jewodudo pugeje dykeje bimodukare pugeje . Dujire inagoino . 43 Boe emode birewy tugu mototo dykeje nowy birewy motu bokware . Raka akedyre . Dykodire bire . Mare Pao Kurirewy umode jewodudo pugeje dykeje motumode . Rakamode . 44 Boe emode birewy tugu mototo dykeje rare kodure birire . Dujire eroino . Boe eragojere moto keje kodi . Dykodire boe emode bireuge etugu mototo . Mare Pao Kurirewy umode ewodudo pugeje dykeje ekodu ewiri umode tuginai . Boe ewirimode ekodumode . Mare umode tuginai pugeje emuguwo nono baru tada Pao Kurirewy apo . 45 Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore : Imedy boetojiwu iere Adão . Pao Kurirewy ure nowy Adão towuje Dykodire nowy Adão ure . Ainore nowy Pao Kurirewy batary akore . Mare Jesus jewodure pugeje dykeje kodu biri ure tuginai pugeje rakojewo baru tada . Emare umode boe ewodudo pugeje Dykodire umode nowy jewodureuge ewiri ekodu udo tuginai jamedy eragojewo baru tada pudabo . 46 Pao Kurirewy ure Adão towuje moto urugudukudu tabo . Dykodire moto pijire Adão aregodyre . Nono boe eiamedy boe ere nono Adão mogadure boetoji . Mare Jesus Cristo aregodyre baru piji . Nono meartorure Jesus jiwyge ewodumode pugeje dykeje ewiri ekodu umode tuginai . Dykodire emode nono baru pijiwu mogadure boigody . 48 Moto kejewyge ere nono moto pijiwu mogadure . Mare utumode baru towyge emode nono baru pijiwu mogadure . 49 Pare nono nowy moto pijiwu Adão mogadure . Mare ia meri keje pamode nono baru pijiwu Jesus mogadure . 50 Imedagenure tagi . Iwo tarduwa pemegado . Pao Kurirewy umode tugimijerado pudumi tuwo boe emugudo pudabo baru tada . Mare boe ekodu utumodukare baruto . Boe ekodu rakojemodukare Pao Kurirewy apo . Boe ekodu akedymode . Ukare nono jewodurewy kodu mogadure . 51 Imode tawie boe erduwakare jiboeji . Ia pagi pawimodukare . Mare Pao Kurirewy o tapira ukiga akomode taci ia boiwu meri keje dykeje umode paiamedy boe pawiri udo tuginai pagody udo tuginai taci je . Pamode paeku to piki pui dykeje pawiri umodukare nono tumogadure pugeje , pagody umodukare nono tumogadure pugeje . Mare Pao Kurirewy o tapira ukiga akomode boiwu meri keje dykejere umode bireuge ewodudo taci je jamedy . Nono ewimodukare pugeje rugadu . Dykejere umode bikarewyge emeartorure Jesus jiwyge ewirido tuginai eragojewo pudabo jamedy . Ewimodukare rugadu . 53 nowy bikareuge ewimodukare pugeje . Mare Pao Kurirewy umode ewiri udo tuginai ekodu udo tuginai . Dykodire ewimodukare rugadu . 54 Pao Kurirewy umode boe eiamedy boe ewiri udo tuginai , ekodu udo tuginai ewikawo pugeje rugadu . Padure bapera kejewy Pao Kurirewy batary akore aino rugadu . Jetumode pudui rugadu . Akore : Boe ewi akedy . Boe ewimodukare pugeje rugadu . Pao Kurirewy ure boe pegareboe akedydo boe ewikawo pugeje rugadu . 55 Boe ewi akedyre rugadu . Boe ewi umodukare boe ekorido pugeje ! Ainore Pao Kurirewy akore . 56 Marigudu Pao Kurirewy makore boei ero pegakawo pugeje . Mare nowy Pao Kurirewy batary ure boe emeardae pegarewy korigo Dykodire nowy boe emeardae pegarewy ure turagado pudui tuwo nowy boe ero pegado rugadu . Boe ero pegare Dykodire boe ewimode . Boe erokwacerewy bokwa . Boe ewimode rugadu . 57 Mare pagimaduwo Pao Kurirewy apo . Emare ure Jesus Cristo maku pagai pagimijerace . Jesus emare umode turaga maku pagai pawiapagakawo pameardae pegareuji pugeje pawo pagera ra paro pegarewy piji rugadu . Umode paginorudo rugadu . 58 Imearydy kurire jiwyge imedagenure tagi rugadu . Taragado tai tameartoruwo Jesusji rugadu . Tagaba tagera ra piji . Tagera kiarikaba tamaragodaeji tamaragodywo Pagimijera ai rugadu . Paga karega boe emaragodymode Pao Kurirewy ai rugadu . Tarduware nowy inoduji marigudu rugadu.

16 1 Tare iwie tagaiduie tawo ia diero maku toro Judéia moto kejewyge meartorure Jesus jiwyge ewagai . Ire Galácia moto kejewyge meartorure Jesus jiwyge erduwado marigudu . Tarodo nono nowy Galácia kejewy meartorure Jesus jiwyge ero mogadure . Ainore erore . Ere bato pui tu tyje domingo meri keje . Ere bato pui dykeje eiamedy boe ere ia to diero rogu maku . Erore aino tu tyje Dykodire ere nowy diero rogu kurido . ca . Tarodo nono nowy ero mogadure jii itaregodyre tagae du ka . Nono itaregodymode tagae dykeje nowy tare maku diero kurimode jamedy tawo maku toro Judéia moto kejewyge meartorure Jesus jiwyge ewagai . 3 Itaregodymode tagae dykeje pamode ia tagaidure jiwu boe etudo nowy diero tabo ewo nowy diero reko toro Judéia moto kejewyge ewagai Jerusalém ba kurirewy ka . Imode atugoreboe maku etai nowy Judéia moto kejewyge erduwawo kaibowu pijiba nowy diero aregodyre . 4 Boemode turugadu dykeje itumode ebo toro Jerusalém ba kurirewy ka jamedy . 5 Itumode Macedônia moto ka . Dupijire itumode tagae iorydywo tai . 6 Nono iorydywakare kaba meri kejeba itumode tabiji . Itaidure iragoje raiwo tagabo . Mare iorydywakare . Imeardaere iragojewo tagabo jii toro biakumodewu ari akedy ka . Mare iorydywakare . Dykejere tamode tagera maku inai ituwo pugeje . Mare iorydywakare raga kaiba itumode . 7 Itaidukare ituwo tabiji kuri aino . Pagimijera Jesus aidumode dykeje iragoje raimode tagabo rugadu . 8 Iragojere woe Éfeso ba kurirewy keje . Iragojemode woe kuri Judeu doge ewadae Pentecostes akedy ka . 9 Inure awu boe ewie Jesus jiwu bakaru pemegareuji woe . Etaidure tuiorydywawo cewadary ji rugadu . Emagare rugadu . Imeardaere emeartorumode Jesusji rugadu . Mare ia boe erdu pegare cewadary ji jamedy . nowy jorydy pegarewy ceiwyge emagare jamedy . 10 Timóteo aregodymode tagae dykeje tagimadudo apo rugadu mugu pemegawo tagabo . Emare maragodyre Pagimijera ai nono imaragody mogadure . 11 Tagaba tameardae pegado ji . Tagera maku ai utu pemegawo tugodyre jiwu awaraji . Utumode tabiji dykeje Timóteo aregodymode mato itae pugeje ia meartorure Jesus jiwugebo pugeje . Ipagare ewagai woe . 12 Imagore pamedia Apoloji utuwo tagae jamedy ia meartorure Jesus jiwugebo . Mare meardaere ukare turugadu tuduwo kuri aino . Mare umode turugadu dykeje utumode tagae rugadu . 13 Taeku jado . Tameartoru rakado Jesusji . Taragado tai . Tabagudukaba . 14 Tamearydy kurido Pao Kurireuji tawo tarore jiboe jamedy boe udo turugadu Pao Kurirewy jakai . Tamearydy kurido boei jamedy tawo tarore jiboe jamedy boe udo turugadu boei . 15 Imedagenure tagi . Dykodire imode tawie . Tarduware imedy Estefanaji . Tarduware uwai kejewygei . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge boetojiwugenure emage tago moto keje , Acaia moto keje . Ere tumagu tagai . Ere tumagu meartorure Jesus jiwyge etai jamedy tuwo tarduwado Pao Kurirewy batary ji tuwo boe pemegado tai , tuwo boe pemegado meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boei . Tameartorudo nowy Estéfanas uwai kejewygei . Ia boe emaragodymode Estéfanas apo turowo nono Estéfanas ro mogadure dykeje tameartorudo ei jamedy . Tarodo nono ero mogadure tawo boe pemegado meartorure Jesus jiwugei jamedy . Imedagenure tagi . Dykodire inagoino tai . 17 Imedy Estéfanas aregodyre itae . Imedy Fortunato aregodyre itae . Imedy Acaico aregodyre itae jamedy . Etaregodyre itae tabiji . Ekimadure itabo tagai . Dykodire ere iegaredo i . 18 Ikiarigodyre tawagai mare ekimadure itabo tagai Dykodire iegarere i pugeje . Ere iegaredo i nono ero moga tai toro dumogadure . Awu ime ero pemegare rugadu . Tawiagodykaba epiji . Tamago pemegado pu biagai erore jiboeji . 19 Ásia moto kejewy meartorure Jesus jiwyge etaidure tugimaduwo tagabo jamedy . Imedy Áqüila , aredy Priscila etaidure tugimaduwo tagabo . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge emode bato pui ewai tada tu tyje . nowy meartorure Jesus jiwyge etaidure tugimaduwo tagabo jamedy . 20 Awu woewu meartorure Jesus jiwyge etaidure tugimaduwo tagabo jamedy . Tagimadudo puapo nono meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe ero mogadure . Meartorure Jesus jiwyge ere tumedagedo puge Dykodire eroino pui tugimadu tabo . 21 Paulonure imi . Imire ire awu batary bu awu bapera keje ikera tabo rugadu ikimaduwo tagabo rugadu . 22 Boe pegamode mearydy kurikare Jesus jiwugei . Ainore inagore . Itaidure Pagimijera Jesus aregodywo kuri aino jamedy . Aregodymode dykeje mearydy kurikare Jesus jiwyge ewarigudumode bope doge eda kejewy joru pegareuto rugadu . 23 Mare pagimijera Jesus Cristo uwo turo pemegarewy maku tagai rugadu aregodykare raga pawagai duji . 24 Pameartorure Jesus Cristoji Dykodire pawoboenure puge . Dykodire imearydy kurire tai rugadu . Iwadary urugadureu.


################################################################
II Coríntios II Coríntios II Coríntios II Coríntios II Coríntios
################################################################


1 1 Paulonure imi . Pao Kurirewy makore iwagai tuwo itudo Jesus Cristo batary tabo boe ewagai . Ainore Pao Kurirewy meardaere rugadu . Inure awu atugoreboe pemegado iwo maku meartorure Jesus jiwyge boe etai Corinto ba kurirewy todawyge etae . Inure awu atugoreboe pemegado iwo maku Acaia moto kejewyge meartorure Jesus jiwyge eiamedy boe etai jamedy . Pamedia Timóteo unure awu atugoreboe maku tawagai jamedy . 2 Pao Kurirewy ro pemegawo tai . Uwo tamearydy kurido pudui tabagudukawo boe pegareuce pugeje tabemegawo pui jamedy . Pagimijera Jesus Cristo ro pemegawo tai jamedy . Uwo tamearydy kurido pudui jamedy tabemegawo pui rugadu . 3 Pamago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . Pagimijera Jesus Cristo uonure ema . Pao Kurirewy emare okudugodymode boebo rugadu . Tu Pao Kurirewy umode tugera maku boe etai . 4 Boe pegamode pai dykeje umode tugera maku pagai rugadu . Dykodire paroiware pawo pagera maku iage etai jamedy . Boe pegamode ei dykeje pamode pagera maku etai nono Pao Kurirewy rore pai dumogadure . 5 Moto kejere boe pegare Jesus Cristoji rugadu . Aino care boe pegare cei nono jamedy . Mare cemeartorure Jesus Cristoji Dykodire Pao Kurirewy ure tugera maku cenai . 6 Cedaidure cewo cegera maku tagai tameartoruwo Jesusji uwo taginorudo tagawo taro pegarewy morido pugeje . Dykodire ro pegareuge ere boe pegado cei . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure turaga maku cenai ceragawo cei . Dykodire umode tugera maku tagai jamedy . Boe pegamode tai dykeje Pao Kurirewy umode turaga maku tagai taragawo tai jamedy tawudugudo tai jii toro nono rore cei dumogadure . 7 Dykodire cerduware tameartorumode Jesus jituji rugadu . Boe pegare tai nono boe pegare cei dumogadure . Mare Pao Kurirewy ure tugera maku tagai jamedy nono turo mogadure cei dumogadure . 8 Cemedagenure tagi . Cedaidure cewo tawie pugeje . Ceragojere Ásia moto keje dykeje boe pegare cei rugadu . Boe pegare cei rugadu . Cemeardaere cewimoduie rugadu . 9 Cemearydyre boe egore tumoduie cewido rugadu . Boe pegare aino cei rugadu . Pao Kurirewy koiare ure boedo aino cei cewiagodykawo cemertorukawo tu cei . Mare Pao Kurirewy batary jire cemeartorumode tu rugadu . Emare ure tugera maku cenai . Emare umode bireuge ewodudo pugeje rugadu . 10 Pao Kurirewy ure ceginorudo cewi piji . Ure ceginorudo ia boe pegarewy piji . Umode ceginorudo rugadu . Dykodire cemeartorure ji rugadu kodire cebagamode bagai rugadu . Cerduware umode ceginorudo rugadu duji . 11 Tamagore baruto Pao Kurirewy bagai cebaru tabo jamedy . Dutabore tare tagera maku cenai . Boe emagare tumago tabo baruto cebaru tabo . Nono Pao Kurirewy umode emagore bagaiboe udo turugadu rugadu . Umode boe pemegado cei rugadu . Dykodire boe emagamode tugimadu tabo Pao Kurirewy apo rugadu . Emago pemegamode Pao Kurirewy rore jiboeji rugadu . 12 Cedaora urukare toro ia boe emeardae pegarewy boeji . Pao Kurirewy ure turo pemegarewy maku cenai Dykodire cegare taekiri pagado . Ure turo pemegarewy maku cenai Dykodire cemago pagakarugure tai . Ainore cerore boe eiamedy boei . Dykodire cedaidure awu Pao Kurirewy ure maku cenaiwu cemeardaeji . Ia boe ekare cerduwado awu cemeardaeji . Pao Kurirewy koiare ure nowy cemeardae maku cenai . 13 Cere awu atugoreboe towuje Pao Kurirewy batary tabo tawagai . Awu atugoreboe tadaboe tagaiwomode ji . Tarduwamode nowy atugoji . Mare tarduwamodukare nowy atugo jamedy boeji taci je . Mare ia meri keje tarduwamode jamedy boeji rugadu . Toro ia meri keje pugeje Pagimijera Jesus aregodymode dykeje tamago pemegamode cei cere tarduwado Pagimijera batary jamedy boeji . Nono cemago pemegamode tai jamedy tamearydy pemegare cere tarduwado jiwu Pao Kurirewy batary jamedy boeji . 15 Iorydyware tagaidure Pao Kurirewy batary ji rugadu Dykodire ire imeardae boetojiwu tawyje ituwo tawagai iwo tarduwado Pao Kurirewy batary jamedy boeji . Imeardaere itaregodywo toro tagae iwo taegaredo tai . Dykejere itumode toro Macedônia moto ka tabiji . Nono imode ikirimi pai ibagi ikodaji pugeje toro tawagai iwo taegaredo tai pugeje . Nono tamode diero maku inai tawo itudo nowy Judéia moto kejewy meartorure Jesus jiwyge etae . 17 Ire awu imeardae tawyje rugadu . Itaidure irowo aino rugadu . Imode iwadarydo mitotyje . Imodukare iwadarydo pobe . 18 Pao Kurirewy kodumode tuwadary ji tu rugadu . Ainore irore jamedy . Imeardaere jiboe ire rugadu tawyje tawiagai . Dykodire ire tawie aino imeardaeji . nowy imeardae imode towuje rugadu . Ia boe emeardae karega . Pao Kurirewy jorydyware imeardaeji . 19 Jesus Cristo batrarodumodukare . Pao Kurirewy onaregedynure ema . Imedy Silas ure tarduwado Jesusji . Timóteo ure tarduwado Jesusji jamedy . Imi jamedy ire tarduwado Jesusji . Jesus umodukare tuwadary makado . Umode tuwadarydo mitotyje . 20 Pao Kurirewy ure boe ewie marigudu turomode jiboeji . Awu Jesus jire Pao Kurirewy akoino rugadu . Pamearydymode awu Pao Kurirewy batary ji dykeje pagagomode boe jokodu ji rugaduie akoino pamago pemegawo Pao Kurireuji . 21 Pao Kurirewy emare ure parduwado rugadu pamugu pemegawo Jesus Cristo apo . Pao Kurirewy emare ure tugerago pai pudae tuwo pado paginai . 22 Ure tugerago pai Dykodire ure pagiedo . Nono parduware Pao Kurirewy ure tugerago jiwu boenure pagi duji . Pao Kurirewy ure Tuwari maku pagai jamedy . Rakojere pagabo . Dykodire parduware Pao Kurirewy umode turo pemegarewy iado pai dyji rugadu . 23 Pao Kurirewy jorydyware imeardaeji rugadu . Iwadrarodumodukare tai . Itaregodymode tagae dykeje inogwa jetumode taro pegare jiboeji tawiagai . Dykodire itukare tawagai inogwa jetumode taro pegarewy jitu kodi . Itaidukare iwo tagiarigo dukodi . Dykodire itukare tawagai toro Corinto ba kurirewy ka . 24 Cedaidukare cewo ceragado tai tameartorure jiboeji . Cerduware tai . Tameartorure Jesusji rugadu . Mare cedaidure tameartoruwo Jesusji tagaidu tabo . Cedaidure cewo tarduwado butugu tabo taegare tabo.
